story:
We have a dream….a dream of world peace, it begins with peace within one's own heart. Quite a few years ago, we began to experience peace through yoga and meditation. We felt we were being called by God to share this peace others by opening a yoga studio. There were so many obstacles in the way at that time, so many that we began to doubt the calling. We turned it over to our Higher Power, who we choose to call God. As we prayed about it, we were led to the Ahh Meditation guided by Dr. Wayne Dyer (it's free on Youtube). Every morning we meditated on the sacred sound of Ahh while thinking about our intention. Then things began falling into place. We give all the glory to God for making the impossible POSSIBLE!! We decided to name the studio Ahh-mazing Yoga to glorify God.

A little over two years ago, we opened the doors of Ahh-mazing Yoga Shala, our quaint studio on Hollywood Beach! We feel truly blessed to able to share yoga and meditation with so many people. We are completely blown away by the positive response from our customers and the community, words simply cannot express how blessed and honored we feel.

So this brings us back to our dream:  We want to open a larger second Shala so we can share the peace of yoga with more people. We once again began to doubt the timing due to obstacles in the way.  We turned it over to our Higher Power by praying and meditating daily and once again, things have begun to fall into place. We have been offered an opportunity to lease a space in a fabulous location in Davie with plenty of space to practice and hold teacher trainings. There will be showers, changing rooms and plenty of FREE parking! However, this space needs a lot of remodeling and that's where we are in need of your help. We are in need of the financial means to make this dream a reality. Since Domenic's background is in construction (he created our first Shala), he will be doing most of the work himself so that saves us a lot of money but materials are still very expensive. We thank you for any amount you could give to our project and we promise to keep you updated on the progress. We thank you for being the Ahh-mazingly unique and beautiful person that you are.

Namaste,

Domenic & Mary Nappa

If you have a chance, please check out our website for more information about us!

http://www.ahh-mazingyoga.com

story:
The AutoBrush for Kids Genesis

The idea for AutoBrush Kids happened when I took my two-year-old to the doctor and he asked if I was brushing her teeth yet.  "Of course, twice a day every day. We love brushing our teeth, don't we sweet pea." I responded looking for the gold star mom award.  


In reality, the closest I had gotten to brushing my daughters’ teeth was buying her a toothbrush so she could put it in her mouth to be like me.  Trust me, all she did was put it in her mouth. The brushing going on was zero. In fact, she stopped even putting it in her mouth about two seconds after she discovered daddy had an electric toothbrush she could use.  By use, I mean that she would steal it and hide it somewhere around the house so daddy could have a panic attack looking for it every morning.


So, I went home feeling like I mom-failed big time with the full intention of brushing my little ladies teeth regularly without fail.  I even stopped at the store and got her some special kids strawberry toothpaste. When it came time to start brushing, the moment my mom-game was going to be strong again, my daughter started screaming in hysterics.  She wasn't going to help me out with my perfect mom mission.


At this point, being a human who couldn't accomplish a simple task, I started questioning whether or not kids ACTUALLY need to brush their teeth that well or regularly.  I mean, their baby teeth will fall out eventually anyway right? What's the big deal? This is just the "man" trying to get me to buy more stuff! To calm myself down and prove myself right, I went to the internet to do some research.  This is a mistake I have made before. What I actually found out was that having my little one brush her teeth is incredibly important!

 

 

Compared to kids with poor oral health, children who establish good oral hygiene habits at a young age:

  • Are less likely to get sick
  • Are more likely to continue excellent brushing and flossing as adults, experiencing far fewer dental problems throughout life
  • Maintain a positive self-image
  • Perform better in school
  • Have a better relationship with food
 

That's when the idea of the AutoBrush transpired.  If kids tooth brushing is so important, how can we as parents get them excited about brushing their teeth?  I was on a rally to find a way to get my daughter to start creating a positive relationship with dental hygiene to carry her through the rest of her life.


Thanks to the innovative team at AutoBrush, I am now equipped with a solution!  The first children's innovation in dental care in decades; AutoBrush for Kids is not only fun for my daughter but it cleans every surface of her teeth which was impossible to accomplish with a normal or even electric toothbrush.

 

What do dentists say about automatic dental care for kids?

They endorse it wholeheartedly!  There are a few things they recommend you consider when planning proper dental care for your children that the AutoBrush for Kids innovation took into account.

  1. Kids can be frightened by an electric toothbrush. They buzz; they make noise; they can tickle or feel weird on gums and teeth. Kids have more sensitive gag reflexes than adults that are designed to protect their smaller airways from obstruction. As a result, anything that goes into a child’s mouth is likely to be more uncomfortable than for an adult. AutoBrush for Kids allows your child to get a clean mouth in less than 15 seconds and it also plays a pleasant song that makes the routine fun instead of scary.
  2. Kids look to their parents for guidance. Show your child what you do, and he will want to mimic it. Even before a parent sticks a toothbrush in a kid’s mouth, that child should see his mom or dad exhibiting good brushing habits, especially if the parent decides to introduce an electric toothbrush. As parents and role models we are not likely going around the house flossing, brushing, and smiling. For this reason, we recommend introducing an adult AutoBrush into your routine when you first give the AutoBrush to your child.  Make it look like fun, and kids will want to be part of it. Since it is hands-free maybe you could play some patty cake while it is running!
  3. Some children breathe primarily through their mouth, rather than their noses. These kids may be less likely to enjoy brushing, as it can be hard to breathe and brush at the same time, and they may gag more easily.  The AutoBrush for Kids was designed not to obstruct breathing and to allow easy airflow to your child's lungs.
  4. Kids won’t need toothpaste until they are at least 5 years old—before then, toothpaste can complicate everything. Kids may not like the taste of toothpaste; it may turn them off from the overall brushing experience, and the truth is that kids are more likely to brush for a longer time if they are doing so with a “dry” brush. AutoBrush for Kids is just as effective with or without toothpaste and the toothpaste we offer is a light flavor that is not too intense for children.
  5. Children don’t understand the importance of brushing, and they cannot visualize the whole area inside their mouth, let alone try to reach all of it. Kids also lack the coordination of proper brushing, so AutoBrush for Kids can help them reach more areas of their mouth with less effort.
  6. A child can start an automatic dental routine as early as age 2—without toothpaste.  The key is making sure the first experience with dental hygiene is fun, which is why we offer fun animal friend options to help comfort your child when they first start brushing. Music is also incorporated so your child can dance through their session!
  7. Most children are ready for an automatic dental routine when they ask for it—when she sees a parent using one and asks for her own, for example. Turning brushing into a family activity can certainly facilitate this process with is why we have the AutoBrush available for premier adult dental care as well.
  8. Typically, parents are usually willing to buy a higher quality toothbrush for themselves than for their children, but that is the wrong approach. You want the same quality of toothbrush for your child that you have for yourself, primarily because lower quality toothbrushes may lead to an abrasive toothbrush head that can damage the enamel on a child’s still-developing teeth.

 

How does it work?

Step 1: Make sure your child’s brush is fully charged before enjoying! Place battery capsule on charging pad. Insert one end of USB cable to charging pad and the other to a USB power source to let charge completely. Light indicator will turn off once fully charged. Full charges last for 30 days.

Step 2: Attach 1 brush head to an animal friend. Run our yummy, bubble gum flavored Foaming Toothpaste along top and bottom of brush head from one end to the other.

Step 3: Have your child insert the brush head into their mouth and bite down so silicone bristles wrap around all teeth, top and bottom, inside and out.

Step 4: Firmly press button on front face of battery capsule to start the fun! Your animal friend will play a lively safari tune and automatically vibrate to brush all teeth and gums simultaneously. Let sit and dance along for at least 30 seconds. Can press button again for multiple modes.

Step 5: Holding down power button to shut off, have your child remove brush head from their mouth, spit, and rinse as usual once done. Build up easily rinses off antibacterial, silicone brush head with little water. Place items back on charging pad for next jamming session!

 

Why is AutoBrush for Kids better at than any other kids toothbrush?
 

1. Plaque removal: The key job of any toothbrush is to remove plaque from teeth and gums, and the high-quality kids AutoBrush will remove plaque consistently and from all areas of the mouth. 

Removing plaque is especially important in the prevention of cavity formation. Americans, especially those eating a Western diet filled with refined carbohydrates, have thick plaque layers which sit on top of the “biofilm,” which is the protective layer referred to as “the skin of our teeth.” The biofilm is what nourishes the tooth, keeping it moist and supplied with calcium. With too much plaque on top of the biofilm, the tooth struggles to access the nutrients it needs, thus leading to cavities and decay.

2. Head shape and size: Head shape and size are important in accessing hard-to-reach areas, such as between the cheeks and molars. This is extremely important for kids, whose mouths are small and still developing.  With AutoBrush for Kids’ complete mouth tray, we make sure no tooth surface goes untouched!
 
3. Quality of bristles: With the high-quality tooth and gum massagers on AutoBrush for Kids, you only need to replace the head every three months.  With lower quality bristles found on most kids electric or standard toothbrushes, the process may need to occur more frequently. Bristles make contact with the tooth, and a bristle made of cheaper material will wear down quickly and become too sharp, scratching the enamel!

4. Power source: A quality kids’ electric toothbrush should be rechargeable, not battery powered. The battery-powered toothbrushes that can be purchased at the supermarket are not high quality, and there is no need to worry about the charging bases of electric toothbrushes, as they are completely safe for kids to be around.

 

 

A recap on why we are so proud to introduce AutoBrush Kids:

  • Rechargeable
  • Fits your child's mouth perfectly and cleans each tooth simultaneously
  • Soft, high-quality bristles.
  • Large area to grip, so it’s easy for kids to hold and use
  • Effective at removing plaque and preventing cavities
  • Fun safari animals and music make cleaning fun
  • The grown-up version is available for easy adoption
  • Fast brush time for impatient children
  • Gentle vibrations prevent harm to sensitive kiddo gums
  • No need for toothpaste unless your child requests it

 

There is nothing more valuable than a child’s health and happiness.  While I was thinking about being a good mom to impress my daughter’s pediatrician at the beginning of the AutoBrush for Kids journey, it is here near the end that I really understand what an important innovation it is.


Even if you cannot fully invest in your child’s dental health today, make sure when you begin brushing your child’s teeth you don’t use your toothbrush or one that you think would work. Think about what your kid would want. It’s a subtle point, but it may make or break the habit of brushing for your child.

First impressions are vital in this case, so whatever you decide, remember that kids look to parents to model brushing habits. If you’re happy with your dental care routine, consider buying a child’s version of the same model and brushing together. This can make a world of difference for your child’s health and happiness for the rest of their lives.

story:
There isn't anybody out there who doesn’t have a mental health condition or knows someone who does, whether it's depression, anxiety, or how to cope with stress.

Suture uses an innovative AI Matching Algorithm to help you find the doctor that’s right for you. With our AI Chatbot, we maintain which doctor’s specialties is a better match for your symptoms. You will be able to choose your doctor based on their profile, education, specialties, experience/certifications and their location from the provided list of matched doctors.

 

1. Download Suture, sign up and create your profile.

2. Have a chat with Suture.

 

 

3. See your outcome.

4. Match with the right doctor.

5. Make an online appointment.

6. Talk to your doctor through the app.

7. Continue your treatment.

 

We have produced a premium health and data platform that will actually allow psychiatrists to flourish and treat patients properly.

story:
With 5 speed levels, the Evo Pro handheld massager meets different groups' needs and is suitable for most kinds of situations for muscle and fascia relaxation.

  • Muscle Activation: Start with 1st gear before exercise, 2200rpm helps you warm up and protects your muscle efficiently.
  • Fascia Relaxation: 2nd gear provides 2400rpm, and is suitable for elderly and office staff who often feel muscle and fascia tension.
  • Lactic Acid Decomposition: After strenuous exercise, your body generates Lactic Acid in the muscle and it takes time for the body to break it down naturally. 3rd gear 2600rpm percussion accelerates this process and eliminates the soreness.
  • Deep Massage: 4th gear with its 2800rpm allows for a deeper percussive massage gun to really promote recovery.
  • Athlete Mode: 5th gear's 3200rpm high-intensity percussions blast away any remaining aches and pains and prepare you for competition.

The powerful brushless high-torque motor with 11mm amplitude provides percussive therapy to relieve your muscle, reduce stiffness and fatigue in deep tissue after a workout.

With its beautiful sweeping lines, seamless build with no screws, protrusions, harsh edges or holes the Evo Pro is a Reddot Design Award Winning Product.

Included with your Evo Pro are four specially designed attachments, each head has been engineered by our physiotherapist team to ensure that they are the most effective way of delivering treatment and pain relief.

Used for when pinpoint, accurate treatment is required. It is the perfect attachment to release knots. 

Impact Level: 5/5

Suitable for most parts of the body and ideal attachment for treating quads, hamstrings, and calves.

Impact Level: 3/5

Suitable for the neck and in between the spine, perfect for sore calves and those suffering from Achilles tendinitis.

Impact Level:4/5

Suitable for large muscle groups and ideal attachment for treating Plantar fasciitis.

Impact Level:2/5

We are experts in researching, producing, and selling household fitness equipment. Products include elliptical machines, spinning machines,  treadmills, rowing machines, and other home-based fitness equipment.

We have been manufacturing fitness products for over 10 years, and have been designing cutting edge massage guns for the past 5 years for a number of UK and United States companies, this is your unique opportunity to purchase, the same product, directly from our factory, rather than paying for costly western branded ‘OEM’ products.

story:
Our Story 

The PUSH UP MACHINE was inspired by the desire to take the most popular exercise in the world and create increased muscle activation for athletes and fitness enthusiasts. 

Three Things at a High Level

U.S. Pat. 9,700,757 and Pat. Pending (See our Facebook Page for details)

Hello Backers!

We have established regional market proof of concept. We are now excited to introduce the PUSH UP MACHINE to the rest of the world. Our goal is to raise a minimum of $20,000 and continue to scale to the market demand. 

Why Buy Now?

Be the first one to own a PUSH UP MACHINE!  

The PUSH UP MACHINE will retail for $129.99.

Special Indiegogo pricing:

  1. Founder Early Bird: only $79 (first 10 PUM's)
  2. Early Bird: only $89 (next 20 PUM's)
  3. Indiegogo Pricing: only $99 (remainder of campaign)
  4. PUM x 2: only $189 (remainder of campaign)
  5. PUM x 5: only $459 (remainder of campaign)
  6. PUM x 10: only $890 (remainder of campaign)

What if we don't reach our Goal? We are all in! You will get your PUSH UP MACHINE. We have already committed to fund the manufacture of the first 2000 units. Not hitting our funding goal only affects our rate of growth and future manufacturing.

Never Give Up!

My name is Matt Shade. I have been a personal trainer for over 20 years. My vision for the PUSH UP MACHINE coalesced several years ago when I took my hand drawn sketches to a local product development company. Those drawings evolved into an initial prototype and, after several years of further development, the first official prototype (pictured above).

In the 2010s, social media and crowdfunding did not exist as we know it today. I only had a pending patent and I had no interest in selling the idea, so I shelved the PUSH UP MACHINE. Fast forward to 2017 and things started to happen. I received notice that the patent was allowed, I applied and received an SBA Loan and Indiegogo helped me create a launch pad for the initial go-to-market strategy.

The SBA Loan and Indiegogo platform will help fund our tooling and manufacture of the first 2000 PUSH UP MACHINE'S. The PUSH UP MACHINE is anticipated to be available for delivery to your door by October of this year.  

Set Up and Use

 

Unique Design

Take Your Workout Anywhere

Handles Ergonomically Tested for Comfort

Thank You

There is no way we could have reached this point without the help and support of our family and friends. Help us keep the forward momentum!

Please consider:

  1. Sharing on Social Media (Instagram, Face Book and Twitter) 
  2. Telling family and friends
  3. Letting us know how we can improve

  #PUM

We are now excited to introduce the PUSH UP MACHINE to the rest of the world. Our goal is to raise a minimum of $20,000 and continue to scale to the market demand. Why Buy Now?Be the first one to own a PUSH UP MACHINE!  The PUSH UP MACHINE will retail for $129.99.Special Indiegogo pricing:

story:
RE-INVENTED HYGIENE

After Nikhil's  80-year-old grandma, Poonam, had a fall in the shower and nearly lost her life he founded BLOSSOM1 with the aim of developing a simple and convenient personal hygiene solution to replace the need for physically challenging showers or other ineffective / intrusive practices like bed baths.  The purpose of the BLOSSOM1 is to ensure that kind-hearted people like Poonam can enjoy a healthy and dignified life.

 

WIDESPREAD PROBLEM

Research and surveys confirmed that hygiene maintenance is challenging for people with disabilities and also for carers.

200 million people worldwide and 6.5 million people in the UK have disabilities because of which they require assistance with maintaining hygiene. 95% people surveyed (out of 239) say that hygiene maintenance is challenging for both providers (caregivers) and receivers of care (people with disabilities).

 

SMART HYGIENE

The BLOSSOM1 - Personal Hygiene Assistant,  is a body cleaning device that simplifies, automates and consolidates manual hygiene processes of rinsing, scrubbing, soaping and drying.

The principles associated with the development of the BLOSSOM1 - Personal Hygiene are aligned with solving the problem of hygiene maintenance and will generate the following value for our intended users:

 

HOW CAN YOU HELP?

We are currently in enhancing the design and require additional funds to transition to development of the final product. While we are in the process of securing bulk of the £775,000 from external investors and winning grant funding competitions, a successful Indiegogo campaign is the best validation for product/market fit.

Additionally, you can get in touch with us to provide feedback on the current concept. We are also looking to speak with care homes / hopsitals to understand the value this solution would generate.

 

WHAT CAN YOU GET?

We are crowdfunding for a limited release. If you are caring for a relative or have a loved one that is dependent on others and can benefit from a solution like this, pre-order your BLOSSOM1 - Personal Hygiene Assistant. This will support us in its development.

You can also order the additional Detachable Handles separately if there are multiple people in your home / household that could benefit from the device. 

Pre-ordering is not the only way you can support the project. If you believe in the value of this solution, please feel free to donate any amount and/or get in touch with our Founder and CEO through email: nikhil@BLOSSOM1.

 

THE IMPACT

Hygiene is a fundamental requirement to good health and this was only further emphasised by COVID-19. Solutions like the BLOSSOM1 - Personal Hygiene Assistant is only a first small step by us to make good hygiene accessible to the society's most vulnerable. We are in this to improve the health and quality of life for the 200 million people globally that have disabilities and require support with hygiene maintenance.

story:
Experience an Instant Posture Transformation

 

Fits Everybody

 

Your Whole Body Shifts into Alignment

 

 

Its Like Wearing a Mini Ergonomic Chair

Make Any Work Environment Ergonomic
story_txt:
What You Can Expect

Effortlessly sit up straight at your computer 
Relieve excess strain off your back, neck and shoulders
Improve balance and equilibrium
Rapidly gain stronger, confident and more attractive posture
Unleash more energy and core power ​
 Experience an Instant Posture Transformation Fits Everybody Your Whole Body Shifts into Alignment Wearable Ergonomics
Easily Achieve the 4 Points of Proper Posture

The ERGO Scientifically improves your center of gravity by using a patented support cushion design that triggers a spinal righting reflex.

See results in the first hour you wear it!  Lift all the pressure off your neck and back.
The ERGO lifts and holds your body in proper spinal alignment by supporting you mid-back vertebrae, ergonomically preventing you from slouching. 
Stretch with it throughout the day to relieve strain and built up tension in your neck, back and shoulders. 
The ERGO is the only back support that strengthens your posture and tones your core while you wear it. Rapid gains are achieved with daily use.




360º View
 Its Like Wearing a Mini Ergonomic Chair Make Any Work Environment Ergonomic
 
Guaranteed Results
Resistance bands provide a force against which your muscles must work. This action causes muscles to contract, which stimulates bone as well as muscle growth. The use of resistance bands are one of the safest methods to increase strength, rehabilitate injury and help prevent deterioration. 
Flex with the therapeutic resistance to release tension and tone key muscles. Increase your circulation, flexibility and range of motion with a simple stretching routine.
 
Stretch and Flex Throughout Your Day

 
How To Use Your ERGO

 
Easy To Adjust the Size and Put On
 Strong & Simple Wearable Exerciser
 Relieve Neck, Back and Shoulder Pain

 
Sitting Stretching Routine
 
Treatment Plan For Pain and Strain

 
Improved Posture = Improved Mental & Emotional Health

Unique Features and Patented Design
Made in the USA from the highest quality custom parts. Built to last you a lifetime of posture strength. Works on everybody.

One size fits all -  Fits XXS-XXL
 Fully adjustable 
 M/F 10+ years 
Comfortable 
 Water Resistant 
 Portable 
 Light weight 
 Durable
Quick 5 minute assembly with Youtube video instruction

 
Your ERGO System Includes

ERGO – Ergonomic back support and wearable elastic resistance posture exerciser.
EXERCISE THERAPY PROGRAM - Correct, rehabilitate and strengthen
INSTRUCTION BOOKLET – Simple 5 Minute Assembly Instructions. Daily Stretching Routine, Pain Treatment Program and 21 Day Perfect Posture Bootcamp Program for rapid posture correction.
SIZING RULER – Line up the bottom of the shield to the top of the hand grips and you have a perfect starting point to find the exact right comfort fit.
PREMIUM CASE – Great for storing or traveling with your ERGO or technology devices.
 
FREE BONUS Portfolio Carrycase  NEW! Ruler for more Accurate Sizing
Line up the bottom of the shield to the top of the hand grips and you have a perfect starting point to find the exact right comfort fit.

Custom Sizing Steps

New and Improved Features include:

New ribbed mid-back cushion featuring a wave pattern non-slip grip
more rigged shield for better support
Longer tube 7'5" can accommodate up to a XXL
Longer hand grips for a better stretch
Bigger End Caps to secure hand grips
New Stretching Routine 
Daily Notifications through the APP
21 Day Perfect Posture Bootcamp Program
Daily Video Routine


 
21 Day Perfect Posture Bootcamp 
 

Perfect For the Office


Real People Real Results

See video
Testimonials

Start Your ERGO Collection Today
Perfectore Corp leads the way as the premiere creators in wearable elastic resistance strengthening devices.
Devices designed to instantly transform, support and strengthen the body during regular activities of daily living, rehabilitation, exercise or sport. High quality, effective and durable Made in the USA products.

Need more back support? A solution for lower back ache or sciatica. Click here
A Message From the Founder
Why do we slouch? Its no secret, but most people don’t know. I’m here to tell you. You slouch because your foundational muscles are too weak to hold your body erect. Your body is like a high rise building with a bowling ball on top. Without strong structural support the building collapses. Check yourself, are you in a continuous state of collapse? I was. I had to address the real problem. Weakness. I needed to design something that could make me stronger at work gaining valuable hours everyday. I started to look into different ways of strength building, weight training, yoga, elastic resistance, pilates. Powerful methods of transformation. Could I make a tool that was a combination of them all? Yes! My eureka moment, I called it Wearable Strength.

story:
We are all connected. Never has that been more apparent than now. Even when we’re separate, we’re together in our efforts. Because of the current pandemic, we now have a greater responsibility to protect each other.

Infectious diseases have shaped human history and remain with us today, continuing to burden populations worldwide and threaten the global economy. Older adults and vulnerable populations are especially at risk. The current pandemic has affected more than 3 million people in the world, and yet, we have no clear cut solution at the moment.

In a time of complexity and confusion, sanitation should be simple. Sanitation 101 involves clean hands.

A sanitation spritzer, PumPix has the appearance of a sleek wrist band. Aside from its comfortable, lightweight wearability, this product is affordable and simple to use on your hands, as well as commonly touched surfaces both in public and at home. After you fill-up the gadget’s inner chamber, PumPix is good for more than 100 pumps.

PumPix offers a straightforward design and peace of mind. You no longer need to buy small bottles of sanitizer. You can use PumPiX as many times as you wish and refill it when you run out of sanitizing liquid! Less plastic means less harm to the environment!

After touching the elevator button, a grimy door handle at the supermarket, or your phone’s touch screen, clean those nasty germs with PumPiX.

The PumPix backward sliding button activates the inner chamber with one pump, releasing just the right amount of sanitizing mist to rub on both hands from front to back and between fingers.

PumPix is unisex, suitable for both men and women of any age and the design is breathable with sweat absorption capabilities.

PumPiX is your sanitizer at hand and your companion in the battle against illness. We have found manufacturers in the U.S. that will produce PumPiX so that we can deliver it to you fast. Remember: This won’t end for anyone until it ends for everyone.

Why PumPiX?

In these hard days of lockdowns, quarantines, and isolation, shopping, working, studying, and socializing are all taking place in homes.  However, understandably, we all have to leave home from time to time for essential needs like groceries or doctor’s appointments. It doesn’t matter how hard you try to stay away from crowded places, steer clear of public transportation, and wear a face mask, if you have no effective way to consistently clean your hands.

We know you’ve heard it a lot already, but let us echo this one more time: "Wash your hands regularly and clean commonly touched surfaces both in public and at home.”

Yes, you heard that right. Even if you don’t leave your house, it’s a good idea (read necessary) to wash your hands and sanitize objects in your home that might have been infected (doorknobs, plastic bags, delivery items, etc.)


According to BCCDC, more than %80 of bacteria and viruses are transferred to your body via your hands. This is why it’s so important to wash your hands and keep them clean at all times, especially before preparing or eating food, after caring for someone else who is sick, before and after treating a wound, after using the toilet or changing a baby’s diaper, after coughing or sneezing, after touching garbage, and after handling pets and animal waste or food.

Sometimes you don’t have access to water and soap or you just don’t feel like going to the bathroom again and again and again. That’s alright! Hand sanitizer does the job too. However, remembering to carry it sometimes presents an additional unwanted hassle. This is where PumPiX comes in!

Sometimes you don’t have access to water and soap or you just don’t feel like going to the bathroom again and again and again. That’s alright! Hand sanitizer does the job too. However, remembering to carry it sometimes presents an additional unwanted hassle. This is where PumPiX comes in!

 

PumPiX Technical Details 

PumPiX is small and compact!

The exact size is 2.5 x 2 x 0.5 inches

Weight: 35 gr

Capacity:  0.4 oz  |  12 ml

Able to spray more than 100 times with a full container.

PumPiX Key Factors

Beautiful and ergonomic design

Very durable

Environment-friendly

Simple to use

Reusable

Lightweight, simple in terms of design, and compact

Full chamber provides more than 100 sprays

How it began... 

During these challenging days, we realized the utmost importance of hand sanitation. We decided to develop a new product to help everyone all around the world to maintain cleanliness all day wherever they go. The wrist seemed like the ideal place for such a product, especially given the popularity of this style when it comes to Fitbit and other health-related monitoring device bands.

PumPiX was born after several sketches and basic designs. We perfected the design by creating a wristband with a container and a separate chamber inside to help regulate the liquid flow. 

At long last, PumPiX was finalized, resulting in a stylish gadget worn on the wrist for sanitation purposes all throughout the day.  It is urgently important for us to get this product out to market as soon as possible, to make a difference in these trying times.

Important facts to keep in mind
               •  You may fill PumPix with any sanitizing liquid that fits your intended usage (i.e., hands and surface areas).
               •  Do not use cleaning agents like bleach, which would be harmful to your skin.
               •  Do not mix more than one kind of detergent or liquid together.
               •  Do not use common household items that have not been approved by professionals for use within a sanitizing liquid.
               •  Follow CDC guidelines on your choice of sanitation liquid, depending on your intended use.
               •  A sanitizing liquid is not included in this product.

Warning and disclaimer 
               •  Do not use sanitizing liquid on your face, mouth, or eyes.
               •  Do not spray sanitizing liquid directly on food.
               •  The best way to keep yourself safe from new virus is to stay at home.
               •  PumPiX is a gadget that helps maintain cleanliness. It does not offer protection if other safety precautions are breached.

By accessing hand sanitizer throughout the day, quite literally at your fingertips, you just may protect your parents, grandparents, the sweet old lady next door, your asthmatic coworker, your wise elderly professor, the hardworking grocer bagging food for your community, or the tireless DoorDasher delivering your food to put food on the table for his own family. The list goes on.

Staying home is still the recommended protocol until further notice. But for the essential workers, those quarantining in groups large and small, and everyday folks running necessary errands and exchanging food and groceries from one pair of hands to another, there’s PumPiX. A wearable and portable fashion gadget with a liquid sanitization dispenser to maintain cleanliness all day.

Sanitation starts with you, but the potential reach of a process as simple as one-two extends further than you can imagine. Keep sanitation simple with PumPiX.

 Reward Packages 

Resources:

World Health Organization (WHO)  |  Center of Disease Control (CDC)  | BC Centre for Disease Control

story:
Our Story

We have been working on the Freq Reflex for many years; since coming up with the idea we have developed, improved and perfected it. We have already completed a production run in the UK selling 170 kits to coaches, athletes and physiotherapists. The results and feedback from our first customers were amazing and it even won the best innovation award at the Elite Sports Performance Exhibition. We have since redeveloped the product and improved our manufacturing process and are now in a position to bring the product to the mass market. The £10,000 we need will help pay for production.

(Above: Dan receiving the best innovation award at the Elite Sports Performance Expo London) 

Some of our Customers

 

 

GB Bobsleigh Development Adam Hames

Using the Freq Reflex for the first time

 

Product Features

 

Resistance Bands

Each set (colour) of resistance bands comes with a pair of small, medium and large (6 bands) 
to suit your size and needs. 
 

Prepare for Competition

Our research has shown that using the Freq Reflex 10-20 minutes before you compete can improve your short term performance by as much as 60% 

 

Improve Technique and Power

Use the different resistance bands to assist with foot position and improve your power at the same time! Train the force-velocity curve to develop true power and peak for competition while ingraining perfect technique. 

Running Efficiency for Speed and Endurance 

The Freq Reflex optimises foot position by pulling the foot up, improving ground contact time, stride rate and overall running efficiency. 

Prevent Injury

By improving your running efficiency, the Freq Reflex will help your foot land underneath your centre of mass, reducing the stress placed upon the hamstrings and shins to prevent hamstring pulls and shin splints. 

Tendon Stretch Reflexes and Elasticity

Activate and improve your tendon stretch reflexes to put an extra spring in your step. 

Peak Muscle Power

Use all of the different resistance bands at different times during your training and season to improve your muscle power and rate of force development. 

Injury Rehab

Use the Freq Reflex to do the rehabilitation exercises prescribed by your physiotherapist and improve the range of motion of your ankle, getting you back to what you do best sooner. 

 

 

Prepare for Competition - Test Data

A total of 5 athletes between the ages of 18-25 years were tested. All subject have an athletic background, specialising in either 200m, 400m sprint running, Sprint Hurdles, Long Jump and Triple Jump. They had a training history of 5 to 10 years and train between 3 and 6 days a week. 

The athletes were split into two groups. One group of 3 were tested in a 30m sprint test and a reactive jump test (group 1). The other group of 2 were tested in a 30m sprint test and a counter-movement jump test (group 2). All jump tests were conducted in a controlled indoor environment using an electronic jump matt and sprint tests were recorded using electronic timing gates. 

The jump and sprint tests were conducted before using the Freq Reflex for a baseline measurement.  The second test was conducted with the Freq Reflex and the final test was conducted after using the Freq Reflex. Each athlete had at least 10 minutes rest between each test.

Results

Early research indicates that the biggest short-term impact seems to be on 2 distinct levels:

1: A potentiation effect after using the Freq Reflex

2: Improved neurological control and biomechanics as the athletes consistently referred to the "toe up" position almost taking care of itself with the product. 

Use the Freq Reflex 10-20 minutes before competition to get similar effects and get the last minute performance edge against your competitors.   

How to use the Freq Reflex

 

 

Prototypes

 

Our First production Run

Order your Freq Reflex today and help us get funded so that we can help you to take the steps to victory! 

Follow our journey and support us on social media: 

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/speedfreq1/

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SpeedFreq

We have been working on the Freq Reflex for many years; since coming up with the idea we have developed, improved and perfected it. We have already completed a production run in the UK selling 170 kits to coaches, athletes and physiotherapists. The results and feedback from our first customers were amazing and it even won the best innovation award at the Elite Sports Performance Exhibition. We have since redeveloped the product and improved our manufacturing process and are now in a position to bring the product to the mass market. The £10,000 we need will help pay for production.

(Above: Dan receiving the best innovation award at the Elite Sports Performance Expo London) 
Some of our Customers

 

 
GB Bobsleigh Development Adam Hames



Using the Freq Reflex for the first time


 

Product Features

 
Resistance Bands

Each set (colour) of resistance bands comes with a pair of small, medium and large (6 bands) 
to suit your size and needs. 
 
Prepare for Competition

Our research has shown that using the Freq Reflex 10-20 minutes before you compete can improve your short term performance by as much as 60% 
 
Improve Technique and Power

Use the different resistance bands to assist with foot position and improve your power at the same time! Train the force-velocity curve to develop true power and peak for competition while ingraining perfect technique. 
Running Efficiency for Speed and Endurance 

The Freq Reflex optimises foot position by pulling the foot up, improving ground contact time, stride rate and overall running efficiency. 
Prevent Injury

By improving your running efficiency, the Freq Reflex will help your foot land underneath your centre of mass, reducing the stress placed upon the hamstrings and shins to prevent hamstring pulls and shin splints. 
Tendon Stretch Reflexes and Elasticity

Activate and improve your tendon stretch reflexes to put an extra spring in your step. 
Peak Muscle Power

Use all of the different resistance bands at different times during your training and season to improve your muscle power and rate of force development. 
Injury Rehab

Use the Freq Reflex to do the rehabilitation exercises prescribed by your physiotherapist and improve the range of motion of your ankle, getting you back to what you do best sooner. 


 

 
Prepare for Competition - Test Data
A total of 5 athletes between the ages of 18-25 years were tested. All subject have an athletic background, specialising in either 200m, 400m sprint running, Sprint Hurdles, Long Jump and Triple Jump. They had a training history of 5 to 10 years and train between 3 and 6 days a week. 
The athletes were split into two groups. One group of 3 were tested in a 30m sprint test and a reactive jump test (group 1). The other group of 2 were tested in a 30m sprint test and a counter-movement jump test (group 2). All jump tests were conducted in a controlled indoor environment using an electronic jump matt and sprint tests were recorded using electronic timing gates. 
The jump and sprint tests were conducted before using the Freq Reflex for a baseline measurement.  The second test was conducted with the Freq Reflex and the final test was conducted after using the Freq Reflex. Each athlete had at least 10 minutes rest between each test.
Results

Early research indicates that the biggest short-term impact seems to be on 2 distinct levels:
1: A potentiation effect after using the Freq Reflex
2: Improved neurological control and biomechanics as the athletes consistently referred to the "toe up" position almost taking care of itself with the product. 
Use the Freq Reflex 10-20 minutes before competition to get similar effects and get the last minute performance edge against your competitors.   
How to use the Freq Reflex

 

 
Prototypes

 
Our First production Run



Order your Freq Reflex today and help us get funded so that we can help you to take the steps to victory! 
Follow our journey and support us on social media: 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/speedfreq1/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SpeedFreq

story:
The team is back with a new upgraded version of the foldable walking pad! In order to fit more people and more scenarios, we changed the weight and volume of the S1.Comparing the WalkingPad S1 to our previous model, the S1 is 20lbs lighter, takes up to 45% less space than the older model, and minimizes noise for a better working environment.

Equipped with premium materials of the frame and the running belt, we aim to deliver the best workout experience at your home. Wake up to a morning walk at home when it’s raining or burn some calories before going to bed; WalkingPad S1 is your perfect solution to an efficient and effective daily exercise – anytime, anywhere.

Unlike traditional treadmills, the WalkingPad S1 adopts a patented 180-degree foldable design that allows the WalkingPad S1 to be easily stored anywhere. Once folded, it takes less than 95% of space, and you can store it either vertically or horizontally at home or in your office.

  

The embedded Feet Sensory Technology allows you to adjust your pace automatically based on your personalized training data. The pressure sensor at the bottom of S1 can accurately measure your position change. To accelerate, simply walk to the front of the pad to speed up. Once you’ve reached your desired speed, move back to the middle of the pad, and it will maintain the speed for you. To decelerate, walk towards the back of the pad and slow down to a steady stop. By identifying different areas, the rate of speed changes accordingly.

The traditional treadmill would generate a noise reading at a range of 65 dB on the sound scale. That's a significant amount of noise generated in which the human ear can pick up differences in sound in a single decibel. The WalkingPad S1 minimizes the noise pollution to average sound scale 45.0dB, and the power engine embedded increases the durability while reducing noise. 

Engaging in physical fitness activities can be challenging during a global pandemic, but finding a way to adapt to these new conditions is vital to maintaining our health. Now, you can stay active with the WalkingPad S1 and easily store it under your bed or against your wall to set a personalized gym at your home.

WalkingPad S1 allows you to be productive and burn calories at the same time. Most people sit in an office environment for hours and don't have the time for their daily exercise. Whether you are working from home or making conference calls, you can still stay in shape, maintain your health, and everything in between. 

You can now catch up on your favorite tv show, listen to your latest playlist, or facetime with your friends and keep up with your healthy lifestyle all at once. Stay entertained at home with the WalkingPad S1.

The WalkingPad S1’s structure was carefully designed with a safety system to ensure your safety while working out. The S1 will automatically stop if no movements were detected on the running belt, and the pre-set speed limit intends to avoid any injury due to operational errors, perfect for senior citizens. Also, the anti-slip mat is made out of EVA material, and it has less friction coefficient when exercising.

The WalkingPad S1 can be controlled in three different ways. Under the manual mode, it can be managed by using the remote control or the KS Fit App. Alternatively, it can be controlled by walking, and the Feet Sensory Speed Control Technology will adjust your speed automatically by monitoring the pace of your movement in real-time.

WalkingPad S1 can be operated after connecting to the KS Fit App, which also allows you to personalize your training plan, manage your workout data and share your progress such as the amount of steps, calories burned, new speed record, and time achievements with friends and family.

The LED touch panel on the front of the WalkingPad S1 provides you a clear summary of your workout speed and data. You can adjust the brightness by using the remote control. Displayed on the LED panel, you can monitor the speed, the time, the step, and the amount of calories burned by the Feet Sensory Technology. Also, the LED panel is touchable and you can choose two different modes from M to A. M stands for mode and A stands for automatic. 

                      

Press kit is available for download here

WalkingPad S1 has newly added front handles to provide additional balance to keep you safe while you exercise. The handlebar be particularly important to senior users for safety concern.The detachable handlebar can be purchased with the WalkingPad S1.

WalkingPad was created by a group of professors, sports scientists, and engineers. Through extensive research and discussions, we developed the innovative features of WalkingPad with the customer' s needs in mind. 

By specializing in solutions created uniquely for the home and workplace, WalkingPad is helping to empower individuals to find better health regardless of the setting. With the WalkingPad exercise equipment, you're free from the sedentary lifestyle. 

 

WalkingPad's Exclusive Partner

Contact: info@longhamtec.com
Customer service: community@walkingpad.com

story:
Flossing is one of the best ways to improve your oral hygiene, beauty, and overall health. In fact, flossing cleans the teeth 35% more than just brushing alone.

But with string and current water flossers, it’s just too time consuming and uncomfortable. Not to mention the fact that many people who do floss generally do it incorrectly!

That’s why we set out to make a floss that will make you smile. Instafloss is the first floss both you and your dentist will love.

 

We know, it sounds too good to be true. A whole mouth floss in just 10 seconds? How?

The answer lies in Instafloss' patented multi-jet design. Carefully positioned jets automatically deliver a quick 360 degree deep clean. Jets are staggered at the front, back and sides of each tooth, allowing all debris to be jettisoned to ensure a perfect floss every time.

Add to that the ability to automatically floss in a single sweep, and Instafloss lets you experience what it’s like to get a fully effective floss at 12x the speed of other methods!

String only cleans the gums between your teeth, leaving the gums in front and behind your teeth untouched. Single stream water flossers can clean the entire gum line, but anyone who’s tried will know the difficulty of effectively cleaning hard to reach areas such as the backside of teeth or rear molars. Meanwhile, Instafloss never leaves a single spot unflossed.

It’s hard to build good habits when the habit you're building hurts you. That’s why we built Instafloss for personalized comfort.

Our pulsing water jets feel amazing, and adjustable water pressure lets you get a thorough, pain-free floss no matter your gum or tooth sensitivity.

Plus, with consultations from ergonomics experts and a study measuring thousands of teeth and gums, we’ve created a mouthpiece designed to fit 98% of users. It doesn’t matter if you have braces, crooked teeth, or bridges, Instafloss will deliver an amazing feeling floss.

Our quick change, replacement mouth pieces make swapping a breeze, so everyone in the family can use one Instafloss. Every mouth piece will feature a color band to help differentiate between family members

Each mouthpiece is coated in super soft antibacterial silicone that glides along your gums comfortably while staying clean. The innovative design fits in the space between your upper and lower teeth, enabling the jets to clean both rows of teeth at once, saving time and increasing effectiveness.

Instafloss is scientifically designed to give a more perfect floss than any alternative on the market. Every aspect of the design was based on rigorous studies, both independent and internal.

Compared to string, water flossing is:

  • 151% as effective at reducing gingivitis (Barnes CM, et al)
  • 129% as effective at removing plaque (Goyal CR, et al)
  • 200% as effective at reducing bleeding (Rosema NAM et al)
     

Additionally, water is able to clean deeper beneath the gumline, reaching as far as 6mm vs string’s 3mm without damaging the gumline (Cobb CM et al).

By utilizing pulsing water jets (as opposed to continuous flow), Instafloss is able to remove debris with 3x the effectiveness (Selting WJ et al). Finally, the jets are aimed at the dentist recommended 90 degree angle, enabling a 50% deeper clean (Eakle et al). 

Each of these factors combines with Instafloss' innovative mouthpiece design to provide flawless, intelligent coverage.

 

Using Instafloss is easy because it does all the hard work of flossing for you

Step 1: Fill the reservoir to the marked line.

Step 2: After filling the reservoir, and placing it back in the housing, all you need to do is put the mouthpiece in the space between your top and bottom rows of teeth. 

Powering on the device will send jets of water both in front and behind each tooth. The multiple water jets will aim for you providing full coverage and penetrating deep into the gumline, so there’s no need to worry about flossing correctly.

Step 3: All you have to do is sweep...

And when 10 seconds are up, you’re done!

 

Evidence shows that we’ve been flossing since prehistoric times. The material may have changed from horse hairs to nylon, but that’s relatively minor and slow progress for such an important part of our self care regimen.

String still takes over 2 minutes, is painful, and hard to do effectively, especially in the harder to reach areas like your rear molars. Even if you’re taking the time to do it, it’s not as effective as water!

 

Water flossers are the most recent innovation and promise increased effectiveness, but only if you use them correctly! This involves aiming at the correct angle, maintaining proper position, and spending the right amount of time for each area.

On top of that, single stream water flossers are still difficult to use in hard to reach areas like your molars and the back of your teeth!

Instafloss blends the added effectiveness of water with convenience never before found in flossing. This represents a huge leap forward for our dental hygiene. It automatically aims for you, just requiring you to sweep the head while riding your teeth along the soft mouthpiece.

With Instafloss, you get both the most convenient and the most effective cleaning possible.

 

Back us today and get Instafloss at the lowest price while being part of a revolution in oral care. The earlier backers will get the lowest prices and the earliest delivery.

Each mouthpiece is color-coded so you can easily identify when using the Instafloss with multiple family members and will last 3 months before we recommend replacing for optimal hygiene. You can add additional mouthpieces (and/or choose a custom color) during checkout.

 

We're probably the only people who will tell you they love flossing. We didn’t use to. That's because we've spent countless hours working towards one belief: that we can make flossing faster, easier, and more effective.

 

Our mission started in 2017, with just an idea. Now, with dozens of prototypes (the six major revisions are shown above) and over one and half years of human testing, we’re ready to share our creation with the world.

 

Our team is a combination of doctors, engineers, scientists, and entrepreneurs all working together for a common purpose: to end the oral health crisis.

 

We’re passionate about helping people live their healthiest, happiest lives and have the expertise and experience to make that goal a reality.

story:
Whipr is a portable ERG machine

designed for Paddle, Row, Ski, Swim, Surf,

Kayak, Canoe, Dragon Boat & multi sport training. 

 

Select a combo from our perks and complete your purchase. If you don't see a combo that you like, simply purchase a base unit and add accessories in our post campaign pledge manager.

You will not be asked for an address. In 14 days we'll send you an email from our fulfillment manager called "Backerkit". We will use that tool to collect your shipping details plus you'll be able to add extra accessories that aren't available in the existing perk packages.

 

As part of our partnership with Rich Froning we're producing a limited edition base station with black accents coupled with our complete package. The package also features a free month of his own MayhemNation.com. The package is available now in limited quantities.

 

 

At around 6x6x6" (16x16x16cm) and weighing around 7lbs (3kg), whipr is conveniently sized to fit in any home gym, studio apartment or workout space. Get a full sized workout, pack it down in seconds and store it next to your sneakers.

Whipr is also great for travel as it packs easily in your carry on bag (along with accessories) and is permitted to fly on airplanes... we've done it many times. 

 

 

 

Whipr started out as a way to replicate stand up paddling. We've expanded on the original concept and now have accessories available to support:

  • Stand up paddling
  • Cross country skiing
  • Rowing
  • Dragon Boat padding
  • Canoeing
  • Kayaking (requires two base stations)
  • Swimming (requires two base stations)

 

 

Each modality uses the same whipr base unit and is enabled by the use of accessories. You may purchase the whole package or choose just the accessories you need to match your training and exercise needs. Whipr will accept any handles, straps or bars commonly used on a regular gym cable machine (carabiner attachments).

Switching modalities is as simple as swapping whipr's orientation and accessories. This takes takes around 15 seconds so it's easy to set up HIIT (High Intensity Interval Training) sets using all three modalities. 

 

Whipr can be used with any cable machine attachments, like these velcro leg cuffs.

 

 

 

The whipr base unit is essentially a miniaturized rowing machine 

with multiple modalities (exercises). It replaces the big, bulk rowing machines and ski-ergs that you'd usually only find in a gym, in fact to purchase equivalent quality machines for all three modalities would cost you over $4,000 and fill up a small bedroom. Whipr will cost you around 10% of that amount and it's around half the size of a basketball.   

 

Key Specifications

  • Size =  6.7"x6.4"x6.4"
  • Weight = 7lbs (3kg) 
  • Pull cord length = 12 ft (3.6m)
  • Resistance =  Around 800N+ . Approximately the same as a full sized rower.
  • Resistance levels = 10
  • Retraction resistance = none

 

Resistance Mechanism

The primary source of resistance is the planetary gearbox. Just like water, our gearbox is harder to get moving then keep moving. So once you build momentum whipr rewards your consistency with a slightly easier catch and pull (stroke), just like on the water. Additional resistance is achieved by increasing or decreasing the resistance wheel which engages magnetic resistance on the inside. 

The images below compare the resistance of whipr with the Concept2 rowing machine (which we consider to be among the best on the industry). The whipr unit being tested was a prototype and at level 7 on our unit delivered 90% of the resistance of Concept 2 at a level 8. 

 

Features

On the front of whipr is the pull cord, the digital screen and the inflate and deflate buttons for the inbuilt anchor. The rear of the unit features the resistance adjustment wheel as well as the inflatable anchor (the flap on the back) and the removable webbing anchor for anchoring whipr to any fixed object.

Front view showing pull cord, digital screen and inflatable anchor controls

Rear view showing adjustment wheel. Hard mount anchor is installed.

Rear view with the inbuilt door anchor inflated.

The webbing anchor can be installed vertically or horizontally

 

You can secure whipr in one of three ways:

  1. Under a door (up to 0.75" gap) using the inflatable anchor. This works for both vertical (skiing) and horizontal (everything else) base unit orientations.

  2. To a vertical or horizontal post, tree or sturdy piece of furniture up to 18" in diameter using the webbing anchor.

  3. Into firm ground using the ground anchor.

 

 

The onboard computer provides real-time performance feedback, logging & tracking including: 

  • Strokes per minute
  • 500m split time
  • Timer / time to complete
  • Distance
  • Average watts
  • Calories burned

 

The whipr app is available for iOS and Android devices & is compatible with popular apps like Strava.

Connectivity & App

Whipr supports Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) to broadcast measurements like Speed, Pace and Power (among others). Our programming uses FTMP/FTMS (FiTness Machine Profile/Service), the Bluetooth standard for fitness equipment. This open protocol makes it very easy for third parties to integrate whipr in their own fitness app. Whipr will also have its own app that provides a real time dashboard and a log book.

Our Bluetooth & health team

To integrate bluetooth we're working with the team from Splendo. Splendo is a Dutch company with a focus on IoT, AI and Digital Health. They've built technology and apps for many high end companies and are an official Garmin Partner. Whipr will be integrated into the SplendoFit platform with app access for all backers. 

Additionally, our medical advisor Jeroen Molinger (Lead Clinical Medical Exercise Physiologist at Duke University Hospital, Center for PeriOperative organ protection), will be testing the feasibility and validity of whipr as an intervention tool in the rehabilitation and perioperative space. Our backers will receive the benefit of this in terms of better app data and we're thrilled that whipr will be able to help out a lot of people in their rehabilitation and recovery. 

 

 

The rowing accessory gives the feeling and action of a full sized rower while being extremely compact. When you're finished training, the rower folds down in around 60-90 seconds and can be easily stored. The longest component is 27.5" so the rails will easily fit in a full sized suitcase. Assembly takes under three minutes and we're very pleased with how solid it feels despite being a portable and lightweight rower.

 

ADJUSTABILITY

The seat can be locked into position in up to 30 different length increments. The locking pin is stored in the seat roller and can be deployed very easily. This will be very useful for anyone wanting to lock the seat in place for kayak, canoe and dragon boat modalities as well as adaptive sports athletes. 

Locking the seat in place. The locking pin is stored in the seat, ready for use at any time

FOOT POSITION

The feet are also very adjustable. Each foot cup has 4 angle positions to choose from and are locked in place with a retractable inbuilt pin. Leaving the pin out also allows for a 'free' mode where the foot cups will freely swing in the center of the foot. We prefer the second hole from the bottom for rowing.

The height of your foot on the foot plate is adjusted with a velcro strap that cups the heel. The top of seat to lowest heel position is 18cm, equivalent to a number 4 foot plate setting on a Concept 2 (third from the top). 

Adjustment of the foot cup into 1 of 4 locked positions or free rotate.

ROWER ASSISTED PADDLING

With the seat locked in place the whipr rower becomes an incredible platform for rower assisted paddle modalities. I've had many questions about if the rower could be used for canoeing and dragon boating and the short answer is yes. In the video I'm using our SUP paddle on the shortest setting and there is plenty of clearance for all modes. It's even useful as a SUP trainer for when you don't have an anchor available, or just want to integrate some standing paddling into your training.

 

 

Building the rower takes 3 mins or less
 

Plenty of room to spare when packed for travel

Rower Specifications:

  • Specifications:
  • Weight limit: 350lbs
  • Total length: 79" (2m)
  • Total height: 20" (50cm)
  • Track length: 51" (1.29m)
  • Seat height: 8" (20cm) from floor to seat position
  • Catch distance: 15.7" (40cm)
  • Catch height (from rail): 35cm
  • Weight: 11.3kg / 24.9lb

 

 

 

Our stand up paddle shaft has been developed in collaboration with Black Project SUP, manufacturers of world championship winning paddles and fins. The paddle shaft collapses into 2 pieces (one of which houses the adjustable shaft length) and is length adjustable to suit any height. The pieces are each 17.5" long and will easily fit inside a carry on bag (typical carry on bag height is 22-24").

The paddle shaft is a special blend of carbon fiber that is softer then normal paddles to give it a distinctive 'alive' feeling in your hands. We've spent a lot of time playing with the right compounds to get it just right and the action is endorsed by world championship paddlers. To attach the paddle shaft simply clip the carabiner onto the whipr base unit.

 

Our paddle shaft, perfectly sized for travel and for paddlers large and small.

Train outdoors by anchoring to almost any fixed object. Great for bootcamps!

 

 

The cross country skiing accessory functions similarly to ski-ergs you'll find in high-end and cross fit gyms. Resistance is engaged with both arms (isolated single arm resistance would require two whipr base units). We've built this accessory to be compact and travel easily while retaining full fluid motion.  

 

 

To use the ski attachment simply unfold it, hook it over a door frame, attach the pulley to the whipr base unit hook and start skiing. The cord length is adjustable with a convenient system built into the handles and when you're finished it folds down to just 10"x4" for easy storage and travel. 

 

 

The Swim & Surf accessory consists of two hand paddles that attach to two base units. They are designed to reproduce the motion of swimming and surfing (paddling). 

The swim accessory is only available in our post campaign manager, Backerkit.
The backer exclusive price is $12, or the swim accessory is free with the purchase of a second base station.

Suggested swim/surf setup Note: the bench is not included.

 

The dual base unit (kayak) accessory is only available
in our post campaign manager Backerkit. The backer exclusive price is $85.

Using two base stations and our dual base station attachment you can convert the rower into a kayak ERG. You will need the following items:

  1. Two base units
  2. The rowing accessory
  3. The dual base station accessory (available as an add-on in our fulfillment manager)
  4. (Optional) Kayak paddle

Our kayak paddle is also available separately for $85.
It is length adjustable by 7" and packs down for portability

 

Many campaigns have disappointed their backers by not thinking through their shipping and logistics strategy. That's why we're pleased to let you know that we've partnered with a global fulfillment and logistics company, floship.com who are very experienced at fulfilling large crowdfunding orders. The following is an estimate of shipping rates.

 

 

Shipping times

After we ship, actual delivery date may take 4-6 weeks depending on your territory. Keep an eye on our updates for any schedule changes.

All shipping and applicable VAT fees will be collected separately just prior to shipping. 

Prices may go up or down depending on your choice of accessories and global shipping rates when we get to the fulfillment stage. We will strive diligently to achieve the right balance of shipping speed and cost efficiency for our backers. We will ship to you at the lowest possible rate we can secure. 

 

 

In partnership with
story_txt:
Whipr is a portable ERG machinedesigned for Paddle, Row, Ski, Swim, Surf,Kayak, Canoe, Dragon Boat & multi sport training.  Select a combo from our perks and complete your purchase. If you don't see a combo that you like, simply purchase a base unit and add accessories in our post campaign pledge manager.You will not be asked for an address. In 14 days we'll send you an email from our fulfillment manager called "Backerkit". We will use that tool to collect your shipping details plus you'll be able to add extra accessories that aren't available in the existing perk packages. As part of our partnership with Rich Froning we're producing a limited edition base station with black accents coupled with our complete package. The package also features a free month of his own MayhemNation.com. The package is available now in limited quantities.  At around 6x6x6" (16x16x16cm) and weighing around 7lbs (3kg), whipr is conveniently sized to fit in any home gym, studio apartment or workout space. Get a full sized workout, pack it down in seconds and store it next to your sneakers.Whipr is also great for travel as it packs easily in your carry on bag (along with accessories) and is permitted to fly on airplanes... we've done it many times.    Whipr started out as a way to replicate stand up paddling. We've expanded on the original concept and now have accessories available to support:
Stand up paddling
Cross country skiing
Rowing
Dragon Boat padding
Canoeing
Kayaking (requires two base stations)
Swimming (requires two base stations)
  Each modality uses the same whipr base unit and is enabled by the use of accessories. You may purchase the whole package or choose just the accessories you need to match your training and exercise needs. Whipr will accept any handles, straps or bars commonly used on a regular gym cable machine (carabiner attachments).Switching modalities is as simple as swapping whipr's orientation and accessories. This takes takes around 15 seconds so it's easy to set up HIIT (High Intensity Interval Training) sets using all three modalities.  Whipr can be used with any cable machine attachments, like these velcro leg cuffs.   The whipr base unit is essentially a miniaturized rowing machine with multiple modalities (exercises). It replaces the big, bulk rowing machines and ski-ergs that you'd usually only find in a gym, in fact to purchase equivalent quality machines for all three modalities would cost you over $4,000 and fill up a small bedroom. Whipr will cost you around 10% of that amount and it's around half the size of a basketball.    Key Specifications
Size =  6.7"x6.4"x6.4"
Weight = 7lbs (3kg) 
Pull cord length = 12 ft (3.6m)
Resistance =  Around 800N+ . Approximately the same as a full sized rower.
Resistance levels = 10
Retraction resistance = none
 Resistance MechanismThe primary source of resistance is the planetary gearbox. Just like water, our gearbox is harder to get moving then keep moving. So once you build momentum whipr rewards your consistency with a slightly easier catch and pull (stroke), just like on the water. Additional resistance is achieved by increasing or decreasing the resistance wheel which engages magnetic resistance on the inside. The images below compare the resistance of whipr with the Concept2 rowing machine (which we consider to be among the best on the industry). The whipr unit being tested was a prototype and at level 7 on our unit delivered 90% of the resistance of Concept 2 at a level 8.  FeaturesOn the front of whipr is the pull cord, the digital screen and the inflate and deflate buttons for the inbuilt anchor. The rear of the unit features the resistance adjustment wheel as well as the inflatable anchor (the flap on the back) and the removable webbing anchor for anchoring whipr to any fixed object.Front view showing pull cord, digital screen and inflatable anchor controlsRear view showing adjustment wheel. Hard mount anchor is installed.Rear view with the inbuilt door anchor inflated.The webbing anchor can be installed vertically or horizontally You can secure whipr in one of three ways:
Under a door (up to 0.75" gap) using the inflatable anchor. This works for both vertical (skiing) and horizontal (everything else) base unit orientations.
To a vertical or horizontal post, tree or sturdy piece of furniture up to 18" in diameter using the webbing anchor.
Into firm ground using the ground anchor.
  The onboard computer provides real-time performance feedback, logging & tracking including: 
Strokes per minute
500m split time
Timer / time to complete
Distance
Average watts
Calories burned
 The whipr app is available for iOS and Android devices & is compatible with popular apps like Strava.Connectivity & AppWhipr supports Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) to broadcast measurements like Speed, Pace and Power (among others). Our programming uses FTMP/FTMS (FiTness Machine Profile/Service), the Bluetooth standard for fitness equipment. This open protocol makes it very easy for third parties to integrate whipr in their own fitness app. Whipr will also have its own app that provides a real time dashboard and a log book.Our Bluetooth & health teamTo integrate bluetooth we're working with the team from Splendo. Splendo is a Dutch company with a focus on IoT, AI and Digital Health. They've built technology and apps for many high end companies and are an official Garmin Partner. Whipr will be integrated into the SplendoFit platform with app access for all backers. Additionally, our medical advisor Jeroen Molinger (Lead Clinical Medical Exercise Physiologist at Duke University Hospital, Center for PeriOperative organ protection), will be testing the feasibility and validity of whipr as an intervention tool in the rehabilitation and perioperative space. Our backers will receive the benefit of this in terms of better app data and we're thrilled that whipr will be able to help out a lot of people in their rehabilitation and recovery.   The rowing accessory gives the feeling and action of a full sized rower while being extremely compact. When you're finished training, the rower folds down in around 60-90 seconds and can be easily stored. The longest component is 27.5" so the rails will easily fit in a full sized suitcase. Assembly takes under three minutes and we're very pleased with how solid it feels despite being a portable and lightweight rower. ADJUSTABILITYThe seat can be locked into position in up to 30 different length increments. The locking pin is stored in the seat roller and can be deployed very easily. This will be very useful for anyone wanting to lock the seat in place for kayak, canoe and dragon boat modalities as well as adaptive sports athletes. Locking the seat in place. The locking pin is stored in the seat, ready for use at any timeFOOT POSITIONThe feet are also very adjustable. Each foot cup has 4 angle positions to choose from and are locked in place with a retractable inbuilt pin. Leaving the pin out also allows for a 'free' mode where the foot cups will freely swing in the center of the foot. We prefer the second hole from the bottom for rowing.The height of your foot on the foot plate is adjusted with a velcro strap that cups the heel. The top of seat to lowest heel position is 18cm, equivalent to a number 4 foot plate setting on a Concept 2 (third from the top). Adjustment of the foot cup into 1 of 4 locked positions or free rotate.ROWER ASSISTED PADDLINGWith the seat locked in place the whipr rower becomes an incredible platform for rower assisted paddle modalities. I've had many questions about if the rower could be used for canoeing and dragon boating and the short answer is yes. In the video I'm using our SUP paddle on the shortest setting and there is plenty of clearance for all modes. It's even useful as a SUP trainer for when you don't have an anchor available, or just want to integrate some standing paddling into your training.

story:
D.M reusable masks invented and developed by MAPLE SCIENTIFIC ENTERPRISES (CANADA) INC., adopt nano-fiber filter, which is proved to achieve N99-100 filter efficiency level. The mask body is made of food grade and eco-friendly Polypropylene (PP) material, which is light in weight, flexible and durable. D.M MASKs are cost effective, highly efficient, energy and resource conservative, as well as environmentally benign.

Majority of masks on the market are disposable featuring low effectiveness, causing waste of resources and serious environmental pollutions. As predicted by the scientist, the Covid-19 virus epidemic will likely coexist with human being in the long run. Demand of safe, ecofriendly and inexpensive masks have become more inelastic for fighting pandemic.

Experimental studies have confirmed that D.M reusable masks are excellent in filtration performance. D.M reusable masks employ new Polytetrafluoroethylene (PTFE) nanocomposite filter material that has excellent media resistance and weather resistance. The nano fiber bearing 100-140 nanometers diameter superimpose together to form a unique structure with a porosity of more than 80%. The filtration efficiency consistently reach more than 99%, which conforms to US standard N99-100.

D.M mask features:

  • Superior breathability. The breathability is much better than regular masks including disposable medical masks and N95 masks. There is a silicone frame which solely contact with the face. It is skin-friendly and feels smooth and comfortable even cool in summer. The silicone not only improves the seal but also leaves a hollow between the mask body and the nose and mouth. It makes incredible wearing experience that you can breathe freely like wearing nothing. Moreover, it provides extra protection due to contact free between skin and mask body compared to regular masks.
  • All day all weather. It can be worn all-weather, and the filtering performance is not affected by dampness, sweating, and humid weather.
  • Reusability. The nano filter can be rinsed and disinfected with hot water for more than 15 times and can be used repeatedly for more than 200 hours without noticeable degradation.
  • Resources saving. The amount of filter material used is only 1/12 of that of regular masks, and therefore, the same frequency of mask use can save 92% of raw materials.
  • Efficient use of resources. Regular masks are generally discarded after about 4 hours of use. D.M MASK with one single filter can be used for more than 200 hours, and the use efficiency is more than 50 times that of regular masks.
  • The mask body has a long service life. PP material has excellent performance, wide temperature adaptability range and can be used for a long time.
