story:
UPDATE: We are now planning to do four or five basic "how to" videos, where Nancy "Miss Mermaid" Kummen will show how to train a child basic water safety and get them started swimming, using the Miss Mermaid Swim Trainer as part of the product, if the goal is met!

The MISS MERMAID Swim Trainer

"If I could just find a way to make these and put them up for sale..."
"Nancy... do you know what I do for a living?

That was the beginning of the conversation after my daughter's swim lesson with Nancy - aka "Miss Mermaid".

I already knew Nancy was passionate about teaching kids to be safe around water - it only takes 10 minutes of her talking animatedly to you about the subject to get that.

But the little "noodle boat" she'd made in her garage (using rough tools and occasionally hurting herself) was in constant use to that one goal - GETTING KIDS SAFE AROUND WATER.

Facts:

  • In the US alone, every year, nearly 800 children are lost to drowning.
  • Many more are permanently injured due to near drowning.
  • These are largely preventable tragedies.
  • The Miss Mermaid Swim Trainer is a valuable tool to help get kids water safe, faster.

We've worked together for two years to observe, test, check and re-design features, and ensure that the Miss Mermaid Swim Trainer is:

  • Affordable - by using ONE main component, and a user-provided standard Pool Noodle, we were able to reduce the cost of each unit by over 50%. Note that this does mean the Foam Noodle must be purchased separately - please see the FAQ for more information on why we made this important decision.
  • Easy to use - It takes less than two minutes to unpack, and assemble with your 2.75 to 3 inch (standard) Foam Pool Noodle.
  • Versatile - It can be used for everyone from a child who cannot swim at all, to a training athlete, to an adult in need of post-injury or surgery aquatherapy.
  • Durable - We evaluated a half dozen manufacturing techniques and materials (with some spectacularly messy and often hysterical failures in the prototype phase) to arrive at the right one. Versatile, long-lasting, high-performance, recyclable. In addition, the Packaging is designed as a mesh bag - to be re-used as a carrying and drying bag for the Miss Mermaid Swim Trainer, and other small swim accessories (goggles, etc.) - along with a plastic tag with space for the Student or Athlete's name. So ZERO packaging into the landfill!
  • LEGAL NOTE: The Miss Mermaid™ Swim Trainer is a training device intended to help children and adults learn to float and swim, thus making them safer in and around water. It is NOT intended or designed as a life saving device.
     

Here's who we are:

Nancy - the primary inventor of the Miss Mermaid Swim Trainer - started triathlons with the 1981 Nautilus Triathlon in Hawaii - an event which was eventually renamed the Ironman®

In the over 40 years since then, she has competed in 8 full Ironman® competitions, 400 half-Ironman®s, Duathlons, Biathlons, and 38 marathons.

In 1991, Nancy made the USA Team, and received the World Silver Medal in Triathlon for her age group.

In 1992, she was awarded the Speedo Award for Fastest Master Swimmer.

She then competed in the Senior Olympics, Master swim events, for both Lake and Ocean, and still competes in triathlons and biathlons to this day.

Since 1982, Nancy translated her athletic prowess into a career as a trainer, focusing on teaching children to swim, from beginner water safety and swim training to youth competitive training, and aquatherapy for adults and seniors, in private, semiprivate, and group settings. She has also taught lifeguarding, having received her American Red Cross WSI Instructor's License in Lifeguarding, CPR and First Aid in 1981.

She has worked as an Aquatics Director, Head Swim Coach, Aqua Aerobics Director, and has started several swimming and triathlon coaching businesses, including Miss Mermaid's Swim Training.

Nancy's certifications include:

  • USA Certified Triathlon Coach
  • American Red Cross Water Safety Instructor
  • Lifeguard
  • CPR
  • Red Cross First Aid and AED
  • National Fitness Association Personal and Group Trainer
  • National Sports Council Medicine
  • Silver Sneakers Certification Land Aerobic Exercise
  • USA Triathlon Swim Coaching

-----------

I'm Thomas - the Product Developer part of the team.
I have over 25 years experience in product engineering, manufacturing, and development, including 15 years in designing and developing product in the Pool, Spa, and Recreational Water industry. In addition, during college I worked as a Certified Pool Operator in a hotel chain setting.

I'm now a Product Development Consultant, and have contacts and investments in manufacturing industry all over the world. I create products and lead teams to do anything, anywhere. "Dreams Made Solid; Dreams Made Real" is my company slogan (thanks Peter Gabriel!)
I am also an active member of the PDMA (Product Development and Management Association), have been a member of the Arizona PDMA Board of Directors, and a PDMA consultant to international client companies.

As such, I have a unique and excellent background to know how much and how long it will take to get this project into the World and doing the good it can do - this is a point where many startups fall apart. I am realistic, from the often painful lessons of experience.

-------------

Dani is the boots on the ground person when it comes to Manufacturing, Sourcing, and Quality Control. With 10 years experience working in the extremely fast paced manufacturing center of the world, Shenzhen, she is uniquely qualified to take a product through manufacturing, quality control, and finally shipping and logistics to get it where it needs to go. With the current situation in the world, our team is now more than ever extremely lucky to have someone of her unique talent, experience, personal virtue, and drive for a quality product.

If it can be done, Dani can find where it should be done, and make sure it gets done correctly, and as on-time as is possible.

Here's where we are (and what we need to get to the goal):

Here are our Timeline Goals:

  • Design (Done)
  • Alpha/Beta Testing (Done)
  • Provisional Patent Application (Done)
  • Quoting of everything from tooling to logistics (Done)
  • Warehouse Space (Secured)
  • Tooling - Six to Eight Weeks
  • First Article/Production Validation Testing - Two Weeks
  • Changes (if necessary) - Two Weeks
  • Initial Production of 5000 to 10,000 units - Four Weeks
  • Pre-Ship Inspection/Shipping - One Week
  • Shipping of 100 Early Top Tier Backer Perk Products - December 15, 2021
  • Shipping (using current ocean shipping, which happens to be a worldwide mess!) - Eight Weeks (Goal of mid-January 2022)
  • US Warehousing and Fulfillment (already in place)
  • Shipping of Backer product and Perks: Late March, 2022
  • Marketing - Eight weeks of campaigns, mid-April of 2022, presentation to Swim Schools and Specialty Retailers in Q4 2021
  • Launch Date: Spring 2022, with On Shelf/End Customer Ship Date goal of April 18, 2022

The end result of this effort and analysis is a dollar figure which serves as the fuel to fund this project to completion:
$92,850

Stretch Goals:
At $100,000, we will create an "XL" size version of the Miss Mermaid™ Swim Trainer, designed for more intense workouts and training for adult trainees and athletes, and physical therapy/recovery/exercise for larger Adults, AND we will hire a professional videographer with underwater experience to make INSTRUCTIONAL videos showing the use of the Miss Mermaid™ Swim Trainer for aerobic exercise, and suggestions for physical therapists in the use of the device for their patients in aquatherapy.

How is this... "Making the World a Better Place?"

Quite simply, this product, put to proper use, is designed to help save lives.

Preventing drowning deaths and injuries starts with the children themselves - helping them learn to be safe IN and AROUND water is of utmost importance. When barriers, fences, locks, and alarms fail, knowing how to FLOAT and SWIM are the difference between a funny or frightening story... and the worst tragedy imaginable.

Secondly, providing a better way for Adults to recover from accidents and surgery by using aquatherapy. The Miss Mermaid™ Swim Trainer serves as an ideal stabilizer in water, helping the customer focus on strengthening and healing, rather than stability or any fear of water.

What are the risks?

As with any Product Development project, there are hurdles, and risks. This one in particular is relatively "safe," but still has risks which must be addressed.

  • The current plan is to manufacture in China (US and other options were evaluated, and found to be ranging from slightly to insanely more expensive than China). If additional tariffs, sanctions, etc. should happen involving the US and China, there are options in Malaysia, Thailand, and Vietnam to which production could be transferred in order to preserve manufacturing capability.
  • The chosen factory (which has been in business making products for the US and world markets since 1995) could go out of business. In this case, there are three secondary choices which could receive and use the same tooling to continue manufacturing.
  • The timeline could be "blown". These products are seasonal - people typically only buy in Spring and Summer months, so sales is typically very bad for products which hit the market after, say, mid-June. The Miss Mermaid™ Swim Trainer may be slightly less susceptible due to indoor swim schools and the increase in number of heated pools. But, in this case, Backers would still get the Products and Perks they deserve, and the unsold stock would be stored in the warehouse (we do have warehouse space to fit the entire projected first two years of production) until the next season.

"I don't have a need for the product... but I love the idea. How can I help?"

  • SPREAD the word! We don't spend a lot of time on Social Media (nearly none) and would REALLY appreciate you sending this out using either this link (
    https://igg.me/at/MissMermaid ), or the Indiegogo Share Tools, to anyone and everyone you know who could use the Miss Mermaid™ Swim Trainer.
  • Have a friend with a kid learning to swim soon? Send them our way!
  • Back us, and give your Trainer to a person you know as a gift, or to a nearby Swim School.
  • Know someone who gives swim lessons? Nancy would be happy to share her techniques for using the Miss Mermaid™ Swim Trainer! (professionally produced YouTube videos showing the training methods are one of the Stretch Goals for the campaign)

A Note on the Production of this Campaign

As you may have noticed, this campaign is "rough" compared to many others - we get that, and it's by design.

It was filmed using very cheap knockoff sports cameras for underwater shots (cameras literally duct taped to pool poles), cell phone cameras, etc., and edited together using very inexpensive desktop software (namely Pinnacle) by... us. The copy was written and edited by... us.

In other words, your contribution to our campaign helps pay for the product, not the professional production of the campaign. 

We're as "grass roots" as you can get.

Facts:

In the US alone, every year, nearly 800 children are lost to drowning.

Many more are permanently injured due to near drowning.
These are largely preventable tragedies.
The Miss Mermaid Swim Trainer is a valuable tool to help get kids water safe, faster.


We've worked together for two years to observe, test, check and re-design features, and ensure that the Miss Mermaid Swim Trainer is:


Affordable - by using ONE main component, and a user-provided standard Pool Noodle, we were able to reduce the cost of each unit by over 50%. Note that this does mean the Foam Noodle must be purchased separately - please see the FAQ for more information on why we made this important decision.

Easy to use - It takes less than two minutes to unpack, and assemble with your 2.75 to 3 inch (standard) Foam Pool Noodle.

Versatile - It can be used for everyone from a child who cannot swim at all, to a training athlete, to an adult in need of post-injury or surgery aquatherapy.

Durable - We evaluated a half dozen manufacturing techniques and materials (with some spectacularly messy and often hysterical failures in the prototype phase) to arrive at the right one. Versatile, long-lasting, high-performance, recyclable. In addition, the Packaging is designed as a mesh bag - to be re-used as a carrying and drying bag for the Miss Mermaid Swim Trainer, and other small swim accessories (goggles, etc.) - along with a plastic tag with space for the Student or Athlete's name. So ZERO packaging into the landfill!


LEGAL NOTE: The Miss Mermaid™ Swim Trainer is a training device intended to help children and adults learn to float and swim, thus making them safer in and around water. It is NOT intended or designed as a life saving device. 


Here's who we are:
Nancy - the primary inventor of the Miss Mermaid Swim Trainer - started triathlons with the 1981 Nautilus Triathlon in Hawaii - an event which was eventually renamed the Ironman®
In the over 40 years since then, she has competed in 8 full Ironman® competitions, 400 half-Ironman®s, Duathlons, Biathlons, and 38 marathons.
In 1991, Nancy made the USA Team, and received the World Silver Medal in Triathlon for her age group.
In 1992, she was awarded the Speedo Award for Fastest Master Swimmer.
She then competed in the Senior Olympics, Master swim events, for both Lake and Ocean, and still competes in triathlons and biathlons to this day.
Since 1982, Nancy translated her athletic prowess into a career as a trainer, focusing on teaching children to swim, from beginner water safety and swim training to youth competitive training, and aquatherapy for adults and seniors, in private, semiprivate, and group settings. She has also taught lifeguarding, having received her American Red Cross WSI Instructor's License in Lifeguarding, CPR and First Aid in 1981.
She has worked as an Aquatics Director, Head Swim Coach, Aqua Aerobics Director, and has started several swimming and triathlon coaching businesses, including Miss Mermaid's Swim Training.
Nancy's certifications include:

USA Certified Triathlon Coach

American Red Cross Water Safety Instructor
Lifeguard
CPR
Red Cross First Aid and AED
National Fitness Association Personal and Group Trainer
National Sports Council Medicine
Silver Sneakers Certification Land Aerobic Exercise
USA Triathlon Swim Coaching

-----------
I'm Thomas - the Product Developer part of the team.I have over 25 years experience in product engineering, manufacturing, and development, including 15 years in designing and developing product in the Pool, Spa, and Recreational Water industry. In addition, during college I worked as a Certified Pool Operator in a hotel chain setting.
I'm now a Product Development Consultant, and have contacts and investments in manufacturing industry all over the world. I create products and lead teams to do anything, anywhere. "Dreams Made Solid; Dreams Made Real" is my company slogan (thanks Peter Gabriel!)I am also an active member of the PDMA (Product Development and Management Association), have been a member of the Arizona PDMA Board of Directors, and a PDMA consultant to international client companies.
As such, I have a unique and excellent background to know how much and how long it will take to get this project into the World and doing the good it can do - this is a point where many startups fall apart. I am realistic, from the often painful lessons of experience.
-------------
Dani is the boots on the ground person when it comes to Manufacturing, Sourcing, and Quality Control. With 10 years experience working in the extremely fast paced manufacturing center of the world, Shenzhen, she is uniquely qualified to take a product through manufacturing, quality control, and finally shipping and logistics to get it where it needs to go. With the current situation in the world, our team is now more than ever extremely lucky to have someone of her unique talent, experience, personal virtue, and drive for a quality product.
If it can be done, Dani can find where it should be done, and make sure it gets done correctly, and as on-time as is possible.
Here's where we are (and what we need to get to the goal):
Here are our Timeline Goals:

Design (Done)
Alpha/Beta Testing (Done)
Provisional Patent Application (Done)
Quoting of everything from tooling to logistics (Done)
Warehouse Space (Secured)
Tooling - Six to Eight Weeks
First Article/Production Validation Testing - Two Weeks
Changes (if necessary) - Two Weeks
Initial Production of 5000 to 10,000 units - Four Weeks
Pre-Ship Inspection/Shipping - One Week
Shipping of 100 Early Top Tier Backer Perk Products - December 15, 2021

Shipping (using current ocean shipping, which happens to be a worldwide mess!) - Eight Weeks (Goal of mid-January 2022)
US Warehousing and Fulfillment (already in place)
Shipping of Backer product and Perks: Late March, 2022
Marketing - Eight weeks of campaigns, mid-April of 2022, presentation to Swim Schools and Specialty Retailers in Q4 2021
Launch Date: Spring 2022, with On Shelf/End Customer Ship Date goal of April 18, 2022

The end result of this effort and analysis is a dollar figure which serves as the fuel to fund this project to completion:$92,850
Stretch Goals:At $100,000, we will create an "XL" size version of the Miss Mermaid™ Swim Trainer, designed for more intense workouts and training for adult trainees and athletes, and physical therapy/recovery/exercise for larger Adults, AND we will hire a professional videographer with underwater experience to make INSTRUCTIONAL videos showing the use of the Miss Mermaid™ Swim Trainer for aerobic exercise, and suggestions for physical therapists in the use of the device for their patients in aquatherapy.

How is this... "Making the World a Better Place?"
Quite simply, this product, put to proper use, is designed to help save lives.
Preventing drowning deaths and injuries starts with the children themselves - helping them learn to be safe IN and AROUND water is of utmost importance. When barriers, fences, locks, and alarms fail, knowing how to FLOAT and SWIM are the difference between a funny or frightening story... and the worst tragedy imaginable.
Secondly, providing a better way for Adults to recover from accidents and surgery by using aquatherapy. The Miss Mermaid™ Swim Trainer serves as an ideal stabilizer in water, helping the customer focus on strengthening and healing, rather than stability or any fear of water.

What are the risks?
As with any Product Development project, there are hurdles, and risks. This one in particular is relatively "safe," but still has risks which must be addressed.

The current plan is to manufacture in China (US and other options were evaluated, and found to be ranging from slightly to insanely more expensive than China). If additional tariffs, sanctions, etc. should happen involving the US and China, there are options in Malaysia, Thailand, and Vietnam to which production could be transferred in order to preserve manufacturing capability.
The chosen factory (which has been in business making products for the US and world markets since 1995) could go out of business. In this case, there are three secondary choices which could receive and use the same tooling to continue manufacturing.
The timeline could be "blown". These products are seasonal - people typically only buy in Spring and Summer months, so sales is typically very bad for products which hit the market after, say, mid-June. The Miss Mermaid™ Swim Trainer may be slightly less susceptible due to indoor swim schools and the increase in number of heated pools. But, in this case, Backers would still get the Products and Perks they deserve, and the unsold stock would be stored in the warehouse (we do have warehouse space to fit the entire projected first two years of production) until the next season.


"I don't have a need for the product... but I love the idea. How can I help?"


SPREAD the word! We don't spend a lot of time on Social Media (nearly none) and would REALLY appreciate you sending this out using either this link (https://igg.me/at/MissMermaid ), or the Indiegogo Share Tools, to anyone and everyone you know who could use the Miss Mermaid™ Swim Trainer.

Have a friend with a kid learning to swim soon? Send them our way!
Back us, and give your Trainer to a person you know as a gift, or to a nearby Swim School.
Know someone who gives swim lessons? Nancy would be happy to share her techniques for using the Miss Mermaid™ Swim Trainer! (professionally produced YouTube videos showing the training methods are one of the Stretch Goals for the campaign)

A Note on the Production of this Campaign
As you may have noticed, this campaign is "rough" compared to many others - we get that, and it's by design.
It was filmed using very cheap knockoff sports cameras for underwater shots (cameras literally duct taped to pool poles), cell phone cameras, etc., and edited together using very inexpensive desktop software (namely Pinnacle) by... us. The copy was written and edited by... us.
In other words, your contribution to our campaign helps pay for the product, not the professional production of the campaign. 
We're as "grass roots" as you can get.

story:
La nostra storia // Our history

Sostegno Ovale è un'associazione ONLUS (no profit), legata al Rugby Colorno, nata nel 2013. Si pone l'obiettivo di diffondere i sani valori del rugby ponendoli come modello di condivisione per la società civile attraverso iniziative formative e solidali.

Il primo progetto a prendere forma, insieme alla bancarella del rugbista, è stato la squadra dei Bufali Rossi.

Una squadra speciale composta al momento da 12 ragazzi tra i 18 ed i 30 anni con problemi di natura psicologica/psichiatrica ma con una discreta integrità fisica. Sono giovani che nel corso della loro vita hanno subito un breakdown psicologico o psichiatrico che li ha portati ad uscire dai normali circuiti di crescita (scuola, amici, sport, ...) e che necessitano di essere reinseriti nel contesto sociale tradizionale. La palla ovale, oltre che strumento per il risveglio muscolare e motorio, diviene mezzo di socializzazione e comunicazione, sinonimo di spirito di gruppo e amicizia.

Il progetto ha come primo obiettivo far diventare i Bufali Rossi una vera squadra di rugby con la possibilità di partecipare ad un campionato amatoriale.

Attualmente i ragazzi si allenano due volte alla settimana sui campi del Rugby Colorno. Integrazione vuol dire ogni tanto fare allenamento congiunto con qualche ragazzo della prima squadra. Questo li aiuta ad integrarsi ma aiuta anche i ragazzi normodotati in un'esperienza di crescita. Allenarsi vuol dire anche superare barriere ed ostacoli (es.: contatto fisico, andare a terra, cadere nel fango, ....).

L'equipe che segue i ragazzi è composta da:

N°1 coordinatore tra pazienti, Associazione Sostegno Ovale, D.S.M. Ausl di Parma (Dott.sa MariaTeresa Gaggiotti).

N°1 Psicologo che ha iniziato una serie di test per parametrare i miglioramenti (Andrea Leone).

N°1 Professore che in coordinamento con la Dott.sa Gaggiotti sta redigendo il progetto dal punto di vista scientifico (Prof. Anedda).

N°1 Allenatore (Massimiliano Faraj).

N°1 Staff di infermieri ed educatori.

I beneficiari di questo percorso sono oltre i ragazzi le famiglie degli stessi che vedono i propri figli ritornare ad una vita migliore.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 

Sostegno Ovale (Oval Support) is a non-profit organization linked to Rugby Colorno that was established in 2013. Its mission is to spread the good values of rugby among people and promote them as a social model through solidarity and education projects.

The first of these to take shape were the Rugby Market Stand (Bancarella del Rugbysta) and the Bufali Rossi Team.

Bufali Rossi is a special team that is currently composed of 12 guys between 18 and 30 years old who are in pretty good health, but who have psychological or psychiatric problems. At a certain point in their lives they had a breakdown that lead them out of their normal growth environment and alienated them from school, sport and friends. In addition to being a useful fitness instrument to improve their muscle tone and their motor abilities, the oval ball becomes an excellent instrument for them to socialize and communicate by developing team spirit and friendship, thus helping them with reintegration.

The first aim of this project is to make the Bufali Rossi a real rugby team and give them the chance to take part in a non-professional championship.

They are now training at the Rugby Colorno fields twice a week. Training is important because it also means facing barriers, like the physical contact or fall in the mud and sometimes they work out together with few guys of the first team, as this helps them in their social reintegration.

The Bufali Rossi are followed by a team composed of:

N°1 Coordinator (Dott. MariaTeresa Gaggiotti)

N°1Psychologist (Dott. Andrea Leone)

N°1 Professor (Dott. Anedda)

N°1 Sport Trainer (Massimiliano Faraj)

N°1 Staff of educators and healthcare assistants

However, this program is not only addressed to the guys but to their families as well, as they see their song get back to a normal and better life.


Di cosa abbiamo bisogno // What we need 


I Bufali Rossi hanno bisogno di un minibus per poter garantire ad ogni singolo ragazzo di partecipare agli allenamenti senza gravare ulteriormente sulle famiglie. Inoltre avere un proprio automezzo potrebbe garantire alla squadra di giocare con le altre squadre presenti sul territorio italiano, lontane e vicine, che utilizzano il rugby come strumento di integrazione sociale.

Il denaro raccolto verrà utilizzato nel seguente modo:


Se non raggiungeremo il nostro obiettivo il denaro non verrà addebitato ma sicuramente ci riproveremo ancora con più forza e più volontà di prima.
Abbiamo inoltre previsto per tutti coloro che faranno una donazione tanti simpatici gadgets dei Bufali Rossi. Tutti coloro che ci aiuteranno avranno il loro nome scritto sul nuovo minibus dei Bufali Rossi, sarete sempre con noi nei nostri viaggi. Abbiamo braccialetti, T-Shirt, felpe ma soprattutto, per i più generosi, vi ospiteremo a vedere i Bufali Rossi una simpatica esperienza di rugby che vi riempirà di vita.
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 

The Bufali Rossi need a minibus to allow all guys to go to the training fields without burdening their families.

This will also give them the chance to play everywhere with other national rugby teamsthat use this sport as an instrument for integration.

The gathered money will be used to:

Shouldn’t we reach our goal this time, we will try again, with even more efforts and perseverance.

All donors will be offered some nice gifts of the team, such as bracelets, tee-shirts and sweatshirts.

The most generous among them will also be invited to watch a Bufali Rossi match, which will be a unique rugby and life experience.

All their names will be written on the Bufali Rossi’s minibus, so that we will remember all people who helped us whenever we get in it.

Our benefactors will always accompany us.


Perché // Fundraising purpose


La tua donazione è importante perché garantirà ai Bufali Rossi una costante presenza agli allenamenti e quindi un costante e continuo miglioramento del loro reinserimento nel tessuto sociale.
Con il nostro automezzo ci sentiremo ancora più squadra e ancora più coinvolti in questo nobile progetto. E ti ricorderemo in ogni viaggio !!

Ogni ragazzo che riusciremo a raccogliere con il nostro minibus sarà un successo per tutti.
Abbiamo bisogno del tuo aiuto anche per divulgare a più persone possibili la nostra iniziativa perché sappiamo che raggiungere la meta non è mai semplice. L'obiettivo che ci siamo dati è importante, aiutaci a diffondere sui tuoi canali, ad amici, parenti, colleghi e conoscenti il nostro messaggio di solidarietà.
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 

Your donation is very important, because it will help the Bufali Rossi train and follow their reintegration program regularly.

Having our own minibus will also make us feel closer and even more engaged in this  noble project. 

For each guy we will be able to pick upa great success will be achieved.

We have a big goal and we need your contribution to promote our project and make more and more people aware of it.

We know that to score a try is not so easy, so please, help us spread our solidarity message among your  friends, your colleagues and your family.

The more we are the better!

story:
Update

The shirts available as a perk will be the first product you can log on ipoura. More details to follow.

What is ipoura?

A platform to reestablish the human connection, that has been lost as a result of our global economy, by using pre-existing data systems combined with social media. With ipoura you will be able to use a mobile or web app to connect with the people who made your goods. Companies that use ipoura will provide information (i.e. photos, what they do, short bios, etc) about each person who contributed to the production of your individual product. If you wish, you can share your new purchase with your friends on social media or say thanks to the people behind your product.

How did the idea come about?

The idea for ipoura was born out of the Rana Plaza factory collapse, this was an entirely preventable tragedy that is repeated in every country when it industrializes. The realization set in that if a company documented the production process and connected the final consumers to the people producing their individual purchases, you could treat employees humanely and still compete in the market place. Research uncovered that “Enterprise Resource Planning” tools, already in place in all but the simplest of today’s factories, generate all of the necessary information and the only part missing is the programming to connect the people. Instead of building a single factory to change an industry we can build a platform and have an impact upon the entire global economy.

Why is the human connection so important?

The loss of the human connection is the reason that financial values seem entirely disconnected from your values. For example: you wouldn’t condone slavery; yet you might unknowingly buy a product that was produced by workers who are enduring near slave labor conditions. Ethics are a natural and powerful part of what it is to be human, but ethics requires empathy. It is impossible to empathize with a product but it is natural to empathize with people. Before the industrial revolution, people knew the individuals who made their goods. Having this connection, not only made it easy for people to empathize with these individuals but it also allowed them to see how their actions affected the market place and the people who made their good. Because ipoura is a large scale social connection, you won’t have to read each individual’s bio; the mere act of being willing to connect with companies who share your values will be enough to change the marketplace.

Are we activists?

No. In order for this to work, we must remain neutral and allow companies and consumers to communicate their values directly to each other. We do not need to be activists though because they already exist. With the presence of a social connection, when activists find hypocrisy within the marketplace the result will be customers switching to competitors. The specific results would depend on what is important to our end users. If you buy American products, and that is what’s important to you, you will be affecting the American economy. If foreign labor conditions are more of an issue for you, then that is where your impact will be. Individually we may not be able to tell the market what to do  but collectively we can!

Why would a company want to use ipoura?

  • Companies spend huge sums of money trying to get their customers attention;  ipoura will help to cut through advertising clutter by connecting businesses to their customers on a social level.

  • Using ipoura will allow businesses that want to do the right thing to compete on an ethical level.

  • ipoura can help a company achieve "cult brand" status by establishing a strong social connection with their customers. This kind of relationship is something that every company wishes to establish.

  • Since ipoura uses data that already exists in the databases of large companies, it will be convenient.

  • Smaller businesses and service providers will be able to use ipoura to add a personal touch to their goods and services.

  • ipoura will be free for business to business connections. Enabling the documentation of a product all the way back to the source materials (i.e. the people who grow the coffee you drink, the miners that dig you diamonds you wear from the earth).

How it works

A picture is worth a thousand words, so we put some screenshots from our demo in the gallery.


What will ipoura cost to use?

For the end user: nothing! ipoura will be free!

For companies, we will use value based pricing (a fraction of a percent) and only charge once per ipoura ID. So in the case of business to business connections it will be free. This is because the further the supply chain gets from the consumer, the higher the likelihood of antisocial behavior. We want to make it as easy as possible, to remove any obstacles for all parties.


What do your contributions help us to achieve?

We need $30,000 in contributions to cover our initial expenses (programmers, lawyers, etc). If we don't raise the full amount, nobody will be charged. We know we can make this happen, if there is enough support. We would rather have 30,000 people contribute $1, than 3 companies contribute $10,000. If enough people want to change the market, the market will be happy to change. This is about a large number of people, doing very little, to change the world.

Your financial contribution will help us finish the first release of the ipoura app. Contributions beyond our goal will help with building our API as well as buying us time to review investors to make sure they share our values and are willing to make ipoura what it can be, instead of sacrificing long term value for a quick buck.

Any form of support, whether financial or through social media, will also demonstrate to companies that their customers are willing to connect on a social level, at least with companies that they feel are behaving in a socially acceptable manner. Not all companies will care about doing the right thing, but every competitive company cares about what is important to their customers.

Privacy policy

In short, ipoura won't sell your data. You will be in control, you will choose what you buy, you will choose what products you log on ipoura, you will choose what (if any) purchases you share on your social media outlets, you will be in control. 

Individual Perks

$1:  Exclusive founding member’s mark on ipoura and posts made from our platform as well as a mention on our "About Us" page of ipoura.

$5:  Sticker + founding member’s mark

$30:  Shirt + sticker + founding member’s mark

$25:  Shirt + founding member’s mark

$75:  $80 Gift card to a future member company + shirt + sticker + founding member’s mark

$125:  $140 Gift card to a future member company + shirt + sticker + founding member’s  mark

$500:  $575 Gift card to a future member company + shirt + sticker + founding member’s  mark

Professional Perks

Service Individuals

$25:  250 ipoura IDs (haircuts, massages, etc.) + 50% off our regular prices for life.

$50:  500 ipoura IDs (haircuts, massages, etc.) + 50% off our regular prices for life.

$100:  1,000 ipoura IDs (haircuts, massages, etc.) + 50% off our regular prices for life.

Small/Medium Companies (No E.R.P. systems)

$100: $100 credit + 50% off our regular prices for 5 years

$250:  $250 credit + 50% off our regular prices for 10 years

$2,500:  $2,500 credit + 50% off our regular prices for 50 years

Large Companies (E.R.P. systems in place)

$5,000:  $5,000 credit + 50% off our regular prices for 5 years

$10,000:  $10,000 credit + 50% off our regular prices for 10 years

$50,000:  $50,000 credit + 50% off our regular prices for 50 years

Challenges

Our single biggest challenge by far is finding enough of the right people, passionate people, who care about values.

Today:

  • We need to find end users, like you.

  • We need to find companies that care; they all claim to but some mean it.

Moving forward:

  • We will need to find talented coworkers.

  • We will need to find investors that care about more than just money.

Who we are

Jerry McMahan - CEO

Degree in entrepreneurship & venture management. Over 8 years of management experience, primarily with small companies and startups. JavaScript programmer.

Eric Jennings - Head of Product

Degree in advertising and professional experience with custom marketing software.


Patent Pending
Copyright 2015 IPOURA LLC
story_txt:
UpdateThe shirts available as a perk will be the first product you can log on ipoura. More details to follow.What is ipoura?A platform to reestablish the human connection, that has been lost as a result of our global economy, by using pre-existing data systems combined with social media. With ipoura you will be able to use a mobile or web app to connect with the people who made your goods. Companies that use ipoura will provide information (i.e. photos, what they do, short bios, etc) about each person who contributed to the production of your individual product. If you wish, you can share your new purchase with your friends on social media or say thanks to the people behind your product.How did the idea come about?The idea for ipoura was born out of the Rana Plaza factory collapse, this was an entirely preventable tragedy that is repeated in every country when it industrializes. The realization set in that if a company documented the production process and connected the final consumers to the people producing their individual purchases, you could treat employees humanely and still compete in the market place. Research uncovered that “Enterprise Resource Planning” tools, already in place in all but the simplest of today’s factories, generate all of the necessary information and the only part missing is the programming to connect the people. Instead of building a single factory to change an industry we can build a platform and have an impact upon the entire global economy.Why is the human connection so important?The loss of the human connection is the reason that financial values seem entirely disconnected from your values. For example: you wouldn’t condone slavery; yet you might unknowingly buy a product that was produced by workers who are enduring near slave labor conditions. Ethics are a natural and powerful part of what it is to be human, but ethics requires empathy. It is impossible to empathize with a product but it is natural to empathize with people. Before the industrial revolution, people knew the individuals who made their goods. Having this connection, not only made it easy for people to empathize with these individuals but it also allowed them to see how their actions affected the market place and the people who made their good. Because ipoura is a large scale social connection, you won’t have to read each individual’s bio; the mere act of being willing to connect with companies who share your values will be enough to change the marketplace.Are we activists?No. In order for this to work, we must remain neutral and allow companies and consumers to communicate their values directly to each other. We do not need to be activists though because they already exist. With the presence of a social connection, when activists find hypocrisy within the marketplace the result will be customers switching to competitors. The specific results would depend on what is important to our end users. If you buy American products, and that is what’s important to you, you will be affecting the American economy. If foreign labor conditions are more of an issue for you, then that is where your impact will be. Individually we may not be able to tell the market what to do  but collectively we can!Why would a company want to use ipoura?
Companies spend huge sums of money trying to get their customers attention;  ipoura will help to cut through advertising clutter by connecting businesses to their customers on a social level.
Using ipoura will allow businesses that want to do the right thing to compete on an ethical level.
ipoura can help a company achieve "cult brand" status by establishing a strong social connection with their customers. This kind of relationship is something that every company wishes to establish.
Since ipoura uses data that already exists in the databases of large companies, it will be convenient.
Smaller businesses and service providers will be able to use ipoura to add a personal touch to their goods and services.
ipoura will be free for business to business connections. Enabling the documentation of a product all the way back to the source materials (i.e. the people who grow the coffee you drink, the miners that dig you diamonds you wear from the earth).
How it worksA picture is worth a thousand words, so we put some screenshots from our demo in the gallery.What will ipoura cost to use?For the end user: nothing! ipoura will be free! For companies, we will use value based pricing (a fraction of a percent) and only charge once per ipoura ID. So in the case of business to business connections it will be free. This is because the further the supply chain gets from the consumer, the higher the likelihood of antisocial behavior. We want to make it as easy as possible, to remove any obstacles for all parties.What do your contributions help us to achieve?We need $30,000 in contributions to cover our initial expenses (programmers, lawyers, etc). If we don't raise the full amount, nobody will be charged. We know we can make this happen, if there is enough support. We would rather have 30,000 people contribute $1, than 3 companies contribute $10,000. If enough people want to change the market, the market will be happy to change. This is about a large number of people, doing very little, to change the world.Your financial contribution will help us finish the first release of the ipoura app. Contributions beyond our goal will help with building our API as well as buying us time to review investors to make sure they share our values and are willing to make ipoura what it can be, instead of sacrificing long term value for a quick buck. Any form of support, whether financial or through social media, will also demonstrate to companies that their customers are willing to connect on a social level, at least with companies that they feel are behaving in a socially acceptable manner. Not all companies will care about doing the right thing, but every competitive company cares about what is important to their customers.Privacy policyIn short, ipoura won't sell your data. You will be in control, you will choose what you buy, you will choose what products you log on ipoura, you will choose what (if any) purchases you share on your social media outlets, you will be in control. Individual Perks$1:  Exclusive founding member’s mark on ipoura and posts made from our platform as well as a mention on our "About Us" page of ipoura.$5:  Sticker + founding member’s mark$30:  Shirt + sticker + founding member’s mark$25:  Shirt + founding member’s mark$75:  $80 Gift card to a future member company + shirt + sticker + founding member’s mark$125:  $140 Gift card to a future member company + shirt + sticker + founding member’s  mark$500:  $575 Gift card to a future member company + shirt + sticker + founding member’s  markProfessional PerksService Individuals$25:  250 ipoura IDs (haircuts, massages, etc.) + 50% off our regular prices for life.$50:  500 ipoura IDs (haircuts, massages, etc.) + 50% off our regular prices for life.$100:  1,000 ipoura IDs (haircuts, massages, etc.) + 50% off our regular prices for life.Small/Medium Companies (No E.R.P. systems)$100: $100 credit + 50% off our regular prices for 5 years$250:  $250 credit + 50% off our regular prices for 10 years$2,500:  $2,500 credit + 50% off our regular prices for 50 yearsLarge Companies (E.R.P. systems in place)$5,000:  $5,000 credit + 50% off our regular prices for 5 years$10,000:  $10,000 credit + 50% off our regular prices for 10 years$50,000:  $50,000 credit + 50% off our regular prices for 50 yearsChallengesOur single biggest challenge by far is finding enough of the right people, passionate people, who care about values.Today:

story:
HUMANS WERE NOT DESIGNED TO SIT STILL FOR HOURS ON END


Modern life requires that we often remain still for extended periods of time, whether we're on road-trips, long flights, or in an office job seated at our desks for most of the day. This sort of sedentary life style can cause stiffness, soreness and health issues in the short and long term...

"ADAFlow is a compact device that wraps around your upper or lower leg and applies a pressure wave massage to make you feel better"

The ADAFlow uses a novel mechanism to generate a pressure wave which combats the discomfort and stiffness associated with a lack of physical movement. You can set the pressure wave's intensity, duration and interval to your personal preference. The ADAFlow is easy to apply, simple to control and travel-friendly. 


ADAFlow IN THE NEWS


LISTEN TO THE CROWDFUNDING PODCAST!
Crowdfunding Cast ADAFlow Podcast

HOW ADAFLOW WORKS
The ADAFlow uses a patented peristaltic motion mechanism to generate pressure waves. The novel mechanism contracts segments of the wrap around your leg in a timed sequence. Both the timing and force of contraction can be adjusted to achieve optimal relief to your personal liking.


The AdaFlow technology is a radical departure from the existing compression devices available today. Typical hospital devices are bulky, mostly involve air bladders that only pump and do not create a wave in one direction, are slow and not efficient. Other electrical stimulation devices are expensive and wasteful as the entire device needs to be replaced periodically. Ada Flow addresses all of these issues with its mobile, compact design that makes this unique pressure wave technology available to the everyday user.


OUR GOAL - $65,000 in funding to bring ADAFlow to the consumer


We have developed an advanced prototype and now we need your help to bring ADAFlow to the consumer. Reaching this funding goal will enable us to finalize the ADAFlow design for manufacture and ship it out to you. We have our manufacturers and distributors lined up and all we need are the funds to bring our prototype to a production model for mass production. By supporting our campaign, you will be part of bringing this novel technology to the market.


STRETCH GOAL - $110,000 in funding for ADAFlow with Smart Phone Control



Help us reach our stretch goal and we will be able to offer a version of ADAFlow that is bluetooth capable. ADAFlow bluetooth will come with a companion app that gives you all of the control you find in the original ADAFlow from your smartphone or tablet. In addition, the app will allow you to set a schedule for running the ADAFlow so that if you are at your desk for 8 hours, for example, you can schedule the ADAFlow to run for 10 minute intervals every hour; just set it and get on with your day!



"Our ultimate goal is to create a version of the ADAflow that can help in the treatment of a myriad of circulation related diseases"


In the long term, your support will help us continue development and create a clinical version of the ADAFlow for FDA approval and treatment of circulation related disease. By helping us get a commercial ADAFlow off the ground, we can begin clinical trials and the FDA approval process.
Many circulation related diseases including Deep Vein Thrombosis (DVT), Lymphadema, and Congestive Heart Failure affect millions of people every year. Current solutions include static and dynamic compression therapies. Static therapies, such as compression stockings, are not especially effective and can be uncomfortable after some time. Dynamic therapy devices are usually bulky, expensive and use relatively slow acting air bladders that apply uniform pressure across a patient's leg. This method can help with circulation, but is inefficient and doesn't work synchronously with a person's heart.
We at Magzor devised novel technology to combat lack of blood flow. The mechanism generates a pressure wave via peristaltic motion to promote blood flow. We have also designed a method of feedback, whereby a patient's heart rate is used to trigger the mechanism. This way, the device is constantly working with the heart, and never against it.
Our hope is to develop this technology into a device that we can implement in clinical trials and prepare for FDA approval. The purpose of the trials is to show that the mechanism can dramatically improve blood flow, especially in patients with circulation conditions. 

IMPORTANT!!

While our ultimate goal is a clinically proven, FDA-approved version of the ADAFlow that combats circulation related ailments, the ADAFlow for this campaign is NOT intended to treat circulation diseases. If you are someone who wants to use the ADAFlow and have some sort of condition, please consult with your physician before using the device.

OUR STORY

Magzor Corp. is a small startup company and we have been developing robotic technologies for the past 6 years. Our engineering team has expertise in biomechanics, mechatronics, robotics and biology. 
Magzor has been awarded government contracts for its advanced research initiatives and during conceptualizing a "smartsuit" to monitor and aid wounded soldiers in the field, we made an unexpected and exciting discovery. We realized that we could develop a new type of device that could address circulation-related issues. This is how the AdaFlow was born.

story:
THE SLOW JUICER JOOTHIE

JOOTHIE, with its cold press system, is the machine of choice for serious juicing. The juicer crushes your fruit and vegetables, then presses them to extract the liquid. JOOTHIE doesn’t use a spinning blade, runs at a much lower speed and produces more juice than conventional juicers. This juicer is also much quieter and extracts a juice that is clearer and healthier, and all that without the froth or excess pulp produced by centrifugal juicers. On top of that, JOOTHIE can also process other foods like nuts and leafy greens.

 

 

Cold pressed juice is a very high quality juice. The nutritional value remains virtually undamaged throughout the juicing process and the juice is less frothy and more appealing than juice from other types of juicers. It’s extracted using a cold press juicer, also known as slow juicer, that directly presses the juice out of the fruit or vegetable by squashing the pulp.

 

 

The JOOTHIE Slow Juicer can extract more juice than conventional juicers, saving you not only time but also money. But most importantly, JOOTHIE SuperJuice tastes super-delicious! You won’t want to drink juice from conventional juicers ever again. 

 

So what is the Slow Squeezing Technology? Unlike the friction and heavy impact common juicers put on foods, the Joothie’s technology achieves a gentle, low speed juice pressing, which allows for a minimized loss of nutrients by heat and oxidation. As an effect, the natural taste and nutrition are kept intact!

 

  • It can juice everything: from berries, to oranges, to wheat grass and carrots.
  • Its way of crushing and squeezing processes juice that yields to its rich nutrients.
  • The overload protection system prevents the juicer from overheating
  • It has in-built direction control which allows the screw to run in reverse, so that the fruit or vegetables don't get jammed
  • The juicer also allows for a very effortless cleaning, since it can be disassembled into its parts entirely.
  • Mind however, that the respective parts are not dish-washer safe.
  • On average, the device operates very quietly so that one can juice in the mornings without having to worry about waking up the household.
  • The juice produced with the JOOTHIE is very smooth and extra pulpy in texture.

 

 

SPECIFICATION

* Lathe and PEI UNITEM strainer and stainless steel
* Electromagnetic induction switch
* High torque AC
* Reverse rotation and temperature controller
* Two jars 0.9L, antifoam retainer, brush, and three filters, tofu box.
* Voltage: 220-240V
* Frequency: 50Hz
* Power: 150w

 

Engine: Adopt AC Induction motor 65 rpm, made of fine copper, about 4.4 kg of weight. The very strong AC motor works effectively and durably while stirring hard objects such as cherry stones.

 

 

 

PEI Material: Our auger and the material adopt strainer PEI / ULTEM. PEI material is one of the most resistant ones for wear, it can help the juicer s all kinds of  fruit without wearing down which significantly extend its service life.

1) A squeezing system that operates at low speed without heat, grind or centrifugal force.

2) The extraction of maximum amounts nutrition, vitamins, antioxidants, flavor, color and juice from any fruit or vegetable.

3) Quiet operating.

4) Quick and easy self-cleaning.

5) Continuous Extraction System, you can extract the juice in a duration of 30 minutes.

6) Safety system against overheating, stops and restarts when it overheats.

7) Engine Warranty 5 years, 1 year for the other components.

 

 

 

 

OUR MISSION

Our mission is to provide JOOTHIE not only at the best quality but also at the best price, so that our juicer is affordable for anybody. A true must have for a greener, more vital and fresher life.

 

 

But why it is important for us to be consuming

all this vegetables and fruits?

 

     BAD EATING HABITS        TOO LITTLE EXERCISE         TOO MUCH STRESS

They all contribute to obesity, which leads to disease and illness.

 

The biggest cause of obesity is practicing the wrong eating habits.

Thankfully, nature can help.

 

WHY FRUITS AND VEGETABLES?

Fruit and vegetables are abundant with natural resources that are good for us, such as vitamins, minerals, fiber, phytonutrients, and enzymes.

 

FRUITS AND VEGETABLES ARE RICH IN PHYTONUTRIENTS

PHYTONUTRIENTS ARE PLANT NUTRIENTS FOUND ONLY
IN FRUITS AND VEGETABLES.

Similar to the white blood cells we find in the human body, phytonutrients are substances
that help plants defend themselves from external dangers, such as insects and microbes.
These substances are have powerful antioxidant effects such as anti-aging,
skin care, promoting a better immune system, and much more.

Phytonutrients can have different effects depending on the particular color of the fruit or vegetable.
Thus, eating a variety of colors while not heating or cooking the fruit or vegetable
is essential for a balanced nutrient intake conducive to good health.

 

 

  • As people tend to lead busy lives, they try and take the “fast and easy road”
    in taking care of their health. This includes for example artificial nutrition in the form of vitamin supplements.
  • Currently there is controversy surrounding vitamins, a number of studies even
    state that taking vitamin supplements could actually increase mortality.

G. Bjelakovic, D. Nikolova, L. Gluud, G. Simonetti, Ch. Gluud, Mortality in Randomized Trials of Antioxidant Supplements for Primary and Secondary Prevention. JAMA. 2007

 

ALL ABOUT ENZYMES

Enzymes are essential catalysts that help almost all the processes that occur in our bodies.
Even speaking and thinking requires the help of enzymes!

 

1. ENZYMES ARE NECESSARY TO SUSTAIN LIFE.

Enzymes are essential to creating energy in your body. If you lack enzymes, the materials
in your body cannot be broken down into energy, making you more easily fatigued.
In contrast, if your body has sufficient enzymes to create energy from ingested food,
you can enjoy a vibrant, active life.

 

2. THE AMOUNT OF ENZYMES IN OUR BODIES DECREASE AS WE GET OLDER AND MUST BE SUPPLEMENTED THROUGH FOOD.

The amount of enzymes in our bodies gradually decreases with age and they do not replace themselves.
Therefore, they must be supplemented by food and the easiest way to ingest the most enzymes is through fruits and vegetables.

 

3. RAW FRUITS AND VEGETABLES CONTAIN THE MOST ENZYMES

Enzymes become damaged if they are heated above 40°C.
Take an unheated bean and a heated bean. Leave them to germinate and you will see that the heated bean will not change while the unheated bean will sprout.

 

 

The reason for this is, that there are still active enzymes in the unheated bean.
As such, cooked and heated foods already have a reduced amount of enzymes in them.
In order to consume active enzymes, we need to eat raw, fresh fruits and vegetables.

 

 

Dietary fiber refers to the part of cell walls in fruits, vegetables, and grains that cannot be completely digested. Dietary fiber does not contain energy or calories, however it helps clean as it goes through the digestive system.

 

1. WE DRINK JUICE TO TAKE IN NUTRIENTS SUCH AS VITAMINS, MINERALS, AND PHYTONUTRIENTS

Vegetables, fruits and cereals contain a large amount of vital dietary fiber.

 

2. WATER SOLUBLE DIETARY FIBER IN SMOOTHIES ACTUALLY INTERFERES WITH NUTRIENT ABSORPTION

Smoothies contain water soluble dietary fiber, which reduces the absorption of nutrients
such as beta-carotene, lycopene, lutein, and tocopherol into the body.

 

JUICE FOR YOUR HEALTH

 

With a glass of Joothie juice, you can easily ingest more of the daily recommended amount of 7 plates of fruits and vegetables!

 

HIGHER ABSORPTION RATE

Compared to eating fruits and vegetables, drinking them in juice-form increases the nutrient absorption rate by four times.
 

EVEN SEEDS AND PEELS

Enjoy even more nutrition in your fruit and vegetable juices by including seeds and peels.

THE KEY TO GOOD HEALTH IS IN NATURE!!!

 

Two Different Types of Juicers

The most easily found type of juicer is a centrifugal juice extractor. These use a high-speed metal blade which chops up the fruit or vegetables and spins the pulp against a mesh filter. The centrifugal force from the spinning separates juice from pulp and sends the juice out through the machine. These are the least expensive types of juicers, and they’re fine if you’re only going to use the juice in cooking, where the heat will break down the nutrients anyway, or if you’re only processing harder fruits and vegetables. They don’t handle leafy greens or softer fruits and veggies.

 

Centrifugal juicers are also very noisy (Motor power 1500 W) and the juice tends to be foamy since air gets in during the spinning process. The juice separates easily and quickly and as a result can’t be saved but instead must be consumed soon after juicing. The spinning process itself produces heat, which can destroy some of the nutritional value in the food being juiced, so this is clearly not the proper equipment for a serious juicing enthusiast.

 

Key benefits

DUAL STAGE JUICING
The juice is extracted by crushing during the first stage and once again in the pressing phase before the pulp is ejected, which means more juice and maximum dry pulp.

SILENCE
Minimized noise during the rather slowly pressing and high speed milling.

HEALTHY
Slow Juicer extracts maximum flavor and nutrients of any fruit or vegetable without altering the natural properties thereof.

EASY TO CLEAN
Simply rinse with water between uses without removing it. It is also easily removable for thorough cleaning.

ECONOMIC PERFORMANCE / SUPERIOR
It extracts a maximum amount of juice using less food and thereby helps save on grocery bills and energy.

VERSATILE JUICE
It is not only limited to juices with fruit, vegetables, leafy greens or wheat grass, but also works for juices with nuts .

KID-FRIENDLY
No sharp blades and highly effective security features.

Unlike the friction and heavy impact common juicers put on foods, the Joothie’s technology achieves a gentle, low speed juice pressing, which allows for a minimized loss of nutrients by heat and oxidation. As an effect, the natural taste and nutrition are kept intact! 
It can juice everything: from berries, to oranges, to wheat grass and carrots.
Its way of crushing and squeezing processes juice that yields to its rich nutrients.
The overload protection system prevents the juicer from overheating
It has in-built direction control which allows the screw to run in reverse, so that the fruit or vegetables don't get jammed
The juicer also allows for a very effortless cleaning, since it can be disassembled into its parts entirely.
Mind however, that the respective parts are not dish-washer safe.
On average, the device operates very quietly so that one can juice in the mornings without having to worry about waking up the household.
The juice produced with the JOOTHIE is very smooth and extra pulpy in texture.
  SPECIFICATION* Lathe and PEI UNITEM strainer and stainless steel* Electromagnetic induction switch* High torque AC* Reverse rotation and temperature controller* Two jars 0.9L, antifoam retainer, brush, and three filters, tofu box.* Voltage: 220-240V* Frequency: 50Hz* Power: 150w Engine: Adopt AC Induction motor 65 rpm, made of fine copper, about 4.4 kg of weight. The very strong AC motor works effectively and durably while stirring hard objects such as cherry stones.   PEI Material: Our auger and the material adopt strainer PEI / ULTEM. PEI material is one of the most resistant ones for wear, it can help the juicer s all kinds of  fruit without wearing down which significantly extend its service life.1) A squeezing system that operates at low speed without heat, grind or centrifugal force.2) The extraction of maximum amounts nutrition, vitamins, antioxidants, flavor, color and juice from any fruit or vegetable.3) Quiet operating.4) Quick and easy self-cleaning.5) Continuous Extraction System, you can extract the juice in a duration of 30 minutes.6) Safety system against overheating, stops and restarts when it overheats.7) Engine Warranty 5 years, 1 year for the other components.    OUR MISSIONOur mission is to provide JOOTHIE not only at the best quality but also at the best price, so that our juicer is affordable for anybody. A true must have for a greener, more vital and fresher life.  But why it is important for us to be consuming all this vegetables and fruits?      BAD EATING HABITS        TOO LITTLE EXERCISE         TOO MUCH STRESSThey all contribute to obesity, which leads to disease and illness. The biggest cause of obesity is practicing the wrong eating habits.Thankfully, nature can help. WHY FRUITS AND VEGETABLES?Fruit and vegetables are abundant with natural resources that are good for us, such as vitamins, minerals, fiber, phytonutrients, and enzymes. FRUITS AND VEGETABLES ARE RICH IN PHYTONUTRIENTSPHYTONUTRIENTS ARE PLANT NUTRIENTS FOUND ONLYIN FRUITS AND VEGETABLES.Similar to the white blood cells we find in the human body, phytonutrients are substancesthat help plants defend themselves from external dangers, such as insects and microbes.These substances are have powerful antioxidant effects such as anti-aging,skin care, promoting a better immune system, and much more.Phytonutrients can have different effects depending on the particular color of the fruit or vegetable.Thus, eating a variety of colors while not heating or cooking the fruit or vegetableis essential for a balanced nutrient intake conducive to good health.  
As people tend to lead busy lives, they try and take the “fast and easy road”in taking care of their health. This includes for example artificial nutrition in the form of vitamin supplements.
Currently there is controversy surrounding vitamins, a number of studies evenstate that taking vitamin supplements could actually increase mortality.
G. Bjelakovic, D. Nikolova, L. Gluud, G. Simonetti, Ch. Gluud, Mortality in Randomized Trials of Antioxidant Supplements for Primary and Secondary Prevention. JAMA. 2007 ALL ABOUT ENZYMESEnzymes are essential catalysts that help almost all the processes that occur in our bodies.Even speaking and thinking requires the help of enzymes! 1. ENZYMES ARE NECESSARY TO SUSTAIN LIFE.Enzymes are essential to creating energy in your body. If you lack enzymes, the materialsin your body cannot be broken down into energy, making you more easily fatigued.In contrast, if your body has sufficient enzymes to create energy from ingested food,you can enjoy a vibrant, active life. 2. THE AMOUNT OF ENZYMES IN OUR BODIES DECREASE AS WE GET OLDER AND MUST BE SUPPLEMENTED THROUGH FOOD.The amount of enzymes in our bodies gradually decreases with age and they do not replace themselves.Therefore, they must be supplemented by food and the easiest way to ingest the most enzymes is through fruits and vegetables. 3. RAW FRUITS AND VEGETABLES CONTAIN THE MOST ENZYMESEnzymes become damaged if they are heated above 40°C.Take an unheated bean and a heated bean. Leave them to germinate and you will see that the heated bean will not change while the unheated bean will sprout.  The reason for this is, that there are still active enzymes in the unheated bean.As such, cooked and heated foods already have a reduced amount of enzymes in them.In order to consume active enzymes, we need to eat raw, fresh fruits and vegetables.  Dietary fiber refers to the part of cell walls in fruits, vegetables, and grains that cannot be completely digested. Dietary fiber does not contain energy or calories, however it helps clean as it goes through the digestive system. 1. WE DRINK JUICE TO TAKE IN NUTRIENTS SUCH AS VITAMINS, MINERALS, AND PHYTONUTRIENTSVegetables, fruits and cereals contain a large amount of vital dietary fiber. 2. WATER SOLUBLE DIETARY FIBER IN SMOOTHIES ACTUALLY INTERFERES WITH NUTRIENT ABSORPTIONSmoothies contain water soluble dietary fiber, which reduces the absorption of nutrientssuch as beta-carotene, lycopene, lutein, and tocopherol into the body. JUICE FOR YOUR HEALTH With a glass of Joothie juice, you can easily ingest more of the daily recommended amount of 7 plates of fruits and vegetables! HIGHER ABSORPTION RATECompared to eating fruits and vegetables, drinking them in juice-form increases the nutrient absorption rate by four times. EVEN SEEDS AND PEELSEnjoy even more nutrition in your fruit and vegetable juices by including seeds and peels.THE KEY TO GOOD HEALTH IS IN NATURE!!! Two Different Types of JuicersThe most easily found type of juicer is a centrifugal juice extractor. These use a high-speed metal blade which chops up the fruit or vegetables and spins the pulp against a mesh filter. The centrifugal force from the spinning separates juice from pulp and sends the juice out through the machine. These are the least expensive types of juicers, and they’re fine if you’re only going to use the juice in cooking, where the heat will break down the nutrients anyway, or if you’re only processing harder fruits and vegetables. They don’t handle leafy greens or softer fruits and veggies. Centrifugal juicers are also very noisy (Motor power 1500 W) and the juice tends to be foamy since air gets in during the spinning process. The juice separates easily and quickly and as a result can’t be saved but instead must be consumed soon after juicing. The spinning process itself produces heat, which can destroy some of the nutritional value in the food being juiced, so this is clearly not the proper equipment for a serious juicing enthusiast. Key benefitsDUAL STAGE JUICINGThe juice is extracted by crushing during the first stage and once again in the pressing phase before the pulp is ejected, which means more juice and maximum dry pulp.SILENCEMinimized noise during the rather slowly pressing and high speed milling.HEALTHYSlow Juicer extracts maximum flavor and nutrients of any fruit or vegetable without altering the natural properties thereof.EASY TO CLEANSimply rinse with water between uses without removing it. It is also easily removable for thorough cleaning.ECONOMIC PERFORMANCE / SUPERIORIt extracts a maximum amount of juice using less food and thereby helps save on grocery bills and energy.VERSATILE JUICEIt is not only limited to juices with fruit, vegetables, leafy greens or wheat grass, but also works for juices with nuts .KID-FRIENDLYNo sharp blades and highly effective security features.

story:
BUTTERFLY - The First Ever Remote Body Thermometer.

Measure the body temperature even from another room!



The key to successful medical treatment is determining an actual correct temperature and its development in time. The Butterfly is an innovative technology for 24/7 measuring body temperature also from another room. We developed smart sensor which will transmit body temperature to smartphone. No need to use round and round conventional thermometer and bother sick person. 

Thanks to the long time temperature curve of the Butterfly, it’s also possible to acquire an exact image about the course of the temperature without contact with sick person. 


 

Smart sensors





It simply sticks to the skin in the armpit and provides continuous 24/7 temperature measurement with data transmissions to Butterfly or smartphone. We used very accurate japan temperature sensors as small as pinhead and connection is through secure and to health harmless Bluetooth technology.  Sensor is developed to be waterproof and secured against swallowing by kids. For data management you will use our great iOS + Android app.


Technical specifications



  • Bluetooth connection to smartphone and/or Butterfly 
  • 0,14 inch (3,5 mm) thin
  • 0,78 inch (20 mm) diameter
  • Battery lasts for 3 days 
  • Wireless charging 
  • Protection against being swallowed 
  • Washable, water resistant 


iOS + Android App

The Butterfly App for nonstop overview offers easy access to information about measured temperature anytime and anywhere. It includes the following:

  • iOS + Android support
  • A graph with the history of the measured temperature curve
  • The ability to set up the sound signal to warn if the temperature rises above a pre-set level
  • Information about time to take medicine to prevent fever 
  • Image of three differently colored backgrounds in the application, depending on set limits of each body temperature level 
  • Image of up to three parallel body temperature measurements from each sensor 


The Butterfly

For perfect overview, the Butterfly displays the actual temperature measured with one or more sensors. It provides information about the actually measured temperature with numeric and light signals and includes the ability to set a sound signal to provide a warning if the temperature rises above the set temperature. All data are sent to smartphone too.




Easy orientation with under lightning


The Butterfly changes colors according to parameters set beforehand. A quick glimpse on the base station is enough to see the actual body temperature.

Normal temperature



Elevated temperature



Fever



Technical specifications




  • Different under lightning by temperature 
  • 360° visual control of temperature 
  • Secured Wi-Fi connection to home network 
  • Multi-sensor connectivity 
  • Display shows current body temperature 
  • 7,07 inch (18 cm) wide 
  • Alarm 
  • Wire/battery power supply
  • Smartphone connectivity 


Comfort & Knowledge





About founders

Two brothers - Roland & Filip  - founded the company and are responsible for the development of the thermometer. We both graduated with university degrees in technology, and we are passionate about gadgets and technological innovations. Since we both have families, our wives and children (aged from 4 months to 7 years) were able to give us excellent feedback on our work and help us to tune the thermometer to a fantastic level.

story:
Night sports, like running, cycling and roller skating is becoming an increasingly popular form of the sport. Given the variety of lifestyles we all lead, from shift work to travelling long distances, sometimes the only time we can run is at night or in the dark. Added to that, night races and night events are also on the increase, in cities and out in the great outdoors. So what do you need to know if you do decide to strap on your running shoes after dark and how do you get fit and stay safe?

Like in the dark drivers won°Øt expect to see you. They will assume that the roads will be largely deserted and drive accordingly. It is more important than ever to make sure they do see you, especially at junctions when drivers are tempted to jump lights and take risks they just would not take when it°Øs busier in daylight hours.

It is better to make yourself to be seen by cars and people, And with this LED pre-safe warning vest, your visibility and safety can be maximumized.

For more information please visit: www.s3triple.com or contact us at sales@s3triple.com

Anatomically shaped design and ultra-soft neoprene for maximum comfort and allows quick and easy access to kit while running, jogging, hiking, walking and cycling etc. and offers full range pf motion without interrupting arm swing.  

Visual optimization layout of 12 LEDs to maximize the visible distance to 1,500 meters (0.93 miles).

3-Way lighting options for different visible requirements. Philips customized low-power high-efficiency 12 LEDs powered by 3 pieces AAA battery, provides ultra- long (over 72 hours) continuous working time.

The main features includes: pre-safe warning, water resistant, made to measure design, anti-shock protection, light weighted design, smart volume and superb elastic fiber etc. Yet a lot more features for you to discover with different applications.


Moreover, worldwide patented LED assembly technology: combines the LED together with fabric provides waterproof (vapor resistant) features. All the components are stainless and additional anti-static sheet was added to release of the static and improve safety.

Customized composite spacer fabric with superb air permeability (96.7CFM) and thermal insulation (0.31CLO) makes the vest water repellent and quick dry at the same time.

Patented wire technology makes the vest machine washable for easy care. The only you need to do is simply unplug the battery case before washing.

The vets can be widely used for outdoor activities, like running, cycling, hiking, jogging etc.

Two size options with adjustable design cover all the physique size.

Five color options can fit with any clothes for seasonal trainings and outdoor activities.

Reference gift perk items: These 2 items are also available to get, please refer to the perks.

The vest has been approved as a safety product by CE, FCC and RoHS. It is also approved as skin-friendly clothing with stable pH level.

Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.
