story:
UPDATE! Signet reviews have started to come in!

The Aqua Kink on the Signet: A Toy with Multiple Uses - http://aquakink.com/a-toy-with-multiple-uses-fu...


The Funkit Signet is a body-safe, platinum silicone ring to add texture to your hands for intimate play.

Hand sex is an often-ignored activity in sex toy design. The existing vibrating rings are often made of toxic jelly rubber and designed to be disposable. Personally, I prefer holding a vibrator to putting a weak one on my fingertip. Rather than turn your hands into a low-power vibrator, the Signet is Your Hands, plus texture.

There are two existing Signet designs: The Groove, with soft horizontal ridges and valleys for rubbing, and the Nib, with stimulating bumps for direct points of pressure. Both have been tested by reviewers and sex educators, and based on their feedback, I’ve tweaked each variant to its current design. Here’s what they have to say about the current model:

"I use my hands a lot. I think they're some of my best features. So, I don't really use very many toys. No hate. Toys just get in the way of what my partners are looking to get from me. The Signet gave me an easy way to enhance what I was already doing. Subtle, easy to use, and unobtrusive. My partners definitely noticed and appreciated the difference, too. It was like an insertable cheat code."
- KP from Poly Role Models

"As a huge fan of the underappreciated art of hand sex, I was so excited to try out this nifty, innovative little toy. Yes, you can feel a difference...especially on a well practiced hand.  Can't wait to buy a set and have instant conversation starters at my fingertips"
- Misty Fisty, Sexy Pseudonym

“I love my Signet ring! It's whimsical, functional, and just a little subversive. This is the sex toy James Bond would have, but way cuter!”
-JoEllen Notte, Sex Writer and Educator

“Looking at the Funkit Toys original Signet rings was a bit like looking at something out of a quarter machine. Unlike quarter machine rings, these little things were far more fun, sexy, and less likely to leave a green stain on your fingers. The rings were easy to use; slip the signet on and you’re good to go (if you use gloves, put a bit of lube on the ring first). Once the Signet rings are married with a professional mold, they will be as beautiful as they are pleasurable. The sensations against my g-spot were majestic, and left me hungry for more. They're definitely sex toys fit for a (pillow) princess!”
-Rebecca Hiles, The Frisky Fairy

Here's what you get:

If you're in any reward tier above Pen Pal and this campaign reaches its minimum goal, you're getting at least one professionally injection molded, black Signet ring. Wear it around, play with yourself or partners, show you care about potential partners' pleasure, upgrade your massages, whatever you decide to do with it, it's yours.

Here are the costs:

  • Finished mold with side-pull: $6,080-7,000
  • Professional Design Software for CNC milling: $995
  • Packaging and shipping: $3-5 for US shipping per shipment, $9.50 for Canada, $13.50 abroad, plus any increases in price between now and the actual ship date
  • ​Materials, production, and paying the fine people who work on the production line
  • Enough money to cover designing, prototyping, sending to testers, redesigning based on feedback, as well as time spent packing and shipping, plus hiring and paying employees to meet shipping deadlines if this gets big enough
  • 5% Indiegogo fees
     

Ultimately, I've decided this needs to raise $12,000 to produce the first run of Signet Grooves. If you raise $24,000, I'll add the second design, the Nib, and if you raise $32k, I'll make an unreleased third design. In addition, if this campaign raises a truly ridiculous sum of money, I'd love to make different sizes, for a better comfort on a larger variety of fingers, hands and toys.


Hi, I’m Kenton, the lead designer for Funkit Toys. I've been researching toy design and materials since before I was old enough to buy them, *cough* and have been making my own professionally for nearly two years. I started Funkit Toys by teaching myself 3D modeling and printing molds of my own designs on a homemade 3d printer. I've since upgraded my equipment, but I still have ideas that are too elaborate for homemade molds. I want to make new ways for people to please themselves and their partners. I think the Signet is a really fun addition to my toybox. I’ve been using it for months, and making them for testers to get feedback to improve it. Now it’s ready, and I want to share it with all of you. For that, I need your help funding professionally milled injection molds. If you can help fund the Signet, it'll prove some of my more unusual ideas are viable for production.

 

The Impact

 

I've been releasing a sex toy every month since April. Many of my larger, simpler designs are already out there, being enjoyed, but the level of detail needed by the Signet and some of my more complicated ideas is beyond my capacity to do alone. By funding this, you'll not only be funding more fun hand sex, you'll be making other, more complicated Funkit Toys possible in the months ahead. I have a lot of fun, sexy ideas I want to bring to life, and you can help me make that happen.

What are the risks?

By prototyping, testing, and tweaking the first two designs before even starting this campaign, I've already mitigated the biggest risk: I already know they work for people. There are more bloggers releasing reviews over the course of the campaign as well, and I’m very excited to share those with you as this goes on.

By setting a minimum funding level, I’ve also mitigated the biggest risk to you: This campaign won’t go forward if I can’t afford to make and ship what you order.

While hand size varies a great deal, the Signet is made of stretchy silicone. Even stretched over two fingers as you saw in the intro video, it maintains a good comfort level. If it’s too large, yo can also secure it with a glove or finger cot.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you aren't in a position to buy a Signet now, the best way to support it is to tell someone you know who can, to ask your local sex toy store about carrying them so there are some for sale when you can, emailing your favorite sex toy bloggers about it and letting them know what we're doing here. While I've been making friends in the sex educator community for years, my own following is pretty small, so anyone you can tell is one more person who might help. Indiegogo would like me to remind you their share tools are the best way to do this, because that way Indiegogo knows people are excited about this too. They're right, you know.
 

Thank you from Funkit Toys, and stay sexy, internet.

What are the risks?
By prototyping, testing, and tweaking the first two designs before even starting this campaign, I've already mitigated the biggest risk: I already know they work for people. There are more bloggers releasing reviews over the course of the campaign as well, and I’m very excited to share those with you as this goes on.By setting a minimum funding level, I’ve also mitigated the biggest risk to you: This campaign won’t go forward if I can’t afford to make and ship what you order.While hand size varies a great deal, the Signet is made of stretchy silicone. Even stretched over two fingers as you saw in the intro video, it maintains a good comfort level. If it’s too large, yo can also secure it with a glove or finger cot.
Other Ways You Can Help
If you aren't in a position to buy a Signet now, the best way to support it is to tell someone you know who can, to ask your local sex toy store about carrying them so there are some for sale when you can, emailing your favorite sex toy bloggers about it and letting them know what we're doing here. While I've been making friends in the sex educator community for years, my own following is pretty small, so anyone you can tell is one more person who might help. Indiegogo would like me to remind you their share tools are the best way to do this, because that way Indiegogo knows people are excited about this too. They're right, you know. 
Thank you from Funkit Toys, and stay sexy, internet.

story:
The first alarm clock was created by Plato around 400 BC. We've had plenty of time to design the perfect alarm clock yet, everyday millions of people wake up late or tired. It's because we wake up in the middle of a sleep cycle instead of the end, and the alarm clock has a lot to do with it. It's time to rethink sleep and the alarm clock.

Smartware Labs is revolutionizing the alarm clock by developing the world's smartest wake up system. It predicts your ideal wake up time and wakes you gradually before the alarm goes off.

The smart pillow helps users wake up at the end of a sleep cycle, so they feel refreshed. Simply put, by using this smart pillow, it'll help you wake up on the right side of the bed. 


Can I use Wakerapper without the sleep sensor?

Yes. Wakerapper will still help you find your ideal wake up time and function as a regular alarm on your phone.


How do I charge the sleep sensor?

The sensor comes with a micro-usb charger. Use the app to pair the sensor, and a battery life indicator will appear to indicate battery level and charging status.


When will pre orders ship?

We expect to ship our early bird orders in October and the rest of our orders in November. 


What is the pillow made of?

The pillow is 100% cotton designed to stay cool through the night and filled with an eco-friendly, hypo-allergenic fiber. It has dual layers, with a thicker inner core to prevent flat pillows. 


When will the app be released?

A beta version of Wakerapper is available for iOS in the app store now.  We're testing it with our early backers throughout the project to find ways to make it better. The official version will be released together for android and iOS at the end of our campaign in August. The full sleep system with the sensor will be released with preorders.

story:
What Is The ManShield ?

Designed by Vladimir Laurent, The ManShield will help to solve major, yet intimate problems that men face on a daily basis—the risk of contamination to genitals, when using the toilet.

 

Medical Benefits & Applications

When any surgery to the male genitalia leaves an incision or a healing wound on or near the scrotum, it is important that this wound is shielded from any form of moisture—most certainly wetness from toilet water, which is difficult to avoid while sitting on the toilet. With prostate cancer being the second leading cause of death among men in the United States, this product will serve as a mandatory household item for many if not all.

This campaign is important to us at Aspect Creations because of the global impact it will have on men’s health and wellness. With your contributions, we can move the product into its introduction stage.

How It Started:

    I was out with my lady one day. And as we were going through our day, I realize that women do so many things to maintain their beauty and health. Everything from reaching in a purse to pull out a mirror to check their make up or using the restroom to make sure all is well below. Men often are not as attentive to their hygiene and health needs. We will use the restroom and some of us won't even wash our hands when we are finished. Which furthered my thoughts. How can we as men better our hygiene?

     I was sitting in my office one day and came up with an idea. When men sit down in the restroom, especially as we grow older, our scrotums begin to hang a little lower. Sometimes, hanging so low that they will dip into the very restroom water that has now been soiled. I wondered how many potential diseases and micro organisms we could be exposing ourselves to. So, I started doing my research. Finding out that there are more case than you probably think of contracting an infection from allowing the male genitals to come in contact with this dirty water. For women, the numbers are even higher. But it came to me. What if I have a product that will support the scrotum as well as guarding from the splash of dirty restroom water. Protecting your penis and testicles from the danger of infection. I called a trusted family member and friend and told him my idea. Immediately he began to laugh and asked me " Man, where do you come up with this (expletive)?" But after he laughed he looked at me and said " Man, this is so crazy and not thought about. You might actually have something." That was the first confirmation I received and it meant a lot. I decided to approach another friend, who actually is now my business partner, and pitched her the idea. What is now a normal first reaction she laughed.  But after thinking about it and being an excellent business woman herself, she called me back the next day and said " let's go for it!" Two confirmations.  That was all I needed to let me know we might have something.
 But as this journey progressed and I began to research, design and go through the necessary protocols,  I realized there are so many men who have suffered in silence with the issue of having to hold their scrotums out of the water while using the restroom. We as human beings have very few pleasurable and stress-relieving moments, the restroom being one of them. Why not make the experience as comfortable and peaceful as possible? Many of us like to read a magazine or check our emails all in the comfort of the restroom. Why add on the task of holding your scrotum out of the water and trying to read your favorite magazine at the same time. Why not just clip The ManShield to the commode and read The Wall Street Journal in peace.

 

How You Can Help

We are seeking $35,000 in startup capital, with the funds being allocated towards mold and mass production, packaging, and marketing. For your contributions, we offer several exciting perks, from a variety of promotional items, to a supply of The ManShield product, and a pamphlet with information on the product itself. Become a Royalty Supporter and receive an exclusive invitation to our Red-Carpet launch event, with 2 Nights Hotel Accommodations. Best of all, you’ll know that you are contributing to a life-changing cause. If the entire goal of $35,000 is not met, this will slow our production, though we know that with your contributions, we can expedite the process of bringing this product to retail stores and public and private restrooms.

 

The ManShield is patented and currently there is nothing else like it on the market. One of our biggest challenges still, is securing the capital to fully back the product and market it around the world. We understand that some of you may not be able to contribute, but even a simple share of this campaign with family, friends, and colleagues could make a difference.

 

We thank you in advance for any way you can contribute.

story:
This is how it works

First version of the app will provide feedback from a single throw:

  • After each throw, you get immediate performance stats and visual feedback
  • The estimated speed and acceleration of your throw
  • Visual representation of your hand movement (grip locks, arching, etc.)
  • Data saved and backed up online in Upsi disc golf app (check out the free app in AppStore and Google Play)

Second goal is to build a data algorithm which learns to analyze technique:

  • After several games, the app analyzes your performance and recommends corrections.

In the future, we hope to improve the system so far it could analyze technique over time, so it could recommend alternative discs which would work for you the best.

To create a good data-based algorithm, we need tens or hundreds of thousands data points (= thousands and thousands of recorded throws). This is the reason every backer is an integral part of the development as the Training Program participant. Based on the training data, the system learns to detect different throwing techniques and judge how well you're performing them.

 

The idea:

The concept is about improving  throws on the course, tracking consistently your development. And to top it all measuring  the pull and release speeds of your throws. Upsi Pro uses motion tracking sensors to give instant feedback, analyze throwing technique and correct mistakes.

We wanted to become better players by improving form and throwing technique. Instructional Youtube videos are a great way to learn. So is video critique, but it takes a lot of time. Going through all the slow-motion videos takes even longer and it's difficult to tell if you're doing it correctly or not. And it's difficult to systematically improve without consistent feedback.

To solve this, we came up with an artificial disc golf "personal trainer", which would is easy to use and always with you: just put on a watch and go to the course to shoot discs. You can record each throw and get immediate feedback. This campaign funds the development of Upsi Pro app for Apple & Android smart watches.

This is not our first app - we're engineers and experienced developers and makers of the Upsi disc golf app: www.upsiapp.com. We suggest you start by watching the video - it explains the concept inside and out.

 

Here's what you get!

We wanted to make this project special, so we included different perks that you can choose from. Depending on the perk you choose, you get:

  • Lifetime pass (or season pass) for Upsi Pro 
  • Training program – early access to Upsi Pro in summer 2017
  • Lifetime pass for Upsi Pro
  • Upsi disc – custom print, to remind You helped make this possible!
  • 3 Disc Set – best discs chosen based on your training data

As the best deal we suggest "Going Pro": for $89 you get a lifetime pass of Upsi Pro, the custom print disc to show off your friends plus three disc set which the algorithm picks for you – based on your training data. Why? Because we want to challenge our technology to see, if you'll like these discs more than your current favorites! (If you throw an ace, please send beer ;-)

The custom discs are shipped to you as soon as the campaign ends. The 3 Disc Set is shipped at the end of the training program, when we can see which discs you should try out!

 

What to do:

Select the the perk most suitable for you and

A) If you have or are ready to get a smart watch:
– Check out the supported devices below
– You can support us best with Going Pro $89 - custom print disc +  3 disc set tailored just for you (so total 4 discs to practice with)

B) But if you’re still unsure about buying a smart watch:
– You can support us small $9 or big $29 (you get a unique disc for this!) All contributions help us closer to our goal
– Decide later, whether you want to buy a smart watch

Here's some smart watch options for you:
– Apple here: http://apple.com/watch/ (starting $269)
– Android Wear 2.0 here: https://www.android.com/wear/ (starting $179)

As many of the people we've interviewed say: this is "the first sensible reason to buy a smart watch", so consider closely. We're only trying to reach about 1000 backers (especially with Going Pro perk). We have limited resources to get the word out so please, share and tell your friend.

 

How we’ll use the funds

Depending on which perks people buy, the funds are planned to be used for:

  1. Majority of the funds (35-45%) is spent on you: custom discs, disc sets and the shipping costs.
  2. Next largest cut (20-30%) is spent on Indiegogo and payment processing fees, taxes and other (pain in the a**) business fees – extra difficult, because we’re operating internationally.
  3. The last cut (30-40%) is used for the product:
    • devices, speed cameras and other equipment for development
    • professional disc golf trainers, booking fees and so on
    • and if needed, hiring extra development help
    • travel costs, marketing costs and technical up keep costs
    • plus some time off our day jobs as well (and still pay rent)

 

Preliminary project timeline

1. Development begins 

  • The prototype is developed for different devices for testing
  • Members of the training program are invited to the private Facebook group
  • We’ll ship the custom printed Upsi discs

2. Training program beings

  • You’ll get the first version of the app and you can start testing it
  • The app can calculate performance stats and draw a simple visualization

3. During the training program …

  • We continue development and release frequent updates to the app
  • We use the Facebook group for updates & getting feedback from you
  • We release new versions of the app and improve the algorithm and interface

​4. We have enough data & the app is ”ready”

  • The algorithm can model different throwing techniques and detect mistakes
  • You can start practicing techniques and get feedback from the app
  • We’ll release new versions of the app and improve the algorithm based on feedback
  • We’ll ship you the recommended disc sets

5. Finished!

  • Upsi Pro is released for everyone!

 

Supported smart watches

We’re planning to develop Upsi Pro for Apple and Android smart watches.

The original prototype was developed for Apple Watch Series 2 and the Android version will be made for Android Wear 2.0.

Because smart watches are like smart phones, they have different software versions and hardware inside them. We will test different devices for software compatibility, accelerometer & gyroscope accuracy and screen readability.

Unfortunately the Samsung Gear is not supported for now as it has it's own operating system Tizen. Are you a Tizen developer - contact us!

After the first phase in the plan, we’ll provide a list of recommended devices here.

 

The prototype

We have created two prototypes for Apple Watch to make sure the technology is usable and suitable for the sport. From the first prototype we know, that the technology is powerful enough to capture the data from the hand movement. Additionally the design prototype featured on the video made us sure that the watch design is usable on the course and the watch doesn't disturb throwing.

However these prototypes are just the technical proof and require a lot of work to be developed into usable, data visualizing product - this is where we need your help.

 

Our manufacturing partner

We’re working together with Discmania to make this campaign possible and to make sure the perk you get is a quality disc you deserve!

As our partner, Discmania will stamp and ship all the discs for this campaign, including the custom stamped discs specialized for upside-down "upsi" (tomahawk) throws as well as the personalized disc sets. When delivered, the disc sets will be customized based on player's training data.

 

Are there any risks?

Every crowd-funding project has risks (see what IndieGoGo says) – we might run into problems and not be able to achieve our goals. However, we're gathering the whole amount including the amount needed to deliver all the perks in this campaign, so whatever happens you will get the items included.

We’ve identified three main risks and this is how we'll work to solve them:

1) Especially for Android smart watches, some sensors may not be accurate enough to detect high-speed motion very well. This risk is resolved by testing varying devices during development, so we can compile a list of recommended watches.

2) The algorithm is trained to detect mistakes based on the throwing data from the training program. Because of this, we can’t be certain how accurate the algorithm will be in the end. This risk is an inherent problem with data based algorithms, but we’ll minimize the problem by preparing to spend 4-6 months of development just on the algorithms.

Naturally, if we don't get enough funds for the campaign, don't worry – IndieGoGo will give your money back automatically.

 

Our team

Founded in 2016 Upsiapp Ltd, our three man team we have already made the Upsi app for disc golfers (www.upsiapp.com). 

We want to support the sport as a fun way to spend time outdoors with your friends for everyone by planning games with friends, keeping score and sharing game results.

We've played disc golf for 5-10 years and love the sport. Our lead developers have a combined 15+ years of professional experience in software development. Getting to combine our professional expertise with our hobby is a dream come true :)

 

See also ...

 

Check out our Upsi app for iPhone and Android:

 

Reach us in Facebook or join our group Upsi & Friends:

story:
The main ingredient of "Clay Rose" collection are Goat Milk and different sorts of clay (according to soap name: white, yellow, red, pink, blue).

Goat Milk softens and moisturizes the skin, it contains vitamins A, B6, B12 and E. Goat milk contains three times more beta-casein than cow's milk. Casein is easily absorbed by the skin and quickly saturates it with moisture. Triglycerides, capric and caproic acid, contained in goat milk, help regulate the natural balance of skin pH, and also contribute to the natural exfoliation of dry skin.

 White clay or kaolin has a regenerating property. It is an excellent antiseptic and a wonderful helper in the fight against problematic and acne prone skin. White clay collects slag, toxins, dead cells of the epidermis, excess fat and saturates the skin with minerals. It is best for oily, thin and sensitive skin.

 

 Yellow clay contains a large amount of iron and potassium. It removes harmful toxins in inflammatory processes such as acne. Yellow clay is an excellent tonic, significantly improves the complexion and enriches the skin with oxygen.

 

 Red clay is rich in oxides of copper and iron, and also contains silicon. These components favorably affect the skin, giving it freshness and elasticity, improves blood flow to the skin, relieves redness, inflammation, itching and flaking. Red clay is an excellent remedy for the care of delicate and tender skin, and also restores its elasticity.

 

 Pink clay is a mixture of white and red clay, so it combines the properties of 2 sorts. This clay has an excellent anti-aging effect, softens and whitens the skin, removes excess fat. Soap with pink clay moisturizes the skin, refreshes and tones it, relieves fatigue, tightens the contour of the face and smoothes wrinkles, has a disinfectant effect, relieves fatigue and irritation, improves blood circulation. Pink clay brings back health, beauty and vitality to the skin.

 

 Blue clay is the oldest and most useful of all clays. Blue clay is an excellent anti-inflammatory agent, has cleaning properties and disinfects the skin. It activates blood circulation and enhances the process of metabolism in skin cells.

PACKING: Soap will arrive in eco-friendly brown box, which is completely recyclable.

 

The soothing effect of soap with natural loofah has a beneficial effect on people suffering from rheumatism and arthritis. Due to its natural properties, it helps to prevent the formation of cellulite, improves blood circulation in tissues, "opens the pores" and saturates the skin with oxygen, makes it soft, silky, elastic and fresh, "erasing" traces of harmful environmental factors and stress.

Contained oils and vitamins strengthens the healthy effect of loofah, creates regenerative effect and tones body skin.

Natural and fresh lemon fragrance gives a pleasant feeling of a SPA in your bathroom.

PACKING: Soap will arrive wrapped in eco-friendly brown paper packaging, which is completely recyclable.

 

More then 13 years I worked as a cosmetologist, so I do know about skin care and cosmetics and not by hearsay. Many years of experience allowed me to identify the main advantages of natural and organic cosmetics. That's how my work has turned into a hobby and hundreds of experiments and tests with cosmetics. 

For a few years I have been suppling handmade soaps to my relatives and friends, selling to friends of my friends, receiving a lot of reviews about positive effect to the skin. It is the main reason why I start from soap making.

I create my soap for people who appreciate healthy lifestyle and uniqueness. My goal is to make high quality, organic handmade soap. Also my hope is to present different types of organic handmade cosmetics in the near future. 

 

I would like to expand and increase my production and marketing development. This campaign will help me in purchasing bulk raw materials to keep my costs down and it will help me reduce lead time in production. This will allow me to bring my natural handmade soap faster to you and start production of natural cosmetic line. 

 

You can be involved in my campaign by purchasing my exclusive perks, available during this Indiegogo-campaign or by donating money by clicking the pink “back it” button. If you wish to help me but can not support our project financially, there are a lot of things you can do to be involved in my campaign:

Like My Lovely Soap on Facebook

Favourite my store on Etsy

Refer your friends and family by sharing my campaign link by email or on Social Media by using the Indiegogo share tools or by sharing this short link: https://igg.me/at/my-lovely-soap
story_txt:
The main ingredient of "Clay Rose" collection are Goat Milk and different sorts of clay (according to soap name: white, yellow, red, pink, blue).
Goat Milk softens and moisturizes the skin, it contains vitamins A, B6, B12 and E. Goat milk contains three times more beta-casein than cow's milk. Casein is easily absorbed by the skin and quickly saturates it with moisture. Triglycerides, capric and caproic acid, contained in goat milk, help regulate the natural balance of skin pH, and also contribute to the natural exfoliation of dry skin.

 White clay or kaolin has a regenerating property. It is an excellent antiseptic and a wonderful helper in the fight against problematic and acne prone skin. White clay collects slag, toxins, dead cells of the epidermis, excess fat and saturates the skin with minerals. It is best for oily, thin and sensitive skin.

 

 Yellow clay contains a large amount of iron and potassium. It removes harmful toxins in inflammatory processes such as acne. Yellow clay is an excellent tonic, significantly improves the complexion and enriches the skin with oxygen.

story:
Problem

Statistics from the Centers for Disease Control, state that more than 70% of Americans are overweight or obese. And, unfortunately, this is becoming a world-wide problem.  It isn't a mystery that to live a healthy and active lifestyle we should exercise regularly and eat healthy foods.  The health issues with being overweight are profound. Regular exercise is important for a healthy life, and walking is a simple gateway to that healthier lifestyle.  But walking can be tedious.

History

I started walking several years ago to lose weight.  Initially I was diligent and lost 20 pounds. Then monotony set in and I started accepting excuses to not walk and exercise.  I wanted to design an activity to make walking and exercising enjoyable.

This is why we are creating Agatha.

Go Agatha

Agatha is a mobile game to #MakeWalkingFun!  It is a “who done it” mystery game played on your smartphone where you discover who murdered the butler.  To move from location to location and receive clues, you walk (run, cycle, hike, etc.) in real life.  The steps recorded by your activity tracker or smartphone convert to progress in the Agatha game.  The more steps, the more clues you collect.  We have submitted a patent application for the technology behind Agatha.

You can play the game while you are walking and exercising or reveal the clues you have acquired after your walk or at the end of your day.  

And while you are walking, imagine listening to a fun mystery story.

"On Wednesday, Archibald normally polished the silver.   While the rest of the staff, detested the task, he seemed to relish the ritual and even the acrid smell of Barton's Gleam and Glitter paste.  The careful inventory would be laid out in the butlers' pantry, along with his meticulous handwritten records.  Archibald would commence promptly at 1 PM, each and every Wednesday.  That's how the guests knew something was terribly, terribly wrong..."

Promote Walking

Agatha can be played alone but is more fun when played with others.  Play with friends, family, and colleagues and use their progress to motivate you to walk … or you can motivate others to become more active.

Use of Funds

Proceeds from the campaign will be used to complete software development, improve graphics, and thoroughly test the game experience.  All money raised will go towards building a great product.

If our funding goal is exceeded, additional efforts will be put to the development of enhanced storytelling during the walking experience.  This will be in the form of audio you listen to while enjoying your walk.  Additional game scenarios (new characters, different locations, different stories) will be developed to keep the game experience fresh.

About Us

Agatha is being developed by Symply Health Inc.  Founder and CEO John Cannon has years of experience researching and developing mobile products that encourage healthy habits and improve health. He is currently collaborating with several governments to provide smoking cessation, healthy eating, and stress management behavior change products. Agatha presents a new paradigm in behavior change and is Symply Health's first product in the area of exercise. Agatha is being developed with crowdfunding to receive rapid input from users and to quickly obtain market feedback.

Support

Help us make walking fun and support the Agatha game by contributing and sharing this project with friends, family and colleagues.  Everyone knows someone who needs a little encouragement to walk and exercise more.

Please look at the perks and help us make Agatha a reality.

Where can Agatha Go?

Agatha is slated for launch fourth quarter 2017. Future versions will be set in exciting cities throughout the world.  Imagine Agatha: Istanbul, Agatha: New York City, or Agatha: Paris.

Perks

Agatha Enthusiast

As an Agatha Enthusiast you will receive a free version of the game for life and you will receive all the new scenarios and enhancements.  We also ask that you play the game, challenge yourself to exercise more, and invite others to do the same.  And you will receive an I #MakeWalkingFun bumper sticker.

Agatha T-Shirt

Select the Agatha logo or the dead butler t-shirt.  Both shirts recognizes that you #MakeWalkingFun as one of the Agatha supporters. When someone asks you about Agatha, invite them to play a game with you.

Agatha Water Bottle

You need to stay hydrated while walking.  Take your Agatha water bottle with you.  Take it to the beach, to soccer games, and cross country events.  Select either the Agatha logo or the dead butler image.  The text I #MakeWalkingFun shows you are the one who made Agatha a reality.

Name a Character

There are 9 suspects in the game.  Oops, 8 suspects and of course the butler is dead.  There are four women and four men to name.  Names must be appropriate for our audience and will become part of Agatha's intellectual property.  You will be credited, if desired, as the creator of the name on the page with the character's profile.

Be the face of a Character

The 8 suspects need a face to go with their name … four women and four men.  Be immortalized as one of the characters in Agatha by providing your photograph which our designers will use as inspiration to create the character avatar.  All images must be appropriate for our audience and will become part of Agatha's intellectual property.  And, if you like, you will be credited as the inspiration for your character.

story:
Introducing A Breakthrough Exercise Device for a Pain Free and Flexible Back!

Welcome to Coreobics360 a revolutionary approach to a pain free and flexible back and a strong and balanced core. This exercise equipment can be used by everyone from beginner level to intermediate, to elite athlete, because the user controls both their range of motion and the resistance with our 3 different sized spring sets. Because there are no weights involved, the risk of back strain or injury is greatly reduced. The Coreobics360 consists of a standing plate a center telescoping pole with height adjustment knob and our patent pending Spring Gear that provides resistance in all directions.

Image of a prototype, final product will have modifications including spring cover and other improvements, this is NOT the final product that will ship.

You can rotate, twist and bend and do these movements separately or combine them to engage more of the muscles. This simulation below in the How it Works Video shows how the combination of spinal movements gently stimulates the intervertebral discs. This increases the flow of blood, oxygen and nutrients and the removal of inflammatory metabolic by products, promoting supple and flexible disc tissue.

This spinal movement is very important in the treatment and recovery from back pain. Along with delivering the blood flow, oxygen, and nutrients, it also can deliver the body's natural pain relieving chemicals to the affected nerves. This same process also helps remove the metabolic waste products that contribute to inflammation and back pain.

The Coreobics360 also helps eliminate back pain by preventing it from occurring in the first place. By using it for just 5 minutes a day, 3 times a week, you help create a fortress around your spine. It helps you exercise all of your core muscles with one device. Because you control both the range of motion and the intensity and there are no weights involved, you dramatically reduce the risk of causing another bout of back pain. Your core is stronger and more balanced and flexible - the ultimate back pain solution.

Why not get off the couch during you nightly TV watching and work in 5 minutes of core strength and flexibility training. It couldn’t be more convenient.

 

Image of a prototype, final product will have modifications including spring cover and other improvements, this is NOT the final product that will ship.

  1. Helps build a fortress of protection around your back

  2. Convenient and easy to use

  3. Improves Core Strength and Back Flexibility

  4. Safe for all fitness levels

  5. Minimizes back strain

  6. Great warm up for Golf, Tennis or other activities

  7. Work your core while standing upright

  8. Stimulates healing blood flow, oxygen and nutrients to the disc tissue

  9. No motors, circuit boards, wires, cables or pulleys.

  10. Small footprint – takes up very little floor space.

  11. Portable – can wheel it out of the way.

Image of a prototype, final product will have modifications including spring cover and other improvements, this is NOT the final product that will ship.
 

 

If you know someone who would benefit from this exercise, please encourage them to join this campaign!

Depending on how far you live from either the West or East Coast, domestic shipping costs will be in the $70-$95 range for doorstep delivery of the standard Coreobics360.

We have excluded shipping costs from the reward thresholds, so that backers can keep flexibility over how much they want to spend on shipping; some people like the Coreobics360 delivered at their doorstep, others don’t mind picking it up at a distribution center. We plan to organize “pick-up events” in major cities for those who’d like to keep shipping costs at a minimum (and meet our backers at the same time).

The shipping cost will be confirmed and billed to you when we are ready for manufacturing and have collected your delivery preference. No need to add shipping fees to your pledge amount.

 

Hi, I’m Dave Kauppi, inventor of the Coreobics360. We are so excited to bring you this health club quality exercise equipment made entirely of steel except for the pads. This is an exercise device that will become the core of your fitness program and you will be able to use for the rest of your life. 

This quest began back in 1973 when I was an undergrad at the Wharton Business School at the University of Pennsylvania and took a class called Entrepreneurship and New Venture Development. Pretty standard business school curriculum today, but back then it was pretty cutting edge. The whole course was to develop a product or service and research the market potential and then create a business plan that would be used to attract investors. For my project I invented what I called a Running Simulator, made some crude drawings and completed my course work. Rather than launching a business upon graduation, I went to work for a bank and did nothing further with my invention. My running simulator looked a great deal like what came many years later – the Elliptical Trainer.

Several years later I invented and prototyped what I called the Undercycle. It was a stainless steel exercise bike meant to be submerged into a pool up to the user’s chest for low impact rehab and exercise. I engaged with a prominent back surgeon to bring it to market, but the consultant he hired thought we could not get enough patent protection to launch and sustain a business. I did not pursue further development. Fast Forward several years to May 2015 when I see a TV Commercial from Optum Healthcare entitled Pursuit of Healthier and I see a swimming pool full of exercisers on the “UnderCycle.”

I have had a lifetime love of sports and fitness. In high school I was a three sport athlete and was recruited to Penn to play football which I did for three seasons until injury ended my college playing days. 

Unfortunately, in my efforts to strengthen my core I utilized exercises and techniques that I employed as a college athlete. This was definitely not the right approach. Instead of strengthening and protecting my back, my training was aggravating my back and often resulted in another bout of back pain. That would completely shut down my fitness program, but did not shut down my caloric intake. So, I entered this cycle of inactivity and weight gain which put more strain on my already tender back.

I knew that I had the right idea about strengthening my core and back, but I just was not able to find the right approach. Then in May of 2013 while on a weekend get away to Grand Beach Michigan, I was walking by the little children’s playground and I saw those spring rider toys. You know the ones with a horse or truck mounted on a large spring that the kids sit on and rock back and forth.

At this point I hired a very talented engineer to develop the mechanical designs and drawings and we tested a number of approaches with several prototypes. We started off with a model based on a single spring but after testing realized that it was very good in providing resistance for a bending motion, but it was very restrictive for a twisting motion. We then moved to a multi spring model and created what we are calling our spring gear. The beauty of this configuration is that it provides us resistance for not only rotation, but bending and twisting at the same time. That’s why we added 360 to the name for 360 degrees of rotation. 

Our number one mission in creating this device is to provide a core strengthening exercise that would also improve flexibility while minimizing the chance of a back injury. We believe we have accomplished that goal and have discovered some additional benefits.

story:
Growing up, I was always bullied in school for being different and "bigger" than everyone else. I picked up Martial Arts to become a better version of me, get in shape and give myself the confidence to stand up for myself.

Ever since, I've been practising martial arts for the past 9 years (since 2010).  I put in the hours every single day to train and become the best fighter I knew I could be, fought and won almost every match I've been in.

I even emerged as the champion during this year's Singapore Kickboxing Championships (under 71kg category).

 

Recently, I've been selected by the Kickboxing Federation of Singapore to represent Singapore in the Sarajevo World 2019 Senior Kickboxing Championships happening in Bosnia from 18th to 27th October 2019!

As kickboxing is still a fairly new sport (that isn't AS popular as others like soccer or swimming) in Singapore, there hasn't been much or any funding at all for this sport. 

Hence, as athletes, we'd have to fork out expenses for traveling, training (which includes fees, meal preps and so on), accomodation (which makes it extra expensive especially since we're only allowed to stay in competition-approved hotels) and other expenditures for ourselves and our coaches when it comes to travelling overseas for major competitions such as this one. 

Between training, working full-time at the gym and doing freelance design on the side, all while having to support myself and my family, it's rather impossible for me to afford the full expense of this trip (which includes flying my coach out with me for the competition too).

This competition is such a major opportunity to miss, so hopefully, crowdfunding would help to get me there and represent Singapore!
story_txt:
Growing up, I was always bullied in school for being different and "bigger" than everyone else. I picked up Martial Arts to become a better version of me, get in shape and give myself the confidence to stand up for myself.
Ever since, I've been practising martial arts for the past 9 years (since 2010).  I put in the hours every single day to train and become the best fighter I knew I could be, fought and won almost every match I've been in.
I even emerged as the champion during this year's Singapore Kickboxing Championships (under 71kg category).

 
Recently, I've been selected by the Kickboxing Federation of Singapore to represent Singapore in the Sarajevo World 2019 Senior Kickboxing Championships happening in Bosnia from 18th to 27th October 2019!

As kickboxing is still a fairly new sport (that isn't AS popular as others like soccer or swimming) in Singapore, there hasn't been much or any funding at all for this sport. 
Hence, as athletes, we'd have to fork out expenses for traveling, training (which includes fees, meal preps and so on), accomodation (which makes it extra expensive especially since we're only allowed to stay in competition-approved hotels) and other expenditures for ourselves and our coaches when it comes to travelling overseas for major competitions such as this one. 
Between training, working full-time at the gym and doing freelance design on the side, all while having to support myself and my family, it's rather impossible for me to afford the full expense of this trip (which includes flying my coach out with me for the competition too).
This competition is such a major opportunity to miss, so hopefully, crowdfunding would help to get me there and represent Singapore!

story:
Give millions of Deaf or Hard of Hearing people around the world new opportunities. The possibility to call anybody and anywhere is taken for granted in present days. However, this is not true for more than 450 million people around the globe with hearing loss. Hear-o will give this opportunity to all of us.

 

Just open Hear-o app and start signing in ASL to your smartphone's camera. Hear-o's artificial intelligence understands what you want to express, translates gestures to text and creates a clear voice to the recipient. 

 

We have the skills and technical experience to create the Hear-o. We have decided to develop this application for free, and we will provide Hear-o to Deaf and Hard of Hearing community without any fees. However, we need your support for the collection and processing of more than 1000 hours of video material capturing signing people. Video collection and subsequent transcription of the sign language will be more than 80% of our work on the Hear-o. Only with this data, we will be able to train properly working artificial intelligence.

 

Hear-o is not just about making phone calls. It will help Deaf or Hard of Hearing person with everything from ordering her favorite drink to describing to a mechanic what is wrong with her car at a garage or presenting her brilliant idea to her colleagues during a meeting.

 

 

 

 

For more information, check out our FAQ section.

Do you have a different question?  Check out our web www.iterait.com. Send us a message to hearo@iterait.com or post a comment on this page. We are  happy to help you!

Thank you for your support!

Thank you for your support!

story:
The problem

Millions of people wear face masks to lessen the spread of the coronavirus. Many professions require wearing a mask for hours every single day. Face masks are mandatory for school children in many countries.

Wearing a mask can cause:

  •  “Maskne,” acne that is caused because the mask traps dirt and oil in pores,
  • Miliaria, also known as heat rash, can result from occlusion and sweat under the mask,
  • Rosacea,
  • Atopic dermatitis, also known as eczema,
  • Sensitivity to humid or dry air,
  • Allergies.

The solution

In addition to making sure your mask fits properly, keeping your mask clean and changing it at least twice a day, you need to start a “maskne” skincare routine that includes applying a moisturizer containing humectants and emollients.

Humectants prevent water from evaporating from the surface of the skin, and help keep the skin hydrated. Humectants also promote the shedding of dead cells by breaking down the proteins that hold the cells together. Humectants can be used by all skin types. 

Emollients help to repair the skin barrier function, making the skin feel and look smooth. Using emollients can help to fill in the spaces between dead skin cells where the barrier has become depleted - ultimately leading to soft hydrated skin. Only non-comedogenic emollients can be used by all skin types.

Our After Mask Regenerating Face Emulsion is a moisturizer that contains humectants and non-comedogenic emollients, formulated with cutting-edge, natural active ingredients.

What is in our emulsion

 

 

What is NOT in our emulsion

 

Risks & Challenges

Our emulsion is handmade and all ingredients are tested, certified and safe for people with sensitive skin as well as children. We are transparent about all used ingredients - which you can find listed in the FAQ.

The 80ml / 2.7oz After Mask Regenerating Face Emulsion comes in an airless tube so that the content stays uncontaminated during usage.

The tube color may vary depending on order volume demand, however, the airless property remains unchanged.

This is a bowling hockey. The can gets 2 points and the point of the bottle. Puck is triggered 10 meters away. 10 rounds and last round a player get double points!

Exciting game until the end.

Sports Clubs set up and start to compete in this sport around the world.
Equipment must be developed.

 

To develop this game and get licenced!

Huge potential.

story:
The Ezeenites Nite Fan. A cooling system for you and your bed.


How Ezeenites Works

The general reason for a bed being too hot is the heat generated by the body has no means of escape. The temperature and humidity builds up under the covers where normal fans cannot reach.

                                                                                                 


Tests have found beds, with two adults sleeping, achieve temperatures of more than 91 degrees F. With the introduction of the Ezeenites Nite Fan we have dropped that temperature to below 72 degrees F in less than 5 minutes, without disturbing the sleepers.  

The EzeeNites Nite Fan


The Ezeenites Nite Fan delivers lower temperature, less humid air from outside the bed space, into the space between the covers. We use a low voltage blower fan that delivers a broad spectrum of air movement from 8 cubic feet per minute to 60 cubic feet per minute.  

The Ezeenites team spent a long time testing and prototyping many combinations of components, this research has devised the perfect combination of housing, fan and control to achieve the best performance and efficiency. The blower fan has a high static head meaning that if a blockage to the airflow occurs, it will continue to blow and find a way of delivering the air, finding those little gaps between you and the covers. The controller is sensitive and unobtrusive, giving fingertip adjustment to the airflow. The air delivery head has been developed to achieve the lowest noise and the best distribution of airflow.

The system at full strength, produces less than 40 db of noise which is somewhere close to the sound of gentle rain. At the lower end of the operating range it produces little more than the sound of someone breathing.

Efficiency has been a key factor in the design; we strived hard to bring the running costs as low as possible. It runs all night at full operating flow for less than 2p a night

The system is compact with the specially designed hose and air delivery head. The level of effects available range from a gentle flow, to a solid blast of cool air on the hotter summer nights.


Typical Install

Why Northern Europe needs Ezeenites

Current estimates are that between 1% and 3% adults over the age of 44 suffer regular night sweats. That's between 400,000 and 850,000 people suffering, without a solution, in the UK alone.  As well as this core group of sufferers, the average temperature regularly leaves the whole of the UK struggling to get to, and stay asleep.

Conventional fan systems, both ceiling and pedestal, rely on high speed air movement which can be noisy and uncomfortable. Also for it to work effectively you need a degree of skin exposure to wick away the heat and moisture. The Ezeenites Nite Fan gives you the comfort of staying covered without the intrusive buffeting of high speed fans. All this for a few pennies a night.

Key Features

  • Designed specifically for Northern European Homes.
  • UK owned, designed and fabricated.
  • Takes 2 minutes to unpack and install
  • Low cost to operate - less than 2p a night.
  • Whisper quiet operation
  • Easy to control

The Team

Our team brings together inventive innovation, industrially tested and proven product development expertise and an eye for the detail. 


The Need

There is a real need out there for more than 1/2 million people who suffer regular loss of sleep. Having explored all affordable potential solutions we believe we have invented the best means to achieve relief. We believe there are many additional benefits that may make the product helpful in the health environment, lack of sleep and broken sleep patterns impacts the health of both you and your partner.

The need for Funding

•We have self-funded more than 4 years of research, development, design prototyping and extensive testing; we have now reached a point where we need your help to get it to the next level.

•We need funding now to initiate the moulds and assembly lines and to bring the product to market. The injection moulds will cost more than £60,000 and then we have the creation of the assembly lines and packaging systems. This early backing will provide the funding to procure the very best components and production facilities and enable further investment and product innovation.

•If we exceed the £90,000 fixed target and get to £120,000 we will develop Bluetooth/wireless controls which will be made available as a free upgrade to all backers.

•The final retail price will be £89.99

•For the first 300 units we have offered a discounted price of £75

•For the next 300 units we have are offering a discounted price of £78

•For all units sold after this we will be offering a discounted price of £81

•For those who want buy the Duo pack we are offering great value at 2 units for £140 

•For those who want to keep the family happy get the Family Pack all 4 units for £275 great value.



Risks & Challenges

We have been working on finding the best solution for over four years. Many hours of research and self-built prototypes provided confidence in the overall design and a firm basis on which to engage with a professional design team. Cube3 where chosen for their proven experience in developing products from concept to production. The brief to deliver an aesthetically pleasing yet efficient and functional product at times was challenging but the team delivered on time and in budget. Prototype testing has been extensive and highlighted a few minor areas that we could improve. Another round of prototypes and testing proved the modifications successful. All major components and manufacturing partners have been sourced and timelines for delivery agreed and we are now ready to move to production.  


Other Ways You Can Help

So you might not want or need a Nite Fan but I am sure you know someone who does. So please let your friends know and get them on board now so we can make this campaign a success.
