story_txt:
SweatBox (Design Patent Obtained - Utility Patent Pending) an innovative kinetically designed fitness training platform designed by Fitness Professionals for the purpose of performing Resistance (Anaerobic) Training Exercises and Cardio Conditioning (Aerobic) Exercises all on one piece of equipment without the burden of having to own various pieces of  gym equipment.  Its unique design targets the Core (Lumbo Pelvic Hip Complex) with every exercise performed.
 
 
SweatBox empowers people to get fit by creating an environment of anticipation, enthusiasm, creativity, and freedom through performing hundreds of resistance training exercises, which result in a healthier, happier, and longer life.              
SweatBox was designed and developed by personal trainers and coaches alike who understand how the body's systems react to different stressors placed on it through resistance training exercises. Combining various resistance training exercises into intervals, forming a circuit, is one of the most proven ways to get fit and healthy. 
Circuit Training focuses on both metabolic systems of the body, aerobic and anaerobic. By combining aerobic and anaerobic (resistance training) exercises into a circuit, it allows the body to burn the maximal amount of calories in the least amount of time. Furthermore, studies have shown that performing resistance training exercises (bodyweight anaerobic exercises) increases lean muscle mass. Lean muscle mass increases the body's metabolism and helps to reduce "Free Fatty Acids" in the blood stream that reap havoc on the body's metabolic systems. So if you're serious about wanting to better your physique and obtain a healthier body by improving your body's Physiological systems (muscular, nervous, cardiovascular, respiratory, skeletal, endocrine, and psychological), then the SweatBox is for you! 
The Core
The Core is the body’s foundation, center of gravity, and is where all movement originates. If you have a weak or dysfunctional core, then all other interconnected joints and muscles of your lower body (below the hip), and the upper body (above the hip), will have muscle imbalances which can result in improper movements and lead to injury. Therefore, it is imperative that you begin first with exercises that focus on training and strengthening the muscles of the “Lumbo Pelvic Hip Complex,” or core of the body. (The video below contains many core exercises) Note: The SweatBox used in this video is the ex-large version, but all exercises in this video can be performed on any size SweatBox.) 


 

About Us - SweatBox Team
Steve, the creator of SweatBox, is a Certified Personal Trainer (NASM), fitness coach, sports coach, and life coach who instructs clients in calisthenics, plyometrics, weight-lifting, athletic competition, high-Intensity circuit training, and nutrition. He creates fitness systems that educate, motivate, and instruct clients in reaching their fitness goals and full potential.
My team and I set out to design a fitness platform that would provide the exerciser a tool that would allow him or her to perform hundreds of different resistance training exercisers all on one piece of equipment without the burden of having to move around from one piece of equipment to another. SweatBox kinetically combines numerous pieces of gym equipment like the flat and incline bench, stair-master, plyobox, aerobic stepper, dip, and push-up station into one simple creative platform making it easy to obtain a full body workout. Furthermore, with the ability of the add-ons of the Resistance Bands and Parallette Bars, it provides the user the versatility of having a cable machine and parallel bars all in one piece of equipment. Another exciting benefit of the SweatBox's design is its innovative ability to be latched together as one solid box or unlatched into two separate individual platforms which allow for even more freedom of creating various calisthenic, plyometric, and resistance training exercises.  
Note: All SweatBoxes Pictured Below Are Prototypes: The logo will either be routed into the wood in place of the decals, or an engraved hard plastic or metal plate will be debossed into the Sweatbox. There will not be decals! 
(The Picture below shows the Sweatbox unlatched resulting in two separate platforms.) 

(The Picture below shows the SweatBox latched together resulting in one complete fitness platform.)  (Max Weight: 1 Person/250 lbs)

Why Does SweatBox Work? Understanding the Science Behind the Invention!
Exercise begins in the mind with knowledge, knowing how the body reacts to different stressors/resistance placed on it during exercise. This type of understanding will determine the person's percentage of success in fitness. Example: Two people take a twenty minute walk daily, one loses an average of 3 pounds per week while the other barely loses 1 pound per week. What's the difference? Speed? No! One understands how the body reacts to the different stressors placed on it during exercise and therefore incorporates resistance training exercises intermixed with his walking, while the other just walks, maintaining the same speed and heart rate through-out the entire walk.  
The overall objective/goal for a person when he or she exercises is to guard/maintain as much muscle as possible during exercise while burning the most fat. When a person performs long bouts of cardio exercises, the body enters into "guard mode," meaning that the body begins to use a percentage of muscle for energy as a way to preserve fat. 
The body is designed to predetermine what stressors are placed on it at all times for the purpose of protecting itself against injury and for survival. As soon as a person even begins to think of performing a single movement or exercise, the brain immediately begins to send messages/signals to the nervous system so it can begin to recruit the proper muscles in order to perform the movement. By doing this it prepares the body's muscles against an immediate shock or blow. (Note: This is why stretching is important before exercise.)   
When an exerciser maintains and builds muscle while at the same time maintaining an elevated heat rate, his or her body enters into a longer post exercise burn of energy which allows the body to continue to use more calories (some being from fat) as energy to repair the torn muscle fibers. This should be the goal of every exerciser who is looking to improve his or her health and get fit. (This is why bodybuilders have to consume more protein in order to maintain their physique and even more if they are wanting to build more muscle, to rebuild the torn muscle fibers.) 
So What's The Secret?
The secret, which has been out for many years, thanks to science and sports medicine, is to create an exercise routine that maintains and builds muscle, all the while burning fat. This is accomplished by performing resistance training exercises intermixed with cardio, which is why the SweatBox was created with its unique design. It provides the user an innovative tool to perform bodyweight resistance training exercises that maintain and build muscle while also providing a platform that allows for a mix-in of cardio to burn fat. Maintaining the heart rate in the appropriate zone for the appropriate amount of time will produce the results the exerciser is looking for.         
(Note: Results will vary depending on a person's HR - Heart Rate and physical condition!) Heart Rate is determined by age, weight, gender, health condition, medication, caffeine and alcohol consumption, diet, and sleep.  (Note: See your doctor before beginning and performing any exercise program!)
Benefits of SweatBox

Creates an environment of anticipation, enthusiasm, creativity, and freedom which results in greater success and longevity in fitness.
Provides a platform for performing resistance training exercises (anaerobic) that increase lean muscle mas and cardio exercises (aerobic) to get the user fit and healthy.    
Challenges the "Fitness Status Quo" by allowing "freedom in exercise!" Create/Invent your own resistance exercises and routines.
Multiple pieces of gym equipment designed into one innovative fitness platform/tool.  
Maintenance-free piece of equipment - no moving parts.
Latches together to form one solid platform.
Unlatches into two separate platforms allowing for even hundreds more of resistance training exercises.
Comes apart which makes it mobile friendly. Move it from room to room in your house, take it outside, to the park, beach, anywhere you go! (Fits in most car trunks)  
Resistance Bands Attachments Package (Add-on) for Building Muscles for all Muscle Groups of the Body. 
Parallette Bars (Add-on) for performing even more Stabilization and Body Weight Resistance Training Exercises.
Perfect for performing Intervals and Circuit Training.
It's the real deal! Not a fitness gimmick like so many products on the market today, it requires time and effort to see results. 
Perform (4) (20 Minute Workouts) per week for 6-8 Weeks coupled with a healthy diet to transform your body. It will get you fit!
Provides a fun way to workout due to the unlimited amount of exercises the user can perform! 
It's Simplistic: Crank up your favorite tunes and hit the box! It's that simple!    

Versatility/Mobility
The versatility of the SweatBox being mobile is very important as it allows the exerciser to take the SweatBox to different locations inside the house and outdoors, like to the park, beach, or on a trip allowing him or her to change up the environment of the workout. Studies show that changing up the fitness environment increases his or her percentage of successfully completing a workout and the longevity of the fitness program meaning that he or she will stick with it longer. Sticking with a fitness regimen on a consistent basis is the challenge and key to seeing positive results.     
For All Fitness Levels
Not only is the SweatBox a serious piece of equipment that provides the exerciser the ability to get into top shape, but it is very fun to use because of its versatility and variety of resistance exercises. Whether the person is a beginner or expert, SweatBox will challenge his or her level of fitness! SweatBox gives the user the power to get fit and intensify his or her workouts because of it's innovative design.     
Due Diligence
With two years in the making and six prototypes later, I believe our team (SweatBoxTeam)  has done it! All prototypes have been tested and used by common everyday people, fitness clients, fitness coaches, and personal trainers to be sure SweatBox produces the expected results. Please support our exciting campaign as this is only the beginning of many more innovative products to come! 
It's not just about the money, but integrity! 
Many fitness companies and manufacturers do not have your best interest in mind. It's more about the money than creating a quality product that actually benefits you. We are bombarded daily by so many fitness gadgets and gimmicks which makes it hard to clearly understand which product will actually benefit us in helping produce results. The truth is, getting healthy and fit, feeling and looking good, only come by a combination of practicing proper nutrition and applying effort in exercise daily in one's life. It's impossible to "out exercise" junk food and excessive calories no matter what exercise apparatus you use and claims companies make. With that said, we, the SweatBox Team, are not going to make the false claim that if you just step up onto the box for 10 minutes a day you'll lose all that fat and transform your body! Anything that has value requires effort and an investment of time. Getting healthy requires effort, persistence, consistency, and a daily healthy diet. No More Excuses - get fit!   
How do you know if a fitness product is a gimmick?
The general rule of thumb is if a fitness product is promoted as not requiring much physical effort and time, then it is probably a gimmick and too good to be true. Furthermore, without physical effort, the most important element for the purpose of fitness, is left out of the equation which is to challenge and increase the heart rate resulting in engaging the body's Physiological  Systems - muscular, nervous, cardiovascular, respiratory, skeletal, endocrine, immune, and psychological. This is what leads to a healthy body.
There’s No Such Thing as “Spot Fat Loss”
 
Being Healthy and Fit Begins on the Inside!
A good looking, healthy and fit body begins from the inside out, beginning with the body's Physiological Systems of the body, then the core muscles (which are all muscles associated with the Lumbo Pelvic Hip Complex) and finally the muscle groups that make up the lower and upper extremities of the body. Take the easy way out focusing on just the outside-the body's appearance, and you are only applying a band-aid, a temporally fix, and not engaging the operating systems of the body that get you healthy. You are cheating yourself!  
SweatBox provides a fitness platform that focuses on one of the most important parts of the body, the core. The body's core (muscles associated with the Lumbo Pelvic Hip Complex) is the body's foundation and is where all movement begins. Body weight resistance training exercises like Push-Ups, Isometric and Dynamic Planks, V-Sit, L-Sit, Raised Leg Lifts, Dynamic Crunches, Mountain Climbers, and many others focus on strengthening the body's core. When your core is healthy and strong, it allows you to have even greater success performing exercise and lowers the percentage rate of injury during exercise and physical activty.            

Activity and exercise are not a choice! 
Studies have shown that most chronic diseases are associated with inactivity and a lack of exercise in one's life. Bottom line: The human body was designed to move, not sit all day. With the growth of technology racing off the charts and the ever increasing digital world in which we live, it has become even more challenging to get our bodies moving. The new "smoking can be hazardous to your health" is now "sitting!" Studies have shown that sitting for long periods on a consistent basis without movement is dangerous to our health and can actually lower a person's lifespan. It's like a car engine that just sits for days and weeks without use. The human body must be challenged to move in order to engage one of the most important muscles in the body, the heart. When the body moves, it causes the body's systems (physiological systems - muscular, nervous, cardiovascular, respiratory, skeletal, immune, endocrine, and psychological) to engage and respond, thus causing them to work as they are designed. Therefore, if you desire a healthy and fit body, longevity, and want to be around for a while for your family, then re-prioritize your life and incorporate one of the most important responsibilities into your daily schedule, exercise! Your life depends on it!
Don't Be a Statistic!
Over 70% of adults 20 years of age or older in the US are either overweight or obese - wow!​​​According to the CDC - Chronic Diseases such as obesity, diabetes, heart disease, and cancer are the leading cause of death. In 2012, almost half of the US population of adults had at least one chronic disease - about 117 million adults.  Additionally, 1 out of every 4 adults had two or more chronic diseases. One-third of adults, about 78 million, are considered to be obese - 30 pounds or more over the recommended weight for their height. It's time to take action before you become a statistic! It's serious!
Inactivity is your enemy, not activity and exercise! Inactivity leads to a lack of energy which leads to laziness which results in even more laziness. It's a downward spiral effect that has to be reversed, and can only come through activity. So get off the couch, turn off the television or gaming device, and get your exercise on the SweatBox so you can begin reversing the Inactivity Lazy Syndrome. 

Who's got time for the gym in these crazy days we live? 
You can ask anyone and almost always get the same answer...How are you doing today? Oh, I'm okay, but super busy! The question is...who's not busy these days?
With the time demands that gyms require like preparing your gym clothes, driving to and from the gym, working out, and then maybe even showering afterward and dressing, many people do not have the time to fulfill a gym membership.
SweatBox with its innovative design, provides the user a tool to empower him or her to perform hundreds of resistance training exercises coupled with aerobic cardio movements to get him or her healthy and fit! it's time to "step outside the box" and experience fitness in a new way, SWEATBOX!     
Is performing cardio exercises enough?
Performing cardio exercises, even though it will condition the cardiovascular, respiratory, and the other systems of the body, will only help a little with maintaining the body's muscle. Tests show that after an average of about 20 minutes of cardio exercise, the body begins to burn close to an equal percentage of muscle for energy as it does fat. Therefore, the overall objective during exercise is to build muscle while burning fat as we need to hold on to as much lean muscle mass as possible. Furthermore, it has been proven that as the body increases in lean muscle mass, it begins to burn more calories, which is required to repair the torn muscle fibers. Therefore, the body enters into a longer post calorie burn which should be the goal for anyone who is looking to get healthy and drop some pounds.  
Additionally, as one enters into his or her 30's he or she begins to lose an average of up to 10% of his or her muscle mass every year. Therefore, resistance training must be incorporated into one's life and begin to be part of his or her daily routine.      
 SWEATBOX Story

In January of 2015 my team and I set out to design an innovative fitness platform that would challenge the "fitness status quo" and allow the exerciser the freedom to perform hundreds of resistance training exercises all on one kinetically engineered platform without the burden of having to own multiple pieces of gym equipment. Additionally, we wanted the product to be free from moving parts so that no maintenance would be required saving the consumer even more money.
SweatBox solves the frustrating and annoying problem of having to spend thousands of dollars for fitness equipment, maintenance, and then find a place to store them. Furthermore, it provides freedom for the exerciser to create his or her own movements and routines, therefore making the exercise experience adventurous and fun!  
The Impact
By supporting this SweatBox campaign you will provide the necessary resources to allows us, the SweatBox Team, to bring the SweatBox, along with its many accessories, fitness videos, and information to production, thus providing the opportunity for many people to get fit, healthy, and experience a new life.  
The human body was designed for movement; therefore, we must create exciting fitness tools that will encourage and motivate people to move daily on a regular basis resulting in a healthy, fit, and good looking body. The SweatBox Fitness Platform was designed with this in mind and is the perfect tool to help people obtain their fitness goals. 
With your support, you will be joining the SweatBox Team in launching the SweatBox into production and allowing us to get this innovative fitness tool to the world. Furthermore, this will allow us to continue in our mission of creating and developing more innovative fitness products that will encourage people to exercise, get healthy and fit, and experience a new life through performing resistance training exercises.  
OUR PASSION
We love to see people overcome obstacles and reach their fitness goals and full potential in all areas of their lives.
OUR MISSION
To design innovative fitness tools that create an environment of empowerment, anticipation, enthusiasm, creativity, and longevity that will encourage more people to exercise which will result in a healthier, fitter, and happier life by performing resistance training exercises.             
OUR VISION
To create an entirely new fitness experience using the SweatBox called SweatBotics. SweatBotics is taking resistance training exercises intertwined with dancing and performing them in robotic type form on the SweatBox thus creating an entirely new fitness experience. 
When the body's muscles are challenged during movement (during the range of motion) to  stop at the beginning, middle, and end of an exercise, it causes the nervous system to have to recruit even more muscle fibers in order to perform the function. By doing this it places more stressors on the muscles, and the result is healthier, stronger, muscles. When combined with several dance moves, it's a combined resistance training and cardio workout that literal gets you excited, healthy, and fit to say the least!
Just imagine you're in a dark room, the dance lights come on, the music ignites, and the instructor steps up on the SweatBox along with the other dozen exercisers, and the workout begins! Everyone performs SweatBotics to the beat. Wow, now that's what I'm talking about!
Please join our team by choosing a perk and help us take the first step in making this vision a reality! Thank you!   
          
SWEATBOX - TIMELINE
1. January 2015: Conception of Idea
2. January - March 2015: Sketch and rough draft
3. March - May 2015: Research and test the size and heights of each level of the SweatBox
4. May, 2015 - April 2016: Study and research patent process
5. May 2015: Brainstorm a name for the exercise platform
After brainstorming and considering many different names, we chose the name "SweatBox" as it was a perfect fit for how we wanted to describe and people to perceive the invention.
6. May - June 2015: Re-sketch and draft drawings with measurements for the platform's size and dimensions
We made some final sketches using what we believed to be the perfect dimensions for the first SweatBox.
7. July 2015: Build a physical model, 3D prototype
We built the first 3D prototype out of Styrofoam to get a visual of the size and measurements so we would not have to waste money using more expensive materials like wood, plastic, or metal.
8. July - August 2015: Built a working prototype to test the functionality of the platform
 
First SweatBox Prototype. 39 inches length x 44 inches wide   
9. July - September 2015: Patent Search
10. September - November 2015: Draft of professional drawings of the platform for a design patent and possible provisional patent
11. December 2015 - May 2016: Continue research on the design of the platform, prior art patent searches, and begin drafting information on design and provisional patents for the SweatBox.
12. June - August 2016: Research manufacturers and began the communication process
13. July 2016: Filed with a patent attorney the design patent application for the resistance training exercise platform
14. July 2016: Built an improved prototype

 Second SweatBox Prototype
We built an even better SweatBox prototype out of wood material. We continued to test this model and began circuit training on it. This was exciting as it provided the results we were hoping for.
15. August 2016: Enter into agreement with manufacturer to render engineering drawings and design two prototypes 
16. August 2016: Review and revise engineer drawings for two prototypes to be manufactured.
17. August - September 2016: Gather and write the description, drawings, and information needed for the provisional patent and file
18. September 2016 - February, 2017: Prepare for crowd funding campaign on Indiegogo
19. November 2016: Received prototypes from manufacturer...not satisfied with the delivered product.  
20. November 2016: Begin search for another manufacturer.  
21. December 2016: Add to the SweatBox Team.
22. January 2017: Build another prototype to calculate material costs and labor   
                      
                        Size: 42 inches in width x 37 inches in length - reduced the size from the first one.                                    
Our team built another prototype in order to calculate material and labor costs. We are leaning towards setting up shop and manufacturing the SweatBox ourselves.
During the process our team added the option of resistance bands: Wow -  what an amazing add-on! 

23. January - May 2017: Continue to add to and build the SweatBox Team.
24. March - June 2017: Prepare for videos and photos of the SweatBox prototype; begin shooting videos and taking photos for the story line of the SweatBox.
25. April - June 2017: Research manufacturers for resistance bands
26. June 2017: Create prototype of Parallette Bars.
 
27. May - June 2017: Test Resistance Bands and Parallette Bars
28. July 2017: Overcome Obstacles - Shipping: 1. Too much money to ship Sweatbox as one piece and not mobile friendly. 2. Too complicated for consumer to assemble. 
29. July - August 2017: Overcame Obstacles: New engineer drawings for split model; Built new prototype to be tested. Latches and unlatches together. Now two SweatBoxes in one with even more opportunities for exercise! Reduced the size again: New Size: 32 inches in width x 37 inches in length. The two individual 16 x 37 inch platforms come together to form One Solid SWEATBOX. Obstacles can be opportunities! Exciting! 
 Now can be affordably shipped and is mobile friendly! (Shipped as shown below)

         

SweatBox prototype which was used for testing the structure and functionality of the platform. Note: When SweatBox goes into production, the logo will either be routed into the wood or a rectangular logo plate will be made from either hard plastic or rubber material then fastened into a 2/16 inch routed space in place of the decals. (Decals were used only for the prototype.)  
30. June - August 2017: Continue preparing for the launch of the crowdfunding campaign: Indiegogo
31. September - October 2017: Launch exciting, innovative SweatBox Fitness Platform Campaign on Indiegogo fundraising platform.
32. October - November 2017: Reach Our Goal: Hopefully, God willing, we will reach our goal on the Indiegogo fundraising platform and begin manufacturing the exciting innovative SweatBox Fitness Product.
33. November 2017 through May 2018: Manufacture SweatBoxes for all backers and fulfill all perks. 
34. 2018 and Forward: Continue to improve, manufacture, and sell SweatBoxes.
35. 2018 -2019 - SweatBotics: Begin promoting and training for "SweatBotics Group Fitness Classes in USA. Train Fitness Coaches to lead SweatBotics Classes. Licensing, Etc. 
36. 2018 - 2019: Begin manufacturing prototypes of our other exciting, innovative fitness products that will re-revolutionize the fitness industry. Can't wait - Bring it! Our goal: Make exercise an EVENT! Get excited about it!
We're excited! The possibility of creating fitness products that will encourage and provide a tool for more people to get fit and improve their health, give them longevity, and experience a new life, while allowing existing exercise practitioners to intensify their training and results and reach new levels, is extremely exciting for our team.
Make exercise an EVENT - get excited about it! No More Excuses!
Please support our campaign and be one of the first to get your own SWEATBOX by choosing one of our exciting perks! By choosing a perk this will provide us the necessary resources to begin production of the SWEATBOX and get this innovative product out to the world! Get excited!
Follow us here...subscribe for our newsletter! https://www.sweatbox1.com/sweat
 
What We Need & What You Get

When you support and back our SWEATBOX campaign, not only will you receive an innovative SweatBox for performing hundreds of resistance training exercises, but you will also be joining the SweatBox community by taking part in bringing the SweatBox to production, which will provide many people a unique fitness tool that will encourage them to lose weight, get healthy and fit! 
Our Goal: To create, design and produce innovative high quality products that are unque, challenge the "Stauts-Quo," encourage and empower people to get fit and healthy. We would rather produce a high quality product that costs a little more to manufacture, than an inexpensive cheap product that will not last. For us, it's about quality and integrity, not just about the numbers. Our product needs to be a win-win, which means a durable quality product priced fairly for our backers (fitness family), but at a price that will allow our team to launch the business successfully and not go broke in the process.
Another one of our main goals is to challenge the "fitness status quo" by designing unique quality products that create an environment of anticipation, enthusiasm, creativity, and freedom which results in greater success by allowing the exerciser to experience freedom in exercise. We want to move from fitness being just fitness, to fitness being an "experience!" That's another reason why the SweatBox was created with its innovative kinetic design, to give people a new and exciting experience!   
Our goal is set for $50,000.00 in order to bring the SweatBox into production. This is the breaking point for maintaining the cost of materials at a fairly affordable price. But if we can reach beyond the set goal then we will be well on our way as this will give us the proper amount of resources to position us for even greater success and produce the SweatBox at an even lower price which can be passed on to our community.     
Risks & Challenges

With over two years of time invested, 6 prototypes, hundreds of hours of research and development, tests, patents pending, and many dollars invested into the SweatBox, we really need to hit our goal so we can take SweatBox to the next level, which is production. It needs to be CNC precisioned cut, and our proprietary parts need to be manufactured.
If we do not hit our goal then we will be at risk of losing the opportunity of bringing the SweatBox to production, not finishing the patents, and going broke, which would be devastating considering the amount of resources we have invested in the project over the last two years. But even the saddest part I believe would be that no one would ever be able to experience the exciting innovative SweatBox for him or herself.   
Other Ways You Can Help

Please join our team in getting the word out about the SweatBox! Please share this campaign with all of your family, friends, co-workers, and with all of your social media platforms. Tag us when you share it and if we hit our goal we'll send you a SweatRag w/logo and WristBand, just pay $5.00 shipping. (Fulfilled after goal is hit and within 60 days after funds are received from Indiegogo!) Indiegogo made it easy to share by using their "Share Tools!" You must use the share tools in order to qualify for your SweatRag and WristBand Reward! 
Size & Weight 

Together as one box: 37 inches in length x 32 inches in width
Separates into two separate individual platforms:  37 inches in length x 16 inches in width 
Height of highest level - 15 inches
Height of lowest level - 7 inches
Incline level: Begins at the 7 inch height to adjoining 15 inch height
Together as one box SweatBox weighs approximately 76lbs - this is necessary as the platform must be very stable.
Each individual platform weighs approximately 38 lbs. Because the weight is equally distributed it does not feel very heavy when picked up with two hands making it mobile friendly. (Max Weight: 1 Person/275 lbs)


Manufacturing
SweatBox is made from Grade A treated 3/4 inch plywood 
CNC machined cut for precise fit
Internal cross frame for extra support
Pre-drilled holes
All joints wood glued together to create one solid box 
Held together by wood screws
Top surface covered with 3/16 thickness interwoven fabric rubber material and bonded to wood with industrial cement.   
Heavy duty latches in front and back
Corners and edges rounded for safety  
Bottom of box - non skid gripper strippers
Note: The logo will either be routed into the wood in place of the decals, or an engraved hard plastic or metal plate will be debossed into the SweatBox.Note: The Parallette Bars will be machined shaped and not have joints as seen in the prototype picture.    Perks:Get Fit and Healthy in 2018 - No More Excuses!SWEATBOX makes exercise fun and adventurous! There are several exciting perks to choose from that will get you pumped, fit, and healthy! (Max Weight for all SweatBoxes: 1 Person/275 lbs)Perk 1: SWEATBOX - FP1 GET FIT & HEALTHY in 2018 - No More Excuses!Receive (1) Kinetically Designed SWEATBOX for performing hundreds of resistance training exercises. It latches together as one & unlatches into two separate platforms. -(1) Exercise Chart-(1) SB SweatRag -(1) SB Bracelet (Platform Only)  - Does not include Resistance Tubes/Bands and Parallette Bars. Perk 2: SWEATBOX FP2 GET FIT & HEALTHY in 2018-No More Excuses!-(1) SWEATBOX FP - Latches & Unlatches -(24)Resistance Tubes: 3 Sets of Different Lengths/Sizes of: 20lb, 30lb, 40lb, and 50lb Strength Bands -(4)Nylon Anchors -(2)Handles-(4)Metal Clips-(6)Nylon Spacers -(2)Velcro Ankle Strap-(2)Accessories Bag-(1)Exercise Chart  -(1)SB SweatRag-(1)SB Bracelet Perk 3: SWEATBOX FP3GET FIT & HEALTHY in 2018 - No More Excuses!Receive (1)Kinetically Designed SWEATBOX for performing hundreds of resistance training exercises. It latches together as one & unlatches into two separate platforms.-(1) Exercise Poster-(1) SB SweatRag -(1) SB Bracelet -(1) Pair Parallette Bars (Not Included - Resistance Tubes/Bands Package) Perk 4: SWEATBOX FP4 - COMPLETE SET GET FIT & HEALTHY in 2018-No More Excuses!-1 SB-Latches & Unlatches -1 Pair Parallette Bars -24 Resistance Tubes:3 Sets of Different Lengths/Sizes of: 20lb, 30lb, 40lb, and 50lb Strength Bands -4 Nylon Anchors -2 Handles -4 Metal Clips-6 Nylon Spacers -2 Velcro Ankle Strap-2 Accessories Bag-1 Exercise Chart  -1 SB SweatRag-1 SB Bracelet Perk 5: SWEATBOX FP5 - 2 COMPLETE SETSGET FIT & HEALTHY in 2018-No More Excuses!-2 Complete SB Packages -Includes:  -1 Pair Parallette Bars -24 Resistance Tubes:3 Sets/Different Lengths/Sizes of:20lb,30lb,40lb,& 50lb Strength Bands -4 Nylon Anchors -2 Handles -4 Metal Clips-6 Nylon Spacers -2 Velcro Ankle Strap-2 Acc. Bag-1 Exercise Chart  -1 SB SweatRag-1 SB Bracelet (Note: Results will vary depending on a person's HR - Heart Rate and physical condition!) Heart Rate is determined by age, weight, gender, health condition, medication, caffeine and alcohol consumption, diet, and sleep.  (Note: See your doctor before beginning and performing any exercise program!)   (Will entertain investors as we would like to manufacture SweatBox in Plastic too!) Join the SweatBox Team for your chance to be starred in one of SweatBox Exercise Videos if we hit our stretch goals. Send us an email with your full name, phone number, and email address to: SweatBoxTeam@gmail.com  -  Note: In subject line of email - write: SweatBoxExerciseVideo!The health and fitness Info. on this page provided by:  http://www.nomoreexcusesgetfit.com/home.html

story:
ViceGrip Performance Rings - Protect, Perform and Grip Tougher!

ViceGrip PRs are ultra-durable silicone rings that act like a second skin for your fingers.  They provide extra grip and protection to your hands without the use of hot and sweaty gloves.  Produced in high-strength silicone these bands provide impact resistance and protection needed to catch a ball more securely, lift weights with less wear, and provide more overall power to your hands.  Using a high friction polygonal texture ViceGrip PRss protect your fingers while providing extra tread to hold on longer, push harder and grip tougher.

The Perks

Level 1 Perk is only 5$.

Level 2 Perk is only 10$.

Level 3 Perk is only 30$.

Level 4 Perk is only 60$.




The ViceGrip PRs Story

A while back after a long bike ride I noticed that every time I went out for a ride, the gloves I was wearing would leave my palms sweaty, and dirty.  Not mention the task of having to take on and off my hot gloves throughout the day to give my hands some air.  It dawned on me that a lot of the grip these gloves provided me were only necessary on the lower digit of my fingers.  In fact I realized a lot of the day to day activities that I would partake in also only really required me to have protection in grip in this specific area.  So utilizing my background in CAD and 3D design I decided to create something that would solve this issue.  Dozens of renderings, 3D printed test models and hand-cast silicone parts later I finally had fully functioning prototypes.


The Challenge and Solution

My biggest challenge was coming up with an texture and design that wold provide tread and resistance at all angles.  Using a extruded diamond texture I was able to provide that impact resistance tread on the front and back of the rings while allowing finger movement with flat areas on the sides.  


Arthritis and Joint Pain Sufferers

As we age our joints become weaker, our grip power  diminishes and in many cases Arthritis develops.  When worn properly sufferers of joint and arthritis pain can can take advantage of the extra grip and protection these rings provide.  Along with providing a supportive and flexible feel ViceGrips can also absorb impact and shock from everyday activities.  ViceGrips aren't a medical device  but they can help prevent pain caused by every day activities on both the young and elderly.

The ViceGrip PRs Advantage

ViceGrip PRss provide the following features and advantages..

  • Superior grip & tread.
  • Impact resistance from shock.
  • Skin Protection from finger wear and tear.
  • Flexible comfort.
  • 2 Modes - Pinpoint diamond for catching and throwing and wide coverage mode for general grip.
  • More air circulation and cooling to your hands then wearing gloves.
  • Non-Slippage inner surface for a secure fit on the fingers.  

"It's not just a band, it's like a second skin that securely grips my hand position while providing great impact resistance when i'm using my driver" 
 Alex Baste - Golfer and Fitness Expert

For the People

Golf Baseball and Softball Training and Fitness
Lacrosse Basketball Crossfit
Handywork WeightLifting FlagFootball
FootballTraining Tennis and Racquet Rugby
Racquetball Handywork Paintball
Track and Field Volleyball Cricket
Handball Softball FieldHockey
Cycling HomeImprovers Wrestling
Boxing and MMA Gymnastics TableTennis
SportsMedicine Arthritis and JointSufferers LawEnforcement

The Technology

ViceGrip PRs are made in a durable yet flexible skin-safe silicone. ViceGrip PRs provide a flexible diamond-like pattern that provide protection and tread similar to dragon skin.  As well as being tough they also provide a soft-to-the-touch comfortable texture. 




 
  



Gloves vs ViceGrip PRs

ViceGrip PRs are not meant to be a complete replacement for Gloves. After all gloves whether they be weight lifting, sports related or general activity usage cover more area per square inch on the hands. ViceGrip PRs are meant to strategically target the area of the hands that get a large portion of activity and damage - the lower digits of the fingers. But regardless of what area is covered ViceGrip PRs main advantage are their comfort. Allowing air flow to reach the hands without hot leather, or vinyl material they provide a soft gel-like texture. Produced in high grade silicone they provide better shock absorption making them ideal for high impact areas on the fingers. When worn in the proper sizes ViceGrip PRs provide excellent protection and performance.

"A secure grasp on to the ball is crucial in Rugby, these (ViceGrip PRs) help me get a good secure grip.  They don't just help me hold the ball better but the ring friction also improves my catching and passing" 

Leonidas Wilson - South Africa Super League Rugby player / Miami Rugby 7's coach / Florida Select Rugby


How do you wear ViceGrip PRs?

ViceGrip PRs can be worn and configured any which way you see fit for the activity you are partaking in. You can wear anywhere from one to 5 ViceGrip PRs on one hand depending how much coverage you want. And because they are flexible they go on comfortably. A testing subject who used ViceGrip PRs to Golf found that one ViceGrip on the index finger helped him maintain a better grip and more shock absorption then a traditional leather glove. A handyman that tested ViceGrip PRs would wear 4 on the hand that he'd use the most to grip his tools and wrenches. It's all up to you where you want extra power.


Won't ViceGrip PRs Slip off when you sweat?

If you wear your proper size ViceGrip PRs will fit snuggly enough on your fingers to stay.  The silicone texture has track and an inner inset logo to provide resistance from falling off easily.  

What does my contribution pay for?

Your generous contribution helps us get a jump start in releasing this product to the masses.  

  • Manufacturing and Tooling Costs for Silicone Injecting Molding ViceGrip.
  • Our first inventory order which goes first towards contributors like you!
  • Shipping Costs
  • Online Marketing, SEO, campaigning to get the word out.

How does ring-sizing with with ViceGrip PRs?

First find out your U.S ring size, then use the guide below to find out your ViceGrip size.  Since ViceGrip PRs are cast in a flexible silicone they fit up to 3 sizes each.

 (Note* At first we are only releasing sizes that cover U.S ring sizes 6.5 - 14 .  In the future we hope to release more sizes)

Configure your combination of rings to your activity


PRINTABLE RING SIZE GUIDE

Click on the image below to download a PDF with a ring size guide you can cut out and measure to find your ViceGrip Ring Size (Set your printer NOT TO SCALE)

The Future.

With your contributions we hope to expand the ViceGrip PR product line to include a variety of activity-specific colors, sizes and new textures.  Skin tones, translucent, team colors, etc.


Our Disclaimer
ViceGrip PRs are are not a medical or injury preventing device.  ViceGrip PRs are meant to be worn in the suggested size listed in our included chart.  ViceGrip PRs should fit snugly on the fingers and no tighter then the suggested chart size.  If worn too tight you risk the potential of cutting circulation to the fingers.  ViceGrip PRs are for people 12 years old and up, and should be kept away from young children as they could pose a potential choking risk.  ViceGrip PRs are made of a skin safe silicone and do not pose any known allergies or health risks.
story_txt:
ViceGrip Performance Rings - Protect, Perform and Grip Tougher!
ViceGrip PRs are ultra-durable silicone rings that act like a second skin for your fingers.  They provide extra grip and protection to your hands without the use of hot and sweaty gloves.  Produced in high-strength silicone these bands provide impact resistance and protection needed to catch a ball more securely, lift weights with less wear, and provide more overall power to your hands.  Using a high friction polygonal texture ViceGrip PRss protect your fingers while providing extra tread to hold on longer, push harder and grip tougher. 


The Perks
Level 1 Perk is only 5$.



Level 2 Perk is only 10$.


Level 3 Perk is only 30$.


Level 4 Perk is only 60$.





The ViceGrip PRs Story

A while back after a long bike ride I noticed that every time I went out for a ride, the gloves I was wearing would leave my palms sweaty, and dirty.  Not mention the task of having to take on and off my hot gloves throughout the day to give my hands some air.  It dawned on me that a lot of the grip these gloves provided me were only necessary on the lower digit of my fingers.  In fact I realized a lot of the day to day activities that I would partake in also only really required me to have protection in grip in this specific area.  So utilizing my background in CAD and 3D design I decided to create something that would solve this issue.  Dozens of renderings, 3D printed test models and hand-cast silicone parts later I finally had fully functioning prototypes.





The Challenge and Solution
My biggest challenge was coming up with an texture and design that wold provide tread and resistance at all angles.  Using a extruded diamond texture I was able to provide that impact resistance tread on the front and back of the rings while allowing finger movement with flat areas on the sides.  


Arthritis and Joint Pain SufferersAs we age our joints become weaker, our grip power  diminishes and in many cases Arthritis develops.  When worn properly sufferers of joint and arthritis pain can can take advantage of the extra grip and protection these rings provide.  Along with providing a supportive and flexible feel ViceGrips can also absorb impact and shock from everyday activities.  ViceGrips aren't a medical device  but they can help prevent pain caused by every day activities on both the young and elderly.


The ViceGrip PRs Advantage



ViceGrip PRss provide the following features and advantages..

Superior grip & tread.
Impact resistance from shock.
Skin Protection from finger wear and tear.
Flexible comfort.
2 Modes - Pinpoint diamond for catching and throwing and wide coverage mode for general grip.
More air circulation and cooling to your hands then wearing gloves.
Non-Slippage inner surface for a secure fit on the fingers.  
 




"It's not just a band, it's like a second skin that securely grips my hand position while providing great impact resistance when i'm using my driver" 
         Alex Baste - Golfer and Fitness Expert



For the People



Golf
Baseball and Softball
Training and Fitness


Lacrosse
Basketball
Crossfit


Handywork
WeightLifting
FlagFootball


FootballTraining
Tennis and Racquet
Rugby


Racquetball
Handywork
Paintball


Track and Field
Volleyball
Cricket


Handball
Softball
FieldHockey


Cycling
HomeImprovers
Wrestling


Boxing and MMA
Gymnastics
TableTennis


SportsMedicine
Arthritis and JointSufferers
LawEnforcement






The Technology
ViceGrip PRs are made in a durable yet flexible skin-safe silicone. ViceGrip PRs provide a flexible diamond-like pattern that provide protection and tread similar to dragon skin.  As well as being tough they also provide a soft-to-the-touch comfortable texture. 






   



Gloves vs ViceGrip PRs
ViceGrip PRs are not meant to be a complete replacement for Gloves. After all gloves whether they be weight lifting, sports related or general activity usage cover more area per square inch on the hands. ViceGrip PRs are meant to strategically target the area of the hands that get a large portion of activity and damage - the lower digits of the fingers. But regardless of what area is covered ViceGrip PRs main advantage are their comfort. Allowing air flow to reach the hands without hot leather, or vinyl material they provide a soft gel-like texture. Produced in high grade silicone they provide better shock absorption making them ideal for high impact areas on the fingers. When worn in the proper sizes ViceGrip PRs provide excellent protection and performance.
"A secure grasp on to the ball is crucial in Rugby, these (ViceGrip PRs) help me get a good secure grip.  They don't just help me hold the ball better but the ring friction also improves my catching and passing" Leonidas Wilson - South Africa Super League Rugby player / Miami Rugby 7's coach / Florida Select Rugby

How do you wear ViceGrip PRs?
ViceGrip PRs can be worn and configured any which way you see fit for the activity you are partaking in. You can wear anywhere from one to 5 ViceGrip PRs on one hand depending how much coverage you want. And because they are flexible they go on comfortably. A testing subject who used ViceGrip PRs to Golf found that one ViceGrip on the index finger helped him maintain a better grip and more shock absorption then a traditional leather glove. A handyman that tested ViceGrip PRs would wear 4 on the hand that he'd use the most to grip his tools and wrenches. It's all up to you where you want extra power.




Won't ViceGrip PRs Slip off when you sweat?
If you wear your proper size ViceGrip PRs will fit snuggly enough on your fingers to stay.  The silicone texture has track and an inner inset logo to provide resistance from falling off easily.  
What does my contribution pay for?
Your generous contribution helps us get a jump start in releasing this product to the masses.  

Manufacturing and Tooling Costs for Silicone Injecting Molding ViceGrip.
Our first inventory order which goes first towards contributors like you!
Shipping Costs
Online Marketing, SEO, campaigning to get the word out.





How does ring-sizing with with ViceGrip PRs?

First find out your U.S ring size, then use the guide below to find out your ViceGrip size.  Since ViceGrip PRs are cast in a flexible silicone they fit up to 3 sizes each.
 (Note* At first we are only releasing sizes that cover U.S ring sizes 6.5 - 14 .  In the future we hope to release more sizes)



Configure your combination of rings to your activity


PRINTABLE RING SIZE GUIDE
Click on the image below to download a PDF with a ring size guide you can cut out and measure to find your ViceGrip Ring Size (Set your printer NOT TO SCALE)




The Future.

With your contributions we hope to expand the ViceGrip PR product line to include a variety of activity-specific colors, sizes and new textures.  Skin tones, translucent, team colors, etc.

Our Disclaimer 
ViceGrip PRs are are not a medical or injury preventing device.  ViceGrip PRs are meant to be worn in the suggested size listed in our included chart.  ViceGrip PRs should fit snugly on the fingers and no tighter then the suggested chart size.  If worn too tight you risk the potential of cutting circulation to the fingers.  ViceGrip PRs are for people 12 years old and up, and should be kept away from young children as they could pose a potential choking risk.  ViceGrip PRs are made of a skin safe silicone and do not pose any known allergies or health risks.

story:
ASPECC: Who We Are

ASPECC (Alberta Sex Positive Education and Community Centre) was founded by four highly motivated individuals who are passionate about sex positive values and education.  With the help of Seattle's Center for Sex Positive Culture we are opening a location in Edmonton to meet the community need for a safe space for networking, education, sex positive events and socializing.

ASPECC will:

  • Have available space for large and small groups to host their meets, munches, events and fundraisers
  • Work in cooperation with other sex positive organizations to assist with fundraising and advocacy
  • Provide sex positive and kink aware training for professionals to assist in providing quality and compassionate services to persons of a wide variety of lifestyles and sexualities.
  • Host events to promote and celebrate sex positive values
  • Follow Safe Space Frameworks with strict anti-harassment and anti-bullying policies
  • Liason with the local law enforcement agencies to create a network of individuals who can support sex positive individuals
  • In cooperation with Alberta Health there will be a quarterly satellite STI clinic at the centre
  •  Provide space for sex positive educators to hold lectures and workshops
  • Organize and offer sex positive education, classes, workshops and demonstrations with a wide variety of presenters.
  • Have screenings of independent films and documentaries on a variety of sex positive topics.
  • Have a healthy conscious canteen with smoothies, wraps and other goodies
  • Be wheelchair accessible, have gender inclusive bathrooms, Member only events to ensure the safety of attendees, be accessible via city transit

We already have city approval, a location with an amazing landlord and a solid financial plan.

What We Need & What You Get

We need your help! 

The location is perfect.  The landlord understands what we are doing and is supportive.  The space is accessible, a central location, has wheel chair accessibility, a/c, large classrooms and a perfect space for events.  We have city approval for the location.  These renovations came in at a much higher cost than we are able to shoulder, at $120,000.  The bathrooms require concrete drilling and there were some complications due to this.

  • We have already invested our own money, to the tune of $20,000 towards the renovation PLUS the start up costs.
  • $5000 of the funds raised will go to our costs for the fundraiser.
  • $50,000 is our share of the renovation expense to install the bathrooms and update the electrical.
  • If we raise $80,000 we can install showers as well!
  • The landlord is willing to shoulder the other half of the renovations!
  • If we do not reach the goal of $55000 then the project cannot proceed and all funds are returned to the folks who stepped forward to donate.

DONATING $100 ALSO GETS YOU A MEMBERSHIP!


We Can Do This!

The centre will provide education, networking, community support, sex positive awareness, advocacy for sexual minorities, promote awareness of LGBTQ+ issues, promote awareness of sexual health issues, provide safe spaces for exploration and learning on sexuality and related topics and encourage consensual sexual attitudes.

Isn't that worth $10?  If only 5000 people donate $10 we can open our doors October 1st WITH bathrooms dedicated to the Centre!!

  • The centre is for those of legal age only.
  • Some events are for members only to ensure the safety of the members attending.
  • Some events will be further restricted to specific sexualities, genders or lifestyles to provide networking and safe space frameworks.
  • We offer fundraising help to other communities and organizations

Risks & Challenges

There are some risks.  This is a start up business, and although we have worked diligently and have a solid financial plan that indicates this centre can be self sustaining in short order, things can and do go wrong.

In the event that we raise this money, and yet the centre does NOT become self sustainable we DO have a back up plan.

  • The space is easily divided to sublet parts of it while we build up our own base..
  • We have other professionals ready to utilize the space for their own workshops on a rental basis to augment ASPECC's income.
  • We are offering workshops to be brought to other locations to augment the centre's income.
  • We are happy to announce that we are able to rent space to members for their functions as well!

Extended Goals

If we raise additional funds we will put those towards the showers and the theatre system to be able to watch high quality screenings. 


Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
No Touch 10 seconds Disinfection | Rechargeable & Portable | Suitable for ATM keyboards, phones, handles, public transit seats | Made in EU

 

 

Description

1. UV-C Disinfection Rechargeable Lamp
2. Mask Compartment
3. USB input
4. Switch Button

 

Why UVC Light?

 

Because it kills 99.9% of all airborne viruses.

 

Ultra-Violet (UV) light is invisible to the human eye and is divided into UVA, UVB and UVC.

UVC is found within 100-280 nm range. In the graph can be seen that germicidal action is maximized at 265 nm with reductions on either side. Iqloo UVC lamps have their main emission at 253,7 nm where the action on DNA is 86% of the peak value and 82% on the IES curve.

 As a result, our germicidal lamps are extremely effective in breaking down the DNA of micro-organisms.

 

This means that they cannot replicate and cause disease.

 

“A concentrated form of UVC is now on the front line in the fight against Covid-19. In China, whole buses are being lit up by the ghostly blue light each  night, while squat, UVC-emitting robots have been cleaning floors in hospitals. Banks have even been using the light to disinfect their money.“ BBC Future

 

 

 

Tech Info & Certifications

 

Charity - IQLOO for low income countries

 

 

The global response to the looming health workforce crisis in low-income settings has been limited so far. WHO estimates that some 89 million masks and 76 million gloves may be needed in the coming months, and has called on manufacturers of PPE to boost production by 40 percent.

Yet so far shipments of PPE to low-income countries are but a fraction of what’s needed: WHO has so far dispatched 0.5 million PPE sets; UNICEF has dispatched 4.3 million gloves, 100,000 N95 respirators and other PPE; philanthropist Jack Ma is donating 100,000 masks and 1,000 protective suits to each country in Africa, as well as 1.8 million masks to 10 Asian countries. It won’t be nearly enough.
These shortages in protective equipment and materials reflect the situation before the arrival of COVID-19 in any of these low-income countries. An inability to protect healthcare workers will not only lead to needless loss of lives, but also deplete already-stretched health systems. We can’t afford low-income countries to go through an experience like that of Liberia and Sierra Leone during the Ebola epidemic. To effectively fight COVID-19 in low-income countries—and hence globally—the international community needs to step up now to protect frontline health workers.


IQLOO, as a company and part of the community, couldn’t just ignore this situation, and decided to take action immediately.

We created specific perks to support low-income countries and provide them IQLOO UVC Mask Sanitazers in order to quickly respond to the lack of masks and PPE.


We ask you to take part to this campaign and do your best to provide your help to the countries and people that really need it. IQLOO cooperates with few charity organizations and will take care of shipping all the UVC Mask Sanitizers to the countries that need them, from Africa to Asia and Latin America.

 

For your HEALTH, for the WORLD

story:
Wellhouse has been designing and making sports and outdoor products for more than 10 years

 

EASY ROTATE, LOCK&LOAD


FIT PERFECTLY WITH YOUR PHONE AND ARM

 

4 Colors to choose, Red, Black, Blue, Green

Carefully selected lycra fabrics and  velcro，make sure the first class wearing experience，High sensitive translucent screen cover, like there is nothing covered between the screen.

      QUALITY BIKE MOUNT

      Light weight bike mount, solide quality, easy to mount, fast to Lock&Load

 SAFE NIGHT RUNNING

Strong reflective and long lasting reflection effect material, safe night 

FIT MOST SMARTPHONES AND ARMS

Designed to fit most mobilephones, there are 2 sizes available.  The small one use iPhone6 as benchmark, the big one take iPhone6 Plus as benchmark. So basically, the small one can fit any smartphone which is smaller than iPhone6, the big one can fit any between the size of iPhone6 and iPhone 6 Plus.    According to our test, we fit almost all the smartphone which available for us to test.  The  velcro band we use is a very good and elastic, it fits almost most of the arms we have ever encounterd. 

Be noted, When you choose the size, 

SMALL  means the smartphone size shoud be equal to or smaller than iPhone6\6s

BIG  means the smartphone size should be between iPhone6\6s and iPhone6\7Plus

PROJECT STATUS

With one  3 months hardwork, trying on different materials and mold design for the locking  and mounting system, we have managed to produce few samples for making presentation materials.   In other words, we are already ready for massive production.  If we hit our campagin target, we will start the production immediately.  

  1. WORLD WIDE FREE SHIPPING, we mean EVERYBODY get a FREE SHIPPING
  2. Armband only , 20 USD for Any color and Any size, all same price. Like the one below.
  3. With Armband and Bikemount, 25 USD  for Any color and Any size, all same price. The following is how you look like with the armband and bike mount.

 

1. Do you have a range of the arm size which fit this band?

    It fits any arm size between circumference 21-50cm or 8.3-17.5 inches.

2. Is this armband water proof? 

  Yes, it is water proof, however, it is not something you can really put it into the water. But you  do can trust this armband to protect your phone from raining.

3. What is this armband made of ?

   It is made of high grade lycra fabric, and of course with some plastic and velcro as well. 

4. What can I have it , if I made the contribution?

 If we could hit the target, we will start product right away, which means which start to ship    in the middle of Septemper, you will have it on your hand on end of September which is perfect time for sports.

story:
Short Summary

 My name is Lewis Hawkins I am currently undertaking a masters degree in Sport and Exercise Psychology and soon to be doing a PhD in the same field. I work as a non-emergency ambulance care assistant in which I have seen all walks of life and the long-term consequence of specific behaviours. It is with these two factors in mind that Militant Fitness was created. 

The term 'Militant' defined as - 'vigorously active and aggressive, especially in support of a cause'

This is important to the philosophy of this company, as this is an unconventional style of fitness coaching that we believe is the correct method based on the latest field of research. With an ever growing era of fitness technology and 'six pack abs in 10 minutes!' programmes it is hard to separate the legitimate from the money grabbing. From my experiences from working on the ambulances, I have seen the crippling realities of training incorrectly. For example, I have witness ex-professional athletes riddled with joint problems and nutritional deficits, and a crippling anxiety from the pressures of competing without proper guidance.  

Militant Fitness vows to steer away from 'Bro-science' and ensure an honest training programme designed only through documented and proven training methods. The implications of this project, I believe, could be vast. The content is out there to prove there is a new way of becoming fit that will work not only for your body but also for your mind. 

What We Need & What You Get

Currently, this company has a team of five passionate volunteer individuals. 1 Mobility and yoga expert with over 20 years experience. 1 Fully qualified nutritionist with extensive knowledge concerning the adequate nutrients for specific training styles, and lastly 3 personal trainers including myself. 

Today, we offer mobile personal training and online advice to deliver our service. However, we are missing a venue to really prescribe our service appropriately. I am looking for £5,000 to allow for a couple months rent of an industrial unit and equipment to allow ourselves enough turnover time to achieve appropriate cash flow. 

With this unit, we will be investing into the latest fitness (and Fitness Technology) equipment to offer our clients, truly, a service unlike any other. This will allow for a premium service to be achieved to objectively earn the clients trust that we do sincerely care about their progression. 

The Impact

It is difficult to foresee the impact of this project as it is unlike any other. Adopting various styles of training (Functionality, Calisthenics, hypertrophy and Flexibility) into one. The last time a similar unique programme was introduced was Crossfit in which exploded beyond control.  It is understandably far fetched to assumed a breadth as wide as CrossFit, however, if we can even reach a fraction of the popularity of CrossFit then this project will be a huge success. 

This project has a great deal of importance. We are far to educated as a society to allow improper training to occur, encouraging life changing injuries and implications. Our militant programmes aim to educate clients to not bottle feed off everything they read on the internet (Fake News) and use their critical eye to understand what is right for themselves. 

Our programmes are already designed and we are itching to start, however, we need your help. Any contribution will be massively helpful, and as a thank you we promise to ensure the most thoughtful efficient training we could possible offer. 

Risks & Challenges

As with any business venture, there is always a risk. This is something our team are very aware of. However, we all volunteer and have been contributing to this service without pay for over two years and are determined to prevail. 

Fortunately, due to the nature of fitness, body maintenance is a task that every single person needs to adhere to. With this in mind, finding clients is not predicted to be our biggest hurdle. The biggest challenge we predict to have as a company is the exclusivity of the training. Professional athletes are individuals that will benefit the most from this service, although, these individual require the most maintenece. In which case it may be the better decision to only allow our training for professional athletes as opposed to the general public as a start point. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot donate, do not worry! For us, creating awareness of the issues of improper training public is rewarding enough. However, to show support please follow our current instagram page with a family of already over 12,000 people (@militant.fitness) and like our facebook page: 

https://www.facebook.com/militantfit/

Alternatively! 

Get in contact with us @militantfitness@hotmail.com to enquire about anything from training to potential positions for you to take up! 

Please share and spread awareness!

Thank you.

From my experiences from working on the ambulances, I have seen the crippling realities of training incorrectly. For example, I have witness ex-professional athletes riddled with joint problems and nutritional deficits, and a crippling anxiety from the pressures of competing without proper guidance.  
Militant Fitness vows to steer away from 'Bro-science' and ensure an honest training programme designed only through documented and proven training methods. The implications of this project, I believe, could be vast. The content is out there to prove there is a new way of becoming fit that will work not only for your body but also for your mind. 

What We Need & What You Get
Currently, this company has a team of five passionate volunteer individuals. 1 Mobility and yoga expert with over 20 years experience. 1 Fully qualified nutritionist with extensive knowledge concerning the adequate nutrients for specific training styles, and lastly 3 personal trainers including myself. 
Today, we offer mobile personal training and online advice to deliver our service. However, we are missing a venue to really prescribe our service appropriately. I am looking for £5,000 to allow for a couple months rent of an industrial unit and equipment to allow ourselves enough turnover time to achieve appropriate cash flow. 
With this unit, we will be investing into the latest fitness (and Fitness Technology) equipment to offer our clients, truly, a service unlike any other. This will allow for a premium service to be achieved to objectively earn the clients trust that we do sincerely care about their progression. 

The Impact
It is difficult to foresee the impact of this project as it is unlike any other. Adopting various styles of training (Functionality, Calisthenics, hypertrophy and Flexibility) into one. The last time a similar unique programme was introduced was Crossfit in which exploded beyond control.  It is understandably far fetched to assumed a breadth as wide as CrossFit, however, if we can even reach a fraction of the popularity of CrossFit then this project will be a huge success. 
This project has a great deal of importance. We are far to educated as a society to allow improper training to occur, encouraging life changing injuries and implications. Our militant programmes aim to educate clients to not bottle feed off everything they read on the internet (Fake News) and use their critical eye to understand what is right for themselves. 
Our programmes are already designed and we are itching to start, however, we need your help. Any contribution will be massively helpful, and as a thank you we promise to ensure the most thoughtful efficient training we could possible offer. 

Risks & Challenges
As with any business venture, there is always a risk. This is something our team are very aware of. However, we all volunteer and have been contributing to this service without pay for over two years and are determined to prevail. 
Fortunately, due to the nature of fitness, body maintenance is a task that every single person needs to adhere to. With this in mind, finding clients is not predicted to be our biggest hurdle. The biggest challenge we predict to have as a company is the exclusivity of the training. Professional athletes are individuals that will benefit the most from this service, although, these individual require the most maintenece. In which case it may be the better decision to only allow our training for professional athletes as opposed to the general public as a start point. 
 

Other Ways You Can Help
If you cannot donate, do not worry! For us, creating awareness of the issues of improper training public is rewarding enough. However, to show support please follow our current instagram page with a family of already over 12,000 people (@militant.fitness) and like our facebook page: 
https://www.facebook.com/militantfit/
Alternatively! 
Get in contact with us @militantfitness@hotmail.com to enquire about anything from training to potential positions for you to take up! 
Please share and spread awareness!
Thank you.

story:
Our Story

 

Ok, confession time - are you a flusher?  I used to be. As I became more educated on the horrible environmental issues caused by flushing tampons, I switched to wrapping them up in the trash, but this felt unpleasant and embarrassing... I'm sure I'm not alone there. Surely there had to be a better way? There wasn't, so I invented one and FabLittleBag was born!

 

Flushing tampons, applicators, pads, and wipes causes massive blockages in the sewers. This causes them to overflow, with sewage flowing into rivers and sanitary items being washed up on beaches. 

 

FabLittleBag helps to prevent this type of aquatic pollution giving Flushers who want to reform an eco-friendly alternative AND for those of us who Wrap-n-Trash already, they make an awkward feeling into an awesome one, where you feel confident about disposing whenever you are. It is simple just : Open, Stash, Seal & Trash!

 

So what makes it so fab? FabLittleBag is an opaque, biodegradable bag that can be opened with just one hand in a nifty move. The clever loops give one-handed operation, which is very useful if you are holding a used item in the other hand. Once the tampon or rolled-up pad are in the bag, peel off the sticky strip and seal it closed. Despite it's petite size, you can fit a lot into your FabLittleBag; tampon, applicator, pantyliner and a wipe!

 

There are no leaks, no odour, no rustle-ly see-through plastic, no soaked tissue. Just a neat package that you can put in the trash without embarrassment. And if there's no waste basket to hand, or the sanitary bin is too disgusting got go near, you can safely put the sealed bag in your purse or pocket until later.

 

We've got off to a flying start with FabLittleBag, with happy and relieved customers everywhere! This means we need to expand our operation to meet the growing demand without missing a beat!

 

Our vision for FabLittleBag is to help women around the globe have angst-free periods and minimize the senseless pollution caused by flushed sanitary products. The feedback we have from women is hugely inspiring, as they are finding FabLittleBag is transforming their monthly experience (see for yourself at www.fablittlebag.com/yousay).

 

There is still some stigma around natural female body processes.  It can be difficult to raise the subject of feminine hygiene, which means that awareness of the environmental consequences of flushing is low. This is something that we can overcome with your help!  FabLittleBag can contribute to these essential conversations about the environment and women's health.

 

If you feel that we have an important message and a game-changing product for women, please support us. Sharing our campaign and message can help the environment just as much as contributing, and we appreciate any type of love you can send our way! Together lets be rid of the taboo around periods and provide women and girls with a fabulous choice for disposal.

 

About Me

Martha is passionate about keeping sanitary waste out of our oceans and mak​ing​ women feel relaxed and confident ​when managing the disposal of their sanitary products​. S​he wants to break down the taboo around periods through discussion, making talking periods as normal as having periods.

story:
The Defender Sponge was created to protect you, your loved ones and our Planet Earth. We are all subject to virus and bacteria that are transmitted through our everyday activities. A major method of transfer is through our hands, touching contaminated surfaces. The Defender Sponge is the tool you can always have with you to defend yourself with a simple squeeze or swipe. Planet Earth is also affected by our traditional attempts to sanitize our hands and surfaces. Millions of tons of paper and plastic products enter our earth's land fills every year due to disposable, single use sanitizing items. Let's end this by using a reusable, refillable, machine washable tool that we can carry with us wherever we go. 

Spray - Swipe - Sanitize™

TWO NOZZLE HEADS TO CHOOSE FROM

 

 

TWO SPONGE MATERIALS TO CHOOSE FROM

                         FOOD GRADE SILICONE                                         ANTIMICROBIAL FABRIC

            

 

EASILY INTERCHANGEABLE

 

 

SIMPLE REFILL

 

Every day and everywhere in your busy life. Wherever you feel the need to sanitize, The Defender Sponge will be there with you. 

PLANET EARTH NEEDS OUR HELP... BADLY.  

We hope to raise $50,000 in pre-sales here on Indiegogo so we can proceed with the following;

​

  1. Pay the engineer to finish designing and perfecting The Defender Sponge.  He is ready and waiting for the green light. 
  2. Create the necessary tooling to make The Defender Sponge.                                                   
    The Factory is ready and waiting for the green light. 
  3. Order our first batch of The Defender Sponges.                                                                           
    As soon as tooling is completed and 1st samples are approved we are ready to order our first batch. How many is up to you!                                 
  4. If our goal is not met to develop The Defender Sponge, then we will send all contributors a Gen.1 in their choice of three colors. So really it's a win-win.

 

LITTLE DEFENDER SERIES

THE PRIDE SERIES

THE WE-DEFEND SERIES

 

 

Hello, my name is Ryan Pirkle and I love to create. My favorite way to express myself and push my mind to its limits, is to look at the world we live in as one big beautiful challenge. Sometimes there are "fun things" to create that bring joy and beauty to the world and sometimes there are "necessary things" to create that provide a better, safer wellbeing for all of humanity.   We have been research and developing The Defender Sponge for 6-months and already have a working product. The Defender Gen. 1. This first model was created to test, experience and learn what we needed on The Defender Gen. 2. We found several improvements that must happen to make this the product that's in every pocket or bag. We have Gen. 1, We have experience, We have the Engineer, We have the Factory... Now we need You, the users. With your pre-sales on Indiegogo, we will finalize the design with all the best features and roll out out first production batch. For $12 you can make this real for yourself and the rest of the world. 

Our goal is to make The Defender Sponge the number one preferred personal sanitizing tool in the world. We hope to equip every person with a Defender Sponge to defend themselves and reduce their waste footprint. So we have some options and some bonuses for you! 

 

We have experience... but that doesn't mean things will be easy. So we plan for the worst.

Ryan has already invested in the design and tooling for The Defender Sponge Gen.1 in order to prove the concept and test features of the product. While developing Gen.1 Ryan worked with a world class product development team as well as a global manufacturing representative company to verify cost, manufacturing feasibility, material selections, supply chain logistics and fulfillment. So we have taken a good first run at the product. Refining this is what we will do now and here are some of the obstacles we may face along the way. 

Engineering - we may face minor changes and adjustments in the functional/moving parts of the final design. We will anticipate all changes before tooling to mitigate the risk of having to re-tool. The engineer has been working on these details and will continue to do so. 

Production - working out the tiny details of the first sample run will be all telling in the quality of tooling and production. We already have the manufacturing representative who has been working with the three factories for over 30 years. The manufacturing rep has guaranteed top production quality on every run as part of their service. 

Freight & Logistics - the first batch will either be air-freighted or sea-freighted to the US for distribution to the contributors. The world of freight is in a bit of a disarray at the moment due to many global factors. Air-freight is costly but fast and may be the only option. We will continue to work with our 3PL to monitor the global freight options as we get closer to our first batch shipment. 

Fulfillment & Logistics - Our 3PL is Argents Express Group and they are one of the only freight forwarding companies in the world that also offer fulfillment. Argents Express will take your product all the way from the factory, to your customers hands. It is an amazing service that saves loads of time and money. They have fulfillment houses in Seattle, Chicago and Charleston for optimal regional distribution. 

 

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

30 SECONDS OF YOUR TIME

We understand that it's been a rough year and that every little bit counts. If you do support our product and our cause and want to help then you can!! Please share this Indiegogo page with anyone and everyone that you think would be on-board. It's easy to use the Indiegogo share tools!

We thank you from the bottom of our hearts and we hope that you will be a part of a movement towards a better tomorrow. 

PLEASE HELP US TO GROW THE COMMUNITY. CLICK A BUTTON BELOW TO SHARE.
