story:
The Project

The World health Organisation has made great strides in fighting malaria in Africa however outdoor malaria transmission remains a problem. 93% of all infective outdoor mosquito bites occur on ankles and feet. Topical repellents that are used to prevent mosquito bites whilst outdoors last for a very short time and require constant re-application which makes them expensive to Africans.

 

 

 

The Team

We are a team of social innovators dedicated to the fight against malaria in Africa. We are trained chemical engineers and have a passion for solving problems.

 

 

The product

Our company has developed an innovative and cost effective repellent textile technology (BikoRepellent FabricTM) that extends the length of effectiveness of repellents from 2 hours to 6 months or 25 wash cycles. This technology is used to manufacture the NoBuzz® socks and ankle covers that help prevent ankle bites by mosquitos whilst outdoors.

 

 

Prototype testing

Laboratory studies have shown us that these products are excellent in preventing mosquito bites on ankles and feet. However, we would like to determine the effectiveness of this technology in real-world conditions. By your contribution, we will be able to conduct a field test in a village in Mozambique under controlled conditions during a typical malaria season cycle.

 

Typical foot-in-cage repellence test set-up. The test is done with 300 blood-seeking mosquitoes

 

A: Bar plot of foot-in-cage repellence test        B: Bar plot of arm-in-cage wash resistance test

 

What We Need 

To conduct a suitable study, we need to have a sample size of at least 400 people who live in a village with known historical malaria infection metrics. We estimate that we will spend at least US$50 per person. This money will go towards manufacturing a pair of repellent socks or ankle covers and also pay for the cost of arranging and implementing the field study. We therefore require at least US$20000 to conduct a competent field study. In the unfortunate event of not reaching our goal, we will use the available money to conduct a downscaled field study with a smaller sample size. Every donation counts!

 

Expected Impact

This field test will give us the evidence of effectiveness that we require to validate our technology and solicit for donor funding to mass produce and distribute this product in highly malaria endemic areas. This tool will lead to a further reduction in malaria particularly in children. 

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest risk in this field study is obtaining ethical clearance to proceed with the study. This involves local authorities and traditional leaders. It may take a while to bring everyone on the same page about the purpose and benefits of the project. This can potentially delay the implementation of the field study. Therefore we are partnering with a non-governmental organisation that is in involved in malaria prevention initiatives and is already set-up in our target rural community.

 

 

NoBuzz in the Media

 

                 

NoBuzz Awards

Our Social Media

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share our campaign on your social media, friends and relatives. Every contribution counts! Please use Indiegogo share tools.

story:
It’s time to make that presentation, crunch those numbers, impress the client, post that selfie with hashtags and do everything else that goes along with living in the era of internet.  

From writing emails on the laptop to social networking on our phones and iPads, we spend most of our day on an electronic device. Little do we know of the unseen dangers that come with using these devices. Insomnia and uneven sleep patterns are just the tip of the iceberg. 

While we cannot live without our devices, our devices cannot live without letting out a few electromagnetic waves (EMF). World Health Organization (WHO) has classified the EMF as a possible class 2B Carcinogen.

Scary, isn't it? 

We at Meine Mama have found a way to not only combat these waves but also protect ourselves and our loved ones. 

We proudly present to you the World’s First Radiation Protectant - a fabric woven out of a special (reads: magical) yarn that reduces up to 97% of radiation! No, it is not made of lead.

Please check out our website http://meinemama.eu/  EMF and effects of EMF radiation.   

THE CONCEPT 

How do we help you in achieve blocking up to 97% of these "harmful radiation"?  

It is our special yarn that makes it happen. The yarn is soft as silk and blocks EMF radiation completely. Weaving it with another natural yarn not only prevents blocking the signal from our devices but also makes it pocket friendly. This radiation free fabric is then used as a lining in clothes and accessories which we design and develop.

 

This yarn is woven with cotton blends to create a radiation-free fabric. The precision of the placement of checks helps us to achieve blocking the radiation up to 97% without blocking the cell phone signal. 

FEATURES

  • Lead Free Tested by FMEC (Belgium) and Intertek(UK)
  • Radiation Shielding from 10MHz to 3Ghz
  • SHIELDS fully without blocking the cell phone signal
  • 100% Safe - Lead Free
 

 

 

OUR PRODUCTS   

Research suggests that Radiation is known to agitate liquid molecules more. This situation worsens among pregnant women as the layer of water and placenta make the baby in the womb more vulnerable to the effects of EMF. Our first collection is therefore focused to their needs and comprises clothes for mothers to be and accessories for their babies.

We have also taken into account men’s needs and constructed a prototype of boxer shorts.

RADIATION FREE CAPS 

RADIATION FREE BABY BLANKETS

OUR COLLECTION OF DRESSES

RADIATION FREE TOPS

 

WHY INDIEGOGO ?  

After 3 years of research and hard work put into developing Meine Mama, we have taken a giant step towards launching the brand on Indiegogo. We have successfully completed the sampling stage but lack the funds for production to enter the market.  

We simply aim to build a global brand that keeps EVERYONE radiation free. We chose Indiegogo to not only achieve this goal but also to expand our product line at the same time.  

We would like to make you an offer you cannot refuse with abundant choices to stay ‘a la mode’ and enable the ladies to flaunt that bump. Our office is always open for backers, so if you are visiting Charleston, do let us know!

REWARDS

We love you for believing in our project and helping us grow! We hope that our rewards suit your needs. Our only recommendation? Take advantage of the early bird offers to avail huge Indiegogo discounts!

RF CAPS in the color of your choice!

RF Blankets available in 4 colors

RF Slips

 

 

RF Boxer Shorts

RF Dresses

RF Tops

Facebook - @meinemama18 

Instagram - @meinemama18

 

Risks and challenges

We are super excited to introduce our product in the market and make it available for everyone. We follow perfection religiously and do not compromise on quality, especially when we guarantee a lead-free and skin safe fabric. We strive to attain timely deliveries through our vast network of partnering agencies to ensure the best customer experience and satisfaction.

We will be keeping our communication channels open for all our backers who have put faith in our project.

It’s time to make that presentation, crunch those numbers, impress the client, post that selfie with hashtags and do everything else that goes along with living in the era of internet.  From writing emails on the laptop to social networking on our phones and iPads, we spend most of our day on an electronic device. Little do we know of the unseen dangers that come with using these devices. Insomnia and uneven sleep patterns are just the tip of the iceberg. While we cannot live without our devices, our devices cannot live without letting out a few electromagnetic waves (EMF). World Health Organization (WHO) has classified the EMF as a possible class 2B Carcinogen.Scary, isn't it? We at Meine Mama have found a way to not only combat these waves but also protect ourselves and our loved ones. We proudly present to you the World’s First Radiation Protectant - a fabric woven out of a special (reads: magical) yarn that reduces up to 97% of radiation! No, it is not made of lead.Please check out our website http://meinemama.eu/  EMF and effects of EMF radiation.   THE CONCEPT How do we help you in achieve blocking up to 97% of these "harmful radiation"?  It is our special yarn that makes it happen. The yarn is soft as silk and blocks EMF radiation completely. Weaving it with another natural yarn not only prevents blocking the signal from our devices but also makes it pocket friendly. This radiation free fabric is then used as a lining in clothes and accessories which we design and develop. This yarn is woven with cotton blends to create a radiation-free fabric. The precision of the placement of checks helps us to achieve blocking the radiation up to 97% without blocking the cell phone signal. FEATURES
Lead Free Tested by FMEC (Belgium) and Intertek(UK)
Radiation Shielding from 10MHz to 3Ghz
SHIELDS fully without blocking the cell phone signal
100% Safe - Lead Free

 
 
 OUR PRODUCTS   Research suggests that Radiation is known to agitate liquid molecules more. This situation worsens among pregnant women as the layer of water and placenta make the baby in the womb more vulnerable to the effects of EMF. Our first collection is therefore focused to their needs and comprises clothes for mothers to be and accessories for their babies.We have also taken into account men’s needs and constructed a prototype of boxer shorts.RADIATION FREE CAPS RADIATION FREE BABY BLANKETSOUR COLLECTION OF DRESSESRADIATION FREE TOPS WHY INDIEGOGO ?  After 3 years of research and hard work put into developing Meine Mama, we have taken a giant step towards launching the brand on Indiegogo. We have successfully completed the sampling stage but lack the funds for production to enter the market.  We simply aim to build a global brand that keeps EVERYONE radiation free. We chose Indiegogo to not only achieve this goal but also to expand our product line at the same time.  We would like to make you an offer you cannot refuse with abundant choices to stay ‘a la mode’ and enable the ladies to flaunt that bump. Our office is always open for backers, so if you are visiting Charleston, do let us know!REWARDSWe love you for believing in our project and helping us grow! We hope that our rewards suit your needs. Our only recommendation? Take advantage of the early bird offers to avail huge Indiegogo discounts!RF CAPS in the color of your choice!RF Blankets available in 4 colorsRF Slips  RF Boxer ShortsRF DressesRF TopsFacebook - @meinemama18 Instagram - @meinemama18 Risks and challengesWe are super excited to introduce our product in the market and make it available for everyone. We follow perfection religiously and do not compromise on quality, especially when we guarantee a lead-free and skin safe fabric. We strive to attain timely deliveries through our vast network of partnering agencies to ensure the best customer experience and satisfaction.We will be keeping our communication channels open for all our backers who have put faith in our project.

story:
"You won't find many better trail bikes for this kind of cash." - MBUK magazine, November 2020 edition.

 

The Origin..

Hi, I'm Steve and I have been an avid mountain biker for over 25 years.  Over the last 10 years I have worked for 3 different direct to consumer bike brands, learning everything I needed to create my own brand. Having seen how much a bike actually costs from the factories, I realised that there was room to make an even higher spec price for a great price. How? By removing the costs that even direct to consumer brands have, such as a warehouse and its staff, an office and its staff and so on... That's where crowdfunding comes in!

I have spent the last couple of years finding a great factory that can build the bikes, designing the bike and and the spec, and honing it until I felt I had a really fun, fast bike that won't break the bank. I wanted to create a bike that was ready to use 'out of the box', so common items that are quickly changed on a new bike (such as good tyres and dropper post) were a must.

In order to be able to get this bike, we need a minimum order of 300, so that's where this crowd funding campaign comes in! When you buy this bike, you'll be getting it in the knowledge that someone with a lot of passion has put their heart and soul into bringing it to life. 

What We Need & What You Get

As I said, we need to reach a minimum order of 300 bikes to be able to get them. If we don't reach that goal after 60 days, you will get your money back. If we do reach the goal, we will immediately order the bikes. 

The Bike:

The Tornado Attack has been designed as a fun and fast all mountain/trail bike for the best price possible.

It has all of the latest mountain bike design features such as Boost spacing, a long and slack frame, a low standover height and a short, wide cockpit.

150mm of RockShox Recon RL front travel and Monarch R rear offers a plush ride, and the 11 speed Shimano SLX M7000 with 11-46 gearing gives you a great range for up or down hill.

The internally routed dropper post with 150mm of travel makes it easy to go from ascending to descending at the flick of a switch, and the tubeless ready Maxxis High Roller II tyres, with 3C on the front, offer great traction.

Maxxis High Roller 2 Tyres, 3C front for extra grip

150mm of Rockshox Suspension front and 154mm rear

Shimano SLX 1x11 Gearing

 

Full Specification:

FRAME: Hydroformed aircraft-grade 6061 aluminium. Tapered headtube, 148mm Boost bolt-thru rear axle. Trail-specific geometry. Available in Medium or Large size. 154mm of rear travel.

FORK: RockShox Recon RL 150mm Solo Air Boost fork. Motion Control RL damping, external rebound, low speed compression to lock.

REAR SHOCK: RockShox Monarch R. External rebound damping.

BRAKES: Shimano MT500 levers and calipers, with Shimano 180mm discs front and rear.

REAR DERAILLEUR: The latest Shimano SLX M7000 Shadow Plus 11 speed with clutch.

CASSETTE: Sunrace 11 speed, 11-46 teeth.

CRANKSET: Wheeltop SR11A Boost width, single narrow-wide chainring, 32 teeth.

CHAIN: KMC X11R.

BOTTOM BRACKET: Wheeltop threaded.

RIMS: Alex Rims MD30. 30mm wide, Tubeless Ready.

HUBS: Nautilus 15mm x110mm axle Boost front, Nautilus 148mm Boost bolt-thru rear.

TYRES: Maxxis High Roller 2 3C EXO 2.4″ front and Maxxis High Roller 2 DC EXO 2.3″ rear. Foldable and tubeless ready. (They come with Maxxis inner tubes.)

SPOKES: Stainless with brass nipples.

SEATPOST: Internal routing dropper Post, 150mm travel with remote

SADDLE: Velo mtb saddle.

SEATPOST CLAMP: Alloy 4mm bolt.

STEM: 35mm long aluminium stem with 35mm diameter clamp.

HANDLE BAR: Aluminium 780mm wide, 20mm rise, 9 degree backsweep, 5 degree upsweep. 35mm clamp.

GRIPS: Lock on grips, 120mm long.

HEADSET: FSA Orbit for tapered headtube.

PEDALS: Included.

Sizing and Geometry

The Tornado Attack will be available in 2 sizes: Medium and large. The medium bike suits anyone from approximately 5’5″ to 5’9″ (1.65 to 1.75m) and the large suits anyone from approximately 5’10 to 6’2″ (1.77 to 1.87m) See the table below for more information on the geometry.

(Please note: After feedback and reviews, we are going to make the reach on both bikes longer on the production models. Large: 460mm and medium 440mm. This will only enhance the already awesome ride)

I hope you enjoy the bike as much as we do!

Steve

Large: 460mm and medium 440mm. This will only enhance the already awesome ride)I hope you enjoy the bike as much as we do!Steve

story:
Your very own eating assistant!

Tracking calories made easier

Just scan the foods that you eat with your smartphone and your own ‘superbilder’ (your diet personal assistant) will recognize the food, measure the quantity and calculate the calories it contains.

At the top of the screen you will see during the day the "calories bar" which will decrease as you eat so you can know when you have reached your suggested calories for that day!

Eat what you need

The bar at the top of the screen shows you your suggested calories for the day. Your superbilder is learning from how your body weight changes depending on what you eat. It adjusts every week the calories to make sure you meet your goals, whether that is losing fat or increasing your lean muscle mass, your superbilder will learn what calories work best for you!

Eat what you want

You can eat whatever you want! In fact, Superbilders is made so that you can go outside with friends, coworkers or when travelling and easily keep control of not over/undereating without difficulties or wasting time. Whatever diet you are following, it is only you that decide what you eat, artificial intelligence will only make suggestions.

For beginners and experts

Superbilders are easy to use for people who have no idea of nutrition but it is also customizable to be used by people who know their specific goals: athletes, nutritionists and others can manually set up a superbilder to allow them track calories according to their specific caloric goals. Expert modes are available that allow your superbilder to give you suggestions for cutting diet breaks, ketogenic diets and much more.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We have worked on the engine of our app now we need to train it to learn to recognize as many foods as possible! That of course involves money and time.
  • By funding this app, the money you give us will 100% be credit for you to use our app! If you see the perks we are offering, the money you give us is money you will have back as free usage of our app.
  • If we do not reach the entire goal, we will nonetheless look for different other sources to get the resources we need. If in the end that is not possible, of course, your money will be refund. We will in any case keep you informed.

The Impact

  • The impact of this app can be huge for so many people around the world. Tracking calories is a proven way to maintain, lose or increase your body weight. Nonetheless people do not look at calories and tracking calories with precision generally involves weighting all the food you eat. Our app can start a revolution that will allow anyone to be in control of their body weight with the help of artificial intelligence.
  • If you would like to get more info on how the app works from a nutritional point of view and how it can help you change your life, feel free to contact our team at any time.

Risks & Challenges

  • Our team is working on a prototype that is already able to do what suggested but we need to develop our database of foods and tackle the constraints of speed and scalability for a big quantity of users. With your help, we are 100% ready to do that.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please, if you are not able to help us fund this project, get the word out in your social media and give us a like in our Youtube video above.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you very much for your help!

If you have any question, we would love to get in touch with you. Just write us an e-mail to info@vector-ai.it

story:
AI-niita A+: Mini Ovulation Saliva Microscope AI Analyser – The Professional Analyser for Women

Planning for pregnancy? Leave it to AI-niita A+ !

AI-niita A+ is an innovative and high-tech product. This mini ovulation saliva microscope AI analyser is able to test for ovulation instantly and predict your peak ovulation day at any time! Created by the professional healthcare R&D team of YHY, led by its founder, Ms. Anita Lin, and combined with AI analysis, it is the best method of ovulation testing for women who are preparing for pregnancy. With AI-niita A+ Mini Ovulation Saliva Microscope AI Analyser, you are in control of the best timing for ovulation and pregnancy!

 

All new AI technology saliva test enabling rapid prediction of golden period of fertility

Traditional ovulation test is mostly done through urine test. Confirmation for ovulation period has to be done at the hospital through medical test in order to obtain the accurate result.

According to the latest medical reports, ovulation cycles can be instantly displayed through changes in estrogen crystals formed in saliva. Hence, the development of AI-niita A+ Mini Ovulation Saliva Microscope AI Analyser by YHY!

With high-tech AI technology, only a tiny drop of saliva is needed to perform an accurate big data analysis, through the algorithm of the images collected in the huge database, for the best ovulation period to be conveniently displayed, and there is no need for any more cumbersome daily urinary test! 

AI-niita A+ Mini Ovulation Saliva Microscope AI Analyser can be used everyday and brought along everywhere without occupying too much space.

Now only on Indiegogo, you can have this great product for only USD 56.77!

 

Still taking body temperature regularly and recording every ovulation date manually or even going to the hospital for tests personally?

Through saliva test and analysis, AI-niita A+ Mini Ovulation Saliva Microscope AI Analyser utilizes its exclusively-patented invention of AI Imaging Technology Module to accurately identify estrogen crystals in the saliva and immediately display the state of ovulation of the day. It also quickly detects the estrogen data and actively pushes useful information on pregnancy preparation to the users, so as to keep them well-informed and composed while at the same time enable them to project a high degree of self-confidence as modern and fashionable women who have the privilege of self-testing elegantly at any time for ovulation.

Let’s meet AI-niita A+!

AI-niita A+ Dedicated smart APP provides more multipurpose services!

Promoting health information by experts actively

AI-niita A+ APP provides dedicated recommendations on pregnancy preparation based on the test results. 

Your dedicated team of professional nursing and nutrition experts will provide you with professional medical news and share with you nursing and nutrition videos sourced world-wide from time to time. AI-niita A+ truly knows you well and deep and brings you the most intimate feeling. Let AI-niita A+ take away all your worries and concerns.

AI-niita A+ knows you best and we bring you the most intimate feeling!

 

If you have any questions, simply look to AI-niita A+ APP

When the information you are searching for is not available in the articles or videos, AI-niita A+ APP can even provide professional online consultation services which are handled by its senior professional nursing and nutrition experts. From then on, you will not need to comb through Google for information nor worry about the reliability of the information obtained; neither would you need to visit the hospital for consultation. Whenever and wherever you need the information, all you need is to ask the professional team of AI-niita A+ for the answers!

 

AI-niita A+ APP makes health education more fun!

AI-niita A+ incorporates health education into its games, which are designed with special educational purposes. The inspiration for the development of such games is based on the real scenario of pregnancy, simulating the obstacles which the sperm and the egg would encounter in the womb, given the short fertilization window of only 24 hours, as the main storyline, reflecting the difficult process of the sperm meeting with the egg hence signifying how precious the life of a newborn is. The games enable users to experience the mystery of life by traveling through the games and learn from the journey.


 

Futuristic design is the new trend in the new era

AI-niita A+ Micro Ovulation Saliva Microscope AI Analyser is inspired by the shape of the inner waist and the flower bud. It uses AI blue tones to present a sense of futuristic and unconventional fashion taste and the focus of attention.

Self-pampering of new age women starts with AI-niita A+!

 

AI-niita A+ is reusable and the saving of the earth starts with you!

AI-niita A+ micro ovulation saliva microscope AI analyser can be reused and does not need to be replaced, thereby reducing the piling up of waste plastic; neither will it waste a huge amount of plastic, as seen in the pregnancy test sticks, nor a large number of ovulation test strips. It simply requires a piece of cloth or the alcohol cotton swab to clean the lens. The saving of, and the love for, the earth starts with you and me, so let's do our best for the earth.

 

Thinking contraception? AI-niita A+ can help you too!

According to the data, about 214 million women are planning for contraception in 2019, and the market value of contraceptive products is as high as 16 billion US dollars. Single women who try to avoid pregnancy through improper methods are actually hurting themselves physically, or both physically and mentally as a result of accidental pregnancies. About forty-nine out of 100 of these people are having sex for the first time. Due to the insufficient promotion of health education, they do not know how to adopt the right contraceptive methods and this leads to phenomenal abortion rates and infanticide.

AI-niita A+ Mini Ovulation Saliva Microscope AI Analyser allows you to understand your physiological conditions, coupled with the professional contraceptive methods advised by the professional medical team, AI-niita A+ can help you protect and take care of yourself.

Let AI-niita A+ become your close buddy and give you the assistance you need. The secret of women – only AI-niita A+ knows you the best!

 

AI ovulation prediction – YHY professional R&D team is always there for you!

YHY professional R & D and medical team collects and stores a large number of images in its data library for comparison, establishes a dedicated database for big data, performs accurate AI analysis and data access. From product conceptualization, R & D and production to APP development and image analysis, the entire process is developed by in-house professional software, hardware and AI engineers plus the ingenuity of YHY’s medical team. Ms. Anita Lin, founder of YHY, builds the team and generates all ideas out of love and care for women and AI-niita A+ is named after the founder. It suggests that women should care for and love themselves while men should also care for women. As AI-niita "loves you", it is also with "him", this is the sweetest and warmest side of AI-niita A+!

Our Rewards

The secret of women – only AI-niita A+ knows you the best! AI ovulation prediction – YHY professional R&D team is always there for you!YHY professional R & D and medical team collects and stores a large number of images in its data library for comparison, establishes a dedicated database for big data, performs accurate AI analysis and data access. From product conceptualization, R & D and production to APP development and image analysis, the entire process is developed by in-house professional software, hardware and AI engineers plus the ingenuity of YHY’s medical team. Ms. Anita Lin, founder of YHY, builds the team and generates all ideas out of love and care for women and AI-niita A+ is named after the founder. It suggests that women should care for and love themselves while men should also care for women. As AI-niita "loves you", it is also with "him", this is the sweetest and warmest side of AI-niita A+!Our Rewards

story:
Our goal throughout this campaign will be to raise enough capital to begin production on Sany Anolyte Hand Spray and get it into the hands of consumers as soon as possible.

ThinkSmarterProducts Inc. has two electrolysis machines in Arizona that can produce over 2,000 gallons per day. That’s over 34,000 8oz. individual units or over 1,000,000 units monthly! The process of creating this anolyte solution can be scaled up to meet large scale demand and put into almost any facility with power and water supplies.

 

 

From the founder of the successful Alkaline88 comes the next generation of electrolysis products for sanitation and better living. ThinkSmarterProducts is currently launching a radically different antiseptic spray made using water, salt, and electricity.

Currently, the United States and the rest of the world face a crisis, an invisible enemy. This is an unprecedented turn of events that no one saw coming. The world has been plunged into chaos with social distancing becoming the new norm and the spread of the virus continues with no end in sight. Keyword being spread. ThinkSmarterProducts Inc. is proud to introduce its new product to the market: Sany Anolyte Protection. This revolutionary hand spray is composed of water, salt, and electricity. 

In order for us to make this product a reality, we need $100,000 in start-up costs. This will secure TSP Inc. with a facility to manufacture Sany antiseptic spray, purchasing initial inventory, full bottling capabilities, and launching marketing programs.

 

 

Electrochemical Activation or ECA is the key to this whole operation. ECA Anolyte has been proven to be able to kill enveloped viruses such as Herpes Simplex and even more non-enveloped viruses like Polio and Hepatitis-A.

ECA Anolyte has been successfully tested against a wide variety of microorganisms including but not limited to, Listeria, Salmonella, and E Coli.

ECA Anolyte is over 300 times more potent than traditional on-brand hand sanitizers. Anolyte is based on oxidation reduction potential (ORP) aka “energy” that a lot of these microorganisms cannot resist and in turn, collapse. Viruses cannot build a tolerance to ECA rendering them ineffective for spreading.

(Source)

 

So how does this relate to combating the spread of the coronavirus?

 

The dominant component in Anolyte is Hypochlorous Acid (HOCL). This is a sanitizing, antimicrobial, and sporicidal agent that meets the EPA’s criteria to combat SARS-COV-2, the novel coronavirus that causes COVID-19. 

(Source)

 

Referring to the chart below, Sany Anolyte Protection outperforms all competitors products such as Lysol Disinfectant and Purell Hand Sanitzers. In this day in age, we all like to know what we’re either ingesting or putting on our bodies. An overuse of harsh chemicals like in our everyday sanitizers isn’t good to use in excess, which is happening right now. Sany Anolyte Spray is 100% biodegradable, sustainable, and safe for children and those with pre-existing sensitive skin/health conditions.

 

 

Major Anolyte Users

While anolyte is used by these major companies and brands, a product like Sany Anolyte Protection does not exist. Yet.

ThinkSmarterProducts Inc. has conducted a search across major online retailers and did not find any products like Sany, a hand sanitizer for human use.

 

Currently, there’s a shortage of hand sanitizer and finding any in the near future will be almost impossible. We intend to be on store shelves and online where orders can be placed and shipped anywhere in the United States. 

ThinkSmarterProducts Inc. expects a growth rate similar to that of Alkaline88 with annual revenue of over $30M/year by year three. TSP expects to disrupt the industry by providing consumers with a new, top of the line anolyte hand sanitizer spray that changes the game in the current market.

Whether there’s a cure or treatment found for COVID-19 or not, the hand sanitizer and consumer cleaning product market will stay strong. For now, with store shelves as well as online “shelves” being void of traditional hand sanitizers, Sany Anolyte Protection is ready to replace and fill those empty shelves with a cleaner, more eco-friendly substitute.

 

 

 

 

 

Steve Nickolas, CEO & CMO 

Mr. Nickolas attended Claremont Mens College (Claremont McKenna) receiving a BS in Political Philosophy and Economics and Claremont Graduate School where he received a master’s degree in Government. Since 1980 Steve has been the CEO/Founder of multiple nationally and internationally known bottled water companies such as Apani© (better known as Dasani©), Alkaline 88© and others. He holds a number of proprietary and patent protected technologies in the nutraceutical, pharmaceutical and plant based science industries, including Anolyte©. He has established over 50 operating bottled water plants in a variety of countries including the United States, Canada, the Philippines, Israel, Jordan, Indonesia, Germany, and Kenya. Developed 1,500 independent water stores in the Philippines. Developed commercial and desalination technology for bottling plants.

 

 

Alex Meluskey, COO

Mr. Meluskey attended The College of New Jersey receiving a BA. In 1993 he founded Optimum Graphics USA, LLC, a printing, promotional marketing company that he still owns. In this role, his responsibilities included managing a network of employees throughout the United States, developing a fulfillment program for a 7,000 employee company with 24 offices worldwide , manufacturer and supplier distribution negotiations and coordination, plus inventory control and budgeting. He is on the board of a publicly traded blockchain company.

 

 

Doug Horn, Chief Engineer & Inventor 

Mr. Horn received a BS in Mechanical Engineering from the University of Louisville. He has over 40 years of experience in the design and engineering of water purification systems, manufacturing equipment and plant construction. Since 1970, has pioneered the design and development of numerous water and beverage systems currently used as a standard in manufacturing plants around the world; emergency mobile water purification, mini-bottled water plants, home and commercial reverse osmosis units and blow molding.

 

 

Chris Chavez, Social Media & Marketing Director

Mr. Chavez attended both Paradise Valley Community College and Scottsdale Community College. As an entrepreneur, he founded his first company in 2016 at 19 years old and has founded several small business ventures since then with his current ones in eCommerce and the vending industry owned by parent company, The Chavez Organization, LLC. His background in marketing includes running social media accounts for his business as well as running advertisements to promote his brand.

 

Video/Graphics Credit

Graphic Design & Logos: Don Long/Alex Meluskey

Video editing/filming/graphics: Chris Chavez

 

 

Check us out on our website!

www.thinksmarterproducts.com

 

 

Social (Distance) Media




 


 

  • Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/ThinkSmarterProducts
  • Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/thinksmarterproducts/
  • Twitter - https://twitter.com/ThinkSmarterP

story:
Summary Thank you for visiting in my campaign!  My name is Janejira.  I’m a multidisciplinary designer, a wife, and a mother.  I was born and raised in big cities, however recently, my family and I have moved to this delightful small town. Our consensus of State College can be described by one word: serendipitous.  Also recently, I have discovered the wonderful world of professional waxing.  I fell in love with an exclusive waxing studio, and have been bitten by an entrepreneurial bug.  I am compelled to share my experiences with the residents (and visitors) of State College, PA.  

Your help will enable me to open a unique salon exclusive to waxing.  We will redefine the waxing experience with quality which you would expect in a big city, but served with small town charm.  Additionally, you will help create up to 10 employment opportunities!

What We Need & What You Get  The projected expenses for this start-up endeavor is approx. 96K.  I am asking 69K to help me get started. Those who are not familiar with crowdfunding, there is about 10% of online administrative fees which will be deducted from raised funds. 

Your money will be fully refunded, if I do not meet this goal...and there will be no studio, because crowdfunding is also a test of market demand.  Here is a chance for you to let me know that you can use my service.

The breakdown of expenses are as follows:

  • Studio build-outs 40k
  • Furniture & Equipment 15K 
  • Supply 4K
  • First year rent and utilities  26K
  • Legal fees (attorney and insurance) 5K
  • Technology 2K
  • Advertisement  1K
  • Misc. 3K

As a ‘thank you’, I’m offering unique perks which are creative and functional. Some perks may not make sense unless you've seen the short film.  Check them out and let me know if you have any questions!

Every contribution helps, no matter how small! Even if you can only contribute one dollar, do know that you will be making a difference with helping me succeed. All contributions, regardless of the amount, are greatly appreciated.

The Impact People around town have expressed strong feelings about the need for a beauty salon, exclusive to waxing!  I know there’s a growing trend in waxing among students.  It’s a lifestyle change for this generation.  Waxing improves one’s appearance thereby increasing self-esteem resulting in a more positive outlook on life.  When it comes to facial and body hair, less is definitely more!

This will be the ultimate place you’ll come for hair removal, where our goal is to provide care with top performance: friendly, professional, quick, yet effective, and with competitive pricing.  Our studio policy includes no double dipping, and no tipping!

Risks & Challenges I have no salon background in terms of operating one, only as a client.  And as a client, I have very high standards for a waxing service, and I would like to provide that same standard to my own clients.  Additionally, I have over ten years of customer service experience in the food service industry.  I’m determined to succeed: I have done my research and found support needed to make this work.  I believe in myself: this is the first time in my life where my mind, my heart, and my gut instincts are all speaking with one voice: let’s wax this city!

I’m approaching this business from a different angle: a designer’s angle, if you will.  The business model begins from the user end.  We’ll make our best efforts to be Eco-friendly from the design of the studio to product selection and all the way through to execution.  But great product alone isn’t good enough.  We’ll couple that with exceptional technical skills.  This means, our entire team will need to be trained to meet highest standards of quality.

As a multidisciplinary designer, all my years of various design experiences will come together for the studio.  My interior and exhibit design background will result in the stunning look of our studio and contribute to an enhanced customer experience.  I will take lead in every aspect of the brand, and operate as the studio manager.  I feel like I’ve been in the business of aesthetics since birth.  I’ve designed for people all my life, now I bring design to the people.

Other Ways You Can Help If you cannot back this campaign because you’re still recuperating from Christmas shopping, or you’ve given every penny to Thon, that’s OK!  Help me by creating buzz and forward this Indiegogo link to all your family & friends.  And because I am a supporter of the American Red Cross, please donate your blood, they won’t charge anything and you’ll get little treats and cranberry juices too!  I promise to (at least) donate semiannually for the life of the studio.  Give blood, save lives.  Thank you for visiting my page!

Special Thanks to everyone who has participated in even the smallest way of this project.  Filming locations: Altoona Beauty School, East Coast Fitness, and Evolution Tattoo. 

Please Note All Perks requiring shipping will be delivered within 3 months of Grand Opening.  All other perks must be claimed within one year of Grand Opening. Models must be available during Soft and Grand Opening.  We cannot guarantee opening date, but it will most likely be during the school semester, early 2016. Travel and lodging expenses are not included in the reward.

story:
Five Crew is a bike riders colony with a dozen of good riders from Hungary. The name comes from the elementary school's area code what is next to our trails.
We started to build our trails about 8 years ago just with our hands and some tools in the downtown of Szekszárd. There was nothing just our imagination! Today we can say that we have one of the best dirt jumps in Hungary!

We can do it better!

Recently, many young riders became interested in this extreme sport. They began to ride their bikes on our jumps.
Some of them help us in maintaining the jumps
so it's a pleasure for us.

We'd like to expand and develop the bike park, to be more opportunities for every people who visits the park. We'd build a really big pumptrack what everybody can use and more jumps in different levels of difficulty. Our goal is that everyone could use the park from the young talents to the worried parents. :)

We need your help!

We always build with shovels and spades but now it's just enaugh to maintain the map. We can't expand the map without excavator and other machines. We have enaugh space to build something great with a lot of possibilities.

We ask your help for rent machines (excavator, rammer, road roller, etc.) and for buy new tools. Other way we need an irrigation system because nobody can use the paths at summertime. There's dust everywhere so it should be sprinkled.


What we offer?

We offer insight into the life of the crew with many high resolution photos
and videos. We're going to make a short film of the Crew in the fall so we're going to share this with all founders in Full HD downloadable format!!!

Here are some earlier videos of the Five Crew's life to get inspired ;)

We hope you'll enjoy!






We've a side project deep down in the Dark Valley forest. Take a look!



If you like what we do
please share with your friends
on any social networking site!

Thank you for your attention!


Five Crew

story:
Hello everybody,

Have you ever stood in front of a medical situation and felt helpless?


Fertility issues are some of the most frustrating situations a couple or a person can face. What people are less aware of is that the human body is capable of regenerating normal or at least healthier fertility capacities.

These claims are based on vast scientific-academic research.


About Me

My name is Dr. Assaf Cohen and I am from Israel.


I did my first research (MSc) in immunology and my PhD in microbiology.

Today I lecture at the Hebrew University of Jerusalem and work privately as a scientist.


What is This Project All About?

This campaign is about funding the publishing of a scientific textbook aimed at improving or completely solving fertility issues.


One of the most meaningful insights I discovered throughout years of intensive laboratory research is that biology cannot be confined. This is why well trained doctors tend to be very careful about giving patients their prognosis, as they have learned to appreciate the tremendous capacities basic human physiology has.

In the past few years I dedicated most of my research to the area of fertility and fertility treatments. This research and development process has led to two major breakthroughs:

  1. Development of two remarkable medical devices (together with a team of engineers and doctors) 
  2. Accumulation of substantial scientific knowledge regarding fertility into practical advice.
One of the things I discovered is that many people who believe they are infertile or suffering from fertility problems are actually capable of generating the next generation, without visiting fertility clinics and paying great amounts of money for fertility treatments. Others may dramatically reduce their dependence on the medical system. The remaining individuals will need to rely on the assistance of the most updated medical techniques.


People ask questions, read information on websites and hear things from others. What I want to do through this book is filter out rumors and inaccurate data (which exists for irrelevant reasons such as generating a profit) and gather reliable scientific data, along with years of experience, into one book. There is a lot of surprising knowledge and there are many opinions to share. Fertility is actually in our own hands far more than we would imagine.

Regardless of which fertility issue you suffer from or whether doctors are unable to define the cause of the infertility, this book can be beneficial to you. This book is meant for both men and women and it focuses mainly on the practical side of curing infertility.


Insights About the Book


Many interesting facts and ideas about and from the book are elaborated upon in the update section of this campaign. Each update details a different aspect of the book; collectively they form a valuable tool to aid in understanding the structure and special benefits of the final product.


What is the $9400 actually required for?

Aside from writing, publishing a book is also about:

Editing- writing in proper English is not enough. The English should be well polished.


Graphic Design- in order to add an aesthetic appeal to this textbook.


Printing- we aim for quality digital printing of at least 1000 copies of the book.

A Website- in which future editions can be sold worldwide, and in multiple languages.

Altogether, it adds up to $9400.

In any case, your credit card/ PayPal account will be charged only in the event that this campaign reaches its funding goal.


Aid is on Its Way

It is no secret that couples all over the globe face fertility issues. The World Health Organization (WHO) estimates the number of people today suffering from impaired fertility at about 50,000,000 and unfortunately, the numbers keep increasing with each passing year.


The good news is that many (!) of these people can help themselves out of this difficult condition.

If you are looking for a professional, yet practical scientific book collecting data from numerous scientific articles and loaded with years of practical lab work, this is it.


True Appreciation

Starting from the “THANK YOU!” letter, I will also be sending the book, the book plus my personal acknowledgement, or the book with your name on one of the opening pages of the first edition (along with the rest of the perks…).


The Bottom Line

Don’t give in automatically to routine treatments.

A person is not sick until he or she defines himself/herself as such.

There is so much to do “MUCH BEFORE THE SYRINGE”.


Here is a video showing some personal aspects I thought might be worth sharing:

Thank You!

situation and felt helpless?Fertility
issues are some of the most frustrating situations a couple or a person can
face. What people are less aware of is that the human body is capable of
regenerating normal or at least healthier fertility capacities.
These claims are based on vast
scientific-academic research.About Me
My name is Dr. Assaf Cohen
and I am from Israel.
I did my first research
(MSc) in immunology and my PhD in microbiology.
Today I lecture at the Hebrew
University of Jerusalem and work privately as a scientist.What is This Project All
About?
This campaign is about
funding the publishing of a scientific textbook aimed at improving or
completely solving fertility issues.
One of the most
meaningful insights I discovered throughout years of intensive laboratory
research is that biology cannot be confined. This is why well trained doctors
tend to be very careful about giving patients their prognosis, as they have
learned to appreciate the tremendous capacities basic human physiology has.
In the past few years
I dedicated most of my research to the area of fertility and fertility
treatments. This research and development process has led to two major breakthroughs:

Development of
     two remarkable medical devices (together with a team of engineers and
     doctors) 
 
Accumulation of
     substantial scientific knowledge regarding fertility into practical advice.


One of the things I discovered
is that many people who believe they are infertile or suffering from fertility
problems are actually capable of generating the next generation, without
visiting fertility clinics and paying great amounts of money for fertility
treatments. Others may dramatically reduce their dependence on the medical
system. The remaining individuals will need to rely on the assistance of the
most updated medical techniques.


People ask questions,
read information on websites and hear things from others. What I want to do
through this book is filter out rumors and inaccurate data (which exists for
irrelevant reasons such as generating a profit) and gather reliable scientific
data, along with years of experience, into one book. There is a lot of
surprising knowledge and there are many opinions to share. Fertility is
actually in our own hands far more than we would imagine.


Regardless of which
fertility issue you suffer from or whether doctors are unable to define the
cause of the infertility, this book can be beneficial to you. This book is
meant for both men and women and it focuses mainly on the practical side of
curing infertility.





Insights About the Book




Many interesting facts and ideas about and from the book are elaborated upon in the update section of this campaign. Each update details a different aspect of the book; collectively they form a valuable tool to aid in understanding the structure and special benefits of the final product.

What is the $9400
actually required for?
Aside from writing,
publishing a book is also about:
Editing- writing in proper English is not enough. The
English should be well polished.




Graphic Design- in order to add an aesthetic appeal to this textbook.






Printing- we aim for quality digital printing of at
least 1000 copies of the book.


A Website- in which future editions can be sold
worldwide, and in multiple languages.



Altogether, it adds up
to $9400.
In any case, your credit card/ PayPal account will be charged only in the event that this campaign reaches its funding goal.

Aid is on Its Way
It is no secret that
couples all over the globe face fertility issues. The World Health Organization
(WHO) estimates the number of people today suffering from impaired fertility at
about 50,000,000 and unfortunately, the numbers keep increasing with each
passing year.



The good news is that
many (!) of these people can help themselves out of this difficult condition.
If you are looking for
a professional, yet practical scientific book collecting data from numerous
scientific articles and loaded with years of practical lab work, this is it.



True Appreciation
Starting from the
“THANK YOU!” letter, I will also be sending the book, the book plus my personal
acknowledgement, or the book with your name on one of the opening pages of the
first edition (along with the rest of the perks…).






The Bottom Line
Don’t give in
automatically to routine treatments.
A person is not sick
until he or she defines himself/herself as such.
There is so much to do
“MUCH BEFORE THE
SYRINGE”.


Here is a video showing some personal aspects I thought might be worth sharing:





Thank You!

story:
Everyone aspires to live a healthy lifestyle but in our hectic modern times it can be darn near impossible to practice well-being. SFIT, the most comprehensive wellness smart device, is here to help!

The first part to a healthy lifestyle is exercise and SFIT helps to keep you on-track with your daily/weekly/monthly exercise routine. SFIT doesn't just manage your fitness, but also acts as your personal skincare advisor. Fitted with both a UV and skin-moisture sensor, SFIT gives you instant feedback to supplement your daily personal skincare program. This technology has also been integrated into a smart tanning program so that you can work towards both a fit body and also healthy glowing skin. All in one tiny compact device, SFIT will keep you health conscious helping you find a more active and healthy YOU!  

For matters of health & wellness, leave it to SFIT.  Start getting healthy and start getting out more with the SFIT by your side!

The most important factor in skin care is moisture!

Skin that is moisture-deficient is more vulnerable to environmental irritants which can form an excess of dead skin cells. Unhealthy skin will turn dull, flaky and rough. Therefore, a daily moisturizing routine is strongly encouraged by all dermatologists. 

SFIT reads skin moisture levels through Bio-Impedance measurement technology, which can analyze water and oil content of skin by measuring the flow of a micro current through skin tissue. Bio-impedance is a well established methodology for estimating body composition in particular muscle mass and body fat. This is done by running a current through the hands across the entire body and measuring the impedance the current faces while running through body tissue. 

The SFIT is designed to take a moisture level reading of only the stratum corneum (the outer-most layer of skin). The stratum corneum is the layer of the epidermis most closely associated with moisture retention and the prevention of irritants, making it the ideal layer to test for dry skin. By running a mico ampere current through this isolated area of the body, accuracy of the moisture level readings are greatly enhanced. 

By providing precise measurements of the moisture levels of your skin, SFIT provides real-time feedback on whether you need to hydrate or moisturize. Also, in coordination with the tanning application, the SFIT tells you whether your skin is in the proper condition to go tanning. 


What are the potential dangers of high UV exposure?

Even a few minutes of exposure to excessively high UV rays can cause direct and immediate damage to your skin. The most common symptoms of excessive UV exposure are:

  • Dryness - as the outer layers thicken to protect you from the sun's UV rays, the skin continuously loses moisture.
  • Blemishes - blotchy discoloration from the breakage of small blood vessels can be an early sign of sun damage.
  • Aging - UV damages the Elastin and collagen fibers in the lower layers of the skin causing loss of the skin's natural elasticity. Less elasticity in the skin creates wrinkles, which if widespread, gives the appearance of skin aging.
For people with chronic dry skin, excessive tanning is often the main culprit of skin aging which shows up in unsightly wrinkles, saggy skin, and spots. Even when this dryness isn't apparent or painful, like with a sunburn, it can have unwanted long-term effects on skin health.  
SFIT's UV sensor is your companion to avoiding potentially damaging daily UV exposure. At high-alert UV levels SFIT will alert you so that you can take the proper precautions. Whether it be avoiding going outdoors or what you should wear when heading out SFIT will be your guide to good skin health. Not only for over-exposure, SFIT will also suggest that you go outside and take in some sunshine if you've been cooped up indoors for too long. 

                                         

How can I continue tanning without exposing myself to health risks?


SFIT ensures proper tanning by first checking whether UV levels are safe and then by analyzing whether your skin is in a healthy enough condition to tan. After you confirm that it's safe to tan, you can set the smart tanning timer which will guide you in achieving your desired skin tone.

 SFIT's tanning timer is not just a timer, the time you need to reach your desired tan is calibrated to shorten or lengthen based on varying UV levels.  In 7 simple steps all tanning precautions will be covered so you can tan without worrying about risk of skin damage. 


What are some of the problems associated with improper tanning?

In modern times, more and more people have found the joy of tanning. A tanned skin-tone is often associated with good health and an active lifestyle. However, while exposure to sunlight has numerous benefits, improper tanning including excessive use of tanning beds has caused cases of skin damage to skyrocket.

Sunburn, a reddening of the skin caused by overexposure to the sun’s harmful ultraviolet (UV) radiation may just seem like temporary irritation, but sunburns can cause long-lasting damage to the skin. Direct exposure to high-levels of UV rays can cause direct damage to the skin's cells preventing moisture retention and creating a higher risk of bacterial infection. 
Children are especially at risk: One blistering sunburn in childhood or adolescence can more than double a person's chances of developing melanoma later in life.

Don’t get burned: Visit the page below to learn all about The Skin Cancer Foundation’s expert advice on sunburn prevention, treatment, and relief!
http://www.skincancer.org/

SFIT was modeled like a surf board to reflect the free spirit of those long summer days at the beach. Designed in a variety of colors, it is a light-weight accessory that adds a fashion exclamation point to any outfit you wear.  

Fastened with a sturdy clip you can wear SFIT anyway that matches your style! Fasten it to a string around your neck as a hip necklace, clip it around your wrist as a bracelet, or any other place including your shirt pocket or the laces of your shoe as a fashion-forward accessory. When exercising, S-FIT is so lightweight you won't even feel it. The clip makes it super easy to both attach and remove. 


     

     

Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.

GPower is a development and manufacturing company with years of experience in the skin/health care wearable device field. Before inventing SFIT,  GPower developed SKINPET, a wearable device that was among the front-runners in the skincare wearables market. SKINPET drew great acclaim for its suitability for individual use while remaining highly accurate in its measurements of skin moisture and UV levels.  SFIT is being introduced as the next generation of SKINPET: More accurate, more personalized, and with higher functionality.


We are crowdfunding as a way to bring new and better products to the market faster. As a manufacturer, we already have access to the tools to bring our product to life in a quick and efficient manner. However, to be able to introduce our product to a wider audience, we don't yet have the visibility or financial means. 

We are also looking to the potential users of our product to provide feedback so that we can improve and fine-tune our current offering. We want to make the best, highest quality, and safest product possible, and only the input of the public will make this goal attainable. We feel that only by putting the reputation of our product into the hands of the consumer will we get a real feel for what we can do better. Finally, given all the help our consumers provide to us, we want to be able to offer the best prices possible during the campaign as a thank you to our buyers who are helping to support our development and refine our product.


GET 5 FRIENDS TO BUY AN SFIT & GET 1 SFIT FREE!

How to Share SFIT with your Friends:

STEP 1:  Log in to Indiegogo if you have not already, or sign up by creating an account.

STEP 2: Click the "Link" icon on the top left of the page to get your personal URL OR share through social media by simply clicking the "Facebook" or "Twitter" buttons with your URL pre-loaded.

STEP 3: When you click on the share tool on the campaign page, you will automatically get a post or tweet that is set-up with your personal URL.

How to Track your Results:

STEP 1: Sign into your Indiegogo account.

STEP 2: Click on your user name beside the search box at the top right of the page.

STEP 3: Click on the “My Profile” option.

STEP 4: Click on the tab that says “Referrals” to see the number of referrals and contributions that you have collected. 

STEP 5: Gather up to 5 funders to claim your Reward!

story:
My girlfriend Katja has been diagnosed with ALS (amyotrophic lateral sclerosis, also known as Lou Gehrig's Disease - www.alsa.org). This is a degenerative disease in which nerve cells die off, leading to ever-decreasing muscle function. Eventually, patients lose control of the muscles used for movement, speech, breathing, and eating. There's no cure for ALS, and most people pass away within 3-5 years of diagnosis.

No one can predict the actual trajectory of the disease (Katja was symptom-free a year ago), but now she cannot move her right leg and has very limited use of her right arm.  We are hoping for the best and attempting to plan for the future while not knowing exactly what that may hold.  We are doing everything that we can for her...finding her an accessible apartment, a motorized wheelchair, physical therapy, non-stop specialist appointments and second opinions. All of these costs really add up, especially living in the most expensive city... needless to say it is overwhelming for her. I'm here in hopes that as a collective we can make things a little bit easier for her so she can worry a little bit less and smile a little bit more.

We know it is important to use her time wisely, look for new experiences, and focus on joy.  In that spirit, since we are pretty sure that there's no way to get tickets to Hamilton (sigh!), I am hoping to give Katja the chance to go on her dream trip to Africa.  She went once on a student exchange in middle school and has always talked about going back to see the amazing animals and landscape again.  However, I need help to make this bucket list trip a reality for her.  I hope it will give her a chance to take some time to live in the moment again.  

I know this is a lot to ask of the internet universe, but I figure it is worth a shot.  If there is anyone who would like to help us reach our goal, we really cannot tell you how much it would mean!
