story:
[Versión en español al final]

 

Who I am

Let me introduce myself first. My name is Ezequiel Lukinskas and I am Biogenica’s CEO (one of the two main organizations that work in this project, each one with an executive and technical counterpart) as well as a pharmaceutical chemistry student. In the past months I have been trying to get loans from different banks to start this but they all said it was too big of a project for us to achieve and that only big pharmaceutical companies carry on drug development. That is why I bring to you, the people, this project, bypassing all the banks that are only interested in money in short term and anyone that tries to tell us what to do and what not to do. Now, I have this dream in which one day no one will have to die from cancer and I believe that if we stand together we can achieve anything and everything we can dream of.

Who we are

We are a team of chemists, medics and executives willing to undertake a mega-project to try and find a solution to what is now the worst ailment of our time and one of the main causes of death in the whole world*.

Because of this we got together with the best scientists of the country and got on board this project with the Faculty of Chemistry of Uruguay’s State University by means of Pando Science and Technology Park and Pando Technological Pole which is the department of the Faculty of Chemistry by which it makes extension (“university extension”, in this context means making projects that are either from public-private participation or collaboration between a university and other organizations). This makes our “base” in Uruguay but as this project’s implications are of global scale we are not discarding the idea of future collaboration from scientists and organizations from all over the world.

*World Cancer Report 2014 – World Health Organization

 

Why we are doing this

We have a team of scientists ready to take the challenge and we have the knowledge that 10 years of investigation have given us but we still need the initial funds to have our own lab space and to start working in the first studies of this stage of the investigation. We have already narrowed the number of substances which we will be working with and identified probably the main substance that will work as active principle so we are actually really close and it’s because of this that we know we will succeed.

But none of this would be possible without your help and this is why we are asking you to be part of this project.

*Simplified drug development pipeline

 

Here is how it works

The approach we are taking with this medicament is essentially different from all other treatments used so far. The way by which the main compound acts against tumors is by stimulating apoptosis (programmed cell death) in tumor cells while leaving healthy cells unaffected.

We also tackle the problem of immunity and cancer: Traditional Chemotherapy and radiotherapy destroy cancer cells, but also destroy healthy cells and bring down the body defenses. The real problem there lies in that when you destroy cells their remains later, if not removed completely, will decompose causing infections that are as much a threat as traditional therapy’s direct damage where as in programmed cell death the remains are recycled and the space filled with new healthy cells. Here we have to remember that tumors are not an external threat that invades our body like a virus or bacteria that needs to be eradicated. Instead we have to realize it is a part of our own body that is “malfunctioning” and needs to be fixed, if possible healed. Now the approach we are taking is different to traditional approaches not only because we are using a substance that will induce most cancer cells to a normal, harmless death, and even change cancer cells that are young or in process of turning cancerous, back to normal healthy cells, but because we also focus in enhancing the immune system so that the body itself can help more efficiently in the tumor eradication. This is why we believe we have found something very close to “the perfect homeostatic regulator”, something that has been sought actively since decades (somewhat like a holy grail in cancer drug development).

 

A lot of the pain and suffering from cancer is a result of necrotic tumours. Cancer cells disable apoptosis via a mutation and this helps fuel their endless proliferation. This makes the normal apoptotic signals useless and although lymphocytes can still trigger apoptosis by reaching the tumor cell, this stresses the immune system and generally is not enough to fight cancer as tumors grow faster than what lymphocytes can deal with. That being said, switching back on apoptosis in tumor cells is at the forefront of cancer therapy.

 

About our perks

T-shirt color choices:

 

 

Our promise to you!

We will continue until we secure enough funding ($600,000) to make this happen! No matter what odds come in our way. What is at stake here is that the sooner we achieve this, the less people will have to die unnecessarily. We will do it sooner or later but we'd rather it be sooner, and we rely on you for that. If you back what we stand for, please support our work, make a donation today!

And if you are unable to donate but want to contribute, don’t worry, there are other ways you can help us. You can follow, like, and share our posts on Facebook and Twitter. We would greatly appreciate it.

At last but not least, let me share one of my favorite quotes from someone who made his way through medicine research

 

 “We try never to forget that medicine is for the people. It is not for the profits. The profits follow, and if we have remembered that, they have never failed to appear.”

George W(ilhelm) Merck

 

 

 

 

 

Versión en Español:

 

Nuestro objetivo es desarrollar un medicamento contra el cáncer que sea inocuo, es decir, que sin perder efectividad en relación a otros tratamientos existentes, no muestre ningún efecto secundario indeseado. Por tal razón, el desarrollo de este medicamento implica una verdadera revolución en el tratamiento del cáncer para todo el mundo ya que a partir de este punto el tratamiento contra el cáncer nunca más volverá a implicar un riesgo mortal para el paciente.

 

Quién soy yo

Permítanme introducirme primero. Mi nombre es Ezequiel Lukinskas y soy el director ejecutivo de Biogénica (una de las dos principales organizaciones que trabaja en este proyecto, cada una con su contraparte técnica y ejecutiva) además de un estudiante de química farmacéutica. En los meses pasados he estado intentando conseguir préstamos de diferentes bancos para dar comienzo a esto pero todos ellos dijeron que esto era un proyecto demasiado grande para nosotros y que sólo las grandes farmacéuticas llevan a cabo desarrollo de nuevos medicamentos. Por esto es que les traigo a ustedes, a la gente, este proyecto, haciendo a un lado a todos los bancos a los que sólo les interesa el dinero a corto plazo y a todo aquel que intente decirnos qué podemos hacer y qué no podemos hacer. Ahora, yo tengo este sueño en el que un día nadie tendrá que morir por el cáncer y creo firmemente que unidos somos capaces de todo y de cualquier cosa que podamos soñar.

 

Quienes somos nosotros

Somos un equipo de químicos, médicos y ejecutivos dispuestos a realizar un mega-proyecto para encontrar una solución a lo que es hoy la peor enfermedad de nuestro tiempo y una de las principales causas de muerte en el mundo entero*.

Para esto es que nos juntamos con los mejores científicos del país y nos embarcamos en este proyecto junto con la Facultad de Química de la Universidad de la República Oriental del Uruguay por medio del Instituto Polo Tecnológico de Pando que es el órgano por el cual la Facultad de Química hace extensión (por extensión universitaria, en éste contexto se entiende como el hacer proyectos de participación público-privadas o colaboración entre la universidad y otras organizaciones). Esto hace que nuestra “base” esté aquí en Uruguay pero como las implicancias de este proyecto son de escala mundial, no descartamos la idea de una futura colaboración de científicos u organizaciones de diversas partes del mundo.

*World Cancer Report 2014 – World Health Organization

 

Porqué estamos haciendo esto

Tenemos un equipo de científicos listos para tomar el desafío y tenemos el conocimiento que 10 años de investigación nos han dado, pero aún nos hacen falta los fondos iniciales para tener nuestro propio espacio de laboratorio y para comenzar a trabajar en los primeros estudios de esta etapa de la investigación. Ya hemos acotado el número de substancias con las que estaremos trabajando e identificado probablemente la principal substancia que actuará como principio activo, por lo que de hecho estamos bastante cerca y es por esto que sabemos que tendremos éxito.

Pero nada de esto sería posible sin su ayuda y por esto es que les pedimos que sean parte de este proyecto.

*Esquema simplificado del proceso de desarrollo de drogas

 

Así es como funciona

El enfoque que estamos tomando con este medicamento es esencialmente diferente a todos los otros tratamientos que se han usado hasta ahora. La manera en la que el principio activo actúa contra los tumores es estimulando la apoptosis (muerte celular programada) en las células tumorales mientras que las células sanas no son afectadas.

También atacamos el problema de la inmunidad y el cáncer: La radioterapia y la quimioterapia tradicional destruyen células tumorales pero también destruyen células sanas y al mismo tiempo se bajan las defensas. Allí el real problema es que cuando se destruyen células, sus restos, si no son removidos por completo, luego se descompondrán causando infecciones que son una amenaza tan grande como el daño directo de la terapia tradicional, mientras que en la muerte celular programada los restos son reciclados y los espacios llenados con nuevas células sanas. Aquí tenemos que recordar que los tumores no son una amenaza externa que invade nuestro cuerpo como un virus o una bacteria, que necesitan ser erradicados. En vez de eso, debemos darnos cuenta de que es una parte de nuestro propio cuerpo que está “malfuncionando” y necesita ser arreglada, de ser posible curada. Ahora, el enfoque que estamos tomando es diferente a los enfoques tradicionales, no sólo porque estamos usando una substancia que puede inducir a la mayoría de las células cancerosas a una muerte normal, no dañina e incluso hasta volver células pre-cancerosas de nuevo a células sanas, sino porque también nos enfocamos en estimular el sistema inmune para que el propio cuerpo pueda ayudar de forma más efectiva en la erradicación de los tumores. Por esto es que creemos que hemos encontrado algo muy parecido al “regulador homeostático perfecto”, algo que se ha estado buscando activamente desde hace décadas (algo como el santo grial del desarrollo de medicamentos).

 

Mucho del dolor y del sufrimiento del cáncer se debe a los tumores necróticos. Las células cancerosas inhabilitan la apoptosis mediante una mutación y esto ayuda a impulsar su proliferación sin fin. Esto hace inútiles a las señales apoptóticas normales y aunque los linfocitos aún pueden disparar la apoptosis si llegan hasta la célula tumoral, esto estresa al sistema inmunológico y por lo general no es suficiente para derrotar el cáncer y que los tumores crecen más rapido de con lo que los linfocitos pueden lidiar. Habiendo dicho eso, el volver a disparar la apoptosis en células tumorales está al frente de la batalla, en la terapia contra el cáncer.

 

Sobre nuestras recompensas

Elecciones de colores de las camisetas:

 

 

Nuestra promesa a ustedes!

Seguiremos hasta asegurar los suficientes fondos (U$S 600,000) para hacer que esto pase! No importa que obstáculos vengan en nuestro camino. Lo que está en riesgo aquí es que cuanto más pronto podamos alcanzar nuestro objetivo, menos gente tendrá que morir innecesariamente. Lo haremos tarde o temprano, pero preferiríamos que fuera temprano y dependemos de ustedes para ello. ¡Si respaldas lo que defendemos, por favor apoya nuestro trabajo, haz una donación hoy!

Y si no puedes donar pero quieres contribuir, no te preocupes, hay otras formas en las que nos puedes ayudar. Puedes seguir, darle "me gusta" y compartir nuestras publicaciones en Facebook y Twitter. Lo apreciaríamos mucho.

Por último, pero no menos importante, déjenme compartirles una de mis citas favoritas de alguien que hizo su camino en la investigación de medicamentos.

“No podemos olvidar que la Medicina es para las personas. No es para las ganancias. Las ganancias vienen luego, y si hemos recordado eso, nunca han fallado en aparecer”

George W(ilhelm) Merck
story_txt:
[Versión en español al final]
 
Who I am
Let me introduce myself first. My name is Ezequiel Lukinskas and I am Biogenica’s CEO (one of the two main organizations that work in this project, each one with an executive and technical counterpart) as well as a pharmaceutical chemistry student. In the past months I have been trying to get loans from different banks to start this but they all said it was too big of a project for us to achieve and that only big pharmaceutical companies carry on drug development. That is why I bring to you, the people, this project, bypassing all the banks that are only interested in money in short term and anyone that tries to tell us what to do and what not to do. Now, I have this dream in which one day no one will have to die from cancer and I believe that if we stand together we can achieve anything and everything we can dream of.
Who we are
We are a team of chemists, medics and executives willing to undertake a mega-project to try and find a solution to what is now the worst ailment of our time and one of the main causes of death in the whole world*.
Because of this we got together with the best scientists of the country and got on board this project with the Faculty of Chemistry of Uruguay’s State University by means of Pando Science and Technology Park and Pando Technological Pole which is the department of the Faculty of Chemistry by which it makes extension (“university extension”, in this context means making projects that are either from public-private participation or collaboration between a university and other organizations). This makes our “base” in Uruguay but as this project’s implications are of global scale we are not discarding the idea of future collaboration from scientists and organizations from all over the world.
*World Cancer Report 2014 – World Health Organization
 
Why we are doing this
We have a team of scientists ready to take the challenge and we have the knowledge that 10 years of investigation have given us but we still need the initial funds to have our own lab space and to start working in the first studies of this stage of the investigation. We have already narrowed the number of substances which we will be working with and identified probably the main substance that will work as active principle so we are actually really close and it’s because of this that we know we will succeed.
But none of this would be possible without your help and this is why we are asking you to be part of this project.

*Simplified drug development pipeline
 
Here is how it works
The approach we are taking with this medicament is essentially different from all other treatments used so far. The way by which the main compound acts against tumors is by stimulating apoptosis (programmed cell death) in tumor cells while leaving healthy cells unaffected.
We also tackle the problem of immunity and cancer: Traditional Chemotherapy and radiotherapy destroy cancer cells, but also destroy healthy cells and bring down the body defenses. The real problem there lies in that when you destroy cells their remains later, if not removed completely, will decompose causing infections that are as much a threat as traditional therapy’s direct damage where as in programmed cell death the remains are recycled and the space filled with new healthy cells. Here we have to remember that tumors are not an external threat that invades our body like a virus or bacteria that needs to be eradicated. Instead we have to realize it is a part of our own body that is “malfunctioning” and needs to be fixed, if possible healed. Now the approach we are taking is different to traditional approaches not only because we are using a substance that will induce most cancer cells to a normal, harmless death, and even change cancer cells that are young or in process of turning cancerous, back to normal healthy cells, but because we also focus in enhancing the immune system so that the body itself can help more efficiently in the tumor eradication. This is why we believe we have found something very close to “the perfect homeostatic regulator”, something that has been sought actively since decades (somewhat like a holy grail in cancer drug development).

 
A lot of the pain and suffering from cancer is a result of necrotic tumours. Cancer cells disable apoptosis via a mutation and this helps fuel their endless proliferation. This makes the normal apoptotic signals useless and although lymphocytes can still trigger apoptosis by reaching the tumor cell, this stresses the immune system and generally is not enough to fight cancer as tumors grow faster than what lymphocytes can deal with. That being said, switching back on apoptosis in tumor cells is at the forefront of cancer therapy.
 
About our perks
T-shirt color choices:
  
 
Our promise to you!
We will continue until we secure enough funding ($600,000) to make this happen! No matter what odds come in our way. What is at stake here is that the sooner we achieve this, the less people will have to die unnecessarily. We will do it sooner or later but we'd rather it be sooner, and we rely on you for that. If you back what we stand for, please support our work, make a donation today!
And if you are unable to donate but want to contribute, don’t worry, there are other ways you can help us. You can follow, like, and share our posts on Facebook and Twitter. We would greatly appreciate it.
At last but not least, let me share one of my favorite quotes from someone who made his way through medicine research
 
 “We try never to forget that medicine is for the people. It is not for the profits. The profits follow, and if we have remembered that, they have never failed to appear.”
George W(ilhelm) Merck
     Versión en Español: Nuestro objetivo es desarrollar un medicamento contra el cáncer que sea inocuo, es decir, que sin perder efectividad en relación a otros tratamientos existentes, no muestre ningún efecto secundario indeseado. Por tal razón, el desarrollo de este medicamento implica una verdadera revolución en el tratamiento del cáncer para todo el mundo ya que a partir de este punto el tratamiento contra el cáncer nunca más volverá a implicar un riesgo mortal para el paciente. Quién soy yoPermítanme introducirme primero. Mi nombre es Ezequiel Lukinskas y soy el director ejecutivo de Biogénica (una de las dos principales organizaciones que trabaja en este proyecto, cada una con su contraparte técnica y ejecutiva) además de un estudiante de química farmacéutica. En los meses pasados he estado intentando conseguir préstamos de diferentes bancos para dar comienzo a esto pero todos ellos dijeron que esto era un proyecto demasiado grande para nosotros y que sólo las grandes farmacéuticas llevan a cabo desarrollo de nuevos medicamentos. Por esto es que les traigo a ustedes, a la gente, este proyecto, haciendo a un lado a todos los bancos a los que sólo les interesa el dinero a corto plazo y a todo aquel que intente decirnos qué podemos hacer y qué no podemos hacer. Ahora, yo tengo este sueño en el que un día nadie tendrá que morir por el cáncer y creo firmemente que unidos somos capaces de todo y de cualquier cosa que podamos soñar. Quienes somos nosotrosSomos un equipo de químicos, médicos y ejecutivos dispuestos a realizar un mega-proyecto para encontrar una solución a lo que es hoy la peor enfermedad de nuestro tiempo y una de las principales causas de muerte en el mundo entero*.Para esto es que nos juntamos con los mejores científicos del país y nos embarcamos en este proyecto junto con la Facultad de Química de la Universidad de la República Oriental del Uruguay por medio del Instituto Polo Tecnológico de Pando que es el órgano por el cual la Facultad de Química hace extensión (por extensión universitaria, en éste contexto se entiende como el hacer proyectos de participación público-privadas o colaboración entre la universidad y otras organizaciones). Esto hace que nuestra “base” esté aquí en Uruguay pero como las implicancias de este proyecto son de escala mundial, no descartamos la idea de una futura colaboración de científicos u organizaciones de diversas partes del mundo.*World Cancer Report 2014 – World Health Organization Porqué estamos haciendo estoTenemos un equipo de científicos listos para tomar el desafío y tenemos el conocimiento que 10 años de investigación nos han dado, pero aún nos hacen falta los fondos iniciales para tener nuestro propio espacio de laboratorio y para comenzar a trabajar en los primeros estudios de esta etapa de la investigación. Seguiremos hasta asegurar los suficientes fondos (U$S 600,000) para hacer que esto pase! No importa que obstáculos vengan en nuestro camino. Lo que está en riesgo aquí es que cuanto más pronto podamos alcanzar nuestro objetivo, menos gente tendrá que morir innecesariamente. story:
-----------WHY DO WE NEED THIS--------------

Smile is Confidence! It comes out best with glowing teeth. This happens when we have proper dental care and our teeth are clean, black spots and germs free. 

Every morning when we get up, the first thing that comes to our mind is to clean our teeth. Due to our hectic lifestyle we do not spend enough time on our oral hygiene and because of this our teeth gets prone to tooth cavity and germs.

We have to struggle a lot to see these germs & spots properly. Seeing inside our mouth, standing in front of the mirror is not an easy task, due to all these difficulties we tend to ignore proper brushing. Finally, it leads to decaying our teeth and poor dental health.

We run to dentist to examine the same and we have to spend a lot of money and time for just a minor dental check up. Dento is a solution/partner for our day to day dental care and oral hygiene.

SAY NO TO DENTIST 

 

INTRODUCING 

SMART BLUETOOTH ENABLE ENDOSCOPIC TOOTH-BRUSH 

 

This allows us to capture real time view of your teeth and identify the germs and black spots around the teeth. One can take images inside the mouth as well as  record clear videos.

720P high-definition image and quick transmission.

Support: IOS /Android/ Windows System

Bluetooth connection and transmission

Focus on the problem of oral cavity and care for the health of your family.

-------------------SPECIFICATION------------------- 

DENTO is made out of three parts:

The Head : It consist of silicon bristles, toothpick like shape and structure which easily removes germs. 

The Neck Piece : Specially designed Flexible neck to avoid any sort of pressure applied on teeth.

The Body : Holding area.

DIMENSION

Lens Specification 

Pixel: 1,000,000

Light: 6 LED lights(5600K)

Bright adjustment: 5 levels of different brightness

Focus range: 10-50 mm

Field angle: 105°

Connection: Bluetooth

Terminal connection: 4 terminals at the same time.

Available distance: ≥30m

Battery: 3.7V 2100mA/h

Battery life: 60 Days / rechargeable

 

BRISTLE FILAMENT INSPIRED FROM BURJ KHALIFA TOWER AND TOOTHPICK

DETAILED VIEW AT  100 TIMES ZOOM 

To enhance the durability of brush heads & filament and to provide long-lasting  cleaning performance, we have come up with an ergonomic design inspired by Burj Khalifa Tower & Toothpick.

This special shape and roundness of the pedex filaments guarantees you a comfortable brushing experience with unrivaled cleaning performance. 

The head part of the filament will go deep into the joints and clean the hidden germs.

 

-----DETACHABLE TONGUE CLEANER-------

One of the smart features of DENTO is that it comes with detachable tongue cleaner which is expandable. It can be used to clean your tongue and ensures oral hygiene after the brushing is done. 

As soon as the tongue is cleaned, you can wash and slide tongue cleaner back and put it into the slot build inside DENTO.

 

 

----------------HOW TO USE DENTO--------------

 

  1. Keep pressing Power button for 3 seconds, green indicator starts to lights up.
  2. Turn on Bluetooth mode on your phone or Ipad, look for Bluetooth name and connect it.
  3. Once connected turn on relative APP, it starts working and the green light on Power button starts flashing.

SWITCHES

The First button is for brightness adjustment of the camera.

Camera button is for taking photo or video. Short press for photo mode, blue light will flash once. Long press for video mode, blue light will start continuous flashing and it will start to record. Press the button again, the record will be auto-saved.

 

LIGHT INDICATOR

Low Battery-red light on / Charging-orange light on/ Charge Complete-green light on/ Instrument working-white light on/ Photo Mode-blue light flashes once/ Video Mode-blue light keeps flashing

 

---------------------DENTO APP--------------------

Dento comes with an app that connects via Bluetooth and helps you to recall your schedule of brushing by sending notification to your mobile, laptop and other related device.

1. Organize your day's brushing schedule.

2. Track your daily teeth report

3.  Brushing plans based on your age, gender, eating habits,etc.

4. Time to time dental caring updates.

 

SEE THROUGH CLARITY 

It can take clear picture inside any liquid and has magnificent magnifying property.

DENTO application will be AVAILABLE on both Android Play Store, Windows Store and iTunes Apple Store

-------------IT COMES WITH------------

1. Wall Adapter : You can charge 250 V 

2. USB Cable : This can be used with wall adapter and also with laptop USB charging  port

3. Rechargeable Battery 

-------------ADDITIONAL FEATURES--------------

Application reminds and also guides you every time about the brushing methods.

COLOR AVAILABLE

 

CONCEPT DEVELOPING STAGE

We did lot of research and exercise before we started conceptualizing for this concept. Thousands of sketch ideas we have generated through CAD. It was day to day rigorous exercise  to reach the final design. 

Keeping in eye ergonomic design and user friendly . Our aim is to provide you the best user experience product.  

 

DENTO SUPER EARLY BIRD OFFER

 

TIME AND DEADLINE

RISK AND CHALLENGES 

Just like any first production there might be delays caused by unforeseen problems. We've taken a safe approach when we made our timeline and we'll do our best to have the products shipped as soon as possible!

Also we intend to keep you in the loop on a constant basis, sending regular updates with our progress!

WHY INDIEGOGO IS OUR CHOICE

Building a great product requires tremendous skills, effort and dedication. But most importantly, we need your support to help complete our vision of an endoscopic toothbrush for everyone.

To propel our dento project into mass production and market launch phase, we need your help. The raised funds will help account for the costs of: 

DFM (Design for manufacturing) process of the finalized product design 

Tooling, manufacturing & quality control

Sourcing material and components

Testing & safety certification (e.g. IEC, CCC, CE, UL) 

Handling and logistics    

WHO WE ARE 

We are a team of young team of passionate designers, engineers and marketing people. After years of working with some big companies, earning experience and understanding how a design gets from the drawing board to the finished product and also understand the need of consumer and giving via val solution to the consumer's need and problems.  We finally got the courage to make this big step, to create products that would make life better. This is our take on Dento, and we really hope you’ll like it! Our goal is to create a ergonomic and hygienic design that would be easy to carry and use, with an impeccable design. 

PLEASE LIKE AND SHARE 

THANKS FOR YOUR SUPPORT

story:
Now more than ever, technology is empowering patients to take charge of their medical care through improved information transparency. Online portals have opened the door for patients to access everything they need to make informed healthcare decisions. Meet Jessica, she’s one of the 92% of Americans with access to her medical record online. Jessica recently completed her annual screening mammogram, and she is anxious to get the results of her test as soon as possible. Through the online patient portal, Jessica can log in and read her mammography report almost immediately after the test is completed. But when she opens her report, she sees a lifeless, black and white document with confusing medical language intended for other doctors, not for patients. To play an active role in her health care, Jessica needs to actually understand what this report means. What if there were a way to provide a new kind of radiology report, one that is translated into plain language and tailored specifically for patients like Jessica?

Introducing Scanslated, the patient-friendly interactive radiology report of the future. Scanslated takes the old, confusing radiology report and automatically converts it into an interactive experience. Using diagrams and simple language, Scanslated helps patients understand the meaning of their test results and empowers them to play an active role in important healthcare decisions.

How does it work? Scanslated software uses natural language processing and advanced machine learning algorithms to analyze radiology reports from the patient’s chart. Scanslated then automatically converts the old report into a patient-friendly version, displaying plain language translations created by medical imaging experts. Without any additional work from the doctor, patients can access the Scanslated report directly through their online portal.

Healthcare today should be all about patients like Jessica.  This means not only giving her complete access to her records, but also presenting health information in a way that she can understand. Scanslated bridges the doctor-patient language barrier and demystifies the medical record, helping patients and doctors to work together for better health in the digital age.

Scanslated.  Your health. Your results.  Now in your language.

         

Help us to revolutionize healthcare for the digital age.   

We have created software that uses machine learning to transform the standard radiology report into a patient-friendly version translated into plain language. 

 

In order to put this revolutionary report in front of the patients who need it, we need $10,000 to build the backend components that will integrate our software with online patient portals.  Help us to usher in a patient-centered revolution in healthcare. 


How you can help:

 

Grassroots supporter -  FREE

If you're like most Americans, you have access to your medical record online. Use it! Exercise your right to be an informed consumer of healthcare, and encourage others to do the same. 

Patient Delegate -  $10

Be an active supporter of the patient-centered healthcare revolution.   Get your name on our official wall of patient advocates. 

Patient Advocate- $50 

Tell us what you think!  Be part of a focus group to help with the design and language of our interactive radiology report of the future.  Help decide on the look and feel of a product that could be seen by millions. 

Patient Ambassador - $100

At this level you'll be part of our focus groups and will get your very own Scanslated t-shirt.  Show your commitment to the cause by wearing your Scanslated T-shirt to the focus group. 

Patient Champion -$1000

At this level you'll be among the first to see our new product demos, and will be one of our go-to consultants on product design and patient-friendly content.  Be a part of continuous product development going forward, and champion the cause for patient-centered healthcare now and in the future.  You'll have direct contact with the founding team and will have the opportunity to see your ideas come to life in a Scanslated product.

 

Meet Our Team

Our 5-person team is made up of three physician medical imaging experts, a business developer with a background in law and business administration, and a software engineer. As a team we are passionate about patient-centered healthcare. We see a tremendous opportunity to empower patients by leveraging the power of the online patient portal and providing patients with individualized, interactive content that speaks to them in a meaningful way.  As radiologists with a passion for improving patient engagement, we are uniquely positioned to identify and address the breakdown in communication that occurs when a patient reads a radiology report. Finally, we are a team that is dedicated to making the patient-facing radiology report a reality, and are willing to do whatever it takes to bring this much needed product to market.

story:
Our Story

ProBalance Vitamins grew out of our concern for our clients and patients.  They came into our office looking for help with nutrition and health.  The majority were taking at least one prescription medication.  In some cases up to 15 different medications.  We knew that these patients relied on these life saving drugs as they aged, but we also knew that pushing the body in one way leaves an imbalance somewhere else.

Digging into the available scientific literature led us to the term Drug Induced Nutritional Deficiency.  Studies of prescription medication have demonstrated that deficiencies may be created by the use of common drugs (e.g. – statins). Other vitamin companies have offered a hodge-podge of supplements designed for certain organs or body systems that have had mixed results.

With so many people relying on the medications for their lives, we designed a vitamin to address the deficiency. This Initial Offering will target the affects of blood pressure and cholesterol medications. We will also offer a supplement to aid in reduction in male hormones brought on by age and other environmental factors.  

Our company offers a single bottle formula to address the possible problem of Prescription Drug Induced Nutritional Deficiency. These supplements will contain doses to balance the potential effects of the medications on the body. We designed ProBalance Vitamins for the way you live your life! 

 

Why We Need Your Support

Over the past year we have developed and tested variations on several different formulas. The vitamin works with quality ingredients in the correct amounts.  We are confident that this First Formula - Cardio Complete BP/CH will support those people afflicted  with these common conditions.  

Our Second Formulation - Complete Male Hi-Test supplements natural hormone balance in the aging male.  It works to support optimal vitality; cardiovascular, mental and blood sugar systems.  The next step involves getting this Vitamin manufactured and in the hands of people who need them.

ProBalance Vitamins are going to be manufactured in an facility that is registered with the FDA. This certified manufacturer uses top-of-the-line equipment and ingredients. This is why we need your help. The initial manufacturing step will cost $22,000. Once this step is completed, we need the additional money to augment our online presence, update ordering software, and create brand awareness for our specialized niche in the crowded Nutritional Supplement market.  Lastly, we can then create a sustainable line of Formulas to address a variety of deficiencies derived from the interaction of the human body and the prescription medication, from Cardio Health to Pancreatic Health to most body systems.

 

What This Means 

You can participate in bringing this needed vitamin to market and, at the same time, help yourself or others.  Our First Formula is designed for those taking a Blood Pressure and/or Cholesterol Medications.  Since these drugs are the most prescribed, you must know someone who could benefit from the ProBalance Vitamins.  

The Complete Male HiTest uses herbs and nutraceuticals to provided support without stopping your body's natural production of hormones while enncouraging a younger, more robust metabolism.

We want to help people live fuller lives without suffering the affects of side effects.  But we need your help to get there.

However, if we fail to reach our goal, the funds will be returned.  No vitamins will be delivered.  And the presence of Drug Induced Nutritional Deficiencies will continue.  Please help us to help others live the type of life they want to live.

 

Problems and Opportunities

The market for supplements has grown exponentially. Current sales have topped over $70 Billion.  The saturated vitamin sector creates a problem needing a solution.  We believe we have that answer.  

We have found a niche that no other vitamin company has tackled.  Other companies have thrown weak supplements without sufficient active ingredients to move the body most effectively out of the Drug Induced Nutritional Deficiency.  With our ProBalance Medinutrient Vitamins, we believe we will dominate our corner of the market.  We can only do it with your help.  Your support could give a different life to someone close to you taking these medications.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't help monetarily, we urge you to please share our campaign. Facebook, Twitter, Blogs, support groups, or good-old word of mouth.  Any of your mentions will help! Without your support, we will not be able to make these ProBalance Vitamins available to the people who need them.

Additionally, our company was formed to give people tools that will help them take control of their nutrition and health. We welcome any ideas on future products you think would help this community. Please email comments and suggestions to: probalancevitamins@gmail.com

story:
So What's the Problem?

On average people change their pillow cases every 2-3 weeks. That's a lot of time for dirt, oil, and bacteria to build up. This can contribute to problems like acne, breakouts, and blemishes on the face. Silver based solutions can get rid of the bacteria, but you are still left with a buildup of dirt and oil.

I have personally slept on and tested over 80 different types of fabric to find one that balances comfort, price, and ease of washing. This sateen cotton elastic blend gets it all done. The sateen cotton has the comfort. The pinch of elastic adds wrinkle resistance.

Where Does the Money Go?

This funding will go towards an initial production order and distribution. We are partnering with Inovatex Apparel to help with the production manufacturing pipeline. Once we reach the funding for a minimum production order quantity, production can begin immediately.

For your support, you can be one of the first to snag a Pillow Wrap, or one of these easy and routine to change cotton t-shirts.

How'd We End up Here?

A little history, I am an engineer with a history of building projects at companies such as Intel. Initially, I used the Pillow Wrap to keep my own pillow case clean and help clear up my own acne. Now, I want to spread this simple redesign to the rest of the world, so we can all look our best.

 

 

Specs

20' x 40' fits most pillows.
Sateen blend 85% cotton 15% elastic.

Can I help beyond contributing?

Can't contribute right now or want to help out even more? You can help out by spreading the word. Know someone with acne or problems with facial blemishes? Help them out by letting them know about us. The share tools are right up there next to the "Back It" button.

story: This campaign is closed.
story_txt: This campaign is closed.

story:
The thinnest rechargeable tracking device

The Blink is the thinnest rechargeable tracking device available on the market. This affordable device is packed with features including USB charging, LED light, ringer and a free iPhone and Android App. Forget about buying batteries, instead charge every 3 months and you are set.

The Blink project started when two guys, one in USA and the other in Thailand came up with a similar idea on the same day. Inspiration struck when one accidentally left his phone in his pants and put them in washer (for about 10th time) while the other was worried about his kids safety in a crowded mall.

After researching what was currently available in the market place and what other trackers are missing, we decided to produce Blink, a device that is  slim (0.13 in / 3.5 mm thickness), rechargeable (comes with USB charger), affordable, attractive and water resistant. Our iOS and Android Apps are easy to use with features that meets even the most discerning user's expectations.

Now with Blink, finding keys is as easy as counting 1, 2, 3....Let it Ring! Let it Ring! Let it Ring!, with our Buzzer + LED feature


Not able to locate your phone, Blink is here to help....with our locate your phone feature


Ask other Blinkers to locate your stuff with our crowd lost and found network


With Blink's metallic silver finish and edges surrounded by LEDs gives this thinnest device a beautiful look.  


The advantages don't stop here.

1. Have your kids wear Blink as a pendant or a bracelet. Now when you are in a crowded mall, a village fair, or in Disneyland, let Blink notify you with our separation notification feature when your loved ones are lost.

2. Concerned about losing your puppy or a cat? Tag them with Blink and now you are worry free. See if they are closing in on you with our approaching notification feature

3. Place Blink in your laundry room or attach it to your TV remote and let Blink notify you that your phone is about to get washed or your TV remote is hiding under the couch.

4. Taking care of an elderly family member? Have them wear it and  never lose a sight of them with our proximity indicator feature.

Use of Funds

With 30 years of combined experience in technology field and Master's degree in Computer Science we make a team that is passionate about this idea and are very close to make it a reality. With our prototype for device in the final phase, we are ready to design our app for mobile devices but we need help to make our dream a reality. With your contribution we will be able to finalize how the final Blink will look. Not just in appearance, because our experience has taught us no matter how beautiful the product the underlying technology has to be solid. With funds from this campaign we will improve the app design, fine tune the antenna, optimize power usage and enhance the ringer sound. Some portion of your contribution will go towards getting certifications from FCC, CE and Bluetooth as well as on our package design that will make our unique product complete.



The specs - The Basics

Lets dive into Blink's specifications now

Battery Type:

Rechargeable through provide USB dongle

Size:

1.77 inches X 1.25 inches (45 mm x 32 mm)

Thickness:

0.13 inches (3.5 mm)

Battery Life:

3 months rechargeable

Connectivity:

Bluetooth 4.0

Range:

Bluetooth range is between 30 feet - 100 feet *

Compatibility:

 iPhone 4s & later, iPad 3rd Generation & later, Android devices with 4.3 or above.

Color Option:

Metallic Silver

Water resistant:

Yes

* Range depends on the feature of the Blink you are using.


Timeline

Everyone who backed our project will be interested in when they are going to get the final product. We have created timeline* and working day and night (remember we are in two time zones - Chicago and Thailand) to make this dream a reality.



* This timeline is based on our current estimation.
We will constantly update our backers and customers on our progress - any milestones we achieve or any road blocks we hit. Count on us, we are committed on delivering Blink on time.

What next after our final product. Everything and anything.

One thing everyone knows, "Technology is constantly changing"  and we are as well and Blink will constantly evolve. 

1. How does wireless charging sound? 

2. Different ring tones?

3. Different Colors?

4. Sharing Blink with your family and friends?

5. How about a way to find your stuff using Blink using your Apple Watch or Samsung gear?

We will keep you posted as we plan for the evolution of Blink. Follow us on Facebook and Twitter or check Updates section of this campaign.

Meet the team who are making Blink happen

FAQ

1. Why are we using Indiegogo?

We think crowdfunding is the best way to bring thinnest USB rechargeable tracking device to a mass audience. It allows us access to the critical feedback given to us by our earliest supporters.

2. Is Blink the only USB rechargeable tracker in market?

Blink is the thinnest tracker in market that has a rechargeable battery and comes with a USB dongle for charging.

3. How long the Blink battery last?

With average use the battery can last up to 3 months. Remember the battery is rechargeable so plug it in (for about 4 hours) and you are ready to go for another 3 months.

4. How long will it take to charge my Blink?

To fully charge a battery from its dead state, it will take about 4 hours.

5. How would I know when it is time to charge my Blink?

Your phone will tell you when it is time to charge your Blink.

6.  What material is Blink made of?

Blink is made of water resistant material called Epoxy resin.

7. What are the dimensions on Blink?

As mentioned in campaign Blink is the thinnest rechargeable tracker.

Dimensions are 1.77 inches (45 mm) X 1.25 inches (32 mm ) X 0.13 inches (3.5 mm)

8. What phones Blink support?

Blink will support all iOS and Android devices that have Bluetooth 4.0 capability.

9. What if I receive a defective Blink?

We are committed to deliver a product that is defect free. Customer satisfaction is our highest priority. Our product comes with 1 year limited manufacturer warranty. If you find your Blink is defective and it is under warranty period, we will replace it at no additional cost.

10. When will my Blink ship?

We are committed to deliver Blink as described in our timeline, which is early January 2016. We carefully chose our delivery time and we are aggressively working to hit our delivery date. If we are delayed due to any unforeseen reason, we will keep our backers posted on new deliverable dates and do everything in our power to make up for lost time to get us back on schedule.

11. What are different color options?

Our first generation Blink comes in metallic silver. Our next generations will allow users to choose different color options.

12. How can I contact you if I have a question?

You can always send any questions, comments, suggestions or feedback to support@blinkdevice.com. We will get back to you within 1 to 2 business days.

charging.

With average use the battery can last up to 3 months. Remember the battery is rechargeable so plug it in (for about 4 hours) and you are ready to go for another 3 months.
4. How long will it take to charge my
Blink?
To fully charge
a battery from its dead state, it will take about 4 hours.
5. How would I know when
it is time to charge my Blink?
Your phone will tell you when it is time to charge your Blink.
6.  What
material is Blink made of?
Blink
is made of water resistant material called Epoxy resin.
7. What are the
dimensions on Blink?
As
mentioned in campaign Blink is the thinnest rechargeable tracker. 
Dimensions
are 1.77 inches  (45 mm) X 1.25 inches  (32 mm ) X 0.13 inches  (3.5 mm)
8. What phones
Blink support?
Blink
will support all iOS and Android devices that have Bluetooth 4.0 capability.
9. What if I
receive a defective Blink?
We
are committed to deliver a product that is defect free. Customer satisfaction
is our highest priority. Our product comes with 1 year limited manufacturer
warranty. If you find your Blink is defective and it is under warranty period,
we will replace it at no additional cost.
10. When will my
Blink ship?
We
are committed to deliver Blink as described in our timeline, which is early
January 2016. We carefully chose our delivery time and we are aggressively working
to hit our delivery date. If we are delayed due to any unforeseen reason,
we will keep our backers posted on new deliverable dates and do everything in our power to make up for lost time to get us back on schedule.
11. What are
different color options?
Our
first generation Blink comes in metallic silver. Our next
generations will allow users to choose different color options. 
12. How can I
contact you if I have a question?
You
can always send any questions, comments, suggestions or feedback to support@blinkdevice.com. We will get back to
you within 1 to 2 business days.

story:
ACTREK is truly the world’s first smart fitness and wellness solution with over 50+ features covering sports, nutrition, sleep, fitness, notification, social networking and Actrek’s Smart Fitness Platform.


"Actrek Fitness Watch Could Blow Fitbit and The Rest Out of Water - If Actrek can really deliver on what it promises with its feature packed fitness device, then Fitbit, Jawbone, Misfit and the rest should be worried." - WAREABLE

"Actrek is one of the most ambitious wearable we've seen. If the team can pull it off I reckon some of the big names will be looking over their shoulders at Actrek which blows most of them away in terms of features.. It's also better looking than the average fitness tracker." - Urbanwearables Technology

"Of course, this is not the first smartwatch that presents itself as a true rival to a fitness tracker, most major companies offer something similar (Samsung Gear S2, Motorola Moto 360 Sport, and Apple Watch for example). However, Actrek’s effort is hoping to become the definitive example, boasting an array of features that cover the broadest possible functionality" - What Wearable Tech

At Entanti we believe that a holistic approach is the best path for realizing true health and fitness improvements: 

  • Be Active
  • Eat Right
  • Sleep Well

Actrek’s 50+ features are powered with patented sensors technologies and sophisticated algorithms. Choose your favorite sports, set your own fitness goals, track your progress, adjust your lifestyle and motivate yourself to live a healthier life.


Achieving better fitness requires adequate exercise, eating properly and good sleep. Actrek Smart Fitness System can help by providing comprehensive tracking, analyzing and guiding capabilities to lead you to achieve your fitness goals effectively and efficiently. Actrek monitors your daily activities including your activity level, your nutritional patterns and your sleep quality. Using your present fitness condition and your goals, Actrek’s Smart Fitness algorithm will find the relationship between your behaviors and your overall fitness scores. Once the correlation is established, Actrek’s Smart Fitness algorithm will provide you reports of how well you are doing and suggestions of how to do them better.

Share Actrek with your friends and earn a chance to receive your Actrek for free. For details instructions, please click the following link -  Actrek Referral Contest.


Sleep is a core component of our health. One of the major factors that impacts sleep quality is snoring. Besides being annoying and embarrassing, snoring increases many health related risks by reducing oxygen intake.

Ackek's patented design does more than just recording movements, such as tossing and turning during sleep. Our technology is capable of detecting snore as well as determining who is snoring in a room and also monitors many other vital signs. Once snoring is detected and the overall sleep quality decreases to a critical level, Actrek generates a gentle stimulus to alert you and restore your sleep back to normal.

After you fall asleep, Actrek snore management system automatically starts to monitor your heart rate, respiration, oxygen level, body temperature and movement. The results will be sent to your mobile phone which will also detect the snoring sound. The Actrek's sleep management app will evaluate your overall sleep quality based on the measured data. This monitoring process works in the background continuously until you wake up in the morning.

ACTREK is truly the world’s first smart fitness and wellness solution with over 50+ features covering sports, nutrition, sleep, fitness, notification, social networking and Actrek’s Smart Fitness Platform."Actrek Fitness Watch Could Blow Fitbit and The Rest Out of Water - If Actrek can really deliver on what it promises with its feature packed fitness device, then Fitbit, Jawbone, Misfit and the rest should be worried." - WAREABLE
"Actrek is one of the most ambitious wearable we've seen. If the team can pull it off I reckon some of the big names will be looking over their shoulders at Actrek which blows most of them away in terms of features.. It's also better looking than the average fitness tracker." - Urbanwearables Technology
"Of course, this is not the first smartwatch that presents itself as a true rival to a fitness tracker, most major companies offer something similar (Samsung Gear S2, Motorola Moto 360 Sport, and Apple Watch for example). However, Actrek’s effort is hoping to become the definitive example, boasting an array of features that cover the broadest possible functionality" - What Wearable Tech


At Entanti we believe that a holistic approach is the best path for realizing true health and fitness improvements: 

Be Active
Eat Right
Sleep Well

Actrek’s 50+ features are powered with patented sensors technologies and sophisticated algorithms. Choose your favorite sports, set your own fitness goals, track your progress, adjust your lifestyle and motivate yourself to live a healthier life.








Achieving better fitness requires adequate exercise, eating properly and good sleep. Actrek Smart Fitness System can help by providing comprehensive tracking, analyzing and guiding capabilities to lead you to achieve your fitness goals effectively and efficiently. Actrek monitors your daily activities including your activity level, your nutritional patterns and your sleep quality. Using your present fitness condition and your goals, Actrek’s Smart Fitness algorithm will find the relationship between your behaviors and your overall fitness scores. Once the correlation is established, Actrek’s Smart Fitness algorithm will provide you reports of how well you are doing and suggestions of how to do them better.





Share Actrek with your friends and earn a chance to receive your Actrek for free. For details instructions, please click the following link -  Actrek Referral Contest.




Sleep is a core component of our health. One of the major factors that impacts sleep quality is snoring. Besides being annoying and embarrassing, snoring increases many health related risks by reducing oxygen intake.
Ackek's patented design does more than just recording movements, such as tossing and turning during sleep. Our technology is capable of detecting snore as well as determining who is snoring in a room and also monitors many other vital signs. Once snoring is detected and the overall sleep quality decreases to a critical level, Actrek generates a gentle stimulus to alert you and restore your sleep back to normal.


After you fall asleep, Actrek snore management system automatically starts to monitor your heart rate, respiration, oxygen level, body temperature and movement. The results will be sent to your mobile phone which will also detect the snoring sound. The Actrek's sleep management app will evaluate your overall sleep quality based on the measured data. This monitoring process works in the background continuously until you wake up in the morning.  





You’re in total control of over 50+ features available that let you customize your experience. Simply choose your favorite exercises and sports on your mobile device and you’re ready to go. Once you’ve finished your exercise, Actrek gives you informative feedback to improve your next workout.









Heart rate is one of the most important vital signs. During an exercise, the heart rate could go up to more than 100 beats per minute so that knowing the accurate results is very important. Actrek enables you to track your heart rate through both optical and electrical means.
Optical heart rate monitoring works reasonably well during normal daily activities while it may give misleading readings during intensive workout.
To overcome the problem, Actrek adds electrical heart rate monitoring capability which works much more accurately in both causal and extensive use cases.




With Actrek, you can manage your exercise to achieve your fitness goal much more effectively.



Flexibility and respiration are something you need to take care.
Do your body and mind a favor, keep yourself hydrated.


During competition, Actrek provides you real time and meaningful feedback to help you improve your performance.

Even as a casual user, you can still know your fitness status including body composition, flexibility, hydration, activity levels and follow Actrek feedback and guidance to improve your health. 


Balanced nutrition is essential to your health and fitness, whether you're in a weight watching program or just trying to eat healthier. Actrek lets you generate barcodes for easy storing and sharing of your home-made recipes. Making it easier for you to know what you ate and what you need to eat.





You can access Actrek nutrition database to get detailed nutrition facts for all kinds of food. Use Actrek Food Tracking System to generate a barcode for the food you normally have and scan them in next time you eat so that you don't have to type in the nutrition facts every time. Using Actrek Smart Fitness System to track your fitness progress and athletic performance in comparison with your nutrition history, you will know why and how you can improve your overall fitness effectively.







Set your goals, keep an eye on your health and fitness improvement, share your tips with your friends, team up with your friends and compete with others. Never miss any important messages, calls and events with Actrek’s notification capability. Enjoy what you love with those that are important to you with Actrek Cloud and Social Network platform. 

Other consumer electronic products available today have taken advantage of the rapid advance in wireless and sensor technologies. Meanwhile the health and fitness wearable segment of the market is lagging behind. At Entanti we believe that we have a great opportunity to integrate these technologies and to develop new products like Actrek that will revolutionize the health and fitness experience.


From the beginning of this project to now, Actrek has evolved from good to better to awesome, and now we present you the awesome Actrek:









Actrek integrates the latest sensor technologies to deliver the comprehensive and meaningful feedback. The sensors are either physical or biometrical and our
advanced signal processing algorithm powered by the ARM
microprocessor produces highly accurate measurements and intensive analysis






Actrek Notification provides Caller IDs, text messaging, and calendar event alerts which allows you a hands-free operation so that you never miss anything important.
Music Control lets you enjoy your workout without the hassle of having to use your phone.

Wireless Charging is easy and convenient. Drop Actrek in the cradle and it will be ready for use soon.
There are great opportunities for developing fitness applications. Actrek SDK opens the door for Actrek developers to utilize Actrek’s Smart Fitness Platform and create features and functions on both mobiles device and the Actrek wearable device. Actrek SDK supports both Android and iOS development platform.







Benefits: 
Lifetime access to Premium Services: 

Smart Fitness Platform 
Personal & Group Goal Settings 
Activity Tracking Analysis 
Nutrition Database
Food Logging 2D Barcode Generation
Behavior Analysis
Virtual Coaching
Team Event Management
Team Competition
Priority Customer Support 
Advertisement Free 







We have assembled a team of industry professionals who have helped Fortune 500 companies design world-class mobile and wireless products. Now as entrepreneurs we want to launch our own innovations. With our expertise and experience and your support we can bring Actrek to the market. Our team has many years of experience in taking complex consumer products from concept, to mass production and to market. We have the necessary skill-sets to bring Actrek to the market offering the consumer with a superior alternative in the health and fitness consumer segment.












We have been making great progress in identifying and designing a new way to measure your overall health. We now would like to invite you to join our efforts in taking our design to mass production and market launch. With our passion and your support we can make this real! The funds will be used to refine our design, comply with all the certification and regulatory requirements, and finalize Actrek’s Application and Social Network platform.
Join us on the exciting journey of bringing Actrek to the market!  

We have already invested our efforts and time to bring Actrek this far so we can share it with you. We now want to invite you to join our team and help us complete the rest of this journey. Don't miss out on this once in a lifetime opportunity, with our passion and experience along with your support we can deliver Actrek with high quality and on time! Thank you!






Risks and challenges
Developing a product from concept all the way to mass production is a challenging task, risks include scheduling, sourcing, and obtaining certifications and approvals.
Our Team has years of experience in the high tech industry. We have gone through the PD processes including; FMEA, CPk, DfM, DfE, IQC, OQC, MFR, FOI, FAI,, SW performance and error management, in many cycles at frequent intervals over the years. Notwithstanding, we’re well versed in Sourcing, Supply Chain, Regulatory Certification Management for EMC, EMI, Safety, FCC, UL, CE, ISO etc.
We are confident to mitigate the above challenges as we have done in the past. Now we invite you to join our team on this exciting journey of Actrek’s last stages of development and bringing a high quality product like Actrek to your hand.

Frequently Asked Questions

How long does the battery last ? How long does it take to charge?
The device will last 7 days between each full charge while GPS is turned off. If the GPS is turned on, the device will last you for about 10 hours. In regards to charging time, at this moment it is competitive with other competitors.
How can Actrek be worn? 
Please refer to our main video, all the different ways of how you can wear Actrek is in it.
Do I need to purchase extra straps for this? The rewards of Indiegogo contain Actrek’s main module, a wrist band and a charger. Other accessories are not included and have to be purchased separately.

How accurate is its heart rate - can it be applied to the chest rather?
Actrek provides you both optical and electrical heart rate monitoring capability, and with electrical the accuracy is higher. Yes, we have an Actrek Smart Chest Band. The chest band is included in the accessories perk of Indiegogo.
Is it EKG and ECG medical grade accuracy? 
No, Actrek is meant for casual usage.
What about the calorie counting feature?
Actrek uses a sophisticated algorithm to calculate the calories burnt based on many biometrical inputs.
How does the tailored fitness advice work? 
Please refer to our presentation.
Is Actrek waterproof?
Yes, it is waterproof and rated at IP68.
Do I have to input what activity I’m doing each time or will it sense it smart?
Yes, you will have to select the sport each time you do it. Selecting a workout on Actrek is very easy.
Is heart rate continuously monitored?
Yes, we support monitoring heart rate continuously.
Does Actrek measure everything when swimming? Or not?Actrek measures parameters relevant to swimming.

story:
Fit-My-Intake Starter Kit ($5)

For a $5 dollar contribution you give your support to a healthier tomorrow. As a thank you, you will receive our five part Email Starter Kit that explains all you need to know for healthy eating and how to start today. You will have unlimited access to our online content ranging from documentaries and short videos to how-to articles and recipes. You will also be first to find out about all new products, collaborations and changes within the company. 


Un-Cook E-Book + Starter Kit ($15)

For $15 dollars you will receive our Starter Kit Plus+, which includes “The Un-Cook E-Book," containing recipes and tips to help you develop vegan living habits. This book focuses on the times when you don't want to cook, but also includes over 25 recipes for when you do have time to cook. These recipes don’t require much skill in the cooking department and also have a low number of average ingredients.  This reward includes our email start kit.


Intake + Starter Kit ($25)

Have your own Intake arrive at your door for a $25 dollar contribution. This package of Intake includes one complete kit which will help you prepare one full day worth of healthy meals.  This reward includes the email starter kit.


Intake + E-Book + Starter Kit ($35)

If you want to experience Intake and use our Un-Cook E-Book to help keep your momentum going then check out this Intake + Book Intake package for $35! 


Motivation Kit + Intake + E-Book + Starter Kit ($55)

Take Intake one step further in your life by receiving our Motivation Kit with our branded slogans for $55. Includes a motivational notebook, shopping tote, 3 stickers, and a signature twist bracelet.  Also includes the email starter kit, the Un-Cook E-Book and one Intake.


30 Day Custom Plan + Fitness Kit + Intake + E-Book + Starter Kit ($150)

Take Intake a step further by receiving a custom 30 day personalized lifestyle plan that can be downloaded onto your phone as an app for a $150 contribution. You will also receive our fitness kit which includes: a fitness mat, a mug, a water bottle, our signature twist bracelet, cotton tote bag, ear buds, shoe pedometer, travel salad shaker, stickers, and a wooden recipe stand. This package, also including the starter kit, the Un-Cook E-book, and one Intake, is the best possible way to transition into a healthier lifestyle. 


One Year of Health ($1500)

Get a year's worth of Intake meal planning and tool kits by receiving our monthly curated box package for a $1500 contribution ($125 per month including shipping). Each kit includes full samples of dry ingredients and tools like sauces, grains, and spices. Each week’s grocery list and recipes will be sent to your phone. As a bonus we'll make sure any new product Intake makes, you get to try out before it goes into stores! Keep in the loop with our starter kit, recipe book, and one Intake.


Healthy Local Personalized Day with Madeline ($5000)

For our premium supporters, enjoy a personal interaction with me, the founder, Madeline (read my story below) in your hometown. Enjoy a guided day to the healthiest activities, restaurants, and shops in your hometown for a $5000 contribution. Bring anyone you like and enjoy a great day of exploration and an optional home cooking lesson for dinner at the end of the day. This package also includes the starter kit, the E-book, five Intakes, the fitness kit, one month's worth of lifestyle plans and one box of ingredients for the month.


Alternative Contribution

We would love for everyone, not just the ones who can contribute funds, to be part of the Intake revolution. Also, if you contributed but want to do more, alternative ways to contribute are:

  1. Share this campaign and the photo below with everyone you know on every form of social media you own. Let your enthusiasm translate in your posts!
  2. Write and tell us your story! Post it to social media, make a video, or write a poem, whatever way you feel best tells us who you are! *Use hashtag #fitmyintake
  3. Let the people for whom you care the dearest know that change is here and there is a way to contribute right now.
  4. Know that everything you buy casts a vote for the kind of society you want, so make your votes count from now on.
  5. Contribute your ideas! Tell us if you have a great idea for a variation of Intake or a related product or service that you want!
We are choosing to crowdfund verses traditional investment strategies because the crowd is what is important to us, you, and everyone you know, on the same page, for change. Stay tuned for updates and new deals! 



FIT strives to stop the deterioration of the environment, remove cruelty from our food culture, and gain back the strength and benefits of our human bodies. All this can be achieved with a vegan diet (why vegan? read my story below). Intake guides you to make the best choices, which you’ll feel great about. We possess the versatility to partner with any company, product, or service that shares our same vision. Our communities will be built to carry the best options, available and affordable for all. 

It is simple really, we want to eat and live healthier; the key is planning. Planning and research is the hard part, but a program could efficiently do that for an individual, which is why we’re offering it to you. With your help we can put this program into action and help everyone achieve health at their own pace and taste.

This campaign is not just about getting Intake into stores. It is the first step in a long line of Intake product variations, planning programs, healthy living collaborations, and a major movement in the way we eat.


AND YOU ARE GOING TO LOVE IT


Intake was designed with today’s busy lifestyle in mind. Intake educates on the benefits of healthy eating and significantly simplifies the process to make adapting your new habits into your previous schedule a breeze.

The photo below shows what Intake carries inside. It includes a grocery list of fresh ingredients, an assortment of dry ingredients, recipes, and tons of bonus content!

You can make an entire day worth of meals for yourself and dinner for four


Intakes takes the complications out of establishing a healthy lifestyle by providing you with the plans, tools and the motivation for action so you don’t have to think; you can just do!  It takes the stress out of healthy eating while providing a wholly nutritious diet, so you can live healthy, easy.


Why Crowd Funding?


I began this campaign because I developed Intake, a product that will introduce you to a lifestyle that is fulfilling, delicious, nutritious, easy to make, and cruelty-free. This is an inclusive product for everyone because, put simply, everyone eats! I have had a great response in my hometown; I even won the top prize of $12,000 in a college run Dragon’s Den competition. 

My next step is to bring Intake into the world (to you!), to expand into a variety of helpful products, planning programs, and niche nutrition needs so everyone has the chance to experience the benefits of enjoying life in a healthy body.

FIT chose crowd-funding over conventional strategies because the crowd is what is important to us: you and everyone you know, on the same page, for change. 

What You are Supporting

Intake needs start-up funds to begin its journey to grocery shelves near you. All funding will go towards the mass processing and logistics of raw materials required to produce Intake and fulfill your rewards! We will be purchasing raw materials, working with a manufacturer and logistics team, and marketing the product accordingly.

We plan for large quantities of Intake, so that the price can be significantly lower and more affordable for you. The more support we gain, the lower the price for you.

My Intake

With the funds from this campaign, FIT will also launch into developing My Intake, a software that analyzes your current life, including where you need to be during the day, what foods you like/dislike, your goals, and more. It will create a plan of action for you that includes meal plans, exercise plans, lifestyle plans, product advice, and educational tools, indefinitely. Instead of apps that are just trackers, My Intake interacts with you throughout the day with helpful tips and reminders, scheduled for your day. It can be updated and changed to your evolving preferences at any time and it introduces you to new things every day rather than all at once. This is just one of the many endeavors FIT will embark upon to contribute to your success. 

Future Varieties and Collaborations

The future possibilities for Intake are endless. Currently there exists one variation of Intake, but FIT plans to develop multiple varieties for different family sizes and food preferences, couples, college students, seniors, and more. Intake has great advantage in that it has the versatility to partner and collaborate with any product or service that shares our same vision of a better tomorrow such as fitness services, nutrition services, personal care products, and at home tools. Intake plans to collaborate with as many existing companies as possible to bring you more convenience in your journey.



You are a very important part of making tomorrow a better place. Your positive actions will influence the people in your life, creating a web from which the positive action can travel freely. Your support today makes a statement that you want a better tomorrow. You want a tomorrow filled with healthy, happy, beneficial people who refrain from cruelty and harm. By supporting FIT today, you claim…


"We will never have a perfect world, but it’s not romantic or naïve to work toward a better one" -Steven Pinker for Chipotle Artist Series


Today you can claim to everyone you know that a better tomorrow is on the way and you have done your part to support it.


My Name is Madeline

I had a poor diet as a child and suffered many health problems because of it. Since I was not gaining weight I did not associate my health problems with my diet, until I was 16 and my adult metabolism started to kick in, sparking a noticeable change in my weight. This caused a huge shift in my thinking, and slowly I began to change my eating habits to combat the effects of my old diet. Planning and research is like a hobby to me; every day I was learning something new and making little changes. It was a challenge to transition despite all the resources. I knew there had to be an easier way but I wasn't sure what that could be.  


One Year Later...


I attended an illustration class; the final project was to draw a cereal box or something found in a grocery store. The project sounded quite dull so to spice it up I decided to invent and draw a cool product that I would genuinely want to buy. I was transitioning into a healthy lifestyle and I love kits so I thought “What if there was a kit that had everything you needed for a healthy day?” As I was sketching, I was planning out the logistics in my head for fun and realized that this could actually help a lot of people, those who want to be healthier but don't know where to start. That very day I made the commitment to pursue what is now Intake, run by my corporation Flexible Integrated Tactics (FIT).

Two months into the research and development of Intake I stumbled upon a book called Skinny Bitch by Rory Freedman and Kim Barnouin. It was a bluntly factual book about the significant harm a diet rich in animal products causes, and it stated that a well-executed vegan diet is the healthiest diet that contributes most to a healthy and prosperous environment, free of any cruelty. There is a negative stereotype of vegans circulating the web, yet they live among us as athletes, authors, teachers, celebrities and people you know. 


Vegan living provides a fulfilling diet for the betterment of the future and our communities. It's become a very normal way to live.  After lots more research and confirmation of facts, I made the decision to go vegan; the creation of Intake followed suit. Intake is not asking you to claim that you are a vegan right at this moment, but is simply providing you the opportunity to learn about the lifestyle and see how you like it!

Becoming a vegan is the best thing I have ever done for myself. The amount of energy I have, the lightness I feel in the morning, the ease of sleep, the glowing skin, the thick hair, the strong nails, the clarity to think easier, is all thanks to my diet free of animal products. Meat, eggs and dairy are not needed by the body contrary to what we may have been taught. Once you remove these things, you open up room for an abundance of plant based foods to come in and improve your life in ways you didn't even think possible. When I started eating healthier my severe acne cleared up but it wasn't until I went vegan that my skin healed so significantly that I feel comfortable not ever wearing the heavy make-up I used to before. I feel great, I am more confident in who I am than ever before, and I feel at peace knowing that I contributed no harm to feel this way. Once you get here, you have no desire to go back.

As more and more people begin to make the transition, businesses will respond with vegan options that will make being vegan even more accessible and affordable. It won't happen overnight, but little steps every day will make the biggest sustainable difference.

Timeline of Delivery


Risks & Challenges

Manufacturing delays are always a risk but with a strong logistics and operations manager, all details will be given full attention. We have allowed ample time in case of delays. 

I completed my Advanced Diploma at The Business School of Humber College. It has given me an in-depth understanding of how businesses are run from the ground up. I graduated with honors just as Intake was winning the funding money from the Dragon’s Den competition. I am a highly creative problem solver and I will use this skill to avoid potential setbacks and spin things for the better. Planning and research are no longer my hobbies; I have made these skills into my career.
