Let the people for whom you care the dearest know that change is here and there is a way to contribute right now.
Know that everything you buy casts a vote for the kind of society you want, so make your votes count from now on.
Contribute your ideas! Tell us if you have a great idea for a variation of Intake or a related product or service that you want!

We are choosing to crowdfund verses traditional investment strategies because the crowd is what is important to us, you, and everyone you know, on the same page, for change. Stay tuned for updates and new deals! 



FIT strives to stop the deterioration of the environment, remove cruelty from our food culture, and gain back the strength and benefits of our human bodies. All this can be achieved with a vegan diet (why vegan? read my story below). Intake guides you to make the best choices, which you’ll feel great about. We possess the versatility to partner with any company, product, or service that shares our same vision. Our communities will be built to carry the best options, available and affordable for all. 
It is simple really, we want to eat and live healthier; the key is planning. Planning and research is the hard part, but a program could efficiently do that for an individual, which is why we’re offering it to you. With your help we can put this program into action and help everyone achieve health at their own pace and taste.
This campaign is not just about getting Intake into stores. It is the first step in a long line of Intake product variations, planning programs, healthy living collaborations, and a major movement in the way we eat.













AND YOU ARE GOING TO LOVE IT



Intake was designed with today’s busy
lifestyle in mind. Intake educates on the
benefits of healthy eating and significantly simplifies the process to make
adapting your new habits into your previous schedule a breeze.
The photo below shows what Intake carries inside. It includes a grocery list of fresh ingredients, an assortment of dry ingredients, recipes, and tons of bonus content!You can make an entire day worth of meals for yourself and dinner for fourIntakes
takes the complications out of establishing a healthy lifestyle by providing
you with the plans, tools and the motivation for action so you don’t have to think; you can just do!  It takes the stress out of healthy eating while
providing a wholly nutritious diet, so you can live healthy, easy.Why Crowd Funding?I began this
campaign because I developed Intake, a product that will introduce you to a lifestyle
that is fulfilling, delicious, nutritious, easy to make, and cruelty-free. This
is an inclusive product for everyone because, put simply, everyone eats! I have
had a great response in my hometown; I even won the top prize of $12,000 in a
college run Dragon’s Den competition. My next step is to bring Intake into the
world (to you!), to expand into a variety of helpful products, planning
programs, and niche nutrition needs so everyone has the chance to experience the
benefits of enjoying life in a healthy body.FIT chose crowd-funding over conventional
strategies because the crowd is what is important to us: you and everyone you
know, on the same page, for change. What You are SupportingIntake
needs start-up funds to begin its journey to grocery shelves near you. All funding will go towards the mass processing and logistics of raw materials
required to produce Intake and fulfill your rewards! We will be purchasing raw materials, working with a manufacturer and logistics team, and marketing the product accordingly.We plan for large quantities of Intake, so that the price can be significantly lower
and more affordable for you. The more support we gain, the lower the price for you.My Intake



With the funds from this campaign, FIT will also launch into developing My Intake, a software that analyzes your current life, including where you need to be during the day, what foods you like/dislike, your goals, and more. It will create a plan of action for you that includes meal plans, exercise plans, lifestyle plans, product advice, and educational tools, indefinitely. Instead of apps that are just trackers, My Intake interacts with you throughout the day with helpful tips and reminders, scheduled for your day. It can be updated and changed to your evolving preferences at any time and it introduces you to new things every day rather than all at once. This is just one of the many endeavors FIT will embark upon to contribute to your success. 

Future Varieties
and Collaborations
The future
possibilities for Intake are endless. Currently there exists one variation of Intake, but FIT plans to develop multiple varieties
for different family sizes and food preferences, couples, college students,
seniors, and more. Intake has great advantage in that it has the versatility to
partner and collaborate with any product or service that shares our same vision
of a better tomorrow such as fitness services, nutrition services, personal care products, and at home tools. Intake plans to collaborate with as many existing
companies as possible to bring you more convenience in your journey.








You are a very
important part of making tomorrow a better place. Your positive actions will
influence the people in your life, creating a web from which the positive
action can travel freely. Your support today makes a statement that you
want a better tomorrow. You want a tomorrow filled with healthy, happy,
beneficial people who refrain from cruelty and harm. By supporting FIT today,
you claim…



"We will never have a perfect world, but it’s not romantic or naïve to work toward a better one" -Steven Pinker for Chipotle Artist Series


Today you can
claim to everyone you know that a better tomorrow is on the way and you have done your part to support
it.

My Name is Madeline

I had a poor diet as a child and suffered many health problems because of it. Since I was not gaining weight I did not associate my health problems with my diet, until I was 16 and my adult metabolism started to kick in, sparking a noticeable change in my weight. This caused a huge shift in my thinking, and slowly I began to change my eating habits to combat the effects of my old diet. Planning and research is like a hobby to me; every day I was learning something new and making little changes. It was a challenge to transition despite all the resources. I knew there had to be an easier way but I wasn't sure what that could be.  

One Year Later...

I attended an illustration class; the final project was to draw a cereal box or something found in a grocery store. The project sounded quite dull so to spice it up I decided to invent and draw a cool product that I would genuinely want to buy. I was transitioning into a healthy lifestyle and I love kits so I thought “What if there was a kit that had everything you needed for a healthy day?” As I was sketching, I was planning out the logistics in my head for fun and realized that this could actually help a lot of people, those who want to be healthier but don't know where to start. That very day I made the commitment to pursue what is now Intake, run by my corporation Flexible Integrated Tactics (FIT).


Two months into the research and development of Intake I stumbled upon a book called Skinny Bitch by Rory Freedman and Kim Barnouin. It was a bluntly factual book about the significant harm a diet rich in animal products causes, and it stated that a well-executed vegan diet is the healthiest diet that contributes most to a healthy and prosperous environment, free of any cruelty. There is a negative stereotype of vegans circulating the web, yet they live among us as athletes, authors, teachers, celebrities and people you know. 

Vegan living provides a fulfilling diet for the betterment of the future and our communities. It's become a very normal way to live.  After lots more research and confirmation of facts, I made the decision to go vegan; the creation of Intake followed suit. Intake is not asking you to claim that you are a vegan right at this moment, but is simply providing you the opportunity to learn about the lifestyle and see how you like it!
Becoming a vegan is the best thing I have ever done for myself. The amount of energy I have, the lightness I feel in the morning, the ease of sleep, the glowing skin, the thick hair, the strong nails, the clarity to think easier, is all thanks to my diet free of animal products. Meat, eggs and dairy are not needed by the body contrary to what we may have been taught. Once you remove these things, you open up room for an abundance of plant based foods to come in and improve your life in ways you didn't even think possible. When I started eating healthier my severe acne cleared up but it wasn't until I went vegan that my skin healed so significantly that I feel comfortable not ever wearing the heavy make-up I used to before. I feel great, I am more confident in who I am than ever before, and I feel at peace knowing that I contributed no harm to feel this way. Once you get here, you have no desire to go back.
As more and more people begin to make the transition, businesses will respond with vegan options that will make being vegan even more accessible and affordable. It won't happen overnight, but little steps every day will make the biggest sustainable difference.

Timeline of Delivery





Risks & Challenges



Manufacturing delays are always a risk but with a strong logistics and operations manager, all details will be given full attention. We have allowed ample time in case of delays. 
I completed my Advanced Diploma at The Business School of Humber College. It has given me an in-depth understanding of how businesses are run from the ground up. I graduated with honors just as Intake was winning the funding money from the Dragon’s Den competition. I am a highly creative problem solver and I will use this skill to avoid potential setbacks and spin things for the better. Planning and research are no longer my hobbies; I have made these skills into my career.

story:
We don't need 500eur for the project. In fact we need only 87eur but indiegogo doesn't allow such a small amount. Small amount yes...but we have a massive goals! Look, we all the same wrote a storytelling to convince you to give 1eur (or more)...

"Dirtiness. That is quite strange to introduce our new Kickstarter projet with this word but it is a hurdle that our Clean Schlager 3.0 overcome!

You can easily imagine this Sunday “morning” at 1:00 pm, you just woke up with a headache, your room is a real mess and you have no motivation. The point is that you want to do something productive during your day like cleaning… and the revolutionary Clean Schalger 3.0 is made for you. Amazing.  

The CS 3.0 is the connected vacuum cleaner whom starts running when the level of dirtiness is too high. The detection is made by the Flemmix laser technology. It is used in several businesses (anti-robber systems, supermarket check-outs…) and testified by an ISO standard. It is a soft detection laser unable to cut you. The vacuum works in silence so it allows you to sleep or to Netflix and chill. An ameliorated version will perhaps allow the user to select the percentage of cleanliness expected.  

But the CS 3.0 is more than a revolutionary vacuum! On its top you could put a saucepan to heat water for your noodles or your tea. An articulated arm could also take stuffs for you to avoid you to go out of your bed. We worked with Apple developers to settle the virtual assistant SIRI in the CS3.0. Thus, it could allow you to have a conversation with the vacuum if you don’t have any friends or to listen your morning music "Despacito". Thanks to our market studies and our strong knowledge of the laziness market, we know that the ideal prices will be around 15 and 15,10 eur. We need to build a first prototype to launch the mass media communication. Due to economy of scales that we can not do, the price of the test model will be quite high…that’s why we need you! By helping us to build the first model you’ll take part of the project and you’ll perhaps benefit from a 50% discount when you will order your first CS 3.0. Only the 100 first donations will allow to have this exceptional discount, let's go together now!  

Thanks to the Clean Schlager 3.0 your laziness won’t be an obstacle to your personal development and you could have fulfilled Sundays!  

Technical description:  

-> Circular size: 32,5cm  

-> Color: Grey, black and white with red dots  

-> Charging: by Duracell rabbit power 2000  

-> Weight: 2 grams without battery  

DEVELOPMENT OPPORTUNITIES  

Our core target are the lazy students . According to a serious American study, men rooms are 42% dirtier than women’s. That is why we will be more focused on men for our promotion. If the first models are well sold, we plan to move upmarket with an ameliorated multifunction vacuum. It will simplify the life of the lazy families!"

story:
This campaign has been canceled and orders refunded. See our updates for more information.

 

 



Explore the power of your instincts.


Transform the way you work, create, interact, and achieve, using your own nose. From revolutionary studies from Harvard and top universities1, we crowdsourced the first human pheromones for productivity: Focus.  Alpha testers used Focus, and reported powerful motivation, wakefulness, and lasting concentration for up to six hours. When you want the boosting effects to end, simply wash Focus off. Unlike pharmaceuticals or caffeine, you control when you feel the effects.

 


 

How does it work?

 

The active ingredients of 2-PEA and Vitamin D float into your nose, and onto the olfactory epithelium, to a particular "lock" called a TAAR. Mammals appear to have evolved some TAARs for the detection of the smell of predators.  Detection leads to the animals feeling alert, awake, and motivated. 2 We've repurposed that mechanism for productivity.  At the bottom of this page, we've got more research to share.
 

How to Use
Mist on your neck or wrists to trigger any sensations, then wash off when you're done. Easy.

 

When would I use Focus?
Focus is great whenever you want to be "in the zone." A great alternative to pre-workouts, productivity boosting supplements or chemicals for school or work, and even for musicians, or anyone involved in creative work. 
 
 

What We're Doing

 

We are raising funds on IndieGogo in order to conduct a clinical study for these exciting compounds and access manufacture space and resources in our home of Detroit.  Our backers will be the first to try this new class of technology.

 

It's time for alternatives.

 

  • 31% of U.S. College students claim to have used prescription stimulants as a study aid. These drugs are habit-forming, sometimes used illegally, and are expensive. 
  • Coffee and energy drinks are long-lasting, can interrupt sleep and users can become tolerant to their effects.
  • Smart drugs, also known as nootropics, are expensive, untested, risky, and poorly understood.

    We designed Focus to give others the most natural and human way to maximize your productivity and concentration.  it is far more accessible and affordable than any traditional productivity booster, and with the best safety profile: FDA GRAS status. 


What is a Pheromone?

 

A scent that can alter mood, behavior, or thoughts. We all have memories that are triggered by a scent, but the ability of pheromones goes even farther: Pheromones are a chemical message from one animal to another, that helps social groups coordinate and inform one another, where the brains of other animals automatically respond by changing behavior or motivation.  Our product Focus, uses our particular combination of scent signals to help you unlock your instinctual state for productivity.

 

See articles on the potential applications of human pheromones:

 

 

 

 

Our Key Ingredients To Encourage Concentration, Wakefulness and Motivation

 

  • 2-PEA, a communication compound already made by your body naturally and involved in happy mood hormones,
  • Vitamin D, an essential vitamin your skin makes in response to sunlight.

Plus a fresh, light, citrus scent in an ethanol carrier, just like cologne or perfume.  

 

Pheros is Just Getting Started

 

Focus is the first product we designed, but we’re ready to investigate more than 100 different pheromones in search of natural, safe, and controllable tools to help with anxiety, sleep, confidence, mood and social goals.

 

The Perks

 

For our core backers, we're offering three awesome rewards.

  • EARLY BIRD SPECIAL!: try a bottle of Focus (3ml). Each bottle contains 60 sprays, giving you a month of daily use. At our early-adopter level, that equals up to 6 hours of motivation, focus and wakefullness each day for $0.30. Beat that, Coffee!
     
  • Get Focused: a 3-pack of 3ml bottles of Focus for you and friends!
     
  • Pheros One (1 Year): You're ready to dive in.  Becoming a member of Pheros One means you'll be part of the cutting-edge crowdsourcing community that made Focus possible, helping push the technology farther, get early access to new products AND receive two complimentary bottles of any product we offer each month.

 

 

 

Learn more about the science of

TAAR and How Focus Works


 

“The evolutionary conservation of the TAAR family suggests a chemosensory function distinct from odorant receptors. Ligands identified for TAARs thus far suggest a function associated with the detection of social cues.”

Liberles, S.D. & Buck, L.B. A second class of chemosensory receptors in the olfactory epithelium. Nature 442, 645-650

 

"Chemosensory function involving recognition of volatile amines was proposed for murine TAAR3, TAAR4 and TAAR5. Humans can smell volatile amines despite carrying open reading frame (ORF) disruptions in TAAR3 and TAAR4."

Structural and Functional Evolution of the Trace Amine-Associated Receptors TAAR3, TAAR4 and TAAR5 in Primates Stäubert C, Böselt I, Bohnekamp J, Römpler H, Enard W, et al. (2010) Structural and Functional Evolution of the Trace Amine-Associated Receptors TAAR3, TAAR4 and TAAR5 in Primates. PLOS ONE 5(6): e11133.  

 

“Most TAARs, and particularly TAAR5, are selectively expressed in human OE (Olefactory Epithelium.) TAAR5 might play a significant functional role since it is known to be activated by trimethylamine, which is present in human secretions and has been implicated in behavioral responses.”

Carnicelli, V., Santoro, A., Sellari-Franceschini, S. et al. Chem. Percept. (2010) 3: 99. doi:10.1007/s12078-010-9075-z

 

If you can support us, we're ready to help you you achieve more; back this project at the top of the page.

 

 

* These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration.  This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease. 2-PEA and VITAMIN D is listed as GENERALLY REGARDED AS SAFE (GRAS) BY THE U.S. FDA.

story:
Revolutionizing Hockey

Like millions of fans worldwide, we love the great game of ice hockey, and Glo-Flite is the  culmination of our efforts to enhance the full experience for fellow spectators and players alike. 

Glo-Flite's patented technology provides:

  • Infrared goal detection the instant the puck fully crosses the goal line.
  • Customizable lighting of the goal posts.
  • Built-in performance tracking, such as velocity and goal shot mapping that can sync to a smart phone, tablet, or laptop.
  • Electronic puck charging pad.

 

Here's a look at our proof of concept prototype of the communication of sensors between goal post and puck:

 

 


Let's Do This

We want to make ice hockey even better, and with your support, we can!

  • Our team of engineers have successfully created and tested a proof of concept prototype.
  • We have obtained our US patent, and issuance has been granted by the Canadian Intellectual Property Office, by which Glo-Flite is officially patent-pending in Canada.
  • Now, we just need to build the next phase and battle-test Glo-Flite for production and NHL standards of perfection.
  • Not only will your help improve the game of hockey, but our grassroots supporters will be rewarded with great perks, such as a free puck-charging pad, and future discounts on the first Glo-Flite system.
  • We believe we can reach our goal with your support, and even if we don't, we will continue to pursue our passion to make Glo-Flite a true game changer for the entire hockey community.

 

The Time Has Come

Far too many hockey fans, broadcasters, and players have endured the frustration and confusion of not knowing when a goal has been scored. 

Even at the NHL level, instant replay has proven to be unreliable.  And outside of professional hockey, instant replay is simply not a practical solution.

We believe that every fan and participant in the game of ice hockey will benefit from our innovation.  Be part of this real and positive change!

Our Challenge

We just need your help in raising the funds to produce a full scale working prototype.  

Other Ways You Can Help

We believe it's so important for us to do this from the ground up with support of ice hockey fans like you.  No contribution is too small, and you can help support us by getting the word out and share our page with your friends and colleagues!

story:
Overview

 

ADIVA ONE is a highly efficient solution for inducing sleep and relaxation. It applies a slow, oscillating motion to your bed (i.e. get rocked to sleep like a baby), using an integrated and programmable motion control system.

 

It consists of four supporting legs that attach to most existing beds or sofas. ADIVA ONE facilitates the onset and depth of sleep, meaning that you will feel refreshed even if you slept fewer hours than usual.

 

A key feature of our product is the integrated sleep monitoring and control system. It enables the device to monitor and analyse user sleep cycles through motion detector sensors and it automatically adjusts oscillation speed and intensity to promote and maintain deep sleep.

 

ADIVA ONE is the result of four years of research and development, including designing and testing several prototypes to achieve a near-silent, silky-smooth operating, and durable product. Our final prototype was demonstrated at CES in Las Vegas this year.

 

 

Sleep’s New Best Friend

  • Four modular supporting legs
  • Control unit which synchronises the legs' motion
  • Remote Control
  • Two wired motion sensors to be clipped to the bed mattress
  • Smartphone App for advanced control
  • Alexa voice control 

 

 

 

 

 

 

To control ADIVA you can use the supplied remote control, as well as the Smartphone App or Amazon Alexa. Alexa will be given as a gift along with ADIVA ONE to all buyers, if the INDIEGOGO campaign surpasses 200k Euro.

There are three predefined programs (P1, P2, P3), associated to each mode:

  • Sleep (night programs)
  • Relaxation (day programs)

 

You can further customise each of these programs by using the supplied App and select one of the operation types:

  • Continuous oscillatory motion
  • Automated on/off motion switch, applicable only to Sleep programs. The bed motion is triggered by your sleep status, which is further derived from the two motion sensors that are clipped on the bed mattress.

You can tune each of the above operation types, through the following parameters:

  • Duration (e.g. Total operation time)
  • Motion Speed & Intensity
  • Suspend (Amount of time that the bed motion is still active after you fell asleep. This parameter is applicable only for the Automated on/off motion switch program; further explanations below).

Finally, we encourage you to use Alexa or the Remote control for controlling ADIVA ONE rather than the smartphone App, thus avoiding the smartphone screen blue light before going to sleep.

 

Automated on/off motion switch

Given that each individual has a different sensitivity for the oscillatory motion and obviously you don't want to overdo that, we advise you to use the automated mode. ADIVA ONE senses your sleep status over a period of time, and based on that the bed motion is turned automatically on or off.

When you get asleep, meaning that you are no longer moving, ADIVA ONE’s motion controller turns off the bed motion after the programable Suspend  time has elapsed. Likewise if you wake up during the night and you start turning or moving on the bed, the bed oscillatory motion will again be automatically turned on.

Additionally ADIVA ONE will learn over a period of time (e.g. a couple of nights) your individual sleep cycles and adapt the bed motion patterns, in order to keep you as much as possible into a deep sleep. You can further tune this feature, by biasing the decisions taken by the device. Note: This feature is most effective for a single user, and could be disabled when there are two bed occupants.

 

Motion sensors

The motion sensors are meant to be clipped on each side of the mattress. It is possible to disable any of them through the Smartphone App, in the case you share a double bed with a partner and he or she doesn't want to get the bed motion triggered by his or her sleep status.

 

 

 

 

 

ADIVA ONE comes in five standard colors: Grey, Beige, White, Brown & Black, that you will select at checkout.

If you wish a custom color and finish for your new bed legs, you can order that as an additional option at the checkout. We will contact you to inquire about your color selection and finish at the end of the campaign. You could send us either a photo which shows your desired color, or the color code. We will make sure that you are pleased with the result, by sending you a picture with the legs, before they are shipped to you.

 

 

 

 

A research study made by the Sleep Laboratory at the Geneva University Hospital in Switzerland demonstrates the beneficial effects of the slow oscillatory motion for improving sleep onset, quality, and depth, by using a slow rocking bed.

 

 

Dr. Michel Muhlethaler, co-author of this study concluded in an interview: “We observed a faster transition to sleep in each and every subject in the swaying condition.” He also highlighted another key benefit of sleeping on a gentle swinging bed: “It’s not just that you go faster to sleep, but also while you sleep, your sleep is deeper”.

 

Another recent study made by the same team concludes that:

  • Rocking boosts deep sleep, sleep maintenance, and memory in healthy sleepers
  • Fast spindles increase during rocking and synchronize with the slow oscillation up-state
  • Rocking-induced overnight memory improvement relates to increased sigma activity
  • Continuous rocking stimulation actively entrains intrinsic sleep oscillations

 

These results provide a strong scientific support to the traditional belief that rocking can soothe our sleep, and produce a calming effect.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 
Note: For your convenience, some of the information in the video above is inlined in the following section.
 
 
 

 

 

 

If you are not sure whether it is possible to attach ADIVA ONE to you bed, please send us an email at: inquiries@adiva.co by attaching a picture with your bed, and we will do our best to advise you.

Also we will be happy to support you over Skype or Hangouts when you do the installation. In the meantime please don’t hesitate to contact us with any questions.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

ADIVA ONE is as complex as the drive train of a four wheel drive electric car. It uses high quality silent servomotors and proprietary FOC controllers, one pair for each leg.

We developed our technology using the finest quality custom manufactured electro-mechanical components to produce a gentle and whisper-quiet motion. The only noise produced by the system comes from the bearings, which is negligible.

 

Electrical:

  • Operating power consumption range (load dependent): from 20 W for a single bed, to 50 W for a very large Californian bed
  • Standby power consumption: 4 W
  • FOC servo controllers, proprietary technology
  • WIFI, Bluetooth connections
  • AC/DC Power Supply Unit: 12V, 60W

 

Mechanical:

  • Legs robust stainless steel design, to support a bed including the occupants weighing up to 1000kg / 2200lbs
  • Motion oscillation range: 4 cm / 1.6”
  • Whisper quiet 20dBA actuators
  • Leg weight: 7.5 kg / 16.5 lbs; Legs total weight (*4 units): 30 Kg / 66 lbs
  • Leg dimensions: 23.7 cm (L) * 11.8 cm (W) * 14.7 cm (H)  / 9.5 in (L) * 4.5 in (W) * 6 in (H)
  • Leg flat surface support: 28.8 cm (L) * 12.6 cm (W)  / 11.4 in (L) * 5 in (W)
  • Packaged Weight: Comes in two boxes each weighing 17.5 kg / 38.5 lbs
  • Packaged Dimensions: Each box size: 48 cm x 32 cm x 25 cm / 19 in x 12.5 in x 10 in

 

 

 

ADIVA ONE will be manufactured in Europe.

It will ship worldwide through TNT, the cost varying by country at check out, from 90 to 270 Euro. Shipping cost heavily depends upon the number of orders from a specific region/country. More orders from a region will reduce the shipping cost per unit, and therefore any balance amount from the shipping charge will be refunded once the campaign ends.

 

 

 

A good night’s sleep is more than just the best way to end the day; it’s the foundation for a healthy, happy life.

We are passionate about using technology to drive change in the world of sleep, and we are excited to have you onboard as we make it happen. Thank youfor backing us!

story:
#BeChivalrous:

"Marked by honor, generosity, and courtesy."* 

Might we add "courage"? It takes courage to be chivalrous, to consider others just as valuable as you are. Here is where we make our greatest impact in the world. 

#BeChivalrous towards your fellow humans who live in rural and remote areas and need better access to a doctor.  Hold open the door to a doctor's appointment.

We are Jermaine and Alana McFarlane and we take chivalry seriously. Jermaine is a general practitioner, or GP (think family doctor). Alana worked in emergency medical services for several years.  Two and a half years ago, we took our family to the Guyana jungle hoping to have an effect on healthcare for one Amerindian village, and ended up with a bigger adventure than we bargained for. Because of our willingness to be chivalrous, change was inevitable.

Now, we're building on our years of knowledge and experience to bring a solution to our home country, Jamaica. Our company,QuikClinik Telehealth Services, or QuikClinik, is our vehicle for bridging the gap in access to physician care. You can help us open our pilot telemedicine clinic in a rural community. We've gotten 95% there. Will you help us with the other 5%?

Become a part of a legacy that impacts because it loves.

*"Chivalrous." Merriam-Webster.com. Merriam-Webster, n.d. Web. 19 Apr. 2016.

Our Needs 

The funds raised will go towards allowing us to travel to Little London where we will spend two weeks. During this time we will:

  • Finalize the clinic set-up: technical aspects like robust internet connectivity, functional aspects like stairs or a ramp up to the front door, aesthetic aspects like cleaning up the yard. 
  • Have outreach activities in the community for them to get to know us better and vice versa, and to further educate persons about the service.
  • Complete our attendant's training.
  • Open the doors for patients to be seen.

How We Say Thanks to You

Please see our list of perks on the sidebar.
Other Ways You Can Help

Remember that even if you don't have money to contribute, you can still influence the success of this campaign.  You can share it with the persons in your network via social media, email, instant messaging, or good ole word-of-mouth.

About Little London

A little video to give you a visual for our pilot:

story:
Explore 48 Powerful Habits

Each card suggests the best time for the exercise, with some that are applicable throughout the whole day. Cards consist of activity title, description and benefits for each offered habit.

 

 

 



 

Diversity Of Habits

Each habit is designed for everyone and does not require any device to perform

           


Multiple Ways To Use

You can try the cards one by one each day or you can start by mastering just one card until you`re ready to take another one. You can take it easy or you can go all the way. Use the cards the way you want.
 


 

 

Benefits In Daily Life

Develop your inner qualities and make a difference in every life situation.

Technology Behind The Cards

Our life already consist of habits that are routine things we do every day and forget to pay attention to. Common actions and situations can consume a lot of energy that often times we do not notice.

With habit cards you can become more aware of those energy draining habits and change them to ones that accumulate energy.

 

Create Your Own Habit Plan

It`s easier to plan ahead with Habit Planner. You can follow your own schedule and check the progress in the process. A digital format will be available so you can print more when you need it.


 

General Information
 


 

Why Cards? Personal Story.

Welcome!

Thank you for checking out the CURRENT Habit Cards!

These cards were made after years of trial, looking for ways to improve my understanding of body and mind mechanics. Each habit has been or is part of my life and has brought powerful awareness of what a human being is and can do.

These habits are essentially about our inner world. They are useful tools that can provide much needed awareness about our body and being. It is a great mystery that a human can create a computer, but miss the opportunity to understand the computer behind it - the human body and mind. A body that breaths, recycles, heals, moves and even thinks without your assistance. Still you call it yours.

The story behind is my journey towards maturing and growing as a human being, becoming aware of that inner onion with so many layers.

         

Follow and Share CURRENT events on Facebook
Follow and Share CURRENT events on Twitter
www.justcurrent.com

 

THE CURRENT PACKAGE

story:
Avoiding the dangers of shared pillows

In today’s world travel whether for business or pleasure, is a constant and ever growing phenomenon. So too is the threat and spread of new diseases. One simple way to reduce the risk is by choosing to travel using a personal pillow, and avoiding those shared by thousands of other travelers.

What is a PneumaPure Travel Pillow ?

 

PneumaPure Travel Pillow is the world’s cleanest pillow, bringing you the most comfort, convenience, and cleanliness as you travel.

State-of-the-art filter ensures your pillow is always sanitized.
The PneumaPure Travel Pillow is crafted using liquid-proof, breathable, and functional fabric, so that you no longer have to worry about germs, spills, and sweat.

 

What is inside?

New generation foam is used to guarantee proper spinal alignment for maximum relaxation and comfort.

HER Pillow- filling is super soft foam

The crowds, the sights, the sounds—a new country is a whole new world to explore. You try on new clothes, you dance with abandon in the hazy light of the setting sun. And when your feet are sore and your eyes tired, you know at least you’ll sleep comfortably.​

HIS Pillow- filling is medium firm foam

The great outdoors are always ready to be explored by the bravest adventurers. Whether you’re in the middle of majestic mountains capped with snow or a forest where the trees stretch around you for miles, you love nature’s beauty. But night falls no matter where you are, so be prepared.

You Travel for Business?

It’s a new city, but still the same work. You’re jetted around on a plane and then you’re stuck in meetings all day, with hardly a moment to explore, to enjoy yourself. But the next morning you’ll wake up ready for anything because of your comfortable and convenient night’s rest.

Problem

 

Infections (Dangers) that Pillows May Transmit

 

Bed linens can indeed be sources of infection; so too can pillows. Linens in hotel rooms get washed and sanitized between users but pillows do not. And what about those pillows offered on airlines during long flights? Should you use them?

Studies supported by health authorities proved pillows carried such viruses and bacteria as E. Coli, MRSA, and flu. We know many of these illnesses exist outside the hospital settings today.

 

Why are pillows a source for infection?

Pillows that are shared on a regular basis, such as those offered on long distance air flights and in hotel rooms across the globe often have a life span far beyond what manufacturers recommend. Pillows have small holes in them where needles pierced the material during the sewing process, plus over time they do develop rips and tears; and some pillows are created using materials that have a wide weave. Minute as they may seem all of these holes are a place for bacteria and other contaminates to enter and live within the construct materials.

Fungal spores can also live within a pillow, a food source for dust mites. Sharing a pillow used by many hundreds of other people can easily become a perfect place for fungus to grow. This makes travel seriously difficult for allergy sufferers.

 

How do contaminants get in to a pillow?

Whether they admit it or not many people drool when they sleep. If a person is ill, whether actively or not, their saliva can soak through the pillow case and in to the pillow material itself. Saliva can contain any number of infectious agents that can seep through the pillow case and in to the pillows material.

If the last person to use a pillow had been ill and vomiting trace amounts of vomitus may still remain in their saliva, introducing still other types of bacteria or viral contaminants in to the pillow.

Sweat and other bodily fluids are other means by which contaminants can be left behind and absorbed in to the base material of a pillow.

World travel is so easy, and necessary in today’s global atmosphere. So exposure to a huge range of viral and bacterial contagions is possible.

The Science

PneumaPure Technology is the intelligent application of a liquid- proof filter mechanism to a cushioning product – a pillow, duvet, mattress and cushion.
The filter is a liquid-proof nano-porous composite; it is hydrophobic and acts as a breathable barrier. In effect, the PneumaPure filter prevents the passage of liquid and air borne pathogens to the interior of the product, whilst allowing the product to breathe. (Air transport in and out of the product is essential to allow proper shaping and draping to the patient). PneumaPure Technology is proven to be highly effective in preventing the ingress of pathogens e.g. MRSA, Norovirus, C. diff, E. coli, etc. to the interior of a bedding product.

 

 

Who is Gabriel Scientific?

Gabriel Scientific is an award winning life sciences company. The company has addressed the significant risk posed to Safe Patient Environments through the invention of the PneumaPure range of barrier bedding.
Having created medical grade bedding and pillows to aid in the processes of infection control, we now expanding our line to include caring for the health and safety of consumers outside health care settings.

If a person is ill, whether actively or not, their saliva can soak through the pillow case and in to the pillow material itself. Saliva can contain any number of infectious agents that can seep through the pillow case and in to the pillows material.If the last person to use a pillow had been ill and vomiting trace amounts of vomitus may still remain in their saliva, introducing still other types of bacteria or viral contaminants in to the pillow.Sweat and other bodily fluids are other means by which contaminants can be left behind and absorbed in to the base material of a pillow.World travel is so easy, and necessary in today’s global atmosphere. So exposure to a huge range of viral and bacterial contagions is possible.The SciencePneumaPure Technology is the intelligent application of a liquid- proof filter mechanism to a cushioning product – a pillow, duvet, mattress and cushion.The filter is a liquid-proof nano-porous composite; it is hydrophobic and acts as a breathable barrier. In effect, the PneumaPure filter prevents the passage of liquid and air borne pathogens to the interior of the product, whilst allowing the product to breathe. (Air transport in and out of the product is essential to allow proper shaping and draping to the patient). PneumaPure Technology is proven to be highly effective in preventing the ingress of pathogens e.g. MRSA, Norovirus, C. diff, E. coli, etc. to the interior of a bedding product.  Who is Gabriel Scientific?Gabriel Scientific is an award winning life sciences company. The company has addressed the significant risk posed to Safe Patient Environments through the invention of the PneumaPure range of barrier bedding.Having created medical grade bedding and pillows to aid in the processes of infection control, we now expanding our line to include caring for the health and safety of consumers outside health care settings.

story:
Happy to meet you 

Hi, I'm Ossi, mother of three and the co-founder of Snoof. I held  key creative positions in leading advertising agencies such as BBDO and Saatchi&Saatchi as a copywriter and creative manager. I’m Self-employed since 2002, consultant, branding & marketing strategy expert and entrepreneur. In the last 2 years, I have dedicated my time to the development of Snoof with a great group of talented people I gathered around me. We all share a deep belief that Snoof resolves an unsolved issue that bothers millions of people.

 

100% Natural 100% Makes Sense  

The beneficial virtues of essential oils have been studied, recognized and made use of for centuries. Leading international cosmetics companies are currently using essential oils to improve and enrich their products. There are hundreds of shampoos and conditioners consisting of essential oils for the purpose of maintaining hair hygiene…

So it just makes sense to create essential oil scented hair accessories

 

The Breakthrough

Coming up with a good idea is wonderful, but isn’t enough to create a good working product. We needed a significant breakthrough in order to resolve the quick evaporation of the ethereal oils on one hand and to avoid oil dripping on the other.  The chemist who developed Snoof’s formula, found a solution. She solidified the essential oils, into a slow releasing formula, allowing scents to spread in a stable and efficient manner, over a period of three months.      

 

 

Labs tests proved

 

Since essential oils had been proved to be highly effective to prevent lice infestation, 

And there are hundreds of shampoos and conditioners consisting of essential oils for the purpose of maintaining hair hygiene

All we had to do is prove that our formula is effective and emitting evenly essential oil scent for over 12 weeks. 

We have conducted extensive examination with independent company that confirm the effectiveness of our formula

 

                                       

The Snoof Vision

With your help, soon Snoof will become a basic consumer product. A whole new and exciting category of scented hair accessories. The real need, the constantly updated collections for different ages, the pleasant scents and the long lasting efficiency would certainly be an attraction to women, parents and children all over the world.

 

100% Natural. 100% Benefit.

.We use top quality essential oils in order to optimize their holistic health benefits

 

 Rosemary  

A renowned medicinal plant used by healers for centuries.                                                                 Rosemary oil is commonly used to sharpen memory and improve concentration due to its ability of brain stimulation. By increasing the blood flow, Rosemary stimulates a clearer thought process consequently improving learning abilities. Rosemary oil nurtures the hair, helps the hair appear healthier and improves hair growth by increasing the blood flow to the scalp and oxygen supply to the roots of the hair. In natural cosmetics, Rosemary oil is used as a head lice repellent, disinfectant, dandruff treatment, as well as a hair grooming and renewal product.

 

Citronella  

Citronella is Known as an effective insects’ repellent, with its pungent, citrus scent.         Citronella oil has a warming effect in addition to its anti-fungal and anti-inflammatory properties. Citronella is often added to a variety of personal care and cleaning products.     Sprays, lotions, sunscreen, wristbands, and flea collars often contains Citronella due to its anti fungal properties. Citronella oil is also used to help heal insect bite.

 

Tea Tree   

The most widely used and studied oil in the world.                                                                                           Tea tree oil can be applied to the skin directly. Tea tree oil can be used to treat various conditions including, tinea versicolor, dry and moist eczema, cuts, mosquito bites, lice, etc. Tea tree oil can also be used to treat allergy related irritations as well as scalp irritations. It is recommended to add a few drops of oil to your natural shampoo and wash without conditioner.

 

Lavender  

Lavender oil is one of the safest oils available. It can be applied directly onto the skin. It is commonly used to treat and calm the nervous system, create a balance between thoughts and emotions, and heal skin burns, cuts and bites. Every household would benefit from having lavender oil for first aid purposes. Lavender is also used as an effective treatment for insomnia (by placing a few drops of the oil on your blanket or pillow), as well as for the treatment of damaged skin tissue; it speeds up the healing process and prevents inflammation. In cosmetics, lavender oil is used in creams, ointments for damaged and tired skin, and as acne and burns treatment. Lavender is known as an insect and lice repellent and is suitable for all skin types and sensitivities.

 

 

FAQ's       

How does it work?

Rosemary, Tea Tree, Lavender and Citronella are essential oils renowned for their insects repelling properties, in particular lice. Snoof’s laboratories has developed a unique formula allowing the gradual release of pure essential oils from our gorgeously designed hair accessories, over a period of three months!

Will others be able to smell my daughter’s Snoof accessories?

Snoof’s hair products were developed and designed to allow a pleasant rather than an overwhelming odour of essential oils; furthermore, these scents are distributed evenly across the head. If you closely smell your child’s head, you will notice the oil fragrance.  It should be noted that unlike other oils in the current market, Snoof’s scents are pleasant and gentle; ensuring your kids themselves enjoy and want to wear our accessories.

Can a long-term use of Snoof's products be harmful?

Absolutely not. The amount of oil in Snoof’s accessories is sufficient to maintain head hygiene and will not cause any harm to your child. Our unique design allows the accessories to distribute the essential oils scents across the hair gradually and evenly. Those who wear Snoof’s accessories will not necessarily notice the scent . Another important fact is that Snoof oils do NOT come into contact with the scalp and hair to ensure the utmost safety.

What about the boys? Are there Snoof's accessories for them too?

Snoof helps boys too… but indirectly. It turns out that there are 50% fewer cases of boys affected by head lice relative to girls, so naturally if girls are protected, the number of head lice cases among boys will simultaneously significantly drop. Additionally, we are working on creating a unisex collection of hair accessories suitable for both boys and girls. 

Are some of the scents more effective than the others?

No.  All of Snoof’s oils are equally effective in maintaining the head hygiene, so you can simply pick your favorite scent and color.

Is one ponytail holder enough to maintain head hygiene?

One ponytail holder highly reduces the chance for future infestation. However, for best results use more accessories. For ultimate protection, Snoof recommends the use of at least two small accessories, or a large accessory with a small accessory; for instance: a ponytail holder and a hairpin; two ponytail holders etc.

I am a mother who got infected with lice from my children; does Snoof have any solution for me?

Definitely. We thought about you and also about teachers and child minders with this precise issue. Snoof’s hairclip was designed especially for you – mothers, teachers and child minders. Snoof’s hair clips are strong, durable, fabulously designed and available in a variety of colours. 

What happens three months after opening the product?

As long as the product is sealed in its original packaging – the scents are not activated. Once you open the package, Snoof’s accessory begins to spread the scent of oils. After three months, the scent will become less noticeable. As Snoof’s hair accessories are of the highest quality and extremely pretty, you will be able to continue using them as “regular” accessories. 

What happens if Snoof accessories get wet?

Don't worry, your accessories will still repell lice. However, we do recommend you remove Snoof accessories before showering or swimming as water may enter the accessories and leak.

What happens if I use Snoof while having a lice infestation?

Not much... Snoof is a preventative measure, not a  treatment. In order to get rid of the lice you should use lice treatment and once your head is lice free, wear Snoof accessories to prevent further infestations. 

How can we maintain the longevity of Snoof’s products?

By keeping Snoof’s hair accessories in a closed box when they are not in use, you will extend the longevity of Snoof’s products.

Do Snoof oils have any other effect, besides maintaining head hygiene?

Yes. For instance, Rosemary oil also improves memory and increases concentration; Lavender has a calming effect on the nervous system etc. However, as Snoof’s accessories designed to spread their scents in the direction of the scalp and in-between the hair, these effects will be less noticeable.

Are Snoof’s accessories safe for children of all ages?

Yes. Snoof’s hair accessories are safe for all ages, however, to prevent choking, we recommend using Snoof’s products for children over the age of 3.

 

The Snoof Time Line

 

 

 

 

PERKS

story:
Hi. My name is Charles Johnson, I am a 45 years old fitness instructor ( 7 years strong ) who is passionate about fitness and helping others to becoming a better version of themselves, particularly ones who are in or around my age group because as we get older, our metabolism slows down and exercise and proper diets is key to healthy living.  This is the reason why I launched this campaign "Hotel Fitness Gurus" with our slogan "Fitness Experts, At Your Service" here on Indiegogo because I wanted to find a platform that would allow me to pitch my idea effectively to raise funds needed the further work on my business concept where we connect passionate fitness professionals with  On-the Go health and fitness conscious guests looking for a real-life personal fitness professional to help keep them on task with their workout session in real time during their getaway at their favorite hotel, resort,etc. either on business or leisure travel.

Picture this scenario below:

IMAGINE- You're an entrepreneur going on a business trip or maybe you're planning a trip with the family for your family vacation . Either case, you plan to book your room at a nice hotel, perhaps at the Hilton hotel in Nashville, TN. As you make your search on various websites you find the perfect hotel at the right price with a room with a view that you also noticed has a very nice State-of-The-Art Fitness Center in addition to the "miniature fitness center" located right in your room called "Five Feet to Fitness", Hilton's new in-room Fitness Kiosk as part of their larger wellness experience, equipped with all the bells and whistles ( See Photo Gallery ). You book the room and discover that you don't have a clue how you use the equipment and  after calling their technical engineer on staff  to help you to make sense of it, he shows you how to use the equipment and leaves you watching a PiYo instructor on a monitor. So, after 10 mins. you give up feeling frustrated...this is your first time trying PiYo and her moves are too complicated for you as a beginner. You try to switch to another program and you can't because you forgot how to operate the equipment. So, now you simply try using the kettle bells provided, but never done it before and doing pull-ups ( Are you kidding me ) is simply out of the question. You feel lost, confused and since you selected that room because of the in room "fitness center" kiosk ( Five Feet to Fitness ) you feel short-changed! "If only I had my very own real-life personal fitness consultant to help me out ... to answer my personal questions (if I had any )and not some pre-recorded  generic message... Someone who can provide individualized coaching specifically for me and my needs as a beginner taking PiYo  for the first time. I need to be motivated even pushed in my workout sessions. And I just like that human touch from time to time, like a warm friendly smile, a handshake, or even a hug and someone rewarding me with a genuine heartfelt commendation like " Job well done...Thank you, have a nice day! "  and etc."  I am sure each of you can relate to at least one of these concerns, right? 

 

Perhaps the scenario above is how you felt when you worked out at the fitness center in the hotel  you  stayed at during your  business trip or perhaps that holiday excursion you went on a few months back. You love the idea of  the freedom of working out at 1 am or 3 am undisturbed, but afraid to try out the weights, because you need a spotter. Let's face it, other than staff to provide water, clean towels or head phones ( if applicable ) there IS no support system for hotel guests utilizing their fitness centers and equipment and definitely no real-life support staff waiting to serve you 24/7 should you need them, UNLESS you are rich and famous. Hotel Fitness Gurus was created to address this problem...thus making it possible for everyone  to have the opportunity to have their very own real-life personal  fitness"concierge"  attentive to their needs only in real time. Let us make your fitness experience PERSONAL! So, whether you are just looking for a work out buddy or someone who can  show you Yoga breathing techniques,etc. You pick what type of real-life fitness coach you want ( whether someone skilled in a specific area  of expertise such as Yoga or merely someone who is there to keep you on task ), You schedule the time, select the length of  your session,( whether it is 30 mins or 1 hour, etc.) and leave the rest to us. And unlike a fitness app or fitness program downloaded  digitally to your  phone, portable laptop, tablet, etc. a real-life person  can address your needs in real time....try doing that with a  generic one size fits all digital workout program. Let's face it, with everything going digital or automated nowadays, it is refreshing to speak and interact with a real-life person. Not to mention, "Have you ever made a call to speak with someone on customer service and you keep having to push buttons and never get a chance to talk to a real-life person specifically about your issues?" It can be very frustrating. Ask yourself...Why is it that a celebrity or an professional athlete hires a real-life personal trainer or fitness professional when preparing for a role or a game? Because other than workout techniques, they too need motivation and encouragement, right? And chances are they may have a library of digitally downloaded workout programs from the likes such as Tony Horton, Charlene Johnson, and the so forth BUT having a real-life personal trainer to help them in real time to stay on task  beats the alternative. So, whatever your reason is, having a  real-life personal  fitness "concierge" is a win-win situation for you and hotel staff alike who want to see you ( the customer )happy during your stay with them. So whether you are looking to engage in an intense workout like HIIT or something more relaxing like Yoga , having  your real-life personal  fitness concierge by your side in real time makes your workout experience  personable whether indoors ,outdoors, on your balcony, or in the privacy of your room. Your time is important and when you reserve your very own  real-life personal fitness "concierge"  there is no need to worry about someone interrupting  your private session. It is your time to utilize it as you see fit.  One of the perks of having your very own  real-life personal fitness concierge  is the ability to reserve any machine you want to use during your session with the hotel in advance so there's no need to wait. (  Equipment reserve services is at the discretion of  management of participating hotels, resorts, etc. ) 

So, you may ask " How are the Hotel Fitness Gurus paid?" Are they considered a part of the staff of your favorite hotel or resort?  Are they allowed to receive tips?

Well, the idea is convenience so we devised that it should be easy for  team members to be paid for their services performed. Here is our strategy: We will launch a test group of 3 or 4 hotels and a select group of both fitness professionals and team members to serve as personal fitness consultants or concierges ( attendants )for a period of 30 days and implement the following :

When a  future guest of a participating hotel makes a reservation and decides to  reserve one of our real-life personal fitness consultants,they will be  given the opportunity to charge it to major credit card or directly bill it to their room through the hotel itself. We get paid through the Hotel /Resort. Our clients ( hotel guests ) are not required to bring their credit card/ debit card  or any personal effects other then what is needed for their workout session, perhaps water, a towel, yoga mat, etc.  We then in turn pay our team members as part of our test group for services rendered  by downloading their  wages directly into their checking/saving account  immediately after services are rendered and invoiced to client whether it is directly to the guest themselves or charged to the hotel where they are staying. Our strategy is to implement a commission program in our to encourage hotel/resorts to get on board in promoting our services to their future clients by promoting our services on their social media pages like Facebook, Twitter, etc. or on their official company websites. Other methods may include direct selling at the front desk upon check in, live chats on the computer or On the phone. 

All fitness consultants or instructors are to be considered independent contractors  working for Hotel Fitness Gurus, and not as employees of the Hotel/Resort in which they are assigned to service a client ( guest ). All independent contractors of Hotel Fitness Gurus are not to solicit tips, gifts, or favors from any client they may serve as their personal fitness"concierge", however, their clients may, on their own free will, give a tip as a token of their appreciation, and I believe this will increase morale and encourage others to always look towards providing the best service possible to each and every client...making them feel like a VIP.

Lastly, Our strategy is to target hotels, resorts, Bed/Breakfasts, Casino-Resorts, etc. with fitness centers as our initial niche market, thus targeting groups of people who are wellness and fitness minded, longevity seekers looking for a personal experience unlike any other offered in the Hotel fitness industry. Our target audience is those who want a real-life personal fitness coach who can provide services specific to their needs in real time and not a generic fitness program previously recorded and downloaded through an App on their tablet, Android, Apple IPhone, etc. We want to break away from the current trend and bring back the personal experience...Again.

Does the above sound appealing to you?  With your support I can further my work in building Hotel Fitness Gurus into a Brand recognized worldwide as a people helping people business through fitness in real time with real-life people...Professionals who is passionate about their craft and about helping others to obtain a better version of themselves one session at a time.

Thank you in advance for your support!  :)

Sincerely Yours,

Charles J

Hotel Fitness Gurus

P.S. We will offer opportunities for you to pre-order your personal fitness consultant/ concierges soon. Look for updates on my Facebook page here: Https://www.facebook.com/hotelfitnessgurus
