And I just like that human touch from time to time, like a warm friendly smile, a handshake, or even a hug and someone rewarding me with a genuine heartfelt commendation like " Job well done...Thank you, have a nice day! "  and etc."  I am sure each of you can relate to at least one of these concerns, right?  Perhaps the scenario above is how you felt when you worked out at the fitness center in the hotel  you  stayed at during your  business trip or perhaps that holiday excursion you went on a few months back. You love the idea of  the freedom of working out at 1 am or 3 am undisturbed, but afraid to try out the weights, because you need a spotter. Let's face it, other than staff to provide water, clean towels or head phones ( if applicable ) there IS no support system for hotel guests utilizing their fitness centers and equipment and definitely no real-life support staff waiting to serve you 24/7 should you need them, UNLESS you are rich and famous. Hotel Fitness Gurus was created to address this problem...thus making it possible for everyone  to have the opportunity to have their very own real-life personal  fitness"concierge"  attentive to their needs only in real time. Let us make your fitness experience PERSONAL! So, whether you are just looking for a work out buddy or someone who can  show you Yoga breathing techniques,etc. You pick what type of real-life fitness coach you want ( whether someone skilled in a specific area  of expertise such as Yoga or merely someone who is there to keep you on task ), You schedule the time, select the length of  your session,( whether it is 30 mins or 1 hour, etc.) and leave the rest to us. And unlike a fitness app or fitness program downloaded  digitally to your  phone, portable laptop, tablet, etc. a real-life person  can address your needs in real time....try doing that with a  generic one size fits all digital workout program. Let's face it, with everything going digital or automated nowadays, it is refreshing to speak and interact with a real-life person. Not to mention, "Have you ever made a call to speak with someone on customer service and you keep having to push buttons and never get a chance to talk to a real-life person specifically about your issues?" It can be very frustrating. Ask yourself...Why is it that a celebrity or an professional athlete hires a real-life personal trainer or fitness professional when preparing for a role or a game? Because other than workout techniques, they too need motivation and encouragement, right? And chances are they may have a library of digitally downloaded workout programs from the likes such as Tony Horton, Charlene Johnson, and the so forth BUT having a real-life personal trainer to help them in real time to stay on task  beats the alternative. So, whatever your reason is, having a  real-life personal  fitness "concierge" is a win-win situation for you and hotel staff alike who want to see you ( the customer )happy during your stay with them. So whether you are looking to engage in an intense workout like HIIT or something more relaxing like Yoga , having  your real-life personal  fitness concierge by your side in real time makes your workout experience  personable whether indoors ,outdoors, on your balcony, or in the privacy of your room. Your time is important and when you reserve your very own  real-life personal fitness "concierge"  there is no need to worry about someone interrupting  your private session. It is your time to utilize it as you see fit.  One of the perks of having your very own  real-life personal fitness concierge  is the ability to reserve any machine you want to use during your session with the hotel in advance so there's no need to wait. (  Equipment reserve services is at the discretion of  management of participating hotels, resorts, etc. ) So, you may ask " How are the Hotel Fitness Gurus paid?" Are they considered a part of the staff of your favorite hotel or resort?  Are they allowed to receive tips? Well, the idea is convenience so we devised that it should be easy for  team members to be paid for their services performed. Here is our strategy: We will launch a test group of 3 or 4 hotels and a select group of both fitness professionals and team members to serve as personal fitness consultants or concierges ( attendants )for a period of 30 days and implement the following :When a  future guest of a participating hotel makes a reservation and decides to  reserve one of our real-life personal fitness consultants,they will be  given the opportunity to charge it to major credit card or directly bill it to their room through the hotel itself. We get paid through the Hotel /Resort. Our clients ( hotel guests ) are not required to bring their credit card/ debit card  or any personal effects other then what is needed for their workout session, perhaps water, a towel, yoga mat, etc.  We then in turn pay our team members as part of our test group for services rendered  by downloading their  wages directly into their checking/saving account  immediately after services are rendered and invoiced to client whether it is directly to the guest themselves or charged to the hotel where they are staying. Our strategy is to implement a commission program in our to encourage hotel/resorts to get on board in promoting our services to their future clients by promoting our services on their social media pages like Facebook, Twitter, etc. or on their official company websites. Other methods may include direct selling at the front desk upon check in, live chats on the computer or On the phone. All fitness consultants or instructors are to be considered independent contractors  working for Hotel Fitness Gurus, and not as employees of the Hotel/Resort in which they are assigned to service a client ( guest ). All independent contractors of Hotel Fitness Gurus are not to solicit tips, gifts, or favors from any client they may serve as their personal fitness"concierge", however, their clients may, on their own free will, give a tip as a token of their appreciation, and I believe this will increase morale and encourage others to always look towards providing the best service possible to each and every client...making them feel like a VIP.Lastly, Our strategy is to target hotels, resorts, Bed/Breakfasts, Casino-Resorts, etc. with fitness centers as our initial niche market, thus targeting groups of people who are wellness and fitness minded, longevity seekers looking for a personal experience unlike any other offered in the Hotel fitness industry. Our target audience is those who want a real-life personal fitness coach who can provide services specific to their needs in real time and not a generic fitness program previously recorded and downloaded through an App on their tablet, Android, Apple IPhone, etc. We want to break away from the current trend and bring back the personal experience...Again.Does the above sound appealing to you?  With your support I can further my work in building Hotel Fitness Gurus into a Brand recognized worldwide as a people helping people business through fitness in real time with real-life people...Professionals who is passionate about their craft and about helping others to obtain a better version of themselves one session at a time. Thank you in advance for your support!  :)Sincerely Yours,Charles JHotel Fitness GurusP.S. We will offer opportunities for you to pre-order your personal fitness consultant/ concierges soon. Look for updates on my Facebook page here: Https://www.facebook.com/hotelfitnessgurus

story:
Forward

Annoying pollen, cat dander, ragweed allergy?  We know the feeling – you spend more time sneezing in tissues instead of enjoying the holiday BBQ!   Over-the-counter treatments such as Zyrtec, Xzyal, and Claritin have been tried one after the other.   These treatments are expensive.  Sometimes they work, other times they don’t.    

Next option?  Allergen therapy is available and administered by a doctor which works to familiarize your immune system with the agent for which you have sensitivity.  However, allergen therapy is administered through painful skin injections that require inconvenient weekly or monthly office visits. 

There is an easier way!  Researchers at Johns Hopkins Hospital in Baltimore, Maryland have recently published a study demonstrating the effectiveness of personalized medication compounds for allergen therapy.  These compounds are easily dropped under the tongue and self-administered at home.   Introducing…  “sublingual immunotherapy.”

Unfortunately, you may need to book a trip to Baltimore for this therapy today.  Your neighborhood pharmacies lack the time, resources, and expertise to compound sublingual immunotherapy.  

Phoenix Medicine will seize this critical patient care opportunity by partnering with your doctor to supply you with personalized compounded sublingual immunotherapy.  Phoenix Medicine will be the premier pharmacy serving patients across the United States that are ready to consider sublingual immunotherapy.

Sublingual immunotherapy is recommended from three to five years to sustain desensitization effects and prevent new allergy sensitization. After this therapy, it is not typical to need retreatment after the initial course for a period of 15 to 20 years, with some patients experiencing longer tolerance periods.

There are factors that might make sublingual immunotherapy not the best treatment option.  Your doctor and a Phoenix Medicine pharmacist will screen you for factors that may make the therapy non-responsive or unsafe.

 

In the News:

  • Statesman Journal: A World Without Allergies, Shot Free. Available from: https://www.statesmanjournal.com/story/life/2016/02/11/sublingual-immunotherapy-allergy-associates-la-crosse-treatment-allergychoices/79894224/
  • U.S. News and World Report: What to Know About Allergy Immunotherapy. Available from: https://health.usnews.com/health-care/for-better/articles/2018-05-23/what-to-know-about-allergy-immunotherapy
  • U.S. News and World Report: How to Treat Spring Allergies. Available from: https://health.usnews.com/health-care/for-better/articles/2018-04-16/how-to-treat-spring-allergies
  • U.S. News and World Report: What to Expect from Your First Allergist Appointment. Available from: https://health.usnews.com/health-care/for-better/articles/2016-10-26/what-to-expect-from-your-first-allergist-appointment

References

  1. Passalacqua, G., C. Lombardi, and G.W. Canonica, Sublingual immunotherapy: an update. CurrOpin Allergy ClinImmunol 2004; 4(1)
  2. Leatherman BD, Owen S, Parker M, et al. Sublingual immunotherapy: Past, present, paradigm for the future? A review of the literature. Otolaryngol Head Neck Surg 2007;136
  3. Juniper EF, Thompson AK, Ferrie PJ, et al. Development and validation of the Mini Rhinoconjunctivitis Quality of Life Questionnaire. Clinical and experimental allergy 2000; 30 (1)
  4. La Crosse Method, sublingual immunotherapy practice protocol, 2008. Allergychoices, inc La Crosse Wi.

 

Overall Funding

  • It is desired that Phoenix Medicine ($350,000 goal) is launched in December 2018 to offer sublingual immunotherapy to patients with quality standards. This will be fast-tracked with meeting our ultimate funding needs of $750,000 for full pharmacy implementation.

 

Fund Infusion Breakdown

Development, Pharmacy Build, & Materials (70% of funding goal): Our location, construction, and inventory carrying costs will constitute the bulk of expected expenses. We want to build a strong laboratory-like and regulation compliant facility to provide quality personalized medication compounds for allergen therapy.  We work closely with your doctor to understand your unique profile of allergen sensitivity.

Research & Development (5%): We want to continuously fuel innovation in health systems, hospitals, clinics, and other healthcare sectors by exploring needs to enhance sublingual immunotherapy available to treat and protect patients.

Interviews/Travel (5%): We will need to travel to spread the word about sublingual immunotherapy treatment.  Phoenix Medicine team members will deliver platform and poster presentations at national physician, nurse, and pharmacist organization conferences.

Advertising and Distribution (2%): The only way we will be able to make an impact with our company/product is to raise awareness.

Fundraising Fees (7%): Part of our funding will go to crowdfunding and credit card fees.

Legal (10%): Legal protocols and fees do apply when building a pharmacy to assure compliance and inspections are up to date to assure a successful opening.

Website Development (1%): An accessible website where interested patients can learn more about sublingual immunotherapy is desired. We want to provide resources that patients can use to become the expert in their therapy.

 

The Rewards

$5 donation: Honorable mention on our website for funding innovation in immunology treatments

$40 donation: All of the above + Newsletter updates of the access to quality therapy we are able to provide patients with clinical updates about advancements in the world of immunotherapy

$80 donation: All of the above + Immunotherapy Innovator inscribed pin

$100 donation: All of the above + Allergy desensitization consultation and potential referral

$120 donation: All of the above + First three months at no cost for start of allergen desensitization therapy for those that meet clinical criteria subsequent to a prescription from your allergist/immunologist ($270 value)

$500 donation: All of the above + Detailed mention on our website for funding innovation in immunology treatments with brief summary of your motivation for supporting groundbreaking access to care and treatment options for patients with allergen sensitivity

$1,000 donation: All of the above + free check-in visits with pharmacist clinician specialist staff for monitoring progress on therapy for the first year ($980 value for a year of visit savings + $270 value of 3 months of no cost therapy)

$10,000 donation: All of the above + Dedication wall mention within pharmacy

$15,000 donation: All of the above + Detailed dedication wall mention within pharmacy with a brief summary of your motivation for supporting groundbreaking access to care and treatment options for patients with allergen sensitivity

$30,000 donation: All of the above + Donation on your behalf to start a secure registry to better supply care providers information and history about a patient’s medical, medication, and allergy history

 

The Team

Megan is the Chief Executive Officer. Megan is focused on applying knowledge and skills learned to her practice focusing on developing and implementing innovative and progressive care setting the highest standards of practice. She is committed to improving access to care for patients and improving safety for patients in all settings. Previously, Megan founded, owned, and operated a long-term care pharmacy, which she sold to pursue residency training. During residency, Megan was able to work on many research projects, which is one of Megan's foremost interests, in discovering how to consistently improve quality and drive innovative practice. During her years at Roseman, she held two pharmacy intern positions concurrently at a 503B outsourcing pharmacy and community pharmacy while serving in multiple leadership capacities in student and professional organizations. Her interests include administration specifically concentrated in oncology, ambulatory care, and medication safety. Additionally, she is highly interested in research, academia, and advocacy. She also has completed ASHP’s Pharmacy Leadership Academy and is currently pursuing a Doctor of Business Administration.

Bryan is the Chief Operations Officer. Bryan earned his Pharm.D. at the University of Rhode Island, his M.S. in Social & Administrative Pharmacy at the University of Minnesota Twin Cities, and studied at the Loyola University Chicago Beazley Institute for Health Law and Policy.  He is very active in the Chicago health law community. Bryan has a decade of leadership experience in a variety of complex pharmacy practice environments including industry, community, and multiple leading academic medical centers across the country.

Aaron is the Chief Pharmacy Officer. He has led a national specialty and compounding pharmacy with a distinct role in founding an FDA-registered 503b/cGMP Outsourcing Facility with state-of-the-art technology, equipment, and processes. Aaron is focused on patient safety and regulatory compliance with expertise in stringent manufacturing controls, strict commitment to purity and integrity in compounded products.

Jake is the Chief Regulatory & Compliance Officer. Jake is recognized as a leader in pharmacy regulatory compliance. He consistently presents continuing education lectures on Federal and State Law at the Utah Pharmacists Association (UPhA) meetings. He additionally was a Pharmacy Inspector with progression to a Level 2 investigator at the Department of Occupational and Professional Licensing. Further, he was the Compliance Officer of a Class A Compounding Pharmacy, Director of Compliance at a 503A Compounding Facility, and the Director of Quality and Compliance at a 503B operation over the past 5 year period. He has additional experience in opening four compounding practices, a long-term care pharmacy, and both 503A and 503B pharmacies from scratch. He also serves as a Pharmacy Consultant for many pharmacies to aid them in becoming and maintaining compliance. He currently serves as well as has served for 5 years on Utah's Compounding Task Force, a sanctioned committee supported by the Utah State Board of Pharmacy. Jake currently serves as the Treasurer of the Executive UPhA Board and on the Board of Trustees. Jake also has presented educational training to Police Officers through the National Association of Drug Diversion Investigators (NADDI). Jake has a wealth of experiencing overseeing compliance aspects in a myriad of settings including cGMP, Federal and State regulations, USP regulations (specializing in USP 795 and 797).

 

Learn More

Phoenix Medicine firmly believes that our patients are an integral part of existence. This is why we work untiringly to assure our patients receive the best and most safe care possible. Apart from our foundational services, we also provide enhanced support and care for all we serve. From initialization of therapy until completion of care and beyond we stand by your side to assure you have someone helping you navigate the complexity that is the healthcare system.

Learn more about our company and commitment to quality and safety at PhoenixMedicine.org.

 

Share the Campaign

Please help us share this campaign by posting the link to social media and sending emails to people you think might be interested in scaling options available to patients that suffer from allergies and chronic immune-based symptomatic ailments for which allergies worsen response such as asthma. If you have any questions about the campaign or company, don't hesitate to e-mail me at pharmacy@phoenixinnovationgroup.com or contact us on Facebook (@PhoenixMedicinePharmacy or https://www.facebook.com/PhoenixMedicinePharmacy/).

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute at this time, we ask that you share our campaign to boost awareness of the importance of making allergen desensitization therapy possible.

story:
Solution for Urban Residents Who'd Love to Enjoy Healthy Rural Environment

We are a team of researchers, all with medical education and background, passionate to keep millions of families healthy.

"We probably could eliminate asthma in the world if everyone would put a cow in their house,
but we know that's not particularly practical" once said Carole Ober, a Chicago scientist who studied why Amish do not have asthma. Dr. Ober meant that it's not easy to recreate rural athmosphere which would contain dairy cow-associated microorganisms (which have been shown to reduce the risk of allergy and asthma).

Well, we put a cow in your house and it comes in a bottle and a tube (no animals harmed! :) ). Our products comprise extract (called lysate) of beneficial bacteria which maintains proper immune system function from the moment of birth in the natural environment of farmhouses and villages, like Amish communities. And it is also suitable for you if you have already developed allergy (see Disclaimer at the bottom). It's quite similar to a probiotic, if you'd wish a simple explanation.

For the further development and production scale-up we'll need to:

  • run some additional tests
  • update our equipment
  • improve the formulations
  • make a better design
  • go through the certification, international patents.

Classic investor scheme would substantially increase product prices and limit its availability to some people: that's why we started this Indiegogo campaign.

...Long ago, in May 1796, Edward Jenner pioneered the smallpox vaccine. He found a young dairymaid with fresh cowpox lesions on her hands and arms, took pus from the lesions and inoculated an 8-year-old boy. The child developed mild symptoms, including fever and loss of appetite, but he quickly recovered. A few months later, Jenner injected the boy with goo from a fresh smallpox lesion — the child developed no symptoms. 200 years later, cows give us another health option. Be involved!

What You and Other People Get With Our Products

  • Healthy environment from the moment of birth
  • Suitable for you if you already have allergy  or asthma (see Disclaimer at the bottom)

How It Is Achievable

  • Creme (emolient) and shampoo will provide the daily care for tender skin
  • Laundry detergent will make even your clothes more healthy
  • You will enjoy clean but healthy room by using carpet cleaner
  • Air spray will recreate scentless but healthy rural atmosphere in your house

 

How Does it Work? Science Behind the Product

 

 

Real Results

In a pilot clinical trial, skin emolient that contained M. vaccae lysate reduced the risk of atopic eczema development in newborns at 6 months by 60%. It also reduced allergy markers such as level of IgE antibodies to cow milk. These results were presented  at 2018 European Allergy and Clinical Immunology Congress.

The formulation that we are going to produce also contains M.vaccae lysate (see Disclaimer below).

 

The Story Will Continue

Mycobacterium vaccae is a wonderful microorganism. Actually, all microorganisms from the natural environment are wonderful.

For example, in a recent study, the possibility of prevention of a childhood leukemia in the presence of proper microbiota have been demonstrated. Your support will help us to elucidate new properties of M. vaccae and other microorganisms and to find new ways to help millions of people worlwide by creating healthy natural environment wherever they go.

Disclaimer: Not a drug or medical device, neither it contains active pharmaceutical or dangerous ingredients. No medical claims are made here, studies have been performed on a certain formulation containing individual ingredient. You may have heard of  cosmetics containing thermal water bacteria extracts (like Aquaphilus dolomiae extract or Vitreoscilla filiformis extract) which are still cosmetics, not anything else. Also, emolients are always recommended for atopic skin, however, they are still cosmetics, not a drug.

Dr. Ober meant that it's not easy to recreate rural athmosphere which would contain dairy cow-associated microorganisms (which have been shown to reduce the risk of allergy and asthma).
Well, we put a cow in your house and it comes in a bottle and a tube (no animals harmed! :) ). Our products comprise extract (called lysate) of beneficial bacteria which maintains proper immune system function from the moment of birth in the natural environment of farmhouses and villages, like Amish communities. And it is also suitable for you if you have already developed allergy (see Disclaimer at the bottom). It's quite similar to a probiotic, if you'd wish a simple explanation.
For the further development and production scale-up we'll need to:

run some additional tests
update our equipment
improve the formulations
make a better design
go through the certification, international patents.

Classic investor scheme would substantially increase product prices and limit its availability to some people: that's why we started this Indiegogo campaign.
...Long ago, in May 1796, Edward Jenner pioneered the smallpox vaccine. He found a young dairymaid with fresh cowpox lesions on her hands and arms, took pus from the lesions and inoculated an 8-year-old boy. The child developed mild symptoms, including fever and loss of appetite, but he quickly recovered. A few months later, Jenner injected the boy with goo from a fresh smallpox lesion — the child developed no symptoms. 200 years later, cows give us another health option. Be involved!


What You and Other People Get With Our Products

Healthy environment from the moment of birth
Suitable for you if you already have allergy  or asthma (see Disclaimer at the bottom)



How It Is Achievable

Creme (emolient) and shampoo will provide the daily care for tender skin
Laundry detergent will make even your clothes more healthy
You will enjoy clean but healthy room by using carpet cleaner
Air spray will recreate scentless but healthy rural atmosphere in your house



 
How Does it Work? Science Behind the Product
 


 
Real Results
In a pilot clinical trial, skin emolient that contained M. vaccae lysate reduced the risk of atopic eczema development in newborns at 6 months by 60%. It also reduced allergy markers such as level of IgE antibodies to cow milk. These results were presented  at 2018 European Allergy and Clinical Immunology Congress.
The formulation that we are going to produce also contains M.vaccae lysate (see Disclaimer below).



 

The Story Will Continue
Mycobacterium vaccae is a wonderful microorganism. Actually, all microorganisms from the natural environment are wonderful.
For example, in a recent study, the possibility of prevention of a childhood leukemia in the presence of proper microbiota have been demonstrated. Your support will help us to elucidate new properties of M. vaccae and other microorganisms and to find new ways to help millions of people worlwide by creating healthy natural environment wherever they go.

Disclaimer: Not a drug or medical device, neither it contains active pharmaceutical or dangerous ingredients. No medical claims are made here, studies have been performed on a certain formulation containing individual ingredient. You may have heard of  cosmetics containing thermal water bacteria extracts (like Aquaphilus dolomiae extract or Vitreoscilla filiformis extract) which are still cosmetics, not anything else. Also, emolients are always recommended for atopic skin, however, they are still cosmetics, not a drug.

story:
Krazyweights-A new innovative training weight

I was inspired to help improve my son's batting skills and abilities. The idea of Krazyweights  took awhile to become a design concept, from sketches to mock up prototypes to a functional prototype model.

Hi, my name is Gary Brown; an Architect /Designer and now inventor of this new innovative training weight. Krazyweights is designed for young players through high school, into college and beyond for mature athletes.

This training weight replace the old fashion "Donut Ring" or weighted sleeve at the barrel end of a baseball bat. This new idea put the weight and control in the hands of the player.

The krazyweights secure  to the bottom of a baseball or softball bat, lacrosse stick or tennis racket. It does not interfere with the hands, wrist or forearms when used during practice. This puts the weight and control in the players hands.

Weight will be sized for the proper age group. The Krazyweights has modular screw-on weights to add more resistances to improve player's strength. 

As part of the Krazyweights team,  your contribution will help complete the patent process and development for production. I strongly believe this product is unique for local and international sports use.

 Campaign funds breakdown.

  •   I have a patent pending and a registered trade name with the US Patent Office. I need to bring the patent to the next step in September 2018 and then follow through to completion.
  • This cost could add up to $12,500 or more.
  •  The prototype design and function is complete, we need to refine the material for durability and smooth operations for the younger players. This will require  materials to be fabricated for testing.This cost could additional engineering and material selection could cost up to $25,000. 
  • The research team will develop the proper weights for the appropriate age group. This relates to overall weight of the unit, as well as individual components. 
  • The Krazyweights team plans to recruit a sport science team to evaluate the  performance value and impact while using the Krazyweights.
  • Our Engineers will refine the jaw design to be adaptable for bat manufacture's knob design. We will need multiple injection molds for different  knob models. We'll develop separate jaw designs for lacrosse sticks and tennis rackets.  Additional engineering for jaw designs, CAD drawing file to product labs for proper sizing and testing.  
  • This operation could range from $8,500 to $22,500.    
  • I've started a Krazyweights concept design for Hockey sticks. This is a unique idea for young players to keep there sticks on the ice during practices. The Krazyweights would attach to the shaft of the stick while not interfering  with the stick's function during practice. This is part of the on going expansion of Krazyweights ideas. Hockey is 3rd most popular sport in the world.

These steps will assist us to make the jump from prototype to manufacturing and into the  marketplace.                                                                                                                                                                  

PERKs-

  • Team boosters (members) will be placed on the Krazyweights Hall Of Fame. This listed will be on the Website for public viewing. Categories will be ; First Ballot, Honorable Mention, Inductees and Founding Members , depending on the donations.
  • I would encourage boosters to offer color schemes options for final productions.
  • I would encourage  booster to offer product  names for each weight class, i.e., Big Thunder.
  • I desire to make this an interactive campaign; to have fun and be creative.

Krazyweights's Impact to players

People may see this as a sports product for young player, and they may be right. I see think as part of a bigger picture for youths to develop  their physical abilities but also their inner confidence of achievements. Players are put in positions that they may not be prepared for, stress, pressure to perform, team peer pressure, etc. 

If a player can develop their own physical and inner confidence during practice, then they may be better prepared for the game. Krazyweights will be able to grow with the player with additional modular weights.

The research shows approximately 2.6 million Little Leaguers in the USA along, with 8 International Regions throughout the world, with approximately 3.5 million players. The USA has numerous baseball leagues for all ages throughout the Country. There are approximately 35 million ball players registered  in 122 counties world wide.  The USA has approximately 9.5 millions young girls/women softball players of all ages throughout the USA. There are approximately 40 million softball players in men and women leagues in the USA. There are approximately 1.5 million women playing softball in International Leagues.

 Research shows approximately 850,000 Lacrosse players all ages in the USA.  Tennis has approximately 14 million players in the USA of all ages, from 7 to 77. This the 4th most popular sport in the world, approximately 1.2 B watch or play tennis throughout the world.

 These numbers are impressive, but every year there is a new group of players stepping into these sports start their own future. Krazyweights will be there to help them along to meet their goals.

Risk and Rewards

  •  I started this adventure with an idea and a sketch pad. 
  • I focused on this concept for over two years before getting others involved.
  • I feel strongly about this product. I took out a second mortgage on my house to pay for the concept start up.
  • I was accepted into a start-up business incubators program for entrepreneurs. I also attended Small Business classes as part of NH Chapter of SCORE monthly meetings. I've  done as much as possible to learn much as I can in this short period of time. 
  • After 4 1/2 years of undergraduate night school while working full time and being married (now going on forty years), I don't give up, I set goals to achieve them.
  • Through networking I found new people to assist me to this point. I ask for help when I come to a road block. This is one of those road blocks, So I'm looking to build a team of boosters to help us cross the finish line together and then into the production line. We don't give up.

Please spread the WORD... and the word is KRAZYWEIGHTS

  •  Please forward the links for viewing and let others make up their mind.
  •  We all know some young player who might need  some help, see if this might be for them.
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools! Thank you very much, we'll see you on the field.......

story:
We have set out to create a helping network and a safety bracelet, to reduce the response time in emergency situations. Our main target is to help elderly people who live alone and people with serious medical conditions. In case of an accident or a disease episode, help needs to arrive at the scene fast. That’s why we designed the Anzen app and bracelet.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Anzen app:  Register either as a volunteer helper or someone seeking for help. Complete your profile with vital informations such as your possible diseases, blood type, antecedents or other personal comments. When the emergency occurs, just send a direct signal to people close by. Acting so, it allows people in your neighbourhood with first aid training to be aware of the scene and bring fast response to it, while emergency services are on their way.

But that's not all! Pre-register personal contacts (family relatives, close friends,...) on the app, they will be notified by text message at the same time the signal is launched!

 

 The world needs everyday superheroes and with our app we can make you one. By helping others in need you are making the world a better place. The Anzen app acknowledges your involvement by a social merit system: collect gifts, vouchers and many more from our certified partners!

  

 

 

 

 

             

               A simple but efficient app as support.

   

 

 

    

 

 

Anzen bracelet: Aren't you grandparents confortable with current technologies? Don't worry, we've thought about that.

  The Anzen safety bracelet allows the user to send out an emergency signal without even having to unlock his phone. The emitted signal is received by the emergency services, the Anzen helping network and the pre-registred contacts. The nearby Anzen helpers will get notified of your situation and they will rush to your aid.

We have designed the bracelet to substitute original emergency calls, as it’s both faster and more convenient.  The design has been designed in order to be light, sturdy and comfortable at the same time.

 

Compact Bracelet.

 

➜ The product summarised in 4 features:

 

We are a multinational team of European students dedicated to solving real-world problems. Helping others needs to be part of our 21st century society, and we are ready to make a difference. We moved in to Singapore to achieve our goal.

 

› From left to right:

 ♙ Otto Kangasmaa: Automation and systems technology student at Aalto University (FINLAND ). Interested in robotics and biomedical and healthcare engineering. Personal interests include: cooking, brewing beer and skiing.

♙ Xavier Claude : Student in mechanical engineering  at Université Catholique de Louvain (BELGIUM). Minor in biomedical engineering. Interests : Sports, cooking, design and computer programming.

♙ Artem Lopatenko: Student in department of Space Technology at Aalto University (FINLAND) with minoring in Financial Engineering. Interested in investment science, fintech and data analysis. Travelling, active sports and dancing as personal interests.

♙ Félix Lambilliotte: Electromechanical engineering student at Université Catholique de Louvain (BELGIUM) specialised in energy generation and harvesting with skills in management and entrepreneurial finance. Like team work and nature lover.

 

A group of student entrepreneurs ready to make the world a safer place...

 

 

 

 

 

Our team is  currently seeking funds for the  marketing campaign , distribution channel development and other operational expenses.

Have a look a the following categories and identify the offer the most adapted to you. (More info's in dedicated section)

   

You don't identify yourself in one of these categories? Well, there is still room to help!

Be part of the change in spreading the word to your family, friends, colleagues and other fellows. If, like us,  you love your elderly relatives, share the campaign on your social medias and start saving lives of your beloved  on your own way!

 

  ᚜ Sincerely yours, the Anzen team ᚛

More info's: wwww.anzenlife.com

story:
Rather Be Golfing?

Us too! That's why we created BONZI GOLF, the short game for those of us who love to golf but may be short on time, money, or patience.

BONZI GOLF started as a hacked together backyard party game in Milwaukee, Wisconsin. After years of refinement, it has become a full-fledged golf system that has helped hundreds hone their golf skills without having to spend several hard-earned hours and dollars at the golf course and driving range.

The BONZI BALL

The system leverages the patent pending BONZI BALL, a reduced flight projectile that acts and feels like real golf ball, but on a much smaller, more manageable scale. It does this through it's offset center of gravity and oscillating aerodynamic profile. Simply put, if you slice the ball on the course, you'll do the same with the BONZI BALL, but instead of walking 20 yards into the woods to find it, you'll just need to take a few steps to the right (if you're a righty. This inclusive game is also designed with southpaws in mind;).

By orienting the ball's dimple in different directions, various lies and conditions can be simulated.

The Games

BONZI GOLF LINKS

LINKS is an outdoor golf game wherein opposing players or teams hit from one turf mat to the other, similar to Horseshoes or Jarts without all of the pesky injuries. The first player or team to get to 18 points wins!

BONZI GOLF ACES

ACES is an an indoor golf game. Think putting into a coffee cup on steroids. Because BONZI BALLS are constructed of durable, yet soft cross-linked EVA foam, golf has become and indoor sport. Chip from the non-slip turf  launch pad into the regulation sized cup. Make it a real game by getting your office mates to pony up some cash to take a few shots. The first one to ace it, takes the pot!  

Why You?

For starters, you're awesome. We've always thought so. We're ready to bring this thing to the next level! Your support will help us do just that. Through BONZI GOLF, We've seen so many people fall in love with the game of golf for both the first time and all over again. We're super excited to make this happen on a larger scale. You're key to making this dream into a reality, which is another reason why we love you so darn much.

story:
Short Summary

I am shocked by what is happening in the world at the moment and how much misinformation there is out there about how to protect yourself from the Coronavirus.

We are a team of Engineers and Microbiologists and have designed a  very ingenious tool that will keep you safe from the virus deposited on surfaces in a proper and scientifically sound way.

With your contribution, we will be able to commence production of our innovative design and assist the population, especially those in remote areas, from this novel disease.

 

My Story

When the Coronavirus pandemic came about, I started protecting myself by making sure my hands were clean. However, I could not avoid touching door knobs and other pushbuttons, like in the elevator. I knew that these surfaces were very likely to be infected, so after touching them I was very conscious about not touching my face. However, this is a lot more difficult that it seems.

I am an Engineer by profession and a Microbiologist by passion. I have experience with medical devices, so I know how a virus can easily transfer from surface to surface by touch, so buying one of the brass door helpers on the market was not an option. They claim that copper and brass kill the virus in 2 to 4 hours. However, during these 2 to 4 hours, the virus is alive and on the surface of the tool. If this surface touches anything on your clothing, it would be transferred there and there it can live for many days, so having an exposed tool made of any materials was useless.

In fact, it is not just useless, but dangerous, as it will give you a false sense of safety. It will transfer the virus onto surfaces that you cannot easily and periodically clean, as you would with your hands, so it is better to use your hands that any of those exposed tools currently out there.

I have a business that designs medical devices, so I got my engineers to work in a project that will result in a door helper device that would be safe to use.

My engineers came up with a design that is not only safer to use, but recyclable and environmentally friendly. It was also designed so that it can be easily manufactured at various locations in the world so that it doesn’t need to be shipped.

 

What We Need & What You Get

I want to make it as affordable as possible, use materials that will not hurt the environment and avoid long sea shipping at all costs.

We need the money to setup manufacturing and packaging facilities in various parts of the world, this way, we would not only be avoiding shipping, but helping the local economies. In the first instance, we plan to manufacture in Australia, USA, Spain and Argentina.

With your contribution, you will get an ENCLOSED HYGIENIC ANTIMICROBIAL HELPER, as well as a HEAVY DUTY RETRACTABLE REEL with every Helper.

  • Sturdy steel casing
  • Side belt clip
  • 750mm Hi tensile Nylon cord
  • Split ring attachment

 

Why is This Tool Important and Why Do You Need It?

We’re currently living though a health and economic crisis the likes of which none of us have ever experienced before, and we all need to adjust in how we work, live of our lives, and do things in general.

One thing that is clear is that we cannot continue to touch surfaces, like doorknobs or buttons that so many people also touched.

The currently available tools that are used to assist in doing these things without touching them are dangerous, as they become infected and then they touch our body or our clothing and transfer the infection to those parts. It doesn’t matter if they are made of copper of brass, as these metals take up to 4 hours to kill the virus and during that time, they continue to be infectious.

As an Engineer and Microbiologist, I realized that it was of extreme importance that the infected portion of the tool remained out of touch. Our design keep any infected part enclosed within the tool, this way it is safe to use.

HOW IS THIS DESIGN BETTER?

The inner part of your ENCLOSED HYGIENIC ANTIMICROBIAL HELPER will get germs on it and get infected. It is important to keep this infected part away from you, because wherever it touches, it will spread those germs:

  • If it touches your hand, it will transfer the germs there
  • If it touches your pants, it will transfer the germs there
  • If it touches anything on your body, it will transfer the germs there
  • If it touches your handbag, etc, it will transfer the germs there.

THAT IS WHY THE INNER PART IS INSIDE A PROTECTIVE COVER.

THIS WAY, NO INFECTED PART WILL TOUCH ANYTHING ON YOUR BODY OR YOUR POSSESSIONS.

 

Risks & Opportunities

In these times of lockdowns and companies on low production, it is possible that we might encounter delays or other unexpected hurdles with production and shipment.

To mitigate those risks, we are in discussion with reputable companies that are capable of manufacturing and shipping our product. So far, we have contacted companies in Sydney (Australia), Rosario (Argentina), Boston (USA) and Barcelona (Spain). All these companies stated that there are no expected difficulties with fulfilling our orders.

To maximize opportunities, we designed the ENCLOSED HYGIENIC ANTIMICROBIAL HELPER so that standard manufacturing machines and facilities would be capable to manufacture it. This way, we can potentially add additional locations to manufacture It with very little difficulty.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

A fantastic way to help our campaign would be by getting the word out and make some noise about our it.

Share on Social Media, on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, etc.

Please note that Indiegogo has sharing tools that you can use. Please use them.
story_txt:
Short Summary
I am shocked by what is happening in the world at the moment and how much misinformation there is out there about how to protect yourself from the Coronavirus.
We are a team of Engineers and Microbiologists and have designed a  very ingenious tool that will keep you safe from the virus deposited on surfaces in a proper and scientifically sound way.
With your contribution, we will be able to commence production of our innovative design and assist the population, especially those in remote areas, from this novel disease.
 
My Story
When the Coronavirus pandemic came about, I started protecting myself by making sure my hands were clean. However, I could not avoid touching door knobs and other pushbuttons, like in the elevator. I knew that these surfaces were very likely to be infected, so after touching them I was very conscious about not touching my face. However, this is a lot more difficult that it seems.
I am an Engineer by profession and a Microbiologist by passion. I have experience with medical devices, so I know how a virus can easily transfer from surface to surface by touch, so buying one of the brass door helpers on the market was not an option. They claim that copper and brass kill the virus in 2 to 4 hours. However, during these 2 to 4 hours, the virus is alive and on the surface of the tool. If this surface touches anything on your clothing, it would be transferred there and there it can live for many days, so having an exposed tool made of any materials was useless.
In fact, it is not just useless, but dangerous, as it will give you a false sense of safety. It will transfer the virus onto surfaces that you cannot easily and periodically clean, as you would with your hands, so it is better to use your hands that any of those exposed tools currently out there.
I have a business that designs medical devices, so I got my engineers to work in a project that will result in a door helper device that would be safe to use.
My engineers came up with a design that is not only safer to use, but recyclable and environmentally friendly. It was also designed so that it can be easily manufactured at various locations in the world so that it doesn’t need to be shipped.
 

What We Need & What You Get
I want to make it as affordable as possible, use materials that will not hurt the environment and avoid long sea shipping at all costs.
We need the money to setup manufacturing and packaging facilities in various parts of the world, this way, we would not only be avoiding shipping, but helping the local economies. In the first instance, we plan to manufacture in Australia, USA, Spain and Argentina.
With your contribution, you will get an ENCLOSED HYGIENIC ANTIMICROBIAL HELPER, as well as a HEAVY DUTY RETRACTABLE REEL with every Helper.

Sturdy steel casing
Side belt clip
750mm Hi tensile Nylon cord
Split ring attachment

 

Why is This Tool Important and Why Do You Need It?
We’re currently living though a health and economic crisis the likes of which none of us have ever experienced before, and we all need to adjust in how we work, live of our lives, and do things in general.
One thing that is clear is that we cannot continue to touch surfaces, like doorknobs or buttons that so many people also touched.
The currently available tools that are used to assist in doing these things without touching them are dangerous, as they become infected and then they touch our body or our clothing and transfer the infection to those parts. It doesn’t matter if they are made of copper of brass, as these metals take up to 4 hours to kill the virus and during that time, they continue to be infectious.
As an Engineer and Microbiologist, I realized that it was of extreme importance that the infected portion of the tool remained out of touch. Our design keep any infected part enclosed within the tool, this way it is safe to use.
HOW IS THIS DESIGN BETTER?
The inner part of your ENCLOSED HYGIENIC ANTIMICROBIAL HELPER will get germs on it and get infected. It is important to keep this infected part away from you, because wherever it touches, it will spread those germs:

If it touches your hand, it will transfer the germs there
If it touches your pants, it will transfer the germs there
If it touches anything on your body, it will transfer the germs there
If it touches your handbag, etc, it will transfer the germs there.

THAT IS WHY THE INNER PART IS INSIDE A PROTECTIVE COVER.
THIS WAY, NO INFECTED PART WILL TOUCH ANYTHING ON YOUR BODY OR YOUR POSSESSIONS.
 

Risks & Opportunities
In these times of lockdowns and companies on low production, it is possible that we might encounter delays or other unexpected hurdles with production and shipment.
To mitigate those risks, we are in discussion with reputable companies that are capable of manufacturing and shipping our product. So far, we have contacted companies in Sydney (Australia), Rosario (Argentina), Boston (USA) and Barcelona (Spain). All these companies stated that there are no expected difficulties with fulfilling our orders.
To maximize opportunities, we designed the ENCLOSED HYGIENIC ANTIMICROBIAL HELPER so that standard manufacturing machines and facilities would be capable to manufacture it. This way, we can potentially add additional locations to manufacture It with very little difficulty.
 

Other Ways You Can Help
A fantastic way to help our campaign would be by getting the word out and make some noise about our it.
Share on Social Media, on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, etc.
Please note that Indiegogo has sharing tools that you can use. Please use them.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
We are Cypher Fitness, a trainer focused certification program. Our program certifies experienced dance fitness instructors who want more out of their dance fitness hustle and life. Our trainers experience two sides of ongoing training, break fitness and mental fitness. 

  • Our break fitness side of what we do reinforces the core fundamentals of breakin'.
  • Our mental fitness side focuses on building leaders within classes, the community, and at home. 

 

This campaign is vital to our own growth so we can do more for our trainers. We aim to serve, educate, and inspire and this campaign will catapult our efforts.

Your help directly impacts our trainers, their growth, and the growth of the community as we align with other leaders in the community. 

Building this facility will not only be home to break fit classes but also serve as a center for educational courses, hip hop/break history, non profit events and so much more.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are seeking $25,000 to be used for standard facility expenses including rent, build-out, mirrors, CRM system, in-house apparel equipment such as stitching and screen printing to expand our apparel line, utilities, advertising, updated training material, audio, and production equipment.

  • Supporters will get a selection of Cypher apparel, access to trainer material including choreography and mindset tools. We will also be hosting group courses and one on one coaching from choreography to leadership/entrepreneurship coaching.

For whatever reason we do not reach our full goal, we are still going to be investing in opening our facility. We will be prioritizing our launch list. 

 

The Impact

We feel that we are living our purpose by empowering others, leading them to new levels of growth because we need stronger and more influential leaders in our communities and within our culture.

If you can teach just one person to lead with effectiveness, you can inspire the 20 that are being guided by that person's positive character. We believe in real actionable change, not just the talk. 

Since our official launch in January of 2020

  • We have gained 22 new members;
  • Hosted 6 events with various events benefiting a local nonprofit, kids hip hop program, and women's empowerment
  • Our trainers are hosting their own events with the help and guidance of fellow crew members
  • Our material has helped 2 entrepreneurs grow their own brands 

Risks & Challenges

Let's be real, the fitness industry can be hard, challenging and risky. We aren't just in the fitness industry. We inherently believe in the good we are doing by creating a community of leaders who support each other to ensure we all succeed together.

Here are some of the hurdles we face and how we plan to overcome them.

  • Pandemic in health and fitness
    • Our program allows us to continue to educate and empower our members and their customers by continuing to offer other resources that do not require a gym nor physical location.
  • Undercapitalization
    • Our business model is designed as a membership model, ensuring a foundational income stream
    • We are expanding our merchandise and apparel line as an added revenue model
    • With the experience between Rodney and Justin, we are able to offset major costs such as marketing, design, web, training modules, production, and more allowing us to run lean.
    • We have a realistic approach to growth, understanding that growth doesn't happen overnight.
    • We invest our own time, energy, and finances
  • Growth stagnation/spikes
    • Limited membership: We have limited the number of trainers allowed per region to join and teach as a licensed rep. We have done this to ensure the quality of their classes aren't diminished in a saturated market, which also allows us to regulate our time and growth so that it is consistent.
    • We have a dedicated recruiter that interviews each member before they are invited to join. This allows us to measure the level of commitment of a possible trainer.

We are confident in our ability to not only meet these challenges head on but overcome them with absolute success due to 3 variables. 

  • Rodney Bacho, our CEO. 
    • Rodney has 10+ years in the dance fitness industry as an award winning instructor/choreographer. His professional experience along with business experience in the dance fitness industry is stacked on top of his personal experience stemming from the '80s in the breakin' culture.
    • Rodney also has 10+ years of experience as a registered nurse. He takes the health and safety of our trainers and students seriously as he works with other health professionals within our organization.
  • Justin Bordeaux, our President.
    • Justin brings 15+ years of successful entrepreneur experience along with 15+ years coaching entrepreneurs and executives in multiple industries. Jus also brings 20 years of creative development experience as a thought leader in Brand architecture. 
  • Our board of advisors and partners
    • Marios Thoupi, Partner & Owner of Dancise Fitness, located in Greece and Cyprus. Marios has 5+ years of entrepreneurial experience in the fitness industry. Marios carries a bachelor's degree in Sports Science and Physical Education. Above all Marios is a competitive B-Boy in Europe and helps lead in break fitness and safety.
    • Dr. Sammy H is an entrepreneur with her own independent practice in spiritual coaching.
    • Dr. Robin WC carries a Ph.D. in Physical Therapy and brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise
    • Shana Blount is our Director of UpRock. She has a Masters Degree in Mental Health Counseling. 
  • Our crew
    • We are nothing without our crew. The support our crew gives each other is infectious. Our crew has come together on their own taking the leadership roles in both the organization but also their personal lives and ambitions.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand if you can't contribute financially, and that's ok. There are other ways you can help our movement. 

  • Share this campaign with other people that vibe with what we are about and what we are trying to achieve.

 

 

We are truly grateful for those of you that make the choice to support our cause our community and our culture.

Marios Thoupi, Partner & Owner of Dancise Fitness, located in Greece and Cyprus. Marios has 5+ years of entrepreneurial experience in the fitness industry. Marios carries a bachelor's degree in Sports Science and Physical Education. Above all Marios is a competitive B-Boy in Europe and helps lead in break fitness and safety.

Dr. Robin WC carries a Ph.D. in Physical Therapy and brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise

Our crewWe are nothing without our crew. The support our crew gives each other is infectious. Our crew has come together on their own taking the leadership roles in both the organization but also their personal lives and ambitions.



Other Ways You Can Help
We understand if you can't contribute financially, and that's ok. There are other ways you can help our movement.

story:
MYSTIK Disposable Mask  is made of a 3-ply construction to help filter up to 99% of bacteria exhaled by the wearer. The lightweight mask is designed to provide comfort and easy breathing. MADE IN USA

# New 6 Color Disposable Mask for any situation. which is: Light Blue (Normal), Black, Red, Pink, Dark Yellow and Green. 

Stay healthy during cold and flu season with Mystik Earloop Disposable Facemasks. Each mask is made in a 3-ply construction, which can filter up to 99% of the bacteria exhaled by the wearer and prevent the spread of airborne illness. Each box contains Fifty earloop masks that are lightweight and comfortable for easy breathing while you wear it. These masks are easy to put on and have no strings to tie. Simply place the mask over your nose and mouth, place an earloop around each ear, pull the mask over your chin, and mold the mask to fit snugly around your nose and chin. They are ideal for use at home, school, or in healthcare settings. 

Our company: MYSTIK US TIMEPIECE LLC

American industry has a long history. Since the 1930's, the reputation of "Made in the USA" has spread throughout the world.  But with the economic transformation, American industry gradually declined, and the words "Made in the USA" began to slowly disappear ...

Recently, due to the emergence of the epidemic, we have found that United States has been too dependent on imported supplies.  At the time of the crisis, it was completely incapable of self-sufficiency. This made us rethink the possibility of "Made in the USA". This place brings new opportunities.

We are a private company founded on February 17, 2017. Mainly produces automatic mechanical watches, and has produced FOSIL, ARMANI, WELDER AND SEKIO watches.

Beginning this year (2020), our company and partners began to produce disposable face masks by fully Automatic Machine, fully cooperated in production lines and all operations. The plant has a 10,000-level clean room and a clean work room.

The main reason for the decline of the US industry is that the United States is very expensive in terms of rent, logistics, manpower, and material costs, which makes it very competitive. However, American-made products are often highly efficient and of high quality, but it is difficult to survive because of the operating environment. In view of this, we will actively develop online sales channels, hoping to sell directly to consumers at the ex-factory price, thereby saving operating expenses and all on-shelf expenses of store sales, so that consumers can purchase products with higher cost performance.

The company specially selects non-woven fabrics for making masks from all over the world. All materials are provided by first-line manufacturers, with local and international recognition or testing reports of various origins. We hope to make high-quality masks for everyone to use.

Funding Purpose:

#Our Company already bought the Machine and Material (For 5 Million pcs of Mask) in Hong Kong, we pay for the cost already spend US$350,000.  Our Machine speed can produce 70pcs per minute, which is 100 thousand pcs of everyday.  

#We want to find the customer, who can pay for the mask to support we can set-up a factory in United States, Maryland.  

#Now we set the price is US$10 for 50pcs Mask and US$80 for 500pcs Mask. Save 40% from the original price.

story:
Our Story So Far...

After injuring my lower back I became frustrated with products available to help in recovery.  The various compression belts I tried were extremely uncomfortable, I hated having to lay still while using ice packs and lumbar cushions have to be repositioned constantly to keep them in the right spot.   I soon realized that it would be far easier to attach everything to a compression belt to hold it all in the right spot no matter how many times I got up or what chair I was sitting in.  Three years and a dozen prototypes later I have come up with a system that does just that.

The Black Belt combines three common treatments into a single system that gives you the flexibility to do one or all three at the same time while remaining mobile. 

  • You can use the compression belt by itself to stabilize your lower back while lifting or bending.  
  • Attach the Lumbar Support Cushion to the belt, then wrap it around your waist to keep it in place.
  • Add in the Thermal Gel Pack and you can easily position an ice pack right where you need it whether sitting, standing or walking around.

My goal is to provide all of the tools you need to recover from lower back injuries and help prevent future damage while maximizing your mobility and comfort.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Our goal for this campaign is to gauge interest in the product and raise the funds for the initial production run.

My project funding goal is $20,000 or just over 300 backers at the "Stop the Pain" level.  This will cover production costs, packaging and shipping, leaving me with a modest store of belts to use in merchandising and promotions to retail chains.  

The main perk for backing the campaign is one or more of the Black Belt systems.  That said, I have included a couple of additional perks for different backing levels for those that are not in need of pain relief but appreciate the entrepreneurial spirit and innovation I am bringing to the project.  

 

Risks & Challenges

While I have done a lot of initial work lining up suppliers and navigating the shipping and assembly processes there are always risks, both known and unknown.  Potential known issues that would impact the project include:

  • Increased tariffs on imports.  This would impact profitability and potentially cause the eventual retail price of the product to rise.  I have the option to move production to US facilities or other less impacted countries if import duties rise to a level that makes the project financially unviable.  Additionally, I may be able to have this classified as a medical device which would significantly reduce or completely remove tariffs altogether.
  • Health concerns in China may impact delivery scheduled for some components of the product.  The CDC has issues statements that the Corona Virus is not communicable via packaging or materials from impacted regions so the concern is really just with the ability of factories to continue working with key employees being unavailable due to quarantine.  The option to have components produced in unaffected locations would remove this obstacle should production times become too long.

I am certain to run into additional obstacles along the way but have proven to be resourceful and creative in finding workarounds to everything I have encountered so far and am confident in my ability to deliver The Black Belt on schedule and at my cost targets.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

My real goal with this project is to help as many people as possible reduce their back pain and prevent future injuries.  If you are fortunate enough to have no back issues you can still help by sharing information about The Black Belt with your friends and family who are not as lucky.

My real goal with this project is to help as many people as possible reduce their back pain and prevent future injuries.  If you are fortunate enough to have no back issues you can still help by sharing information about The Black Belt with your friends and family who are not as lucky.

story:
Close your eyes, discover your sleep. 


Sleep Sense helps people sleep better.

Sleep sense is a personalized sleep care mask for those of us who have irregular schedules or limited time for rest. Sleep sense will help you regulate your sleep patterns and enable you to sleep deeper and to wake up refreshed.

     

Having a hard time to wake up every morning? Want to sleep 5mins more?

                                       Feeling tired whole day?

Sleep Sense will delight you with a bright morning!


Sleep problem

‘The plague of light in our bedrooms’

Researchers warn of the health dangers of too much light while we try to sleep. 

By Tom de Castella                                                      


‘Spreading the Word about Light Pollution’

Researchers warn of the health dangers of too much light while we try to sleep. 

By Troy Lambert 


Sound and light can be used to induce better sleep. Sleep sense mask blocks external light completely. It induces a deep sleep with an auditory pattern and it will wake you refreshed with a light pattern based on your personal and individual sleep formula.


3 in 1 (Systemized)


Functions


Sleep sense provides a personalized sleep inducing sound pattern to help you sleep comfortably and deeply. Sleep sense will learn your sleep pattern and it will improve itself for maximum efficacy. No more ear-phone or smart phone kept playing music next to you. The personalized sleep inducing sound or music comes from bone conduction transducers inside the mask.  This stops automatically when you fall asleep.

Sleep sense provides an artificial sunrise alarm during the light sleep stage so you wake up refreshed.  No more annoying alarms.  You will experience a peaceful and energetic morning with Bright Alarm! (*A cure for jet lag. If travelers were exposed to intermittent light while sleeping in the early morning, your body would be fooled into thinking the sun had risen earlier.)    



Sleep sense provides a personal sleep diary mobile application.  It monitors daily sleep quality with initial bedtime, time in bed, wake up time, sleep pattern, relationship to others, affect of caffeine, daytime grogginess, etc.  We work so hard to care for our health in the daytime, but nighttime is just as important.  Perhaps even more important?

Specification


Sleep Sense better your sleep quality


How it works



Smart Sleep Mask 

Our mask is light and comfortable even if it is embedded with cutting edge sensors. Our sound and light therapy will induce you to deeper and healthier sleep by stabilizing  your body and mind. With Sleep Sense, you can relax, fall asleep faster, and maintain deep sleep during the whole night, which provides you better feelings after waking up. 

Smartphone App

We created an intuitive way to visualize your sleep information and general health conditions and to let you know more about your sleep quality.. We analyze big data from our app to provide you with a personalized sleep care.

Smart Cloud Feedback

The last ingredient of Sleep Sense is the AI sleep assistant, a cloud-based machine learning AI. It analyses the sleep data gathered by f.mask and combines that with ambient environmental data like temperature, weather, and humidity, looking for patterns in the data and offering suggestions to optimize sleep schedules. In this aspect, AI plays the role of a sleep assistant.


In development


Press

Frasen's mask helps you to sleep - BBC  

Frasen is tackling the problem with a wearable smart head mask that allows people to wake up naturally by “showing an artificial sunrise on your eyes.” - PIVOTL 

                                                                                                                       

The sensors, speakers, and lights embedded in the eyepatch help people learn more about the actual quality of sleep and offer variety of ways to improve it - TechNode  

Rest right with Frasen's sleep monitoring solutions - e27  

Frasen has developed a hardware/software solution to make people happier by leading more healthy, less stressed lives - VentureBeat


Why Is Healthy Sleep Important? 

Sleep is vital for learning and memory, and lack of sleep impacts our health, safety, and longevity. In the short term, a lack of adequate sleep can affect judgment, mood, ability to learn and retain information, and may increase the risk of serious accidents and injury. In the long term, chronic sleep deprivation may lead to a host of health problems including obesity, diabetes, cardiovascular disease, and even early mortality.  - Harvard Medical School


What Is Good Sleep?

  • Falling into deep sleep
  • Having a constant sleep cycle with reaching sleep stages (light, deep)
  • Waking up at the right time of your sleep cycle without grogginess

How to make user fall asleep deeper

A person has 90-minute sleep cycle with deep sleep and shallow sleep. Meanwhile the brainwave changes from beta to alpha, theta, and  delta. Delta brainwave signal comes out when a person is in deep sleep stage. 

With the bone conduction speakers, binaural beats are delivered in accordance with the user's brain activity referring one's sleep stage.(Using Brainwave Synchronization technology) By checking the brain signal and giving appropriate binaural beats simultaneously to generate sleeping stage brainwave, Sleep Sense helps users to fall asleep faster and wake up feeling refreshed.


How to wake user up feeling refreshed

LED lights help user to wake up naturally by providing Artificial Sunrise. While tracking the bio-signals during sleep, the mask detects user's sleep cycle and wakes user up at the perfect sleep stage to awake. Stop waking up by distracting alarm at any random point, but wake up naturally with slowly brightening LED lights and feel refreshed every morning.

Three steps to use Sleep Sense


Give yourself a break        
        Put your mind at ease


Why We Need Your Support

We have been working on Sleep Sense for the past year and are now on the final stage of optimizing our sleep mask and smart app. The next step will be production. 

Here is where you step into our project. You can help us to increase the amount of product we produce and more people will experience better quality of their sleep with Sleep Sense. Let’s make a move to let us have better life with healthier sleep. 

Be the first to realize the exclusive sleep experience!


Meet Our Team


In addition to our core team, we've assembled an incredible group of engineers, designers, and industry experts who are collaborating with us to create the best product possible.

FraSen's Advisors


FraSen's Investors

            

 

FAQs

1. Purchasing & Shipping

A. When will I receive my Sleep Sense?

 June 2016. We are doing out utmost to have the Sleep Sense shipping to you as soon as possible. We will provide continuous updates about the production schedule during and after the campaign. The projected timelines mentioned above will be firmed up over the coming weeks.

B. Where do you ship to?

 We use major courier companies and we will ship to anywhere that they deliver.

C. Shipping cost?

  $30 (USD) for international shipping

D. How can I check the contribution status?

 Please refer to this article on How to Check if Your Contribution is Successful. If there is still an issue, you may contact us at contact@frasen.com with the subject line: PREORDER CONFIRMATION.

2. In The Box

Your Sleep Sense mask will be sent with all the necessary accessories listed below:

  • Sleep Sense mask
  • Micro-USB cable
  • Instruction manual
  • Protective case (or pouch)

3. Compatibility

A. What kind of smartphone can I use for the application?

 Android and iOS smartphones with Bluetooth connection can be used compatible with Sleep Sense mask.

B. What kind of music does the mask play when giving me feedback? Can I choose?

 The mask has embedded memory card where sample music is saved. It provides basic sounds and music – ex. Relaxing music and rain sound. You can also add songs of your own taste via Bluetooth connection of your smartphone.

4. Functions & How it works

A. What kind of data does Sleep Sense mask collect and store?

 Sleep Sense stores certain information about you and the environment around you when you are in sleep. It not only measures your movement as other sleep-aid devices currently in the market, but also detects your brain activity(EEG).

B. What does EEG stand for?

 EEG (electroencephalography) refers to the recording of the brain’s spontaneous electrical activity (brain waves). Our brain cells communicate via electrical impulses and are active all the time, even when we are asleep. With different activities and conditions, the brain signals defer. Thus, by tracking your brain signal, we can detect four different sleep stages during your sleep.

C. How does Sleep Sense make me fall asleep faster? Is it tested?

  With the bone conduction speakers, binaural beats are delivered in accordance with your brain activity referring your sleep stage. By checking the brain signal and giving appropriate binaural beats simultaneously to generate low-frequency brainwave, Sleep Sense helps you fall asleep. Within our team experiment, the time to fall into sleep reduced up to 66%(avg.33%). We will update new test result as soon as it comes out.

E. How does Sleep Sense wake me up refreshed?

  Embedded LED lights of the mask help you wake up naturally by providing artificial sunrise effect. While tracking the bio-signals during your sleep, the mask detects your sleep cycle and wakes you up at the lightest sleep stage within your set 30-minute alarming time. Stop waking up by distracting alarm at any random point, but do wake up naturally with slowly brightening LED lights and feel refreshed every morning.

5. Additional info

A. Does the Sleep Sense mask come in any other colors?

 The Sleep Sense mask is currently only offered in white. Since the beginning of the campaign, we have received suggestions for additional colors of the mask. For now, our production capacity cannot allow us to entertain the idea of offering new colors, but the success of the campaign will ensure to make it an option. We need your support and feedback on our Sleep Sense to have an optimized and broader selection of it!

B. Can I back-up the data in the mask and my phone?

 There is no need to “back-up” your sleep data since your mask and phone are always connected that all the data are automatically stored in the Sleep Sense cloud system. If your mask or phone ever needs to be replaced, once you connect your new device to your account, it will automatically have all the information and sleep care advices that your old device had.

C. If I have questions, how can I reach your team?

 Please read through the FAQ first to find the answer for your question. We are receiving a lot of special requests related to the Indiegogo campaign, you can contact contact@frasen.com.
