story:
Have you ever woke up in the morning in a panic because you immediately realized you were late for class? What about that important meeting with your boss? Your workout class you PROMISED your friend you'd go to?

We've been there (more times than we'd like to admit!) and we finally said ENOUGH is enough and developed Spritely. Our goal is to make sure you reach your full potential by waking up, seizing the day and kicking some serious butt.



Spritely is the patent-pending, unbeatable wake-up solution guaranteed to get you out of bed in the morning.

With its smart sensor that communicates via Bluetooth with your smartphone, Spritely can detect when you are in and out of bed. The alarm on your phone will go off until you get out of bed or if you get back in. If you turn your phone off, or it dies in the middle of the night, Spritely’s failsafe alarm will go off. The Spritely alarm will also sound if the sensor is removed from the bed, and it will continue to go off until it is put back in place.

Spritely is not just an alarm- it’s a wake-up system and solution that uses a special sensor and corresponding mobile app to guarantee you get out of bed in the morning. It is the only wake-up system that ensures you get out of bed at the time of your alarm. It also wakes you up during the lightest point in your sleep cycle, so you don’t feel groggy in the morning. Spritely collects your sleep data and gives you tips on how you can improve as well.

Our sensor can detect motion, and since there is a certain amount of motion associated with each sleep stage, it derives sleep stages. In the morning, the app presents a graph showing how deep you slept over the course of the night. It also presents some statistics, including your time in bed, time asleep, and time in deep sleep. Taking these all into account, it gives you a comprehensive sleep score out of 100. 
We want to do more than just tell you how you slept, which is what sets us apart from our competitors. Using our app, you can also set goals for improving your sleep score, and Spritely will work with you to achieve those goals. For example, if you make a goal to go to bed within an hour of 10 PM each night and stay up an hour later than the previous night, the app will notify you and help maintain good sleep habits. 

Long term, we hope you will build better sleep habits, and won’t even need to use the alarm. But when you do, it will be the most refreshing wake-up possible, and you’ll never get out of bed a minute late- guaranteed.

The Spritely sensor will detect when you’re in your bed, and it will ring the alarm on your phone until you leave your bed- it will even resume sounding if you try to get back in!

With Spritely, it’s as simple as inserting the thin sensor strip between your mattress and boxspring, plugging it in and hitting the hay!

Thanks to the built-in sleep sensor that sounds your alarm during the lightest stage of your sleep cycle, you will wake up feeling refreshed.

The Spritely sensor connects with the Spritely app on your phone via Bluetooth. The app allows you to set alarms and choose custom tones from your personal music library as well as Soundcloud and Spotify.

Spritely comes equipped with backup batteries and an additional buzzer that will sound when you turn off your phone or remove the sensor from underneath your mattress.

The Spritely app uses its sleep sensor to gather information about your sleep patterns and compiles a “sleep score” that will give you personalized tips on how to improve your sleep habits.

Not only is Spritely the best way to wake up - it’s the ONLY way to make sure you actually wake up! 

We can all agree that waking up in the morning is difficult. You oversleep, your alarm wakes you up in a deep sleep, you press snooze with the touch of a button- how often do you oversleep because of the snooze button or wake up feeling groggy? You’re not alone- in a survey conducted by the National Sleep Foundation, they found that 48% of Americans felt either “extremely motivated” or “very motivated” to improve their sleep. Well, now is your chance. Wake up with Spritely to be refreshed and ready to go in the morning!

Spritely isn’t just for people who have a hard time getting up in the morning. Spritely is for:

  • Those who are interested in learning about and improving their sleep

  • Those who want to be woken up in a more holistic, natural manner

  • Those who often oversleep, missing important meetings and other appointments

  • Those who find it too easy to press snooze and go back to sleep


The Spritely team is made up of fresh, young entrepreneurs straight out of an accelerator program. Composed of students at California Polytechnic State University in San Luis Obispo, the team has been preparing for their campaign around the clock. It has been their goal to come up with a wake-up solution, rather than just a device that wakes people up. The team is passionate about improving people’s sleep habits.

Product development support provided by Point Innovation

     


Will my phone work with Spritely?

The Spritely app can be downloaded on both iOS and Android smartphones and is able to communicate with the sensor via Bluetooth.

Will Spritely actually improve my sleep?

Not only does Spritely provide analytics on your night’s sleep, but it gives you personalized tips on how to act upon the information to gradually improve your sleep habits over time!

How can Spritely guarantee to wake me up in the morning?

Spritely includes additional features that make the system failsafe, such as backup batteries, sensor detection if it is removed from the mattress and a buzzer component that rings if you turn off or silence your phone.

Spritely wakes me up during the lightest point in my sleep cycle. Does that mean I may be woken up earlier or later than what my alarm is set for?

You can set the optimal-wake up period to last between 5 and 90 minutes before the alarm. It will sound based on when you are at the lightest point in you sleep stages. It will never go sound after the set alarm time.

How does Spritely know when the lightest point in my sleep cycle occurs?

Spritely uses a special sleep-staging algorithm to detect the lightest point in your sleep cycle, so you don’t wake up groggy from a deep sleep.

I usually turn off or silence my phone at night. Will my alarm still go off?

Yes, Spritely works even when your phone is off by sounding the buzzer on the Spritely sensor.

What happens if the sensor becomes removed from under my mattress?

Spritely’s sensor can detect if it is removed from the mattress and will sound the alarm if it is taken out.

I like to set my alarm tone to a song that I’ve downloaded on my phone. Can I do that with Spritely?

Yes! You can select music from your personal library, Spotify or Soundcloud to set as your alarm tone within Spritely’s app.

Composed of students at California Polytechnic State University in San Luis Obispo, the team has been preparing for their campaign around the clock. It has been their goal to come up with a wake-up solution, rather than just a device that wakes people up. The team is passionate about improving people’s sleep habits.


Product development support provided by Point Innovation

     



Will my phone work with Spritely?The Spritely app can be downloaded on both iOS and Android smartphones and is able to communicate with the sensor via Bluetooth.Will Spritely actually improve my sleep?Not only does Spritely provide analytics on your night’s sleep, but it gives you personalized tips on how to act upon the information to gradually improve your sleep habits over time!How can Spritely guarantee to wake me up in the morning?Spritely includes additional features that make the system failsafe, such as backup batteries, sensor detection if it is removed from the mattress and a buzzer component that rings if you turn off or silence your phone. Spritely wakes me up during the lightest point in my sleep cycle. Does that mean I may be woken up earlier or later than what my alarm is set for?You can set the optimal-wake up period to last between 5 and 90 minutes before the alarm. It will sound based on when you are at the lightest point in you sleep stages. It will never go sound after the set alarm time.How does Spritely know when the lightest point in my sleep cycle occurs?Spritely uses a special sleep-staging algorithm to detect the lightest point in your sleep cycle, so you don’t wake up groggy from a deep sleep. I usually turn off or silence my phone at night. Will my alarm still go off?Yes, Spritely works even when your phone is off by sounding the buzzer on the Spritely sensor. What happens if the sensor becomes removed from under my mattress?Spritely’s sensor can detect if it is removed from the mattress and will sound the alarm if it is taken out.I like to set my alarm tone to a song that I’ve downloaded on my phone. Can I do that with Spritely?Yes! You can select music from your personal library, Spotify or Soundcloud to set as your alarm tone within Spritely’s app.

story:
Introducing The MicroGym

Hello, my name is Michael Miller from Buckeye Inventions, LLC and we are here to tell you about our ambitions to create the world’s first self-serve exercise machines. The world of personal fitness is about to change forever. You will no longer be limited to Gym memberships and specific locations.


                                          So what are we doing? 

 

The goal of this campaign is to reach like-minded people for collaboration, raise money for this startup company, and we also want to spread the word.

Our Solution

Introducing the World’s First Self Serve Fitness machine! We are creating  a fitness machine that accepts credit cards so you can fill your need for exercising at anytime, anywhere they are offered.

This revolutionary self-serve fitness machine is...



Now imagine actually owning one of these machines and having it placed in an airport, or a mall, or anywhere that people usually have to “wait.” Once they use the machine, you will be making a profit, and they will be getting their needed exercise! It is a win-win!




How You Can Help

For us to bring the “MicroGym Technolgy” to life, we need your support!

Your generous funding will help us get things started in order to realize our concept. It will assist us with the cost of further development, manufacturing and production. We will also use our funding to test our concept to make it better.




How We'll Use the Funds

We set our goal at $100,000 in order to get into the “MicroGym” market. This will includes marketing, materials, labor and related expenses for start-up. 

The amount requested will also tell us if this is a good idea or GREAT one!

The “MicroGym” needs your attention and interest! If you love this product as much as we do then please take a moment to see the use of this technology and contribute. Help us spread the word and get things started! If we don't reach our goal you get your money back!

Below is a little info on the brains of this technology!


Final Thank You

We feel so grateful to everyone who has taken the time to read out this campaign and for those who contributed what they could to make a difference and helping us spread the word. Please know your efforts, even the smallest, don’t go unnoticed. We will continue to keep you posted on what your donation helped us achieve. Please share this with anyone you think would be willing to help.


Also...

If you do not have to have a PayPal account. They accept credit cards and debit cards.

Please help spread the word! Don't forget to use the social media tools on this site.

All we're asking is  for 5 minutes of your time, a $5 contribution, and 5 personal emails.

Feel free to leave a message also.


If you wish to contact us:

Contact Information

Name: Michael Miller

Company: Buckeye Inventions, LLC

Phone Number: 330-353-9578

Personal Email: buckeyeinventions@gmail.com

If you have thoughts or would like to discuss a collaboration or sponsorship, we would love to hear from you, please feel free to contact us at info@buckeyeinventions.com

story:
Bad decisions were made

Hello, my name is Robin and I made a terrible mistake. I was fooled by the false advertisement of Jolla. I didn't know, that by being "Unlike" they really just meant "not working".

Why the Jolla was a mistake for me

The system is way too underdeveloped. There a lot of unfixed bugs. But with every update they promised to fixed them, but never really did. There are a ton of "guides", explaining how to fix most of the bugs. But I didn't buy a phone to "hack" some strange stuff into a console and maybe destroying all I got.

Here are some of the bugs I encounter every day.

  • Android Apps are freezing when not focused for a while.
  • Native Apps are crashing on a regular basis.
  • Battery Charge is jumping around (30% to 0% or 10% to 20%...).
  • Logged in Accounts are disconnecting every other day.
Also, there's no native App for WhatsApp. I'm a student. I do use WhatsApp on a regular basis. The old "native" App got users banned, and the Android version is crashing and is often not receiving any messages. So without this I'm missing a lot of important messages from College, Friends and Family.
Instead of fixing the current bugs they knew about, Jolla started developing a Tablet. With this move I feel left alone by them. But since they always promised to fix the bugs, I was waiting. And after a year of waiting? Nothing really changed and I regret the purchase.

So? Where can You help me?

I want to switch to a phone that is more reliable and can drive my everyday communication. So I want to switch to a Blackberry Classic. I choose this phone, because some of my friends are using it and are really satisfied by it. I had a opportunity to test it a few times and have to say that it just feels better. Apps aren't crashing and there are native Apps for all my needs.

Why I can't buy a better phone myself

As I'm a student, I don't have a lot of money. I'm happy if I am able to pay my rent and get something to eat everyday. I get exited if I have enough money left at the end of a month to go to a pub and get a drink there. So, there currently is no way for me to buy myself a better phone, since the money I had saved went into buying the Jolla.

Can't offer money, but still want to help?

That's fine. Leave me a positive message, get the word out there, so I can reach more people? That would be awesome too. Every little thing to help me here is greatly appreciated.

story:
Getting Tired of Snoring? SOMNOVA Can Help!!

 

What is SOMNOVA?

SOMNOVA is the Only Solution to a Better Sleep.

SOMNOVA is the world's first smart anti-snoring mat, helping you stop snoring by changing your sleeping position. It is non-invasive and comfortable compared with the wearable devices, such as masks, dentures, and nose clips. At the same time, SOMNOVA can give you an acupoint massage, relaxing and leading you to a better sleep.

It’s free! Click the button below and share our project to your Facebook/Twitter, you will get a limited edition of Chinese magical massager (helps you relax and have a better sleep) for free now! Don’t forget to contact us for the gift after sharing.

Hurry up, 300 quotas only!

 

Featured in

Feel free to contact  us, we are happy to help here.

Via: service@somnova.com

 

Users' Comments

 

How Does SOMNOVA Work?

When snoring is detected, SOMNOVA will rise up gradually and gently, moving your body to a lateral position. As a result, snoring is reduced effectively.

Real Time Monitor: When you are asleep, SOMNOVA will monitor your body movements and breathing patterns for the adjustment helping to stop snoring.

 

Two Ways of Setting

Considering different users’ sleeping habits, we have specially conceived two kinds of setting.

 

The Mobile App

 

Why SOMNOVA is so Amazing?

Why do People Snore and How Dangerous is it?  

Generally speaking, snoring results from the relaxation of the uvula and soft palate. When you are sleeping, those tissues can be relaxed enough to partially block the trachea, resulting in irregular airflow and vibrations. Those vibrations are heard as snoring.    

Snoring is an universal reason of sleep deprivation to snorers and those who around them. In addition, snoring can cause daytime drowsiness, irritability, inattention and libido decrease. It is also been suggested that snoring can cause significant psychological and social damage to snoring sufferers. Multiple studies reveal a positive correlation between loud snoring and risk of heart attack (about +34% chance) and stroke (about +67% chance).

How do People Feel if They Have Snoring Problems?

There are different kinds of snoring patients. In medical science, we define, during sleeping, mild snoring patients will stop breathing 5 times per hour; moderate patients,20 times per hour; and severe patients, 40 times per hour or even more . And each time of breathing stop is longer than 10 seconds.

1. Mild snoring patients will feel chest tightness, as in the crowded subway.

2. Moderate snoring patients will feel like breathless after climbing stairs.

3. Severe snoring patients will appear hypoxia or sudden death

How SOMNOVA Relieves Snoring?

As the studies shown, sleeping on the lateral position instead of lying on the back can reduce snoring effectively.

There is a snore monitor and a mini-pump in the gray case placed beside the bed. This mat consists of two airbags. When the case perceives you snores, it will pump the air slowly into one of the two airbags. As one airbag inflates, it gently pushes you to your side and engages your body to remain this position. Then snoring is reduced effectively.

 

The Science of SOMNOVA: 

The Only Way to a Better Sleep  

There are researches found that approximately 25-60% of patients with obstructive sleep apnea are correlated with sleep position. Avoidance of the supine posture is efficacious for reducing the events of apnea. And the optimal sleep position reduced mild snoring by more than 80%.  

1.Joosten, S.A., et al., Supine position related obstructive sleep apnea in adults: pathogenesis and treatment. Sleep Med Rev, 2014. 18(1): p. 7-17.

2.Lee, J.B., et al., Determining optimal sleep position in patients with positional sleep-disordered breathing using response surface analysis. J Sleep Res, 2009. 18(1): p. 26-35.

Snore judgment is key of our technology. SOMNOVA will continually cooperated with medical institution to get more snore sample. This will help our acoustic expert and engineers optimize a more precise snore judgment algorithm. Each time we issue a newly optimized algorithm, users can get it by free updates.

 

Experiments on SOMNOVA

We have done a lot of experiments on SOMNOVA, including the falling test, temperature test, weight test,noise test and clinical test. We make sure SOMNOVA is a reliable and effective production. SOMNOVA really help people to relief snoring and keep people refreshing when they get up.

 

The Design of SOMNOVA

It is simple and easy to use SOMNOVA.

 

 

The Birth of SOMNOVA

Positional Intervention Therapy 

During the War of Independence, small cannonballs were sewn into the backs of uniforms to keep soldiers from snoring and alert the enemy. Sleeping on the lateral side not only can stop snoring but also improve sleep quality. Therefore they can have better physical strength to fight for the independence of America. With the long history of  Positional Intervention Therapy, it is commonly recognized by medical community. Other traditional methods include put a pillow or a ball under your back, which make people feel uncomfortable lying on it.

Why do we Design a Smart Mat?  

We have tried many traditional methods of positional therapy , such as putting a pillow under the back. It is very uncomfortable and uneasy to fall asleep. In the sleeping, because of this discomfort, it is easy to lie on the back and start to snore again. We hope to invent an automatic device that help you to sleep on the side only when you are snoring, but you can also lie on the back when you don't snore. Yes, this is SOMNOVA.  

Why SOMNOVA is not a smart pillow?  

Actually we have made many tests on inflatable pillow. But there are lot of nerves in the head and therefore it is very sensitive. When pushing the head, it is very easy to wake up.  

On the other hand, it is possible that the airway becomes more narrow when pushing your head. Although you may not snore, but the next morning you may be more tired.

After more than a year of research and development, we came out with SOMNOVA.

The SOMNOVA System

● One power adapter  

● One control case (Please put the case 60-70cm away from your head, and the sound reception hole should turn in the direction of your head.)

● Air tube made of silica gel  

● One inflatable mat ( formed of two independent air bags )  

● One cloth cover (There are four fastener in each corner, which can connect with corresponding four fastener in the mat)

 

Rewards

FUTURE RETAIL PRICE: $580  

Backers enjoy 80% off! Help us build the Community！

See more detail at reward section

 

Team SOMNOVA   

I am Ken, founder of Somnova. We are a young, dynamic and creative team. As a group of young people with American dreams, in this equal society, we believe that we can eventually be successful by our own efforts. Now we are very close to the success and we really need your support.  

Positional therapy is a good snore solution which has a long history. As early as the War of Independence, in order to have a better sleep, cannonballs were sewn to soldiers’ uniforms to keep them sleeping on the side and relieve snoring. Good rest without snoring helped them more energetic to fight for their dreams, the victory in the war and the independence of America.  

Somnova is based on this traditional positional therapy and combined with modern science and technology. With Somnova, it is more comfortable and more effective to stop your snoring by helping sleeping on the side.  

The workplace is like a battlefield. If you also have an American dream, you need to keep energetic to fight for success just like those soldiers. Or you even don’t know why you are lost in the American selection. Somova helps you relieve snoring and have a good sleep. Then you would be full of vigor to meet challenges every day.  

So fight for American dream with Somnova.

 

Time Line  

Get limited edition better-sleep-comb-massager for free now!! by simply clicking the link below to share our project in your Facebook/Twitter!!!!

Your little effort will help us and the SOMNOVA community a lot! This special comb improves your sleep quality. It can gently do a massage by covering the major acupoints on your head, and makes you feel very relaxing and comfortable. 

 

Hurry up , we only offer 300 free combs. 

If you want to get one free comb, please complete the following steps:

  1. Click here to share our project on your Facebook/Twitter (Your must write something in the share field to introduce or recommend SOMNOVA to your friends). 

 2. Click here to add us as a friend on your Facebook/Twitter (We won't send you anything in the Facebook. We just want to check your share content and contact you for shipping )

 3. Make sure you do not delete your share until our campaign ends.

 4. After campaign ends, we will contact you on Facebook for shipping the free reward,. No extra cost or shipping cost!

 

FAQ

1.How is SOMNOVA different from other snoring solution?

First, many snoring solutions are wearable but Somnova is non-wearable. With Somnova, there is nothing to wear to bed.

Second, Somnova relieves snoring with a non-invasive method compared with other snoring solutions. Somnova softly pushes you to your side and encourages your body to remain on its side, without waking you up.

Other solutions stops snoring by interrupting your deep sleep through a pillow movement, sound or electric shock, which affects your sleep quality.

2.How does SOMNOVA  engage user's body to a lateral position?

The inflatable mat consists of two independent airbags. When snoring is detected, one airbag would be inflated and bulge slowly, which pushes your back slowly. Then you would change your sleeping position unconsciously.

3.Does SOMNOVA affects sleep quality?

No. SOMNOVA would not raise your body totally up. The speed of inflation and deflation is very slow, which you could even not perceive an obvious change. This process is so gentle that it would not wake you up.

4. Is SOMNOVA available for fat people?

Yes. It is available for people whose weight is under 200 KG.

 

Risks and challenges

Any hardware company can face challenges when sourcing parts. Our team has excellent experience creating hardware products, so we can avoid any delays getting SOMNOVA to you. 
We promise to keep our backers informed about any issues that concern SOMNOVA. With regular updates for our backers rest assured that at any moment you will know what exactly we are up to and when SOMNOVA will be at your doorstep.

Somnova softly pushes you to your side and encourages your body to remain on its side, without waking you up.Other solutions stops snoring by interrupting your deep sleep through a pillow movement, sound or electric shock, which affects your sleep quality.2.How does SOMNOVA  engage user's body to a lateral position?The inflatable mat consists of two independent airbags. When snoring is detected, one airbag would be inflated and bulge slowly, which pushes your back slowly. Then you would change your sleeping position unconsciously.3.Does SOMNOVA affects sleep quality?No. SOMNOVA would not raise your body totally up. The speed of inflation and deflation is very slow, which you could even not perceive an obvious change. This process is so gentle that it would not wake you up.4. Is SOMNOVA available for fat people?Yes. It is available for people whose weight is under 200 KG. Risks and challengesAny hardware company can face challenges when sourcing parts. Our team has excellent experience creating hardware products, so we can avoid any delays getting SOMNOVA to you. We promise to keep our backers informed about any issues that concern SOMNOVA. With regular updates for our backers rest assured that at any moment you will know what exactly we are up to and when SOMNOVA will be at your doorstep.

story:
Live Cool® Hot Flash Relief

As a woman, sometimes you want to feel like you're hot. But if you’re in or approaching menopause, you may be feeling REALLY hot.

Uncomfortable hot! Please stop it hot!

That’s why we created Live Cool®, an all-natural supplement that helps you keep your cool!

Live Cool® is a perfect balance of safe, natural and scientifically proven ingredients which help women manage numerous menopause symptoms, including hot flashes and night sweats. 

Live Cool® comes in soft chewables that are delicious. They’re ready when you need them, and they work with your body to keep you chill.

Say goodbye to pills and hello to Live Cool®!

 

Our Triple Action Formula

Menopause affects women physically, emotionally, and psychologically.  Most products try to provide physical relief--others both physical and emotional; but only Live Cool's Triple Action Formula containing Eleuthero, the King of Adaptogens that is clinically proven to help support menopause health in three ways.  

So you’ll be feeling good all over!

 

 

 All-Natural & Effective Relief

Live Cool® is a synergistic all-natural combination of soy, black cohosh, and our proprietary Siberian Eleuthero works naturally to relieve symptoms of menopause safely, including hot flashes.  Live Cool® helps to significantly reduce menopause symptoms like hot flashes, night sweats, sleeplessness, and moodiness. Live Cool® also supports normal cardiovascular function, provides circulatory support and safely induces favorable alterations in energy to promote optimal health by increasing metabolism, stamina, and sex drive.

 

 

Worry-Free & Hormone-Free

Live Cool® does not contain synthetic hormones. So if you’re worried about going on prescription drugs or a hormone replacement therapy plan, give Live Cool® a try first.

It’s safe, it’s easy, and it’s all natural

 

Live Cooler with Live Cool®!

You're not alone. Every day, 6,000 women in the US reach menopause. That's over 2.1 million women each year. And while every woman experiences menopause differently, up to 80% of women in menopause have to deal with hot flashes on a daily basis - at home, while working or while socializing.

Stop hot flashes cold in their tracks with Live Cool®.

 

 

Support Our Campaign Today!

Live Cool® is offering multiple perk packages exclusively through Indiegogo so you can support the production of Live Cool and receive your supply this spring. You can order:

  • 1-month 
  • 3-month
  • 6-month
  • 1-year supplies

Depending on your choice, you may receive any combination of perks including: 

  • Simply Radiant Organic Vitamin C&E Anti-Aging Face Mask
  • A super cute Live Cool® t-shirt
  • A Live Cool® Baseball Cap

Free shipping on all US orders!

 

Live Cool® FAQ’s

Is Live Cool all-natural?

Yes.  Live Cool® contains 100% all-natural herbal ingredients that have been tested and shown to be effective at significantly reducing menopause symptoms. There are no synthetic hormones in the Live Cool® formula.

Will Live Cool help me to sleep better?

Many women experience disturbed sleep patterns during their menopausal years.  If you suffer from lack of sleep, Live Cool® may be able to help you. Clinical research has shown our proprietary blend of active ingredients improves healthy sleeping patterns in menopausal women.

Should I take Live Cool every day?

Yes. You should eat 1 soft chew every day for maximum relief of menopause symptoms.

Are there any side effects from taking Live Cool?

The primary active ingredients in Live Cool® have been used for centuries for the relief of menopause symptoms.  Historically, they have been proven safe and effective.

†The statements on this website have not been evaluated by the FDA. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

*Individual results will vary. Regarding the endorsements and testimonials provided on this website, please note that while they represent individual, real life experiences of women who have used Live Cool in the past, they are individual results and may not reflect the typical results that other users will experience. We do not make any claims or assurances that these individual experiences represent the typical results that Live Cool consumers will achieve.

story:
3rd Arm

It was Plato that said, "necessity is the mother of invention", and right now it is so alarmingly clear that we need to flatten the curve of the Covid-19 pandemic. The goal of the 3rd Arm project is to reduce germ spread  through the surface-to-human contact required in everyday life. While we can all operate within the guidelines of proper hygiene and social distancing, there are situations that inherently require contact with surfaces. Ultimately, this campaign will produce a tool that:

  • can push, pull, click, grab, and twist items such as doors, payment portals, ATMs, and other public utility
  • can be used by left or right-handed people alike
  • is intuitive and useful for people with all levels of strength and dexterity
  • is 100% made in America

With your help, we can produce a device that will reduce the spread of disease and become a commonplace safety item that compliments the use of sanitizer gels and wipes.

 
The team:
  • Nicko Trataris
    • Serial entrepreneur and inventor with a mechanical engineering degree and background. Led many hardware and software projects from mainframes to Smart Phones. Currently focus on software development for the Medical Industry.
  • Kaitlin Trataris
    • Kat Trataris is an artist and entrepreneur based in Oakland California. She works as a partnership and business developer for small nonprofits. Currently works as the Director of Programs and Partnerships in the arts. 
  • Travis Lander
    • Development professional and founder of The Lander Group, a digital technology consulting firm. Worked in several roles to plan, develop, and execute projects for both large and small enterprises in publishing, automotive, government, and lifestyle industries. Currently leads Customer Success for SoftLedger, a cloud-native general ledger system.

 

What We Need & What You Get

While we have already contributed our own capital for initial R&D, prototype production, and user application testing, we need the capital necessary for greater production and awareness. The more 3rd Arms in circulation, the more effective we can be in combating the spread of infectious disease. Funding stages:

  • Initial goal to produce the first fleet of 1,000 units: $19,000
  • Growth phase or 1,001 - 5,750 units : $19,001 - $218,250
  • Ongoing production of 5,750+: $218,250+

We feel that we all bear responsibility in suppressing the spread of disease, particularly novel disease in which we don't have established treatments yet. As such, we make a pledge ourselves to contribute 10% after our ongoing production stage is reached as donations to those that would benefit most from the 3rd Arm,

 

The Impact

As a species, we have always leveraged tools to advance our capabilities. Today, the biggest impact we can all make is to reduce the amount of contact we have with each other, whether direct or indirect. By incorporating the 3rd Arm into daily routine, we can reduce community spread of novel viruses, such as Covid-19, to keep our most vulnerable safe and our healthcare system intact.

Your contribution will launch the first wave of the 3rd Arm that will keep you shielded from inevitable everyday contact, as well as your community through contact suppression and added awareness to these silent dangers.

Some common use cases:

  • Grocery shopping
  • Physical and digital signature with point-of-sale portals
  • Gas station or charging stations
  • Entry and egress from buildings
  • Public facilities and amenities
    • Bathrooms
    • Parking garage
    • Crosswalk signals
    • Toll booth
       

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge will be to produce enough supply to match demand. Like social distancing, the 3rd Arm is more impactful the more widely adopted it is. Less contact with surfaces means less contact with germs, which leads to less disease.

We have already found there is immense demand for this product, so our biggest risk is inadequate funding for the execution of the timeline to meet this demand. People need this protection now. We are fast tracking this launch to meet the demand that has been brought upon by the Covid-19 pandemic, but the 3rd Arm will be essential to guard against germs of all kinds for years to come.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not in a financial position to pledge financially, we completely understand. The next best pledge is to spread awareness about our campaign, so that our message can reach as many people as possible. Use the share tools provided by Indiegogo or tell friends, family, and communities about the 3rd Arm so we can all be contributors in our fight against disease.

OR if you cannot make the full pledge, contribute whatever amount you can towards the 10% donation pool for those most exposed: elderly, immunocompromised, and healthcare workers. 

 

How it begun

On February 10th, 2020 I was going to see a client in San Diego. I was not usually concerned about touching things but I had been following the Corona Virus story and I was concerned. When going up in the elevator I noticed a person using their elbow to press the floor button. Then on the visit to the bathroom I washed my hands, grabbed a paper towel, which I kept to open the door before dropping it in the trash. As I approached the door to my clients office I though, 'wait I don't have the paper towel anymore. How stupid is that, I went to the trouble of using the paper on the door handle of the bathroom and a minute later I was faced the problem at another door. Being a mechanical engineer I sat in the parking lot of a grocery store waiting for my wife and I sketched out my idea. How can we open a large variety of commercial doors without touching anything and keeping the contact as far away as possible. It had to be small, but large enough and strong enough to open large door handles. Then it has to shield us when doing other thinks that require pushing, pulling, twisting and grabbing. That is how it started.

I also wanted something that was more than a small key chain accessory, what is the point of touching everything with a tool and then touching that device with accumulated germs and viruses. We will strive to improve the 3rd Arm Shield as this level of protection will end, this is the beginning of a new way of life.

story:
MyFaceMask

MyFaceMask App is a mobile application downloadable on IOS and Android devices, which allows you to create transparent masks adaptable to your characteristics and therefore customizable by scanning your face in 3D.
The scanning process is simple and fast: it takes place through the use of the camera of your mobile phone.
In addition, the material used in the production of the masks allows their repeated use, being able to sterilize them through
washing at high temperatures.

MyFaceMask was designed and built to fight against this invisible enemy 

that's killing our loved ones,

The idea is to make a reusable face shields that is ergonomically suited to your face, ecological to be reused several times by changing only the filters.

With MyFaceMask you can generate a 3D model that will fit your face and you can print it comfortably in your home without the need to go out.

MyFaceMask with its 3D scanning process, allows you to create ergonomic masks suitable for every feature of your face. This custom adaptation will allow you to reduce the marks released by normal masks after hours of use.

The problem solved by the project

With MyFaceMask App we want to find the solution to the problem of the availability of personal protection devices for everyone, in fact thanks to this app anyone can print his mask, following our guidelines for the use of safe and biodegradable materials, with their own 3D printer,only if you are certificated member of our network to ensure the quality and safety of the mask produced according to all applicable regulations, so that you have a mask for you and your family that can last for all this complicated period that we are living. 

The solution you bring to the table

MyFaceMask is installable for free on all iOS and Android devices that have compatibility requirements and in a simple automated way and can create your own 3D mask and send it directly to the 3d printer certificated

The idea behind this project is to create a safe, cost-effective product that respects nature for us and future generations

The needs to continue the project

This project needs funds in order to create the best mask with the best materials and for this a significant investment in research and development in addition to wanting to make and print masks to those who do not have the opportunity to have their own 3D printer 

The value of your post-crisis solutions

We believe a lot in this project because it is a valuable help to anyone who does not have the opportunity to always have a disposable mask and this mask can be reused even after this crisis (hopefully it ends as soon as possible) in any sector that needs personal protection devices

Ergonomic MyFaceMask with its 3D scanning process, allows you to create ergonomic masks suitable for every feature of your face. This custom adaptation will allow you to reduce the marks released by normal masks after hours of use.

  • 3d Printable

    The realization of the 3D masks allows anyone to create them independently.
    In fact, a 3D printer and a mobile phone are enough to quickly create personalized templates based on the desired quantity.

  • Ecological

    Every day millions of masks are used and thrown away, this is a great environmental damage as well as being a danger of contamination 

    The material of MyFaceMask makes these masks absolutely ecological, a very important feature if you consider high consumption
    daily, especially in some sectors.
    In fact, these masks can be reused several times later washing at high temperatures which allows sterilization.

  • Trasparent

    One of the main features of MyFaceMask is transparency.
    The idea of ​​making these masks with a transparent material was born mainly from the awareness of the importance of lip reading for deaf people.

  • Customizable you with the app you can enter the text you prefer like your name, dedication or phrase to make your mask unique

 

 MyFaceMask prototype models

We are testing the best 3D models and material to create the perfect MyFaceMask for you!

  • Model 1 prototype (Dany)  

 

Why need your help?

 

We need your help to be able to find the best solution and be able to make the best prototype, using the best materials at the best cost and certificate 3d models

Your contribution is essential to fight this battle together and win together

at this difficult time we must remain united, any of your contribution, proposals or even criticism of this project is welcome

Also help us simply by sharing this project.

Thank you and it will be all right!

#stopcovid

story:
Due to the spread of new corona-virus infection, masks and disinfectant goods which are in high demand. wE. is a mask case with stylish design that anyone can carry around. Equipped with UV-C LED light that has already acquired the standard, it has an excellent sterilizing effect. Keep the mask clean. Easy to pick up compared to other disinfectant mask cases.

We believe that everyone recognizes the importance of keeping your mask clean. However, can you be sure that your mask is really 'hygienic'?  It is reasonable to say that not many have given it much thought.

wE. is a mask case with sterilizing power by using UV-C LED light. 

But, it is not merely a mask case. 

「with Earth.」

Benefiting from Earth’s blessings, we are, at the same time, exposed to unpredictable disasters and viruses. How can we adapt ourselves to this ever-changing environment?   

We strive to improve the masks that have proven to become a necessity to live on this present Earth. A project that helps further keep daily masks in a hygienic and secure condition to ease our minds, the 'wE.' .

 

Have you ever struggled with where to put your masks in daily life? The answer is wE. 

Reusing masks you put in a pocket or on a table?

Bacteria and germs multiply when a mask is used for a long period of time.  It is not safe to wear such a mask anymore. 

Handling as well as managing masks has become a concern.

In light of invisible bacteria, it is necessary to sterilize your masks, even for reusable ones. 

Why do we need wE. in our daily lives? 

Let's look at the following cases.

Removing your mask when you are dining with your loved ones in restaurants. 

Would you leave it on the table? Stuff it into your bag? 

wE. can keep your mask hygienic. To this day and age, it is not an exaggeration to call this table manners.

 

 

A sunny day.

Driving with a lover.

After taking off the mask inside a car, do you just put it in the bottle holder or drawer?

wE. can keep your mask hygienic. This is a social etiquette showing your care towards your loved one.

 

To set everything in order. Comfortably progressing work smoothly and efficiently in a tidy environment.

When you take off the mask during work, how would you manage it? On the desk? In a bag?

wE. can keep your mask hygienic. This may even be a lifehack.

 

There should be people who feel stressful wearing a mask during daily life.

Let’s have a break without a mask.

Please do not stick your mask into the pocket and wear it again.

wE. can keep your mask hygienic. This can definitely bring comfort to you.

 

Despite age and gender, the fine polished design of wE. fits everyone.

It is fashionable because you need to bring it out. We believe everyone agrees with this.

This is a design filled with the atmosphere of clean and simple.

Even westerners who were not used to wearing masks have started equipping themselves with masks. Our daily habits change along with time.

Here comes the time that carrying a mask case is a part of social etiquette.

wE. wants to integrate into everyone’s life as natural as it can.

wE. has 2 colors, Black and White. 

Match your style with your preferred color. 

The UV-C LED in wE. has passed the SGS test, showing that it is equipped with effective sterilizing power. 

Comparing with UV-A and UV-B, UV-C has a wavelength of 200-280nm which is appropriate for sterilization, thus UV-C is commonly used in many sterilizing equipment. 

wE. uses this UV-C in LED form so as to generate strong UV rays that strengthen sterilizing power.

 

Test Content

Bacteria is exposed to 2 UV-C LED lights (3mW*) in wE. mask case for 6 minutes, r results demonstrating high sterilizing power found in UV-C LED light. . 

Designed in Japan and Made in Taiwan

Treating wE. project as a new challenge and possibility, we are striving to contribute our creativity and innovation to society, especially in our hard times. Japanese members from Gifu and Tokyo, together with product team from Taiwan, crossing the national borders, we strengthen on high quality and successfully turned this project into trustworthy product to everyone.

wE. is different from those which merely change the packaging and color of existing products, wE. is an original product starting from zero, design and manufacturing. 

For the design, under repetitive trials we have finally come up with a good-quality and user-friendly design. 

A slim size that fits in your bags and only occupies limited space. 

Size:　200mm(L) x 115mm(W) x 18mm(H)

Use of wE. is extremely simple and easy. All you need to do is insert your mask, connect with electricity then press a button.

wE. is designed with a sliding cover so you can open and close smoothly. Also, the lid is fixed by a magnet that prevents it from opening accidentally.

Connect with Type C cable and turn on the switch

Connect with a Type C battery, press on the button and wait 6-minutes for sterilization.

The case will automatically turn off 15 seconds after the sterilization has completed.

※Type C cable is not included.

(Nintendo SWITCH and Macbook also use Type C port)

 

Experience any-time sterilization by bringing along your mobile charger. 

You can sterilize your mask anytime anywhere by bringing along a Type-C mobile charger.

Your mask can always be in a germ-free condition.

Duration of battery: No battery inside

Time for charging: Not available

Charging port: Type C    ※Type C cable is not included

Origin: Designed in Japan, Made in Taiwan

Operation Mode: Connect with Type C charging cable, press the SW button and wait for 6 minutes for sterilization.

The mask case will automatically turn off 15 seconds after the sterilization has completed.

Sterilization LED: 2 pcs of 3mA UVC LED

Remarks:

1. UV-C is known as effective for sterilization but it depends on the condition of the mask. Also, it is not guaranteed that consistent sterilizing power works on all kinds of bacteria.

2. Please do not look at LED lights directly.

3.Sterilization activates only when the case is connected by Type C and after the SW button is pressed, lasting for 6 minutes. No sterilization takes place when it is not connected.

But, it is not merely a mask case. 
「with Earth.」
Benefiting from Earth’s blessings, we are, at the same time, exposed to unpredictable disasters and viruses. How can we adapt ourselves to this ever-changing environment?   
We strive to improve the masks that have proven to become a necessity to live on this present Earth. A project that helps further keep daily masks in a hygienic and secure condition to ease our minds, the 'wE.' .

 

Have you ever struggled with where to put your masks in daily life? The answer is wE. 
Reusing masks you put in a pocket or on a table?
Bacteria and germs multiply when a mask is used for a long period of time.  It is not safe to wear such a mask anymore. 
Handling as well as managing masks has become a concern.

Why do we need wE. in our daily lives?

Removing your mask when you are dining with your loved ones in restaurants. 
Would you leave it on the table? Stuff it into your bag? 
wE. can keep your mask hygienic. To this day and age, it is not an exaggeration to call this table manners.

story:
But not all of us have the time to exercise, and sometimes we’re too lazy to go to the gym to work out.

 

 

Where and what exactly is our body’s CORE?

The core is the body’s column. It is comprised of a network of muscles that holds us up and ensures proper functioning of our entire body.

 

What are the benefits of taking care of our core?

First, maintain a good habit of putting your body’s core upright. Proper posture increases the breakdown of body fat around the belly and strengthens muscles around the waist.

The Keeping Core Band is the simplest way you can change your body to make it more fit and toned.

Bad habits create bad posture, and bad posture definitely isn’t good for your body. Even though we know about our bad habits, we keep forgetting to correct them.

Now you say, “Well, I want someone to correct my wrong posture.”

From now on, the Keeping Core Band will be your personal trainer.

 

 

Why do you have to tighten up your abdomen?

There is a method known as Gokhale motion or Stacksitting that induces continuous core contraction. Have you ever heard that tightening up your belly makes you lose weight? While further studies are needed to prove this, it is quite known that this method tightens up your belly, improves balance, body stability, and helps reduce waist circumference. Try it and see!

People with belly fat often do ‘core exercises’ that stimulate the core muscles of the body around the spine. As the core muscles become stronger, the position changes as they support the spine. If you do ‘core exercises’ regularly, your metabolic rate will increase and your body fat will break down as well.

Why use the Keeping Core Band?

In the course of acquiring a doctorate in physiotherapy and treating patients over 15 years, I have realized that staying in good posture is as important as treatment. A healthy, beautiful body is impossible without continuous effort and good habits. It's hard to feel the effects because most people do not want to be bothered with it or they simply keep forgetting.

So this is what I thought: If there is something that gives you daily feedback to help tighten up your belly no matter where you are, it will help people to stay healthy.

That's why we created the Keeping Core Band.

 

HOW TO USE

 

 

Adjust the length of the Keeping Core Band to match your waist circumference. The proper length at this time is around the perimeter of the tightened belly.

 

 

 

Tighten your belly as if you are pulling all the way toward the back. Then put the adjusted Keeping Core Band around waist just below the belly button and fasten the clasps to

 

 

 

The Keeping Core Band works when you relax your stomach and stops when you tighten your belly.

 

 

 

 

Now you can go on with your daily activities while making your body healthy and fit!

 

 

 

 

 

STUDIES AND RESEARCH

 

Effects of performing intentional abdominal muscle compression using real-time feedback based on changes detected in waist circumference during activities of daily living on pain, functional capacity, and neuromuscular control in chronic low back pain patients <Publication of domestic records>.

Effects of intentional core contraction along with real time monitoring on the physical safety of Pilates participants <Registration confirmation for domestic equivalent publications>.

 

 

The vibrations from the Keeping Core Band alert you to correct your posture. It’s like having your own personal trainer!

 

You can wear the Keeping Core Band anytime, anywhere.

 

FEATURES

 

  • Changes in the abdominal area should be monitored closely.
  • It is thin enough to be undetectable when worn under clothes.
  • Even if you wear it over your clothes, it will look nice and natural.
  • It is lightweight.
  • There are no sharp screws.
  • The vibrating feeling is subtle and comfortable.
  • It is a product without any harmful electromagnetic waves (EM).
  • Effects are observed through clinical trials.

 

The Keeping Core Band is compact and virtually unnoticeable under your clothes. And with our stylish colors, you can even turn it into a fashion statement!

 

Our Team

 

 

A team of experts with health-related knowledge and over 20+ years of product development experience created the Keeping Core Band.

 

COLOR OPTIONS

 

 

 

 

*Please note that the colors on the picture may vary due to lighting. Actual colors are Black and Pure White.

 

 

DELIVERY PROCESS

Keeping Core Band is already ready for the shipping! You will receive our perks by November.

You will get your our own customized Core package box.

When you open the box, you will see stylish foil logos in black. We used high quality carbon paper instead of inexpensive coating. Please open it carefully to avoid scratches.

The contents of the box are: 1 Keeping Core Band, and the user manual.

Now you are on your way to build a healthy and fit body!

 

WE ARE READY TO SHIP!

Back us and get your rewards by November! 

 

F&Q

 

Does it come with only one waist size?

The Keeping Core Band can be adjusted to fit up to 40 inches around the waist. (minimum: 26 inches, maximum: 40 inches)

 

Where is the power switch?

The Keeping Core Band does not have a power switch since it consumes very little to no power when it is not in use.

 

Why do you use batteries instead of charging them?

We use batteries instead of charging the Keeping Core Band to avoid the hassle of chargers. In most homes, there are already a lot of gadgets that need charging. The Keeping Core Band uses AAA batteries and because of the low power consumption it is possible for it to last up to 1 month assuming it takes 3 seconds per vibration and 100 vibrations per day.

 

Do you wear it directly over your skin?

We recommend wearing the Keeping Core Band over light clothing to avoid the band scratching the skin. This is especially for people who have sensitive skin.

 

Where exactly is Keeping Core Body worn?

For best results, it is recommended to be worn at the top of your stomach, below the belly button.

 

How long should I wear for a day?

The longer you wear it, the faster you can lose belly fat. The Keeping Core Band is not a device that gives external stimulus but is intended to induce continuous contraction of the abdomen. If you have a weak abdomen or suffer from back pain, it may be hard to wear it for a long time at first. We recommend that you gradually increase the wearing time.


Can vibration be heard by others?

We have done a lot of experiments with vibration, and we have reduced the noise as much as possible. Even with a lot of people around, the noise is inconspicuous. However, if worn with light clothing and you are in a quiet place, some people might be able to hear the slight vibration.


Would the electromagnetic wave be an issue?

The Keeping Core Band is KC certified. Rest assured that there are no electromagnetic waves.

 

Do you think wearing it on your waist will cause me to sweat?

Sweating varies from one person to another. The level of sweat or moisture does not affect its function. However, it is recommended to place the Keeping Core Band in a well ventilated place to help it dry properly and to avoid any unwanted smells.

 

PLEASE BACK US 

The Keeping Core Band is the simplest, easiest way to correct your posture and get rid of excess abdominal fat. Try it to believe!
We are ready to deliver our greatest invention to you.

story:
SeizSafe is a system that detects epileptic seizures that take place while sleeping and alerts the caregivers so that they can assist affected persons as soon as possible. It consists of a non-invasive device that is placed in the bed of affected people and sends alerts to the smartphone of the caregivers. 

SeizSafe also allows sharing all the information and videos captured with doctors so they can diagnose more precisely and prescribe more effective treatments.

 

Relatives usually sleep in the same room as affected people trying to detect when a seizure occurs. Nonetheless this reduces the intimacy, increases the feeling of dependence, worsens the sleep quality and most important: it is not very effective. In other scenarios like clinical environments it is not even feasible that caregivers stay the whole night with each affected person.

 

Epileptic seizures involve certain risks that can be mitigated with appropriate assistance to the affected people at the moment they are produced. During the day, people who suffer epileptic seizures are usually well attended, but during the night it is difficult to watch over and assist them.

SeizSafe improves the quality of life of both affected people and their caregivers, providing greater security, better rest and more independence and privacy. 
In addition, SeizSafe collects all data and video of the attacks and stores them in a cloud platform for analysis.

 

 

  • The motion sensor is placed on the mattress, under the sheets in a zone where it does not bother, and it is connected to the detection unit.

•  The detection unit monitors all the movements of the affected person and identifies epileptic seizures to warn the caregiver as soon as possible.

• The camera includes a support that can be placed on different surfaces 
to be able to capture in the plane the most part of the bed.

• The mobile app allows to receive alerts when a seizure occurs, 
to configure the system and to access all the registered information.

 

The main function of the mobile application of SeizSafe is to monitor patient seizures so the caregiver can give assistance. While a seizure is taking place, the transmission module starts streaming a video that can be watched live from the mobile application and then stored, so it can later be played from the application.

Furthermore, the user can modify the name and mode of the network generated by Seizsafe and adjust the levels of the seizure detection algorithm and the way in which the data is stored.

You can now find the app in Google Play and Apple Store.

 

 
 
 
 
 
 

 

 

 

 

 

Encore Lab is an IoT company founded in 2014. It is specialized in different fields, such as health, agriculture and environment. Nowadays, there are ten people working on the different products and projects it carries on. The team is mainly formed of designers and software and hardware engineers.

 

Currently Seizsafe is in a validation process with real users and research centers involved. After this task some redesigns could be needed. We do not expect to delay the market launch (June 2019) because of this, but technical issues could arise.

This development has been cofounder by the European Commission under the program H2020. With this campaign we aim to raise funds to build molds for serial production and to manufacture a first batch of devices.

 

Seizsafe has been tested by multiple hospitals and potential users, showing an accuracy of 97%.

Seizsafe detects every epileptic seizure with movement. The system is valid for tonic-clonic seizures and for some myoclonic ones, but not for absences.

Doctors and patients are the only ones allowed to watch the videos in the cloud platform. However, anyone allowed by the patient with the app installed is able to watch the epileptic seizures via streaming in order to help him.

Epileptic seizure recordings are saved on Seizsafe cloud, 
a completely secure platform.

No. It is always turned on, but it only records when an epileptic seizure is detected in order to alert the caregivers.

Yes. The only difference using the camera is that caregivers cannot access to the streaming. The device still detects the epileptic seizures and alert the people who assist the patients.

Furthermore, the user can modify the name and mode of the network generated by Seizsafe and adjust the levels of the seizure detection algorithm and the way in which the data is stored.
You can now find the app in  Google Play and Apple Store.
 

 
 

 

 

 

 

 


 


 





 


 

Encore Lab is an IoT company founded in 2014. It is specialized in different fields, such as health, agriculture and environment. Nowadays, there are ten people working on the different products and projects it carries on.  The team is mainly formed of designers and software and hardware engineers.
 

Currently Seizsafe is in a validation process with real users and research centers involved. After this task some redesigns could be needed. We do not expect to delay the market launch (June 2019) because of this, but technical issues could arise.
This development has been cofounder by the European Commission under the program H2020.  With this campaign we aim to raise funds to build molds for serial production and to manufacture a first batch of devices.
 


Seizsafe has been tested by multiple hospitals and potential users, showing an accuracy of 97%.

Seizsafe detects every epileptic seizure with movement. The system is valid for tonic-clonic seizures and for some myoclonic ones, but not for absences.

Doctors and patients are the only ones allowed to watch the videos in the cloud platform. However, anyone allowed by the patient with the app installed is able to watch the epileptic seizures via streaming in order to help him.

Epileptic seizure recordings are saved on Seizsafe cloud, a completely secure platform.

No. It is always turned on, but it only records when an epileptic seizure is detected in order to alert the caregivers.

Yes. The only difference using the camera is that caregivers cannot access to the streaming. The device still detects the epileptic seizures and alert the people who assist the patients.

story:
Occlusion X was founded in Australia back in 2009. While undertaking undergraduate studies in exercise and sport science co-founders James Wallace (Rehabilitation Consultant) and Joseph Marcus (Doctor of Physiotherapy) became fascinated with this relatively "new" form of resistance training. After countless hours of research, they both came to the realisation that what was taking place in the literature (strict exercise protocols, measurable restriction pressures, safety methods etc) were not being translated well to the general public. The use of potentially dangerous knee wraps are the norm where the pressures being exerted upon arteries and veins are unknown, often eliminating the benefit of the training as well as potentially completely restricting blood flow which can be dangerous. An affordable, reliable digital device was needed; fast forward nearly 5 years and Occlusion X is now available to pre-order; the worlds first digital, lightweight, affordable, blood flow restriction device with university studies underway.

This page contains an extremely brief summary of the benefits of Occlusion Training. For more in-depth information, see our, 'scientific research' page at www.occlusionx.com

What is Occlusion training / Blood flow restriction training?

  • Occlusion training involves the use of specialised pneumatic cuffs applied to the either the proximal arm or proximal leg, pumped up to a specific pressure.
  • This pressure is low enough that mean arterial inflow (blood flow to muscle) is maintained, but high enough to restrict blood traveling back to the heart (via veins) leading to pooling in the muscle.
  • This pooling of blood in the muscle is not dangerous and actually leads to positive physiological adaptions (strength and hypertrophy) when combined with low load resistance training.

 General benefits

  • Increased muscle size
  • Increased muscle strength
  • Increased bone density

 A small sample of the specific benefits of Occlusion Training

  • Training at intensities as low as 20% 1RM with moderate vascular occlusion results in muscle hypertrophy in as little as three weeks (making it beneficial for athletes, patients in post operation rehabilitation (specifically ACL injuries), the elderly and even astronauts (Loenneke 2009)
  • As little as 3 wk of treadmill walk training performed with intermittent BFR results in a 6-8% increase in quadriceps and hamstring muscle cross-sectional area (CSA) along with a 7-8% increase in leg press and leg curl 1-RM strength. (Abe 2006)
  • It has been observed that five sets of knee extension resistance exercise at 20% of maximal isometric strength with a thigh occlusion pressure of 280 mm Hg results in an acute ninefold increase in serum growth hormone (GH). (Pierce 2006)
  • Aerobic benefits have also been studied. A study by Abe et al 2010 demonstrated that a single mode of low intensity (40% of VO2max), short-duration (15 min) exercise training with BFR can elicit improvements in muscle volume in healthy young subjects. Aerobic capacity also improved concurrently following the training.
  • Despite using low mechanical load, low intensity vascular restriction training is a potentially effective training alternative to traditional high intensity resistance training for enhancing bone health in older men. (Karabulut et al 2011)

 Uses

  • Rehabilitation
  • Sports performance
  • Elderly populations

For more information please check out our website;

www.occlusionx.com

Or email us personally;

james@occlusionx.com (Co-founder)

joseph@occlusionx.com (Co-founder)

Risks and challenges

Before we began this campaign we spent 5 years developing this project which gives us a fair level of confidence that should a challenge arise, we are prepared and capable to overcome it.

We have ordered samples of our product a number of times, from various suppliers to ensure consistent, high quality products. Should we be fortunate enough to have our project funded, we plan to fly overseas to meet our chosen supplier in person to create a positive relationship with them in the hope that this improves the end product that you receive.

Our biggest challenge is the fact that our ideal design involves a number of completely custom parts. We believe we have suppliers that can fulfil this need, but the need for custom parts will limit our choice of suppliers and raise our costs. We do have a back up plan, where we decided which components of the design we could leave unchanged and still provide a fully functional device.

Overall our suppliers can provide huge volumes and we hope this Indiegogo project takes off as we truly believe Occlusion X is the future of strength and rehabilitation and we have the research to back it up.

Let us know if you have any questions and we are very keen for all feedback (good or bad) as well as any potential ideas or modifications that you feel would take this device to the next level.

story: Although we were not successful in securing funding through this campaign, the Tibet hot air balloon has now been built thanks to the very generous support of a special group of people who shared our vision. You can find more information about the project at www.tibetballoon.org.uk
